46001004	Nthaŵi zonse ndimayamika Mulungu wanga chifukwa cha inu , popeza kuti adakukomerani mtima mwa Khristu Yesu .
46001005	Zoonadi mwa Khrisru mwakhala anthu olemera pa zonse , makamaka pa kulankhula ndi pa kudziŵa zinthu ,
46001006	popeza kuti mau ochitira Khristu umboni akhazikika mwa inu .
46001007	Nchifukwa chake palibe mphatso yauzimu imene yakupereŵerani , pamene mukudikira kubweranso kwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
46001008	Iye adzakulimbitsani mpaka chimalizo , kuti mudzakhale opanda cholakwa pa tsiku la Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
46001009	Mulungu ndi wokhulupirika , ndipo Iye ndiye amene adakuitanani kuti mukhale a mtima umodzi ndi Mwana wake Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu .
46001010	Abale , ndikukupemphani m'dzina la Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu , kuti muzivomerezana pa zimene munena . Pasakhale kupatulana pakati panu , koma muzimvana kwenikweni pokhala a mtima umodzi ndi a maganizo amodzi .
46001011	Pakuti ena a m'banja la Koloe andifotokozera kuti pali kukangana pakati panu , abale anga .
46001012	Chimene ndikufuna kunena nchakuti aliyense mwa inu akungonena zakezake . Wina akuti , " Ine ndine wa Paulo , " winanso akuti , " Ine ndine wa Apolo , " wina akuti , " Ine ndine wa Kefa , " winanso akuti , " Ine ndine wa Khristu . "
46001013	Kodi Khristu wagaŵika ? Kodi adakuferani pa mtanda ndi Paulo ? Kodi mudabatizidwa m'dzina la Paulo ?
46001014	Ndimayamika Mulungu kuti pakati panupo sindidabatize wina aliyense , kupatula Krispo ndi Gayo basi .
46001015	Motero palibe amene anganene kuti adabatizidwa m'dzina langa .
46001016	Inde ndidabatizanso Stefanasi ndi a m'banja mwake , koma sindikumbukira kuti pali winanso amene ndidamubatiza .
46001017	Paja Khristu adandituma , osati kuti ndizibatiza ai , koma kuti ndizilalika Uthenga Wabwino . Ndipo ndiyenera kumaulalika mosagwiritsa ntchito luso lake la ulaliki , kuwopa kuti mtanda wa Khristu ungatheretu mphamvu .
46001018	Mau onena za imfa ya Khristu pa mtanda ndi chinthu chopusa kwa anthu amene akutayika , koma kwa ife amene tili pa njira ya chipulumutso , mauwo ndi mphamvu ya Mulungu .
46001019	Paja Malembo akuti , " Ndidzaononga nzeru za anthu anzeru , ndidzathetsa kuchenjera kwa anthu ochenjera . "
46001020	Nanga ali kuti anthu anzeru ? Ali kuti aphunzitsi a Malamulo a Mose ? Ali kuti anthu onyadira nzeru zamakono zapansipano ? Monga Mulungu sadaonetse kuti kudalira nzeru zapansipano nkopusa ?
46001021	Pakuti mwa nzeru zake Mulungu adakonzeratu kuti anthuwo asamdziŵe ndi nzeru zao . Koma kudamkomera Mulungu kupulumutsa anthu okhulupirira ndi mau opusa amene timalalika .
46001022	Ayuda amafuna kuwona zozizwitsa , pamene Agriki amafunafuna nzeru .
46001023	Koma ife timalalika Khristu amene adapachikidwa pa mtanda . Kwa Ayuda mau ameneŵa ndi okhumudwitsa , pamene kwa anthu a mitundu ina mauŵa ndi opusa .
46001024	Koma amene Mulungu adaŵaitana , kaya ndi Ayuda kaya ndi Agriki , onsewo amazindikira kuti Khristu ndi mphamvu ya Mulungu ndiponso nzeru ya Mulungu .
46001025	Pajatu chimene chimaoneka ngati kupusa kwa Mulungu , nchanzeru kupambana nzeru za anthu . Ndipo chimene chimaoneka ngati kufooka kwa Mulungu , nchamphamvu kupambana mphamvu za anthu .
46001026	Abale , taganizani m'mene munaliri pamene Mulungu adakuitanani . Pakati panu panalibe ambiri amene anthu ankaŵayesa anzeru . Panalibenso ambiri amphamvu , kapena obadwa m'mabanja omveka .
46001027	Koma Mulungu adasankha zimene anthu amaziyesa zopusa , kuti Iye anyazitse nazo anthu anzeru . Adasankhanso zimene anthu amaziyesa zofooka , kuti Iye anyazitse nazo anthu amphamvu .
46001028	Ndipo zimene anthu amaziyesa zachabe , zonyozeka ndi zosakhala zenizeni , Mulungu adazisankha kuti athetse mphamvu zinthu zimene iwowo amayesa kuti ndiye zenizeni .
46001029	Mulungu adachita zimenezi kuti pasakhale wina aliyense woti nkumadzitukumula pamaso pake .
46001030	Mulungu ndiye adakulunzanitsani ndi Khristu Yesu , ndipo adamsandutsa kuti akhale nzeru yathu . Chifukwa cha Yesu , timapezeka olungama pamaso pa Mulungu . Ndi Yesuyo amene amatisandutsa anthu akeake a Mulungu , ndiye amatipulumutsa .
46001031	Nchifukwa chake , monga Malembo anenera , " Wofuna kunyada , anyadire Ambuye . "
46002001	Abale , inetu pamene ndidafika kwanu kuti ndikulalikireni chinsinsi chimene Mulungu adatiwululira , sindidayese kulankhula mwaluso , ngati munthu wodziŵa zapatali .
46002002	Koma ndidaatsimikiza kuti pamene ndili pakati panu , ndiiŵale zina zonse , kupatula Yesu Khristu yekha , koma tsono amene adapachikidwa pa mtanda .
46002003	Choncho pamene ndidafika kwanuko , ndinali wofooka , ndiponso ndinkanjenjemera kwambiri ndi mantha .
46002004	Ndipo pamene ndinkalankhula kapena kulalika , sindinkalankhula moonetsa nzeru , kuyesa kukopa anthu , koma mau anga anali otsimikizika ndi mphamvu za Mzimu Woyera .
46002005	Ndinkachita zimenezi kuti chikhulupiriro chanu chisakhazikike pa nzeru za anthu , koma chikhazikike pa mphamvu za Mulungu .
46002006	Komabe pakati pa anthu okhwima m'chikhulupiriro , timalankhula zanzeru . Koma nzeruzo si za masiku anozi , kapena za akulu olamulira dziko lino lapansi , amene mphamvu zao nzodzatha .
46002007	Nzeru zimene timalankhula , ndi nzeru za Mulungu , zachinsinsi , zobisika kwa anthu . Mulungu asanalenge dziko lapansi , adaakonzeratu zimenezi kuti atipatse ulemerero .
46002008	Panalibiretu wolamulira wa masiku ano wodziŵa zimenezi . Akadazidziŵa , sakadapachika Ambuye aulemerero pa mtanda .
46002009	Koma ndi monga Malembo anenera kuti , " Maso a munthu sanaziwone , makutu a munthu sanazimve , mtima wa munthu sunaganizepo konse zimene Mulungu adaŵakonzera amene amamkonda . "
46002010	Ifeyo Mulungu adatiwululira zimenezi mwa Mzimu Woyera . Pajatu Mzimuyo amadziŵa zinthu zonse kotheratu , ngakhalenso maganizo ozama a Mulungu .
46002011	Kodi za munthu angazidziŵe ndani , osakhala mzimu wa mwiniwake yemweyo umene uli mwa iyeyo ? Momwemonso palibe munthu amene angadziŵe za Mulungu , koma Mzimu wa Mulungu Mwini .
46002012	Ife sitidalandire mzimu wa dziko lino lapansi , koma tidalandira Mzimu Woyera wochokera kwa Mulungu , kuti adzatithandize kumvetsa zimene Mulunguyo adatipatsa mwaulere .
46002013	Timalankhula zimenezi osati ndi mau ophunzitsidwa ndi nzeru za anthu , koma ndi mau amene Mzimu Woyera amatiphunzitsa . Timaphunzitsa zoona zauzimu kwa anthu amene ali naye Mzimu Woyera .
46002014	Munthu wodalira nzeru zake zokha sangalandire zimene zimachokera kwa Mzimu wa Mulungu . Amaziyesa zopusa , ndipo sangathe kuzimvetsa , popeza kuti zimalira kukhala ndi Mzimu Woyera kuti munthu azimvetse .
46002015	Munthu amene ali ndi Mzimu Woyera angathe kuzindikira khalidwe la zonse , ndipo palibe wina amene angathe kutsutsapo ai .
46002016	Ndi monga Malembo anenera kuti , " Ndani adadziŵa maganizo a Ambuye , kuti athe kuŵalangiza ? " Koma ife tili ndi maganizo a Khristu .
46003001	Tsono ine , abale , sindidathe kulankhula nanu monga momwe ndimalankhulira ndi anthu amene ali ndi Mzimu Woyera . Koma ndidaayenera kulankhula nanu ngati anthu odalira zapansipano , kapenanso ngati ana akhanda m'moyo wanu wachikhristu .
46003002	Ndidakumwetsani mkaka , osakupatsani chakudya cholimba , chifukwa simukadatha kuchidya . Ngakhalenso tsopano simungathe kuchidya ,
46003003	popeza kuti mukudalirabe zapansipano . Pakati panu pali kaduka ndi kukangana . Nanga zimenezi sizikutsimikiza kuti mukudalirabe zapansipano , ndipo kuti mumachita monga momwe amachitira anthu odalira zapansipanozo ?
46003004	Mumangoti ali apa , " Ine ndine wa Paulo , " ali apa , " Ine ndine wa Apolo . " Kodi mukamatero simukuchita ngati anthu odalira zapansipano ?
46003005	Kodi Apolo nchiyani ? Paulonso nchiyani ? Ndi atumiki chabe a Mulungu , amene adakufikitsani ku chikhulupiriro . Aliyense adangogwira ntchito imene Mulungu adampatsa .
46003006	Ineyo ndidabzala mbeu , Apolo nkuzithirira , koma amene adazimeretsa ndi Mulungu .
46003007	Motero wobzala kapenanso wothirira sali kanthu , koma Mulungu yekha amene amameretsa , ndiye ali kanthu .
46003008	Tsono wobzala sasiyana ndi wothirira , ndipo aliyense adzalandira mphotho yake molingana ndi ntchito imene adaigwira .
46003009	Komabe ife ndife okhaokha ogwira ntchito ya Mulungu , inuyo ndinu munda wa Mulungu , ndinunso nyumba ya Mulungu .
46003010	Popeza kuti Mulungu adachita kundituma , ndidakhazika maziko monga mmsiri waluso , ndipo wina akumanga pa mazikowo . Koma aliyense azichenjera pomanga .
46003011	Pajatu palibe maziko enanso amene wina aliyense angathe kukhazika osiyana ndi maziko amene alipo kale . Mazikowo ndi Yesu Khristu .
46003012	Pa mazikoŵa munthu angathe kumangapo ndi golide , siliva , miyala yamtengowapali , mitengo , udzu kapena mapesi .
46003013	Koma ntchito za munthu aliyense zidzaonekera poyera , pamene tsiku la chiweruzo lidzaziwonetsa . Pakuti tsikulo lidzafika ndi moto , ndipo motowo ndi umene udzayesa ntchito za munthu aliyense .
46003014	Zimene munthu adamanga pamazikopo zikadzakhalapobe , mwiniwakeyo adzalandira mphotho .
46003015	Koma zikadzanyeka ndi moto , sadzalandira mphotho . Inde mwiniwakeyo adzapulumukabe , koma monga ngati munthu amene wangopulumuka m'moto .
46003016	Kodi inu simudziŵa kuti ndinu nyumba ya Mulungu ndipo kuti Mzimu wa Mulungu amakhala mwa inu ?
46003017	Ngati wina aliyense aononga nyumba ya Mulunguyo , Mulungu nayenso adzamuwononga ameneyo . Pakuti nyumba ya Mulungu ndi yopatulika , ndipo nyumbayo ndinu amene .
46003018	Tsono musadzinyenge . Ngati wina mwa inu adziyesa wanzeru , kunena za nzeru za masiku ano , ameneyo ayambe wakhala ngati wopusa , kuti asanduke wanzeru .
46003019	Zoonadi nzeru za anthu odalira zapansipano , nzopusa pamaso pa Mulungu . Pajatu Malembo akuti , " Mulungu amakola anthu anzeru m'kuchenjera kwao . "
46003020	Penanso Malembo akuti , " Ambuye amaŵadziŵa maganizo a anthu anzeru kuti ndi achabe . "
46003021	Nchifukwa chake pasakhale wina aliyense wonyadira anthu chabe . Zinthu zonse nzanu :
46003022	Paulo , Apolo ndi Kefa , dziko lapansi , moyo ndi imfa , zimene zilipo ndi zimene zilikudza . Koma ngakhale zonsezi nzanu ,
46003023	inu ndinu ake a Khristu , ndipo Khristu ndi wake wa Mulungu .
46004001	Muzitiwona ngati antchito a Khristu , ngati akapitao osamala zinsinsi za Mulungu .
46004002	Chofunika chachikulu pa akapitao otere nchakuti akhale okhulupirika .
46004003	Kunena za ine ndekha , ndilibe nazo kanthu ngati ndiweruzidwa ndi inu , kapenanso ndi bwalo lina lililonse la anthu . Ndiponsotu ngakhale mwiniwakene sindidziweruza ndekha ai .
46004004	Ndilibe kanthu konditsutsa mumtima mwanga , komabe ngakhale chimenechi si chitsimikizo chakuti ndine wolungama . Ondiweruza ndi Ambuye basi .
46004005	Motero musaweruziretu munthu aliyense , Ambuye asanabwere . Iwo ndiwo adzaunika pa zonse zobisika mu mdima , ndipo adzaulula maganizo a m'mitima mwa anthu . Pamenepo aliyense adzalandira kwa Mulungu chiyamiko chomuyenerera .
46004006	Abale , zimene ndanenazi nzokhudza ine ndi Apolo . Ndifuna kuti zimenezi zikuphunzitseni tanthauzo la mau aja akuti , " Musapitirire zimene Malembo akunena . " Nchifukwa chake musamanyadira wina , ndi kupeputsa mnzake .
46004007	Nanga adakusiyanitsa ndi anthu ena ndani ? Kaya uli ndi chiyaninso chimene sudachite kuchilandira ? Tsono ngati udachita kuzilandira , ukunyadiranji ngati kuti sudangozilandira chabe ?
46004008	Ndiye kuti muli nazo kale zonse zimene mumasoŵa ! Ndiye kuti mwalemera kale ! Ndiye kuti mwasanduka mafumu popanda ife ! Ndikadakondwera mukadakhaladi mafumu , kuti ifenso tikhale mafumu pamodzi nanu .
46004009	Ndikuwona kuti atumwife Mulungu adatipatsa malo a kuthungo kwenikweni , ngati anthu oti akukaphedwa . Ndithu tasanduka ngati chinthu chochiwonetsa kwa zolengedwa zonse , osati anthu okha ai , komanso ndi angelo omwe .
46004010	Ife ndife opusa chifukwa cha Khristu , koma inu ndinu anzeru mwa Khristu . Ife ndife ofooka , koma inu ndinu amphamvu . Inu mumalandira ulemu , koma ife timanyozedwa .
46004011	Mpaka tsopano lino timamva njala ndi ludzu , ndipo ndife ausiŵa . Anthu akutimenya , ndipo tilibe pokhala penipeni .
46004012	Tikugwira ntchito kolimba ndi manja athu kuti tidzisunge . Anthu akamatichita chipongwe , timapempha kuti Mulungu aŵadalitse . Anthu akamatizunza , timangopirira .
46004013	Anthu akamatilalatira , timangoŵayankha moleza . Tasanduka onyozeka , ngati zinyatsi za dziko lapansi , ndipo mpaka tsopano anthu onse akutiyesa zinyalala .
46004014	Ndikukulemberani zonsezi , osati kuti ndikuchititseni manyazi , koma kuti ndikulangizeni , chifukwa ndinu ana anga okondedwa .
46004015	Ngakhale mutakhala nawo aphunzitsi ambirimbiri m'moyo wanu wachikhristu , simukhala ndi atate ambiri ai . Pajatu m'moyo wanu wachikhristu ine ndidachita ngati kukubalani pakukulalikirani Uthenga Wabwino .
46004016	Ndikukupemphani tsono kuti muzinditsanzira .
46004017	Nchifukwa chake ndakutumizirani Timoteo , mwana wanga wokondedwa ndi wokhulupirika mwa Ambuye . Iyeyu adzakukumbutsani za mayendedwe anga achikhristu , amene sasiyana ndi zimene ndimaphunzitsa ponseponse m'mipingo yonse .
46004018	Ena mwayamba kudzitukumula , monga ngati sindidzabwerako kwanu .
46004019	Koma Ambuye akalola , ndidzabwera kwanuko posachedwa . Pamenepo ndidzadziŵa zimene odzitukumulawo angathe kuchita , osati zimene amangonena chabe .
46004020	Pakuti mu Ufumu wa Mulungu chachikulu si mau chabe , koma ntchito .
46004021	Nanga mukufuna chiyani ? Mukufuna kuti ndidzabwere kwanuko ndi mkwapulo , kapena ndi mtima wachikondi ndi wofatsa ?
46005001	Mbiri yawanda ponseponse yonena kuti pakati panu pali dama . Ndipo damalo ndi la mtundu wakuti ndi anthu akunja omwe sachita . Ndamva ndithu kuti munthu wina akukhala ndi mkazi wa bambo wake .
46005002	Ndipo inu mukudzitukumulabe ! Kwenikweni mukadayenera kumva chisoni , ndi kumchotsa pakati panu munthu amene adachita zimeneziyo .
46005003	Kunena za ine , ngakhale sindili nanu pamodzi , komabe mtima wanga uli nanu ndithu . Mwakuti ndamuweruza kale munthu amene adachita zimeneziyo , monga ngati ndili nanu pamodzi .
46005004	Tsono mutasonkhana m'dzina la Ambuye Yesu , inenso m'maganizo ndili nanu pomwepo , ndi mphamvu ya Ambuye athu Yesu ,
46005005	munthuyo mumpereke kwa Satana , kuti thupi lake liwonongedwe , ndipo pakutero mzimu wake udzapulumutsidwe pa tsiku la Ambuye .
46005006	Pamenepo palibe choti inu nkunyadira ai . Kodi simuŵadziŵa mau aja akuti , " Chofufumitsira buledi chapang'ono chimafufumitsa mkate wonse ? "
46005007	Muchotse chofufumitsira chakalechi cha uchimo , kuti mukhale oyera mtima ndithu , ngati buledi watsopano wosafufumitsa , monga momwe muliri ndithu , pakuti Khristu , Mwanawankhosa wathu wa Paska , adaphedwa kale ngati nsembe .
46005008	Tiyeni tsono , tichite chikondwererocho , osati ndi chofufumitsira chakale chija cha uchimo ndi cha kuipa mtima , koma ndi buledi wosafufumitsa , wa kuyera mtima ndi wa choona .
46005009	M'kalata imene ndidaakulemberani , ndidaakuuzani kuti musamayanjane nawo anthu adama .
46005010	Sindiye kuti muziŵapewa anthu onse apansipano amene ali adama , aumbombo , achifwamba , kapena opembedza mafano ai . Kuti mutero kukadafunika kuti mungochokamo m'dziko lino lapansi .
46005011	Koma ndidaakulemberani kuti musamayanjane ndi munthu amene amati ndi mkhristu , pamene chikhalirecho ndi munthu wadama , kapena waumbombo , wopembedza mafano , waugogodi , chidakwa , kapena wachifwamba . Munthu wotere musamadye naye nkomwe .
46005012	Nanga kuweruza anthu amene adakali kunja , ndi ntchito yanga ngati ? Si koma amene ali mu mpingo ndiwo muyenera kuŵaweruza ?
46005013	Ndi Mulungu amene amaweruza anthu akunjawo . Paja mau a Mulungu akuti , " Munfhu woipayo mumchotse pakati panu . "
46006001	Ngati wina ali ndi mlandu ndi mkhristu mnzake , angathe bwanji kukauzengetsa kwa oweruza amene ali akunja , osati kwa akhristu anzake ?
46006002	Kodi simukudziŵa kuti akhristu ndiwo adzaweruza anthu onse ? Tsono ngati inu mudzaweruza anthu onse , kodi simungathe kuweruza ngakhale ndi timilandu tating'ono tomwe ?
46006003	Kodi simukudziŵa kuti tidzaweruza angelo ? Nanji zinthu za moyo wapansipano ?
46006004	Tsono ngati muli ndi milandu pa zinthu zotere , bwanji mumaika anthu amene mpingo suŵayesa kanthu kuti aiweruze ?
46006005	Ndikunena zimenezi kuti ndikuchititseni manyazi . Kodi mwa inu palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe wanzeru , amene angathe kuweruza mlandu pakati pa akhristu anzake ?
46006006	Bwanji mkhristu akuimba mlandu mkhristu mnzake , mlanduwo nkuupereka kwa anthu akunja kuti auzenge ?
46006007	Chokha chakuti mumaimbana milandu inu nokhanokha , chatsimikiza kale kuti mwalephereratu . Bwanji osangopirira pamene ena akulakwirani ? Bwanji osangolola kuti inuyo akubereni ?
46006008	Koma inuyo ndi amene mukulakwira ena , ndipo mukuŵabera , ngakhale iwowo ndi akhristu anzanu !
46006009	Kani simudziŵa kuti anthu osalungama sadzaulaŵa Ufumu wa Mulungu ? Musadzinyenge : anthu adama , opembedza mafano , achigololo , ochimwa ndi amuna anzao ,
46006010	mbala , aumbombo , zidakwa , augogodi , kapena achifwamba , ameneŵa sadzaulaŵa Ufumu wa Mulungu .
46006011	Enanu munali otere kale , koma mudayeretsedwa , mudasanduka anthu a Mulungu , ndipo mudapezeka olungama pamaso pake . Zimenezi zidachitika m'dzina la Ambuye Yesu Khristu , ndiponso mwa Mzimu wa Mulungu wathu .
46006012	Zinthu zonse nzololedwa kwa ine , koma si zonse zili ndi phindu . Zonse nzololedwadi kwa ine , koma sindingalole kuti chilichonse chindigonjetse .
46006013	Chakudya , kwake nkuloŵa m'mimba , ndipo mimba , kwake nkulandira chakudya . Koma Mulungu adzaononga ziŵiri zonsezo . Thupi la munthu si lochitira dama , koma ndi la Ambuye , ndipo Ambuye ndiwo mwiniwake thupilo .
46006014	Mulungu adaukitsa Ambuye kwa akufa , ndipo mwa mphamvu yake adzatiwukitsa ifenso .
46006015	Kodi inu simudziŵa kuti matupi anu ndi ziwalo za Khristu ? Monga tsono ine nkutenga ziwalo za Khristu nkuzisandutsa ziwalo za mkazi wadama ? Chosatheka !
46006016	Kaya simudziŵa kuti munthu amene amadzipereka kwa mkazi wadama , iyeyo ndi mkaziyo amasanduka thupi limodzi ? Paja Malembo akuti , " Aŵiriwo adzasanduka thupi limodzi . "
46006017	Koma amene amadzipereka kwa Ambuye , iyeyo ndi Ambuye amakhala mzimu umodzi .
46006018	Thaŵani dama . Tchimo lina lililonse limene munthu amachita , siliipitsa thupi lake , koma munthu wadama amachimwira thupi lake lomwe .
46006019	Kodi simudziŵa kuti thupi lanu ndi nyumba ya Mzimu Woyera ? Mulungu adakupatsani Mzimuyo kuti akhale mwa inu . Nchifukwa chake moyo umene muli nawo si wanunso .
46006020	Mulungu adakugulani ndi mtengo wapatali , tsono muzimlemekeza ndi matupi anu .
46007001	Tsopano ndiyankhe zimene mudandifunsa m'kalata yanu . Nkwabwino kuti munthu asakwatire ,
46007002	koma kuwopa dama , mwamuna aliyense akhale ndi mkazi wakewake , ndipo mkazi aliyense akhale ndi mwamuna wakewake .
46007003	Mwamuna azipereka kwa mkazi wake zomuyenerera zokhudza banja ngati mkazi wake , momwemonso mkazi azipereka kwa mwamuna wake zomuyenerera zokhudza banja ngati mwamuna wake .
46007004	Mkazi thupi lake si lokhalira iye yekha ai , ndi lokhaliranso ndi mwamuna wake yemwe . Momwemonso mwamuna thupi lake si lokhalira iye yekha ai , ndi lokhaliranso ndi mkazi wake yemwe .
46007005	Musamakanane , koma pokhapokha mutavomerezana kutero pa kanthaŵi kuti mudzipereke ku mapemphero . Pambuyo pake mukhalenso pamodzi , kuwopa kuti Satana angakuyeseni chifukwa cha kulephera kudzigwira .
46007006	Pamene ndikunena zimenezi , sindikuchita mokulamulani ai , koma mokulolani chabe .
46007007	Kwenikweni ndikadakonda kuti anthu onse akhale ngati ine , koma Mulungu adapatsa munthu aliyense mphatso yakeyake , wina tnphatso yakuti , winanso yakuti .
46007008	Kwa amene sali pa banja , ndiponso kwa azimai amasiye , mau anga ndi aŵa : Nkwabwino kuti iwo akhalebe paokha choncho ngati ineyo .
46007009	Koma ngati sangathe kudziletsa , aloŵe m'banja , pakuti nkwabwino kuloŵa m'banja kupambana kupsa ndi moto wa zilakolako .
46007010	Kwa anthu am'banja lamulo langa , limenetu kwenikweni ndi lochokera kwa Ambuye , ndi ili : Mkazi asalekane ndi mwamuna wake .
46007011	Koma ngati amuleka , akhale wosakwatiwanso , kapena ayanjane nayenso mwamuna wakeyo . Chimodzimodzinso mwamuna asasudzule mkazi wake .
46007012	Kwa ena mau anga , osati a Ambuye ai , ndi aŵa : Ngati mkhristu ali ndi mkazi wachikunja , ndipo mkaziyo avomera kukhala naye , mwamunayo asathetse ukwatiwo .
46007013	Momwemonso ngati mkhristu wamkazi ali ndi mwamuna wachikunja , ndipo mwamunayo avomera kukhala naye , mkaziyo asathetse ukwatiwo .
46007014	Pakuti mwamuna wacMkunja uja amadalitsidwa chifukwa cha mkazi wakeyo . Nayenso mkazi wachikunja uja amadalitsidwa chifukwa cha mwamuna wakeyo . Pakadapanda apo , bwenzi ana anu atakhala akunja , koma monga zilirimu , ndi ana a Mulungu .
46007015	Koma ngati wakunja uja afuna kuleka mkhristu , amuleke . Zikatero , ndiye kuti mkhristu wamwamunayo kapena wamkaziyo ali ndi ufulu . Mulungu adakuitanani kuti mukhale ndi moyo wamtendere .
46007016	Kodi iwe , mkazi wachikhristu , ungadziŵe bwanji ngati udzampulumutsa mwamuna wako ? Kapenanso iwe , mwamuna wachikhristu , ungadziŵe bwanji ngati udzapulumutsa mkazi wako ?
46007017	Aliyense atsate moyo umene Ambuye adamkonzera , moyo umene Mulungu adamuitanira . Ndizo zimene ndimaŵalamula anthu onse amumpingo .
46007018	Ngati wina Mulungu adamuitana ali woumbalidwa , asavutike nkubisa kuumbala kwakeko . Chimodzimodzi ngati wina adamuitana ali wosaumbalidwa , asaumbalidwe .
46007019	Kuumbala si kanthu ai , kusaumbala si kanthunso . Kanthu nkutsata malamulo a Mulungu .
46007020	Aliyense angokhala monga momwe analiri pamene Mulungu adamuitana .
46007021	Kodi unali kapolo pamene Mulungu adakuitana ? Usavutike nazo . Komanso ngati upeza mwai woti ulandire ufulu , uugwiritse ntchito mwaiwo .
46007022	Pakuti munthu amene anali kapolo pamene Ambuye adamuitana , ameneyo ndi mfulu ya Ambuye . Momwemonso amene anali mfulu pamene Ambuye adamuitana , ameneyo ndi kapolo wa Khristu .
46007023	Mulungu adakugulani ndi mtengo wapatali , tsono musasanduke akapolo a anthu .
46007024	Abale , aliyense angokhala pamaso pa Mulungu monga momwe analiri pamene Mulunguyo adamuitana .
46007025	Kunena za amene sali pa banja , ndilibe lamulo lochokera kwa Ambuye . Koma ndikuuzani maganizo anga , ngati munthu amene Ambuye adandichitira chifundo kuti ndikhale wokhulupirika .
46007026	Chifukwa cha masautso a nthaŵi ino , ndiyesa nkwabwino kuti munthu akhale monga momwe aliri .
46007027	Kodi ndiwe wapabanja ? Usayese kuthetsa banja lako . Kodi ndiwe wopanda banja ? Usayese kupeza banja .
46007028	Komabe ngati ukwatira , sukuchimwa ai . Ndipo ngati namwali akwatiwa , sakuchimwa ai . Komabe oloŵa m'banja adzakumana ndi zovuta m'moyo wao , ndipo pano ndingofuna kukupewetsani zovutazo .
46007029	Chimene ndikukuuzani , abale , nchakuti nthaŵi yachepa . Kuyambira tsopano anthu okwatira akhale monga ngati sadakwatire .
46007030	Amene akulira , akhale monga ngati sakulira , amene akukondwa , akhale monga ngati sakukondwa , amene akugula zinthu , akhale monga ngati sali nazo zinthuzo .
46007031	Ndipo amene akugwiritsa ntchito zinthu zapansipano , zisaŵagwire mtima zinthuzo . Pakuti dziko lino lapansi , monga liliri tsopanomu , likupita .
46007032	Ndidakakonda kuti pasakhale zokudetsani nkhaŵa . Munthu wosakwatira amangotekeseka ndi za Ambuye , kuganiza za m'mene angakondweretsere Ambuye .
46007033	Koma munthu wokwatira amatekeseka ndi zapansipano , kuganiza za m'mene angakondweretsere mkazi wake .
46007034	Motero amagwira njakata . Mkazi wosakwatiwa , kapenanso namwali , amangotekeseka ndi za Ambuye , kuti adzipereke kwa Ambuye m'thupi ndi mumzimu momwe . Koma mkazi wokwatiwa amatekeseka ndi zapansipano , kuganiza za m'mene angakondweretsere mwamuna wake .
46007035	Ndikunenatu zimenezi kufuna kuti ndikuthandizeni , osati kuti ndikuletseni ufulu wanu ai . Makamaka ndifuna kuti muzichita zonse moyenera , ndipo kuti muzidzipereka kwathunthu potumikira Ambuye ,
46007036	Koma ngati wina akuganiza kuti akumlakwira namwali wake amene adamtomera , ndipo ngati namwaliyo unamwali wake ukupitirira , tsono munthuyo nkuganiza kuti ayenera kumkwatira , angathe kuchita zimenezo , si kuchimwa ai .
46007037	Komabe ngati wina , mwaufulu wake , popanda womukakamiza , watsimikiza kwenikweni kuti samkwatira namwali adamtomerayo , nayenso wachita bwino .
46007038	Ndiye kuti , munthu wokwatira namwali amene adamtomera , akuchita bwino , koma woleka osamkwatira , akuchita bwino koposa .
46007039	Mkazi amamangika ndi lamulo la ukwati , nthaŵi yonse pamene mwamuna wake ali moyo . Koma mwamuna wake akamwalira , ali ndi ufulu kukwatiwa ndi mwamuna amene iye afuna , malinga ukwatiwo ukhale wachikhristu .
46007040	Koma m'mene ndikuganizira ine , adzakhala wokondwa koposa ngati akhala wosakwatiwanso . Ndipo ndikuyesa inenso ndili naye Mzimu wa Mulungu .
46008001	Tsopano ndifuna kunena za chakudya choperekedwa kwa mafano . Nzoonadi kuti tonse tili nazo nzeru , komatu nzeru zokha zimangotukumula anthu . Chikondi ndicho chimapindulitsa .
46008002	Munthu amene amadziyesa wodziŵa kanthu , ndiye kuti sakudziŵabe kwenikweni monga momwe akadayenera kudziŵira .
46008003	Koma munthu akamakonda Mulungu , ndiye kuti amadziŵika ndi Mulungu .
46008004	Ndinene tsono za chakudya choperekedwa kwa mafano . Tikudziŵa kuti fano si kanthu konse , ndiponso kuti palibe mulungu wina , koma Mulungu mmodzi yekha .
46008005	Ena amati kuli zinthu zina kumwambaku , kapena pansi pano , zimene iwo amazitchula milungu , ndipo anthuwo ali nayodi milungu yambiri , ndi ambuye ambiri .
46008006	Koma kwa ife , Mulungu ndi mmodzi yekha , ndiye Atate , amene adalenga zonse , ndipo moyo wathu umalinga kwa Iye . Tilinso ndi Ambuye amodzi okha , Yesu Khristu . Mulungu adalenga zonse kudzera mwa Iye , ndipo ife tili ndi moyo chifukwa cha Iye .
46008007	Komabe si onse amene amadziŵa zimenezi . Ena adazoloŵera kupembedza mafano , ndipo mpaka lero akamadya chakudya choperekedwa kwa mafano , amaganiza ndithu kuti chakudyacho chidaperekedwadi kwa mafano . Tsono popeza kuti ali ndi mitima yofooka , mitima yaoyo imaipitsidwa .
46008008	Nzoona kuti chakudya sichitifikitsa pafupi ndi Mulungu . Tikapanda kudya chakudyacho , sititayapo kanthu , komanso tikachidya , sitipindulapo kanthu .
46008009	Komabe chenjerani kuti ufulu wanuwu pochita zinthu , ungaphunthwitse ena amene chikhulupiriro chao nchosalimba kwenikweni .
46008010	Ngati iweyo amene uli wodziŵa udya m'nyumba yopembedzeramo fano , nanga tsono munthu wosadziŵa kwenikweni , atakuwona ukuchita zimenezi , kodi chimenechi sichidzamlimbitsa mtima kuti nayenso azidya chakudya choperekedwa kwa mafano ?
46008011	Motero amene chikhulupiriro chake nchosalimba kwenikweni , adzatayika chifukwa cha iwe amene uli wodziŵa . Chonsecho tsono iyeyo ndi mbale wako amene Khristu adamufera !
46008012	Mukamachimwira abale anu achikhristu motero , ndi kulakwitsa amene ali ndi mitima yofooka , mukuchimwiranso ndi Khristu yemwe .
46008013	Nchifukwa chake , ngati chakudya chingaphunthwitse mbale wanga waclukhristu , sindidzadya konse nyama , kuti ndingamuphunthwitse mbale wangayo .
46009001	Kodi sindine mfulu ? Kodi sindine mtumwi ? Kodi suja ine ndidamuwona Yesu Ambuye athu ? Kodi suja inu ndinu zipatso za ntchito yanga yogwirira Ambuye ?
46009002	Ngakhaletu ena sandiyesa mtumwi , koma kwa inu ndine mtumwi ndithu , pakuti moyo wanu wachikhristu ndi umboni wakuti ndinedi mtumwi .
46009003	Zimene ndimaŵayankha ofufuza za ine ndi izi :
46009004	Kodi si koyenerera kwa ife kumalandira chakudya ndi chakumwa ?
46009005	Kodi si koyenerera kwa ife kuti ŵaakazi azitsagana nafe pa maulendo athu , monga zikuchitikira ndi atumwi ena ngakhalenso abale a Ambuye ndiponso Kefa .
46009006	Kodi ine ndi Barnabasi , ndife tokha oyenera kugwira ntchito zamanja kuti tizidzipezera tokha zotisoŵa .
46009007	Kodi alipo msilikali womadzipezera yekha zofunika zonse ? Kodi alipo munthu wobzala mpesa , koma osadyako zipatso zake ? Kodi alipo munthu wokhala ndi ziŵeto , koma osamwako mkaka wake ?
46009008	Kodi zimene ndikunenazi ndi nzeru za anthu chabe ? Suja Malamulo a Mose amanena zomwezi ?
46009009	Paja timaŵerenga m'Malamulowo kuti , " Usaimange pakamwa ng'ombe pamene ikupuntha tirigu . " Kodi pamene adanena zimenezi , Mulungu adangosamala za ng'ombe zokha ?
46009010	Kodi sankanena zimenezi makamaka chifukwa cha ife ? Adazilembadi chifukwa cha ife , pakuti wolima ndiponso wopuntha , onsewo amagwira ntchito yao ndi chiyembekezo chakuti nawonso adzalandirako kanthu pa zokolola .
46009011	Ngati ife tidafesa zabwino zauzimu pakati panu , nanga tilekerenji kulandira kwa inu zotisoŵa m'moyo wathu wathupi ?
46009012	Ngati ena adziyesa kuti ndi oyenera kulandira zimenezi kwa inu , nanga ife sindiye oyenera koposa iwowo kuzilandira ? Komabe kuyenera kumeneku sitidakugwiritse ntchito ai . Makamaka tidapirira zonse , kuwopa kuti tingachedwetse anthu mwa njira iliyonse kulandira Uthenga Wabwino wonena za Khristu .
46009013	Kodi simudziŵa kuti otumikira m'Nyumba ya Mulungu , amadya chakudya cha m'Nyumbamo , ndipo kuti opereka nsembe pa guwa lansembe , amalandira nao zansembezo ?
46009014	Momwemonso Ambuye adalamula kuti olalika Uthenga Wabwino , azilandira zoŵasunga pakulalika Uthengawo .
46009015	Koma ineyo sindinkagwiritsa ntchito konse lamulo limeneli . Ndiponso sindikulemba kalatayi chifukwa chofuna kuligwiritsa ntchito kumene . Kwenikweni ndikadakonda kuti ndife , kupambana kuti wina andichotsere chifukwa chimene ndimanyadira .
46009016	Komabe pamene ndikulalika Uthenga Wabwino , apo pokha palibe ponyadira ai , popeza kuti ndi Ambuye amene adachita kundilamula zimenezo . Tsoka kwa ine ngati sindiulalika Uthenga Wabwinowo .
46009017	Ngatitu ndikugwira ntchitoyi mofuna ine ndekha , ndiye kuti ndilandirapo mphotho . Koma ngati ndiigwira mosafuna ine ndekha , ndiye kuti ntchitoyo ndi udindo umene Ambuye adandipatsa .
46009018	Pamenepo tsono mphotho yanga ndi yotani ? Mphotho yanga ndi yakuti ndikamalalika Uthenga Wabwino , ndizingoulalika mwaulere , osafuna kulandirapo malipiro aja amene ndikadayenera kulandira polalika Uthenga Wabwinowo .
46009019	Ndine mfulu , osati kapolo wa munthu wina aliyense ai , komabe ndidadzisandutsa kapolo wa anthu onse , kuti ndikope anthu ambiri .
46009020	Kwa Ayuda ndidakhala ngati Myuda , kuti ndiŵakope . Ngakhale ineyo sindilamulidwa ndi Malamulo a Mose , komabe kwa Ayuda amene ali olamulidwa ndi Malamulowo , ndidakhala ngati iwo omwe , kuti ndiŵakope .
46009021	Kwa amene alibe Malamulo a Mose , ndidakhala ngati iwo omwe , kuti ndiŵakope . Sindiye kuti ndilibe Malamulo a Mulungu ai , popeza kuti ndili nawo malamulo a Khristu .
46009022	Kwa amene ali ndi chikhulupiriro chofooka , ndidakhala ngati wa chikhulupiriro chofooka , kuti ndiŵakope ofookawo . Kwa anthu onse ndidakhala ngati iwo omwe , kuti ngati nkotheka ndikope ena mwa iwo .
46009023	Zonsezi ndimazichita chifukwa cha Uthenga Wabwino , kuti inenso ndilandire nao madalitso a Uthengawo .
46009024	Monga inu simudziŵa kuti pa mpikisano wa liŵiro onse amathamanga , koma mmodzi yekha ndiye amalandira mphotho ? Tsono kuthamanga kwanu kukhale kwakuti nkukalandira mphothoyo .
46009025	Aliyense wothamanga pa mpikisano wa liŵiro amadziletsa pa zonse . Iwowo amachita zimenezi kuti akalandire mphotho ya nkhata yamaluŵa yotha kufota . Koma mphotho imene ife tidzalandira , ndi yosafota .
46009026	Nchifukwa chake ndimathamanga monga munthu wodziŵa kumene walinga . Ndiponso ndikamachita mpikisano womenyana , sindichita ngati munthu amene angomenya mophonya .
46009027	Ndimazunza thupi langa ndi kuligonjetsa , kuti likhale ngati kapolo wondimvera . Ndimachita zimenezi kuwopa kuti ine ndemwe , amene ndidaitana ena ku mpikisano , ndingapezeke wosayenera kuchita nao mpikisanowo .
46010001	Abale , ndifuna kuti mudziŵe zimene zidaŵachitikira makolo athu akale aja . Onse adayenda mu mthunzi wa mtambo , ndipo onse adaoloka Nyanja Yofiira .
46010002	Motero mumtambomo ndi n'nyanjamo onsewo adachita ngati kubatizidwa ndi kukhala amodzi ndi Mose .
46010003	Onse ankadya chakudya chauzimu chimodzimodzi .
46010004	Onse ankamwanso chakumwa chauzimu chimodzimodzi , pakuti analikumwa m'thanthwe lauzimu limene linkaŵatsatira . Thanthwelo linali Khristu yemwe .
46010005	Komabe ambirimbiri mwa iwo Mulungu sadakondwere nawo , kotero kuti adafera m'chipululu .
46010006	Tsono zimene zidachitikazi ndi zitsanzo zotichenjeza ife , kuti tisamasirira zoipa monga adaachitira iwowo .
46010007	Tisakhale opembedza mafano , monga analiri ena mwa iwo . Paja Malembo akuti , " Anthu adakhala pansi kuti adye ndi kumwa , kenaka nkuimirira kuti azivina . "
46010008	Tisachite dama monga momwe adaachitira ena mwa iwo : paja pa tsiku limodzi adafa anthu zikwi makumi aŵiri ndi zitatu .
46010009	Tisapute Ambuye monga momwe adaaŵaputira ena mwa iwo : paja anthuwo adaphedwa ndi njoka .
46010010	Musadandaule monga momwe adaadandaulira ena mwa iwo : paja adaphedwa ndi mngelo wodzetsa imfa .
46010011	Zonsezi zidaŵagwera makolo athuwo kuti zikhale zoŵachenjeza . Ndipo zidalembedwa kuti tipezepo phunziro ifeyo , amene tikuyandikira nthaŵi ya kutha kwa zonse .
46010012	Tsono amene akuganiza kuti waimirira molimba , achenjere kuti angagwe .
46010013	Mayeso amene inu mwakumana nawo , sasiyana ndi mayeso amene anthu ena onse adakumana nawo . Mulungu ndi wokhulupirika , sangalole kuti muyesedwe kopitirira mphamvu zanu . Koma pamene mudzayesedwa , Iye yemwe adzakukonzerani njira yopulumukira , pakukupatsani mphamvu kuti mupirire .
46010014	Tsono okondedwa anga , pewani kupembedza mafano .
46010015	Ndikulankhula nanu ngati anthu anzeru . Muweruze nokha zimene ndikunenazi .
46010016	Nanga chikho chimene timachidalitsa mothokoza Mulungu , kodi suja timaphatikizana ndi magazi a Khristu tikamweramo ? Nanga mkate urnene timaunyema , kodi suja timaphatikizana ndi thupi la Khristu tikaudya ?
46010017	Popeza kuti mkate ndi umodzi wokha , ife tonse , ngakhale tili ambiri , ndife thupi limodzi , chifukwa tonse timagaŵana mkate umodzi womwewo .
46010018	Onani zimene amachita Ayuda . Nanga amene amadyako zoperekedwa nsembe , kodi suja amachita nao miyambo ya pa guwa lansembelo ?
46010019	Tsono tanthauzo la zimene ndikunenazi nchiyani ? Kodi ndiye kuti nsembe yoperekedwa kwa fano nkanthu ? Kapena kuti fanolo nkanthu ?
46010020	Iyai , koma kuti zimene anthu akunja amapereka nsembe , amapereka kwa Satana , osati kwa Mulungu . Sindifuna kuti inu muyanjane ndi Satana .
46010021	Simungathe kumwera m'chikho cha Ambuye nkumweranso m'chikho cha Satana . Simungathe kudyera pa tebulo la Ambuye nkudyeranso pa tebulo la Satana .
46010022	Kodi tichite kuŵaputa dala Ambuye ? Kodi mphamvu zathu nkupambana zao ?
46010023	Zinthu zonse nzololedwa , koma si zonse zili ndi phindu . Zonse nzololedwa , koma si zonse zimathandiza .
46010024	Munthu asamangodaftinira yekha zabwino , koma makamaka azifunira anzake zabwino .
46010025	Mungathe kudya nyama iliyonse imene amagulitsa pa msika , osafunsa mafunso okhudzana ndi m'mene mtima wanu umamvera .
46010026	Paja Malembo akuti , " Dziko lapansi ndi zonse zam'menemo ndi za Chauta . "
46010027	Mkunja akakuitanani kuti mukadye naye , inuyo nkuvomera kupitako , mukadye chilichonse chimene akakupatseni . Musakafunse mafunso okhudzana ndi m'mene mtima wanu umamvera .
46010028	Koma wina akakuuzani kuti , " Nyama iyi idaperekedwa kwa mafano , " apo ndiye musadye nyamayo . Chifukwa cha amene wakuuzayo , usadye nyamayo , kuwopa kuti mtima ungavutike .
46010029	Osati kuti iweyo ungavutike mu mtima ai , koma iye uja amene wakuuzayo . Pamenepo udzati , " Kodi ufulu wanga utsekerezedwe chifukwa munthu wina mtima wake ukumuvuta ?
46010030	Ngati ine ndikuthokoza Mulungu chifukwa cha chakudya changa , nanga munthu angandinyoze bwanji chifukwa cha chakudya chimene ndikuchilandira mothokoza Mulungu ? "
46010031	Tsono , kaya mulikudya , kaya mulikumwa , kaya mukuchita chilichonse , muzichita zonse kuti mulemekeze Mulungu .
46010032	Moyo wanu ukhale wosaphunthwitsa Ayuda , kapena anthu a mitundu ina , kapenanso Mpingo wa Mulungu .
46010033	Muzichita monga momwe ndimachitira ine . Ndimayesa kukondweretsa anthu onse pa zonse . Sindifunafuna zokomera ineyo , koma ndimafunafuna zokomera anthu onse , kuti apulumuke .
46011001	Muzinditsanzira ine monga momwe inenso ndimatsanzira Khristu .
46011002	Ndikukuyamikani chifukwa mumandikumbukira pa zonse , ndipo mumasunga miyambo imene ndidakusiyirani .
46011003	Koma ndifuna kuti mudziŵe kuti Khristu ndiye mutu wa mwamuna aliyense , mwamuna ndiye mutu wa mkazi , ndipo Mulungu ndiye mutu wa Khristu .
46011004	Ngati mwamuna apemphera kapena kulalika mau a Mulungu , atavala kanthu kumutu , akunyoza mutu wake .
46011005	Koma mkazi akamapemphera kapena kulalika mau a Mulungu , osavala kanthu kumutu , akunyoza mutu wake . Kuteroko sikusiyana ndi kungometa mpala .
46011006	Ngati mkazi sazivala kanthu kumutu , kunali bwino atangodula tsitsi lake . Koma popeza kuti nchamanyazi kwa mkazi kumeta mpala , kapena kudula tsitsi lake , ndiyetu azivala kanthu kumutu .
46011007	Kwa mwamuna palibe chifukwa choti azivalira kanthu kumutu , pakuti amaonetsa maonekedwe ndi ulemerero wa Mulungu . Koma mkazi amaonetsa ulemerero wa mwamuna .
46011008	Pajatu mwamuna sadapangidwe kuchokera kwa mkazi , koma mkazi ndiye adapangidwa kuchokera kwa mwamuna .
46011009	Ndiponso mwamuna sadalengedwe chifukwa cha mkazi , koma mkazi ndiye adalengedwa chifukwa cha mwamuna .
46011010	Tsono , chifukwa cha angelo , mkazi azivala kanthu kumutu , kuti chikhale chizindikiro cha ulemu wake .
46011011	Komabe m'maso mwa Ambuye mkazi sali kanthu popanda mwamuna , ndiponso mwamuna sali kanthu popanda mkazi .
46011012	Inde mkazi adapangidwa kuchokera kwa mwamuna , komanso tsopano mwamuna amabadwa mwa mkazi . Ndipo zinthu zonse zimachokera kwa Mulungu .
46011013	Weruzani nokha ngati nkoyenera kuti mkazi azipembedza Mulungu osavala kanthu kumutu .
46011014	Kodi chibadwa chathu chomwe sichitiphunzitsa kuti nchamanyazi kwa mwamuna kukhala ndi tsitsi lalitali ,
46011015	koma kuti kwa mkazi nchaulemu ? Mulungu adapatsa mkazi tsitsi lalitali loti aziphimbira mutu wake .
46011016	Tsono ngati wina afuna kutsutsapo pa zimenezi , ndingoti ife ndiponso mipingo ya Mulungu tilibe mwambo wina ai ndi womwewu basi .
46011017	Tsopano pali mfundo ina imene sindingakuyamikireni . Ndiye kuti misonkhano yanu imabweretsa zoipa osati zabwino ai .
46011018	Choyamba , ndikumva kuti mukamasonkhana mu mpingo , mumapatulana . Ndipo ndikhulupirira kuti zimenezi kwinaku nzoona .
46011019	Nkofunika ndithu kuti pakhale kusiyana maganizo pakati panu , kuti amene ali okhoza pakati panu adziŵike .
46011020	Pamene musonkhana pamodzi , chimene mumadyatu si Mgonero wa Ambuye .
46011021	Inu mumati mukamadya , aliyense angoyambapo kudya chakudya chakechake , kotero kuti wina amakhala ndi njala , m'menemo wina waledzera .
46011022	Zokuwonerani zimenezi ! Kodi mulibe nyumba zomakadyeramo ndi kumweramo ? Kodi kapena mufuna kunyazitsa Mpingo wa Mulungu ndi kuŵachititsa manyazi amene alibe kanthu , eti ? Ndikuuzeni chiyani tsono ? Ndingakuyamikeni ngati ? Iyai , pa zimenezi sindingakuyamikeni konse .
46011023	Inetu zimene ndidalandira kwa Ambuye ndi zimene nanenso ndidazipereka kwa inu , zakuti usiku umene adaperekedwa uja , Ambuye Yesu adaatenga mkate .
46011024	Ndipo atathokoza Mulungu , adaunyemanyema nati , " Ili ndi thupi langa limene likuperekedwa chifukwa cha inu . Muzichita zimenezi kuti muzindikumbukira . "
46011025	Momwemonso atatha kudya , Ambuye Yesu adatenga chikho nati , " Chikhochi ndi chipangano chatsopano chotsimikizika ndi magazi anga . Nthaŵi zonse mukamamwa chikho chimenechi , muzindikumbukira . "
46011026	Pakuti nthaŵi zonse mukamadya mkate umenewu , ndi kumwa chikho chimenechi , mumalalika imfa ya Ambuye , mpaka adzabwerenso .
46011027	Nchifukwa chake tsono , munthu akadya mkate umenewu , kapena kumwa chikho cha Ambuyechi mosayenera , apalamula mlandu wonyoza thupi la Ambuye ndiponso magazi ao .
46011028	Koma munthu aziyamba wadziwona bwino asanadyeko mkate umenewu ndi kumwa chikho chimenechi .
46011029	Pakuti amene adya mkate umenewu ndi kumwa chikho chimenechi , koma osalizindikira thupi la Ambuye , akudziitanira chilango pamene akudya ndi kumwa .
46011030	Nchifukwa chake ambiri mwa inu akudwala , akufooka , ndipo ena amwalirapo kale .
46011031	Tikadadziyang'ana bwino , sitikadalangidwa .
46011032	Koma Ambuye amatilanga , kuti tiphunzirepo nzeru , kuwopa kuti tingaimbidwe mlandu pamodzi ndi anthu odalira zapansipano .
46011033	Tsono abale anga , pamene musonkhana kuti mudye Mgonero wa Ambuye , muzidikirana .
46011034	Ngati wina ali ndi njala , ayambe wadya kwao , kuti Mulungu angakulangeni chifukwa cha kusonkhana kwanu . Koma zina zimene sindidatchule , ndidzazilongosola ndikabwera .
46012001	Abale , ndifuna kuti muzindikire bwino za mphatso za Mzimu Woyera .
46012002	Mukudziŵa kuti pamene munali akunja , anthu ankakusokezani mwa njira izi ndi izi , kukukokerani ku mafano osalankhula .
46012003	Nchifukwa chake ndikukuuzani kuti munthu amene Mzimu wa Mulungu amamtsogolera , sanganene kuti , " Yesu atembereredwe . " Ndiponso , munthu amene Mzimu Woyera samtsogolera , sanganene kuti , " Yesu ndi Ambuye . "
46012004	Tsonotu pali mphatso zamitundumitundu , koma wozipereka ndi Mzimu Woyera mmodzimodzi .
46012005	Pali njira zosiyanasiyana zotumikira , koma Ambuye amene timaŵatumikira ndi amodzimodzi .
46012006	Pali mphamvu zosiyanasiyana , koma Mulungu ndi mmodzimodzi amene amagwiritsa ntchito mphamvu zonsezo mwa munthu aliyense .
46012007	Mzimu Woyera amapatsa munthu aliyense mphatso yakutiyakuti yoti aigwiritse ntchito yopindulitsa anthu onse .
46012008	Mzimu Woyera amapatsa munthu wina mphatso ya kulankhula zanzeru , ndipo Mzimu Woyera yemweyo amapatsa wina mphatso ya kulankhula mau olangiza anthu .
46012009	Mzimu Woyera yemweyo amapatsa wina mphatso ya kukhulupirira , ndipo Mzimu Woyera mmodzi yemweyo amapatsa wina mphatso ya kuchiritsa matenda .
46012010	Amapatsa wina mphamvu zochitira zozizwitsa , wina mphatso ya kulalika mau a Mulungu , wina nzeru za kusiyanitsa pakati pa zinthu zochokera kwa Mzimu Woyera ndi zochokera kwina . Amapatsa wina mphatso ya kulankhula zilankhulo zosadziŵika , ndipo amapatsa wina mphatso ya kutanthauzira zilankhulozo .
46012011	Amene amachititsa anthu zonsezi ndi Mzimu Woyera mmodzi yemweyo . Amagaŵira munthu aliyense monga momwe Iye afuna kumgaŵira .
46012012	Khristu ali ngati thupi limodzi limene lili ndi ziwalo zambiri . Ngakhale ziwalozo nzambiri , komabe thupilo ndi limodzi lokha .
46012013	Pajatu ngakhale ndife Ayuda kapena a mitundu ina , akapolo kapena mfulu , tidabatizidwa mwa Mzimu Woyera mmodzimodzi kuti tikhale thupi limodzi . Ndipo tonse tidalandira nao Mzimu Woyera mmodzi yemweyo .
46012014	Thupitu si chiwalo chimodzi chokha ai , koma lili ndi ziwalo zambiri .
46012015	Nanga phazi litanena kuti , " Poti sindine dzanja , ndiye kuti sindine chiwalo cha thupi " , kodi silikhala chiwalo cha thupi chifukwa cha chimenecho ?
46012016	Nanga khutu Iitanena kuti , " Poti sindine diso , ndiye kuti sindine chiwalo cha thupi " , kodi silikhala chiwalo cha thupi chifukwa cha chimenecho ?
46012017	Kodi thupi lonse likadakhala diso lokha , bwenzi munthu akumva bwanji ? Kapena thupi lonse likadakhala khutu lokha , bwenzi munthu akununkhiza bwanji ?
46012018	Koma m'mene ziliri Mulungu adaika chiwalo chilichonse pamalo pake m'thupi , monga momwe adafunira .
46012019	Ziwalo zonse zikadangokhala chiwalo chimodzi , sipakadakhala thupi konse .
46012020	Komatu ziwalo nzambiri , ngakhale thupi ndi limodzi lokha .
46012021	Motero diso silingauze dzanja kuti , " Ndilibe nawe ntchito . " Ndiponso mutu sungauze mapazi kuti , " Ndilibe nanu ntchito . "
46012022	Kwenikwenitu ziwalo zimene zimaoneka ngati zofooka , ndizo zofunika kopambana .
46012023	Ziwalo zimene timaziyesa zotsika , ndizo timazilemekeza kopambana . Ndipo ziwalo za thupi lathu zimene zili zochititsa manyazi , ndizo timaziveka kopambana .
46012024	Koma zimene zili zooneka bwino , nkosafunikira kuti tiziveke motero . Mulungu polumikiza ziwalo za thupi , adazilumikiza mwa njira yoti adapereka ulemu woposa kwa ziwalo zimene zimausoŵadi ulemuwo .
46012025	Adachita zimenezi kuti pasakhale kugaŵikana m'thupi , koma kuti ziwalo zonse zizisamalirana .
46012026	Chiwalo chimodzi chikamamva kuŵaŵa , ziwalo zonse zimamvanso kuŵaŵa . Chiwalo chimodzi chikamalandira ulemu , ziwalo zonse zimakondwa nao .
46012027	Tsono inuyo nonse pamodzi ndinu thupi la Khristu , ndipo aliyense mwa inu ndi chiwalo cha thupilo .
46012028	Mulungu mu Mpingo wake adaika anthu aŵa : poyamba atumwi , kachiŵiri aneneri , kachitatu aphunzitsi . Adaikanso anthu amene ali ndi mphamvu za kuchita zozizwitsa , ena amene ali ndi mphamvu za kuchiritsa matenda , ena amene ali ndi mphatso ya kulongosola ntchito , ndiponso ena amene ali ndi mphatso ya kulankhula zilankhulo zosadziŵika .
46012029	Kodi onse ndi atumwi ? Kodi onse ndi aneneri ? Kodi onse ndi aphunzitsi ? Kodi onse ali ndi mphamvu za kuchita zozizwitsa ?
46012030	Kodi onse ali ndi mphatso ya kuchiritsa matenda ? Kodi onse angathe kulankhula zilankhulo zosadziŵika ? Kodi onse angathe kuzitanthauzira ?
46012031	Iyai , koma inu muike mtima wanu pa mphatso zopambana . Tsonotu ndikuwonetseni njira yopambana kwenikweni :
46013001	Ngakhale nditamalankhula zilankhulo za anthu kapenanso za angelo , koma ngati ndilibe chikondi , ndili ngati chitsulo chongolira , kapena chinganga chosokosera .
46013002	Ngakhale nditakhala ndi mphatso ya uneneri , ngakhale nditamadziŵa zobisika zonse , ndi kumamvetsa zinthu zonse , ngakhale nditakhala ndi chikhulupiriro chachikulu chakuti ndingathe kusuntha mapiri , koma ngati ndilibe chikondi , sindili kanthu konse .
46013003	Ndipo ngakhale nditagaŵira amphaŵi chuma changa chonse , kapena kupereka thupi langa kuti anthu alitenthe , koma ngati ndilibe chikondi , ndiye kuti changa palibe .
46013004	Chikondi ncholeza mtima ndiponso nchofatsa . Chikondi chilibe kaduka , ndipo sichidzitamanda kapena kudzikuza .
46013005	Chikondi chilibe matama kapena chipongwe , sichidzikonda , sichikwiya , sichisunga mangaŵa .
46013006	Sichikondwerera zosalungama , koma chimakondwerera choona .
46013007	Chikondi chimakhululukira zonse , chimakhulupirira nthaŵi zonse , sichitaya mtima , ndipo chimapirira onse .
46013008	Chikondi nchosatha . Uneneri udzatha , kulankhula zilankhulo zosadziŵika kudzalekeka , ndipo nzeru za anthu zidzatha .
46013009	Paja timangodziŵa zinthu mopereŵera , ndipo kulalika kwathunso nkopereŵera ,
46013010	koma changwiro chikadzaoneka , chopereŵeracho chidzatha .
46013011	Pamene ine ndinali mwana , ndinkalankhula mwachibwana , ndinkaganiza mwachibwana ndipo zinthu ndinkazitengera chibwana . Koma nditakula , ndidazileka zachibwanazo .
46013012	Tsopano timaona zinthu ngati m'galasi , zosaoneka bwino kwenikweni . Koma pa nthaŵiyo tidzaona chamaso ndithu . Tsopano ndimangodziŵa mopereŵera , koma pa nthaŵiyo ndidzamvetsa kotheratu , monga momwe Mulungu akundidziŵira ine kotheratu .
46013013	Choncho pakali pano zilipo zinthu zitatuzi : chikhulupiriro , chiyembekezo ndi chikondi . Koma mwa zonsezi chopambana ndi chikondi .
46014001	Muziyesetsa kukhala nacho chikondi , komanso muike mtima pa mphatso zimene Mzimu Woyera amapereka , makamaka mphatso ya kulankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu .
46014002	Munthutu wolankhula chilankhulo chosadziŵika , salankhula ndi anthu ai , koma ndi Mulungu . Palibe munthu womvetsa zimene iyeyo akunena , Mzimu Woyera ndiye amamlankhulitsa zachinsinsi .
46014003	Koma wolankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , amalankhula ndi anthu , ndipo amaŵathandiza , amaŵalimbitsa mtima ndi kuŵasangalatsa .
46014004	Munthu wolankhula chilankhulo chosadziŵika , amangothandizidwa yekha , koma wolankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , amathandiza mpingo .
46014005	Ndikadakonda kuti nonsenu mukhale nayo mphatso ya kulankhula zilankhulo zosadziŵika , koma makamaka ndikadakonda kuti nonsenu mukhale ndi mphatso ya kulankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu . Pakuti munthu wolankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , ndiye wofunika kwambiri kuposa wolankhula zilankhulo zosadziŵika , ngati palibe munthu wotanthauzira zilankhulo , kuti mpingo upindulepo .
46014006	Abale , mudzapindulanji ngati ndibwera kwa inu nkumadzalankhula m'zilankhulo zosadziŵika ? Simudzapindula konse ndi kulankhula kwangako , ngati m'mau angawo mulibe zina zimene Mulungu wandiwululira , kapena zina zopatsa nzeru , kapena zina zimene Mulungu andipatsa kuti ndinene , kapenanso phunziro lina .
46014007	Ndi ngati zipangizo zopanda moyo zimene zili ndi liwu , monga toliro kapena zeze . Woziliza akapanda kusiyanitsa bwino maliwu ake , womvera sangadziŵe nyimbo imene ikuimbidwa .
46014008	Ndiponso woliza lipenga akapanda kuliliza momveka bwino , ndani angakonzekere nkhondo ?
46014009	Inunso chimodzimodzi : munthu angadziŵe bwanji zimene mukulankhula , ngati polankhula simunena mau omveka bwino ? Pamenepo mudzangotaya mau anu pachabe .
46014010	Mosapeneka konse pali zilankhulo zamitundumitundu pa dziko lapansi , ndipo palibe ndi chimodzi chomwe chimene mau ake alibe tanthauzo .
46014011	Koma ngati ine sindidziŵa tanthauzo la mau a m'chilankhulo , ndidzakhala mlendo kwa amene akulankhula , ndipo iyenso adzakhala mlendo kwa ine .
46014012	Inunso chimodzimodzi : popeza kuti mwaika mtima pa mphatso za Mzimu Woyera , muziyesetsa kuzigwiritsa ntchito , makamaka mphatso zolimbikitsa mpingo .
46014013	Nchifukwa chake munthu wolankhula chilankhulo chosadziŵika , apemphere kuti alandirenso mphatso ya kuchitanthauzira .
46014014	Ngati ndipemphera m'chilankhulo chosadziŵika , mtima wanga ukupemphera inde , koma nzeru zanga sizipindulapo kanthu pamenepo .
46014015	Nanga pamenepa nkutani ? Ndidzapemphera ndi mtima wanga , komanso ndi nzeru zanga . Ndidzaimba ndi mtima wanga , komanso ndi nzeru zanga .
46014016	Mukayamika Mulungu ndi mtima wanu wokha , nanga munthu amene ali nanu pamodzi , koma sadziŵa zamumtimazo , angavomereze bwanji kuti , " Amen ! " pa pemphero lanu lothokoza Mulungu , pamene sakudziŵa zimene inuyo mukunena .
46014017	Ngakhale inu muthokoze Mulungu bwinobwino , koma munthu winayo sapindulapo konse .
46014018	Ndikuthokoza Mulungu kuti ine ndimalankhula m'zilankhulo zosadziŵika kuposa nonsenu .
46014019	Komabe mu msonkhano wa mpingo , m'malo molankhula mau ochuluka m'chilankhulo chosadziŵika , ndingakonde kwambiri kunena mau asanu okha omveka bwino , kuti ndiphunzitsire anthu .
46014020	Abale , musamaganiza zachibwana . Pa zoipa , khalani ngati ana osadziŵa , koma pa maganizo anu , mukhale okhwima .
46014021	M'Malembo mudalembedwa kuti , " Ndidzalankhula ndi mtundu uwu kudzera mwa anthu a zilankhulo zachilendo , ndiponso ndi pakamwa pa anthu achilendo . Koma ngakhale nditero , sadzandimvera , akutero Chauta . "
46014022	Motero kulankhula m'zilankhulo zosadziŵika , ndi chizindikiro kwa anthu osakhulupirira , osati kwa anthu okhulupirira . Koma kulankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , ndi chizindikiro kwa anthu okhulupirira , osati kwa osakhulupirira .
46014023	Tsono ngati mpingo wonse usonkhana pamodzi , ndipo onse ayamba kulankhula zilankhulo zosadziŵika , nanga mukaloŵa anthu osadziŵa kapena osakhulupirira , kodi iwo sadzayesa kuti ndinu amisala ?
46014024	Koma ngati onse alankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , ndipo munthu wosakhulupirira kapena wosadziŵa aloŵa , adzatsutsidwa ndi zonse zimene akumva . Mau onsewo adzamuloŵa mu mtima ,
46014025	ndipo zobisika za mumtima mwake zidzaonekera poyera . Pamenepo iye adzadzigwetsa choŵerama pansi ndi kupembedza Mulungu , ndipo adzavomereza kuti Mulungu ali pakati panudi .
46014026	Ndiye titani tsono , abale ? Pamene musonkhana pamodzi , aliyense angathe kukhala ndi nyimbo , kapena phunziro loti aphunzitse , kapena kanthu kena kamene Mulungu wamuululira , kapena mau oti alankhule m'chilankhulo chosadziŵika , ndipo wina afuna kutanthauzira mauwo . Komatu cholinga cha zonsezi chikhale kulimbikitsa mpingo .
46014027	Ngati alipo ena ofuna kulankhula m'chilankhulo chosadziŵika , alankhule aŵiri okha , kapena atatu , koma osapitirira pamenepo . Alankhule modikirana , ndipo pakhale wina wotanthauzira mauwo .
46014028	Koma ngati palibe munthu wotha kutanthauzira mauwo , iyeyo akhale chete mu msonkhano , ndipo azingolankhula ndi Mulungu payekha .
46014029	Kunena za olankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , aŵiri kapena atatu alankhule , ndipo ena onse aweruze zimene iwowo akunena .
46014030	Koma Mulungu akaulula kanthu kwa munthu wina amene ali pomwepo , amene akulankhulayo akhale chete .
46014031	Nonsenu mungathe kulankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu malinga nkupatsana mpata , kuti onse aphunzire ndi kulimbikitsidwa .
46014032	Anthu amene ali ndi mphatso ya kulankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , adziŵe kuilamulira mphatsoyo .
46014033	Mulungu safuna chisokonezo ai , koma mtendere . Monga zimachitikira m'mipingo yonse ya anthu a Mulungu ,
46014034	akazi akhale chete m'misonkhano ya mpingo , pakuti iwo saloledwa kulankhula . Monga Malamulo a Mose anenera , akazi azikhala omvera .
46014035	Ngati ali ndi mafunso , akafunse amuna ao kunyumba . Pajatu nchamanyazi kuti mkazi alankhule mu msonkhano wa mpingo .
46014036	Monga nkuti mau a Mulungu adachokera kwa inu ? Kaya kapena adafika kwa inu nokha ?
46014037	Ngati wina akuyesa kuti akulankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , kapena kuti akuuzidwa mau ndi Mzimu Woyera , avomereze kuti zimene ndikukulemberanizi ndi lamulo lochokera kwa Ambuye .
46014038	Ngati munthuyo savomereza zimenezi , Mulungunso samuvomereza iyeyo .
46014039	Nchifukwa chake tsono , abale anga , ikani mtima pa kulankhula mau ochokera kwa Mulungu , ndipo musaletse anthu kulankhula zilankhulo zosadziŵika .
46014040	Koma tsono , zonse zizichitika moyenera ndi molongosoka .
46015001	Abale , ndifuna kukukumbutsani Uthenga Wabwino umene ndidakulalikirani . Mudaulandira , ndipo mudakhazikitsapo chikhulupiriro chanu molimba .
46015002	Mulungu adzakupulumutsani ndi Uthenga Wabwinowu , ngati musunga bwino mau ake monga ndidakulalikirani . Popanda kutero , bwenzi mutangokhulupirira pachabe .
46015003	Pajatu mau aakulu amene ndidakupatsani ndi omwewo amene inenso ndidalandira . Mauwo ndi akuti Khristu adafera machimo athu , monga Malembo anenera .
46015004	Adaikidwa m'manda , mkucha wake adauka , monga Malembo anenera .
46015005	Motero adaonekera Kefa , kenaka atumwi khumi ndi aŵiri aja .
46015006	Pambuyo pake adaonekera abale opitirira mazana asanu pa nthaŵi imodzi . Ambiri mwa iwowo akalipo , ena adamwalira .
46015007	Ndipo adaonekera Yakobo , kenaka atumwi onse .
46015008	Potsiriza , pambuyo pa onse adandiwonekeranso ineyo , ngakhale ndili ngati mpolo chabe .
46015009	Inetu ndine wamng'onong'onodi mwa atumwi onse . Sindine woyenera konse kuti ndizitchedwa mtumwi , pakuti ndinkazunza Mpingo wa Mulungu .
46015010	Koma chifukwa chakuti Mulungu adandikomera mtima , ndili monga ndilirimu . Ndipo kukoma mtima kwakeko sikunali kopanda phindu , popeza kuti ndidagwira ntchito koposa atumwi ena onse . Komabe si ndine ndidaigwira , koma mphamvu za Mulungu zimene zikundilimbikitsa .
46015011	Motero kaya ndi ineyo kaya ndi iwowo , zimene timalalika ndi zomwezo , zimene mudakhulupirira ndi zomwezonso .
46015012	Tsono popeza kuti chimene timalalika ndi chakuti Khristu adauka kwa akufa , bwanji ena mwa inu akunena kuti , " Anthu akufa sadzaukanso ? "
46015013	Ngati akufa sadzauka , ndiye kuti Khristunso sadauke .
46015014	Tsono ngati Khristu sadauke , kulalika kwathu nkwachabe , ndipo chikhulupiriro chanu nchachabenso .
46015015	Ngati zili choncho , ndiye kuti ndife mboni zonama , tikuchita umboni wonama m'dzina la Mulungu , ponena kuti Mulungu adaukitsa Khristu . Ngati nzoonadi kuti akufa sauka , ndiye kuti Mulungu sadamuukitse Khristuyo .
46015016	Pakuti ngati akufa sauka , Khristunso sadauke .
46015017	Ndipotu ngati Khristu sadauke , chikhulupiriro chanu nchopanda pake , ndipo mukadali m'machimo anu .
46015018	Pamenepo nawonso amene adamwalira ali okhulupirira Khristu , adatayika ndithu .
46015019	Ngati taika chikhulupiriro chathu mwa Khristu chifukwa cha moyo uno wokha , ndiye kuti ndife omvetsa chisoni koposa anthu ena onse .
46015020	Koma ai , Khristu adauka ndithu kwa akufa . Pakati pa onse amene adafa , ndiye woyamba kuuka .
46015021	Pakuti monga imfa idadza pansi pano kudzera mwa munthu wina , momwemonso kuuka kwa akufa kudadza kudzera mwa munthu wina .
46015022	Monga anthu onse amamwalira chifukwa ndi ana a Adamu , momwemonso anthu onse adzauka chifukwa cholumikizana ndi Khristu .
46015023	Koma aliyense adzauka pa nthaŵi yake : woyambirira ndi Khristu , ndipo pambuyo pake , pamene Khristuyo adzabwera , nawonso amene ali ake adzauka .
46015024	Pamenepo chimalizo chidzafika . Khristu atathetsa ufumu wonse , ulamuliro wonse , ndi mphamvu zonse , adzapereka ufumu uja kwa Mulungu Atate .
46015025	Paja Khristu ayenera kulamulira mpaka atagonjetsa adani ake onse .
46015026	Mdani wotsiriza kumthetsa mphamvu , ndiye imfa .
46015027	Malembotu akuti , " Mulungu adamgonjetsera zinthu zonse . " Koma nchodziŵikiratu kuti pamene akuti " zinthu zonse , " sakuphatikizapo ndi Mulungu yemwe , amene adagonjetsera Khristu zinthu zonse .
46015028	Koma pamene zonse zidzakhala zitagonjera Khristu , pamenepo Mwana wa Mulungu nayenso adzagonjera Mulungu , amene adarngonjetsera zinthu zonse . Adzachita zimenezi kuti Mulungu akhale wolamulira aliyense kwathunthu .
46015029	Ngati Yesu sadauke kwa akufa , nanga amafunanji anthu amene amabatizidwa m'malo mwa amene adafa ? Ngati akufa sauka konse , nanga chifukwa chiyani anthu amabatizidwa m'malo mwao ?
46015030	Nanga pamenepo ifenso timakhaliranji m'zoopsa nthaŵi zonse ?
46015031	Abale anga , imfa ndimayenda nayo tsiku ndi tsiku . Ndikunenetsa zimenezi chifukwa ndimakunyadirani mwa Khristu Yesu Ambuye athu .
46015032	Nanga pamene ndidalimbana ndi zilombo ku Efeso , ndidapindulapo chiyani , ngati ndinkatsata maganizo a anthu chabe ? Ndiyetu ngati akufa sauka , tizingochita monga amanenera kuti , " Tiyeni tizidya ndi kumwa , pakuti maŵa tikufa . "
46015033	Musadzinyenge . " Paja kuyanjana ndi anthu ochimwa kumaononga khalidwe . "
46015034	Mudzidzimuke mumtima mwanu , ndipo muleke kuchimwa . Ena mwa inu sadziŵa Mulungu konse . Ndikukuuzani zimenezi kuti muchite manyazi .
46015035	Koma kapena wina nkufunsa kuti , " Kodi akufa adzauka bwanji ? Kodi adzakhala ndi thupi lotani ? "
46015036	Ati kupusa ati ! Mbeu imene umafesa , siingamere ndi kukhala moyo itapanda kufa .
46015037	Ndipo chimene ufesa , si mmera umene udzatuluka ai , koma ndi njere chabe , kaya ndi ya tirigu , kapena ya mtundu wina uliwonse .
46015038	Koma Mulungu amaisandutsa mmera monga momwe Iye akufunira , mbeu iliyonse mmera wakutiwakuti .
46015039	Mnofu sukhala wa mtundu umodzi . Pali mnofu wina wa anthu , wina wa nyama , wina wa mbalame , ndi wina wa nsomba .
46015040	Palinso zolengedwa zakuthambo , ndi zina zapansipano . Koma ulemerero wa zakuthambo ndi wosiyana ndi ulemerero wa zapansipano .
46015041	Dzuŵa lili ndi kuŵala kwake , mwezi uli ndi kuŵala kwake kosiyana ndi kwa dzuŵa kuja , nyenyezinso zili ndi kuŵala kwake kosiyana ndi kwa zina zija . Ngakhale nyenyezizo zimasiyananso kuŵala kwake .
46015042	Zidzateronso pamene akufa adzauka . Thupi loikidwa m'nthaka ngati mbeu yofesa , limaola , koma likadzauka , lidzakhala losaola .
46015043	Thupi loikidwa m'manda , ndi lonyozeka ndi lofooka , koma likadzauka lidzakhala lokongola ndi lamphamvu .
46015044	Thupi loikidwa m'manda , ndi lamnofu chabe , koma likadzauka , lidzakhala lauzimu . Ngati pali thupi lamnofu , palinso thupi lauzimu .
46015045	Paja Malembo akuti , " Munthu woyamba uja , Adamu , adachita kusanduka chinthu chamnofu chokhala ndi moyo . " Koma Adamu wotsiriza adakhala chinthu chauzimu chopatsa moyo .
46015046	Loyamba si thupi lauzimu ai . Loyamba ndi lamnofu , pambuyo pake lauzimu .
46015047	Adamu woyamba uja anali wochokera ku dothi , anali wapansipano . Koma Khristu , Adamu wachiŵiri uja , anali wochokera Kumwamba .
46015048	Anthu onse apansipano ali ngati Adamu wopangidwa ndi dothi uja . Ndipo onse amene ali a Kumwamba , ali ngati Khristu wa Kumwamba .
46015049	Monga takhala ofanafana ndi Adamu , munthu wopangidwa ndi dothi uja , momwemonso tidzakhala ofanafana ndi Khristu , munthu wa Kumwamba .
46015050	Abale , chimene ndikunena nchakuti munthu ndi thupi lake lamnofuli sangathe kuloŵa mu Ufumu wa Mulungu , ndipo zimene zimaola , sizingathe kuloŵa kumene zinthu siziwola .
46015051	Mvetsetsani , ndikuuzeni chinsinsi . Sikuti tonse tidzamwalira , komabe tonse tidzasandulika .
46015052	Zidzachitika mwadzidzidzi , pa kamphindi ngati kuphethira kwa diso , pamene lipenga lotsiriza lidzalira . Likadzaliratu lipengalo , akufa adzauka ndi matupi amene sangaole , ndipo ife tidzasandulika .
46015053	Pakuti thupi lotha kuwolali liyenera kusanduka losatha kuwola , ndipo thupi lotha kufali liyenera kusanduka losatha kufa .
46015054	Tsono thupi lotha kuwolali likadzasanduka losatha kuwola , ndipo thupi lotha kufali likadzasanduka losatha kufa , pamenepo zidzachitikadi zimene Malembo adanena kuti , " Imfa yagonjetsedwa kwathunthu . "
46015055	" Iwe imfa , kupambana kwako kuli kuti ? Iwe imfa , ululu wako uli kuti ? "
46015056	Ululu wake wa imfa ndi uchimo , ndipo chimene chimapatsa uchimo mphamvu , ndi Malamulo .
46015057	Koma tiyamike Mulungu amene amatipambanitsa mwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
46015058	Tsono abale anga okondedwa , limbikani , khalani osagwedezeka , gwirani ntchito ya Ambuye mwachangu masiku onse , podziŵa kuti ntchito zimene mumagwirira Ambuye sizili zopanda phindu .
46016001	Kunena za zopereka zothandizira akhristu a ku Yerusalemu , inunso muchite monga momwe ndidalongosolera m'mipingo ya ku Galatiya .
46016002	Pa tsiku loyamba la sabata , aliyense mwa inu azipatulapo kanthu , potsata momwe wapezera . Zimene wapatulazo azisunge kunyumba , kuti pasakakhalenso kusonkhasonkha ine ndikabwera .
46016003	Tsono ndikadzafika , ndidzaŵapatsa makalata anthu amene mungaŵasankhe , ndipo ndidzaŵatuma kuti akapereke mphatso yanuyo ku Yerusalemu .
46016004	Koma ngati nkofunika kuti inenso ndipite , tidzapitira limodzi .
46016005	Ndidzafika kwanuko nditadutsa dziko la Masedoniya , pakuti ndingodzerako ku Masedoniyako .
46016006	Koma kapena kwanuko ndidzakhala kanthaŵi , kapenanso nyengo yonse yachisanu . Ndifuna kuti pambuyo pake mudzandithandize kupitiriza ulendo wanga kulikonse kumene ndingapite .
46016007	Ulendo umenewo sindifuna kungokuwonani chidule modutsa chabe , koma ndikuyembekeza kukhala nanu kanthaŵi ndithu , Ambuye akalola .
46016008	Koma ndikhala ku Efeso kuno mpaka chikondwerero cha Pentekoste .
46016009	Pakuti pano mwai ulipo woti nkuchita zazikulu , ndiponsotu adani alipo ambiri .
46016010	Ngati Timoteo afika kwanuko , samalani kuti pasakhale kanthu komdetsa nkhaŵa pakati panu , pakuti iyenso akugwira ntchito ya Ambuye , monga ine .
46016011	Tsono wina aliyense asamnyoze , koma mumthandize kupitiriza ulendo wake mwamtendere kubwerera kuli ine kuno . Paja ndikumuyembekeza pamodzi ndi abale ena .
46016012	Kunena za mbale wathu , Apolo , ndamuumiriza kolimba kuti pamodzi ndi abale ena abwere kwanuko kudzakuwonani , koma iye sadafune kupita tsopano . Akadzapeza mpata wabwino , adzabwera .
46016013	Khalani maso , khalani okhazikika m'chikhulupiriro chanu , chitani chamuna , khalani amphamvu .
46016014	Zonse zimene muchita , muzichite mwachikondi .
46016015	Abale , mukudziŵa kuti Stefanasi ndi a m'banja mwake ndiwo adayambirira kuloŵa chikhristu m'dziko la Akaiya . Ndipo akhala akudzipereka kutumikira anthu a Mulungu .
46016016	Tsono ndikukupemphani kuti inunso muziŵamvera anthu otere , ndiponso aliyense wogwira ntchito ndi kutumikira modzipereka pamodzi nawo .
46016017	Ndakondwa kuti Stefanasi , Fortunato ndi Akaiko afika , pakuti ngakhale inu simuli nane , iwo achita ngati kuloŵa m'malo wanu .
46016018	Adandisangulutsa ine monga adasangulutsanso inu . Anthu otere muziŵalemekeza .
46016019	Mipingo ya ku dziko la Asiya ikuti moni . Akwila ndi Prisika , pamodzi ndi mpingo umene umasonkhana m'nyumba mwao , akuti moni kwa inu nonse , akhristu anzao .
46016020	Abale onse akuti moni . Mupatsane moni mwa chikondi chenicheni .
46016021	Ineyo Paulo , ndikuchita kulemba ndekha mau aŵa akuti " Moni . "
46016022	Ngati munthu sakonda Ambuye , akhale wotembereredwa . Maranatha ! ' Ambuye athu , bwerani !
46016023	Ambuye Yesu akudalitseni .
46016024	Chikondi changa chikhale pa inu nonse , mwa Khristu Yesu .
47001001	Ndine , Paulo , mtumwi wa Khristu Yesu mwa kufuna kwa Mulungu . Ndili limodzi ndi mbale wathu Timoteo . Tikulembera mpingo wa Mulungu umene uli ku Korinto , ndiponso anthu onse a Mulungu okhala m'dziko lonse la Akaiya .
47001002	Mulungu Atate athu ndi Ambuye Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere .
47001003	Tiyamike Mulungu , Atate a Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu . Ndiwo Atate a chifundo ndi otilimbitsa mtima kwathunthu .
47001004	Mulungu amatilimbitsa mtima m'masautso athu onse , kuti monga momwe Iye amalimbitsira ife mtima , nafenso tithe kuŵalimbitsa mtima anzathu amene ali pakati pa masautso amitundumitundu .
47001005	Pakuti monga tikumva zoŵaŵa kwambiri pamodzi ndi Khristu , momwemonso Khristu amatilimbitsa mtima kwambiri .
47001006	Ngati tikuzunzika , nkuti inu mupeze chokulimbitsani mtima ndiponso chipulumutso . Ngati ife atilimbitsa mtima , nkuti inunso mulimbitsidwe mtima ndi kulandira mphamvu za kupirira pamene mulikumva zoŵaŵa zomwezo zimene ifenso timamva .
47001007	Chikhulupiriro chathu pa inu nchohmba . Tikudziŵa kuti monga mulikumva zoŵaŵa pamodzi nafe , momwemonso mudzapeza chokulimbitsani mtima pamodzi nafe .
47001008	Tsono abale , tifuna kuti mudziŵe , masautso amene tidakumana nawo ku dziko la Asiya , adatipsinja koopsa , kopitirira mphamvu zathu , kotero kuti sitinkayembekezanso kuti nkukhala ndi moyo .
47001009	Ndithu m'mitima mwathu tinkangoganiza kuti basi talandira chilango chokaphedwa . Zimenezi zidachitika kuti tisamadzikhulupirire , koma kuti tizikhulupirira Mulungu amene amaukitsa akufa .
47001010	Ndiye amene adatipulumutsa ku zoopsa zotere za imfa , ndipo adzatipulumutsanso . Taika ndithu chikhulupiriro chathu pa Iyeyo choti adzatipulumutsanso .
47001011	Inu nomwe muthandizane nafe pakutipempherera . Pamenepo anthu ambiri adzathokoza Mulungu m'malo mwathu , chifukwa cha zimene Iye adatichitira mwa kukoma mtima kwake .
47001012	Chimene timanyadira nchakuti mtima wathu umatichitira umboni kuti ponseponse pamene tidapjta , koma makamakanso pakati panu , mayendedwe athu anali oyera ndi opanda chinyengo . Zinali choncho osati chifukwa chotsata nzeru za anthu ai , koma chifukwa Mulungu adatikomera mtima .
47001013	Timakulemberani zokhazokha zimene mungathe kuziŵerenga ndi kuzimvetsa bwino . Ndikhulupirira kuti ,
47001014	monga mwayamba kale kutidziŵa pang'ono , mudzatidziŵa kwenikweni , ndiye kuti pa tsiku la Ambuye Yesu mudzatha kutinyadira ife , monga momwe ifenso tidzakunyadirani inu .
47001015	Popeza kuti pa zimenezi ndinali wotsimikiza ndithu , ndidaaganiza zoti ndiyambe ndafika kwanuko . Ndidaafuna kuti mulandire madalitso paŵiri :
47001016	ndidaakonza ulendo wanga kuti ndidzere kwanu popita ku Masedoniya , ndi kuti ndidzerenso kwanu pochokera ku Masedoniyako . Ndinkafuna kuti potero mudzandithandize kupitiriza ulendo wanga wopita ku Yudeya .
47001017	Kodi pamene ndidaaganiza kuchita zimenezi , inu mukuyesa kuti ndidaachita zinthu mwachibwana ? Kaya zimene ndimaganiza kuzichita , kodi ndimangoziganiza mwaukapsala , kotero kuti ndingathe kunena kuti , " Inde , inde " ndiponso " Ai , ai " pa nthaŵi imodzi ?
47001018	Pali Mulungu woona , ndikulumbira kuti mau athu amene timakuuzani sali " Inde " ndiponso " Ai " .
47001019	Yesu Khristu , Mwana wa Mulungu , amene ine ndi Silivano ndi Timoteo tidakulalikirani , sanali " Inde " ndiponso " Ai " pa nthaŵi imodzi , koma nthaŵi zonse anali " Inde " wa Mulungu .
47001020	Ndipo zonse zimene Mulungu adalonjeza zidachitika ndi " Inde " ameneyu . Nchifukwa chake mwa Yesu Khristuyo timanena kuti , " Amen " kulemekeza Mulungu .
47001021	Mulungu ndi amene amatikhazikitsa pamodzi nanu mwa Khristu . Ndiye amene adatidzoza ,
47001022	natisindikiza chizindikiro chake , ndi kuika Mzimu Woyera m'mitima mwathu ngati chikole .
47001023	Mulungu akhale mboni yanga , chifukwa chenicheni chimene sindidafikirenso ku Korinto chinali chakuti ndisakumvetseni chisoni .
47001024	Sikuti tikufuna kuchita ngati kukulamulirani pa zoti muzikhulupirira , pakuti pa mbali ya chikhulupiriro chanu , ndinu okhazikika ndithu . Makamaka tingofuna kugwirizana nanu kuti mukhale okondwa .
47002001	Nchifukwa chake ndidatsimikiza kuti ndisachite ulendo winanso wopweteka wobwera kwanuko .
47002002	Ngati ndine amene ndikukupweteketsani mtima , nanga ineyo adzandisangalatsa ndani , kodi si yemweyo amene ndidampweteketsa mtima .
47002003	Nchifukwa chake ndidakulemberani kalata ija . Sindidafune kudza kwanuko , kuwopa kuti inuyo oyenera kundisangalatsanu mungandipweteketse mtima . Ndidaadziŵiratu kuti ine ndikamakondwa , nonsenunso mumakondwa .
47002004	Pamene ndidakulemberani kalata ija , mtima wanga unali wovutika ndi wopsinjika ndithu , ndipo ndinkalira misozi . Sindidafune kukupweteketsani mtima , koma makamaka ndinkafuna kuti mudziŵe kuti ndimakukondani kwambiri .
47002005	Ngati wina aliyense adachita kanthu kolasa mtima , si ineyo amene adalasa mtima , koma pang'ono ponse adalasako nonsenu , kunenatu mosakulitsa nkhani .
47002006	Munthu woteroyo , pafupi nonse mwamtsutsa , choncho chilangocho nchokwanira .
47002007	Tsono makamaka nkwabwino mumkhululukire ndi kumlimbitsa mtima , kuwopa kuti angamve chisoni chachikulu chomtayitsa mtima kotheratu .
47002008	Nchifukwa chake ndikukupemphani kuti mumtsimikizirenso kuti mumamkonda ndithu .
47002009	Pamene ndinkakulemberani kalata ija , cholinga changa chinali chakuti ndikuyeseni , ndi kuwona ngati mudzandimvera pa zonse .
47002010	Mukakhululukira munthu , inenso ndimkhululukira . Ngati ine ndakhululukira , patakhala kanthu koti ndakhululukira , ndiye kuti ndakhululukira chifukwa cha inu pamaso pa Khristu .
47002011	Cholinga chake nkuti Satana asatichenjerere , paja tikudziŵa njira zake .
47002012	Pamene ndidafika ku Troasi kuti ndikalalike Uthenga Wabwino wonena za Khristu , ndidapeza Ambuye atanditsekulira kale pa khomo kuti ndikagwire ntchito kumeneko .
47002013	Komabe mumtima mwanga munalibe mtendere , chifukwa sindidampeze Tito , mbale wanga . Tsono ndidatsazikana ndi anthu akumeneko nkupita ku Masedoniya .
47002014	Tithokoze Mulungu amene mwa Khristu amatitsogolera nthaŵi zonse m'kupambana kwake . Kudzera mwa ife Mulungu akupatsa anthu onse nzeru zodziŵira Khristu , ndipo nzeruzo zikuwanda ponseponse ngati fungo labwino .
47002015	Zoonadi tili ngati fungo labwino la Khristu lokomera Mulungu , pakati pa anthu amene akupulumuka ndi amene akutayika .
47002016	Kwa amene akutayika , fungoli ndi la imfa , ndipo limaŵapha . Koma kwa amene akupulumuka , fungoli ndi la moyo , ndipo limaŵapatsa moyo . Nanga ndani angaithe ntchito yotere ?
47002017	Ifetu sitili ngati anthu ena ambiri amene amangochita malonda ndi mau a Mulungu . Koma , popeza kuti tili mwa Khristu , ngati anthu otumidwa ndi Mulungu , timalankhula moona , molingana ndi kufuna kwake .
47003001	Kodi ponena izi ndiye kuti tikuyamba kudzichitira umboni tokha ? Kodi kapena nkofunika kuti ifenso , monga anthu ena , tikhale ndi makalata otichitira umboni kwa inu , kapena makalata aumboni ochokera kwa inu ?
47003002	Kalata yotichitira umboniyo ndinu nomwe . Idalembedwa m'mitima mwathu , kuti anthu onse aidziŵe ndi kumaiŵerenga .
47003003	Anthu onse angathe kuwona kuti ndinu kalata yochokera kwa Khristu , yolembedwa kudzera mwa ife , osati ndi inki koma ndi mzimu wa Mulungu wamoyo , osati pa zolembapo zamiyala koma m'mitima mwa anthu .
47003004	Mulungu akudziŵa kuti tikunena zimenezi chifukwa Khristu ndiye amatipatsa kulimba mtima kotere .
47003005	Pakuti mwa ife tokha mulibe kanthu kamene kangatiganizitse kuti tingathe kuchita ntchitoyi patokha . Amene amatipatsa mphamvu ndi Mulungu kuti tithe kuichita .
47003006	Ndiye amene adatipatsa mphamvu kuti tikhale otumikira chipangano chatsopano , osati mwa malamulo olembedwa , koma mwa Mzimu Woyera . Paja malamulo olembedwa amadzetsa imfa , koma Mzimu Woyera amapatsa moyo .
47003007	Malamulo ongolembedwa pa miyala aja adaperekedwa ndi ulemerero waukulu , kotero kuti Aisraele sankatha kuyang'anitsitsa nkhope ya Mose chifukwa cha kuŵala kwake . Komabe kuŵala kwakeko kunali kosakhalitsa . Tsono ngati malamulowo , amene ali odzetsa imfa , adaperekedwa ndi ulemerero wotere ,
47003008	nanji ntchito ya Mzimu Woyera , kodi siidzakhala ndi ulemerero wopambana pamenepo ?
47003009	Ngati ntchito yoweruza anthu kuti alangidwe inali yaulemerero , ndiye kuti ntchito yoti anthu apezeke olungama pamaso pa Mulungu idzakhala yaulemerero koposa .
47003010	Chifukwa cha ulemerero wopambanawu umene waoneka tsopano , zinthu zimene kale zidaali ndi ulemerero , masiku ano zilibenso ulemerero konse .
47003011	Tsono ngati zinthu zosakhalitsa zidaafika ndi ulemerero , ndiye kuti zinthu zokhala mpaka muyaya zidzakhala ndi ulemerero wopambana .
47003012	Popeza kuti timayembekeza zimenezi , timalimba mtima kwambiri .
47003013	Sitichita ngati Mose amene ankaphimba nkhope yake ndi nsalu , kuwopa kuti Aisraele angamapenye kutha kwake kwa kuŵala kosakhalitsa kuja .
47003014	Koma iwo nzeru zao zidauma , pakuti mpaka lero lino chophimba chomwe chija chimakhalapobe akamaŵerenga mabuku a m'Chipangano Chakale . Pajatu chophimbacho chimachotsedwa pokhapokha munthu akakhala mwa Khristu .
47003015	Ndithu , mpaka lero lino nthaŵi zonse akamaŵerenga Malamulo a Mose , chophimba chija chimaphimbabe mitima yao .
47003016	Koma munthu akatembenukira kwa Ambuye , chophimbacho chimachotsedwa .
47003017	Tsono tikamati , " Ambuye , " tikunena Mzimu Woyera . Ndipo kumene kuli Mzimu wa Ambuye , kuli ufulu .
47003018	Tonsefe , opanda chophimba nkhope yathu , timaonetsa ulemerero wa Ambuye , monga momwe galasi limaonetsera nkhope ya munthu . Monsemo Ambuye , amene ali Mzimu , amatisandutsa kuti tifanefane naye , ndi kukhala nawo ulemerero wake mochulukirachulukira .
47004001	Mulungu mwa chifundo chake adatipatsa ntchitoyi , nchifukwa chake sititaya mtima .
47004002	Takaniratu njira zonse zochititsa manyazi zimene anthu amatsata mobisika . Sitichita kanthu monyenga kapena kupotoza mau a Mulungu ; koma pakulankhula zoona poyera pamaso pa Mulungu , tifuna kuti anthu onse ativomereze m'mitima mwao .
47004003	Koma ngakhale Uthenga Wabwino umene timalalika uli wophimbika , ngwophimbika kwa okhawo amene akutayika .
47004004	Iwoŵa sakhulupirira , popeza kuti Satana , amene ali mulungu wa dziko lino lapansi , adachititsa khungu maganizo ao , kuwopa kuti angaone kuŵala kwa Uthenga Wabwino . Kuŵalako kumaonetsa ulemerero wa Khristu , ndipo mwa Iyeyu Mulungu mwini amaoneka .
47004005	Motero polalika sitidzilalika tokha , koma timalalika Yesu Khristu , kuti ndiye Ambuye . Ife ndife atumiki anu chabe chifukwa cha Yesuyo .
47004006	Paja ndi Mulungu amene adaati , " Kuŵala kuunike kuchokera mu mdima . " Mulungu yemweyo ndiye adatiwunikiranso m'mitima mwathu , kuti anthu adziŵe ulemerero wa Mulungu umene ukuŵala pa nkhope ya Khristu .
47004007	Koma ife ndife mbiya zadothi chabe zosungiramo chumachi , kuti padziŵike kuti mphamvu zazikulu zoterezi ndi za Mulungu , osati zathu ai .
47004008	Tikuwona masautso a mtundu uliwonse , koma osapsinjidwa . Tikuthedwa nzeru , koma osataya mtima .
47004009	Adani akutizunza , koma sitisoŵa wotithandiza . Akutigwetsa pansi , koma sitikugonja .
47004010	Nthaŵi zonse tikuyenda nayo imfa ya Yesu m'thupi mwathu , kuti moyo wake uwonekenso m'thupi mwathu .
47004011	Pakuti nthaŵi zonse , ngakhale tili ndi moyo , tikuperekedwa ku imfa chifukwa cha Yesu , kuti moyo wake uwonekenso m'matupi athu amene amafa .
47004012	Motero ife timaperekedwa ku imfa , koma chimenechi chimakupatsani moyo .
47004013	Malembo akuti , " Ndidakhulupirira , nchifukwa chake ndidalankhula . " Tsono popeza kuti ife tili ndi mtima womwewo wokhulupirira , ifenso timalankhula .
47004014	Pakuti tikudziŵa kuti Mulungu amene adaukitsa Ambuye Yesu kwa akufa , adzatiwukitsa ifenso pamodzi ndi Yesu , nadzatifikitsa pamodzi nanu pamaso pake .
47004015	Cholinga cha zonsezi nchakuti inu mupindule , ndipo kuti monga momwe anthu olandira madalitso a Mulungu akunka nachulukirachulukira , momwemonso othokoza Mulungu achulukirechulukire ndi kumchitira ulemu .
47004016	Nchifukwa chake sititaya mtima . Ngakhale thupi lathu likunka lifookerafookera , komabe mu mtima tikulandira mphamvu yatsopano tsiku ndi tsiku .
47004017	Masautso athu ndi opepuka , a nthaŵi yochepa , komabe akutitengera ulemerero umene uli waukulu kopambana , ndiponso wamuyaya .
47004018	Mitima yathu siili pa zinthu zooneka , koma pa zinthu zosaoneka . Paja zooneka nzosakhalitsa , koma zosaoneka ndiye zamuyaya .
47005001	Thupi limene timakhalamo pansi pano lili ngati msasa chabe . Koma tikudziŵa kuti msasawu ukadzapasuka , tidzakhala ndi nyumba ina imene Mulungu adatikonzera Kumwamba . Nyumbayo ndi yosamangidwa ndi manja a anthu , ndipo ndi yamuyaya .
47005002	Nchifukwa chake tsono tikubuula ndi kulakalaka kuvala nyumba yathu yakumwambayo ,
47005003	kuti titaivala , tisadzapezeke amaliseche .
47005004	Ife amene tili mu msasa uno timalemedwa ndipo timabuula . Sitifuna kuuvula msasawu ai , koma kwenikweni tikadakonda kuvala nyumba ija ya Kumwamba pamwamba pake , kuti chimene chili chakufa chimizidwe ndi moyo .
47005005	Mulungu ndiye amene adatikonzeratu kuti tilandire zimenezi , ndipo adatipatsa Mzimu Woyera ngati chikole chake .
47005006	Nchifukwa chake timalimba mtima masiku onse , ndipo tikudziŵa kuti nthaŵi yonse pamene tikukhala m'thupi , ngati kwathu , ndiye kuti tili kutali ndi Ambuye .
47005007	Pakuti timatsata chikhulupiriro , osati zopenya ndi maso .
47005008	Ndithu tikulimba mtima , ndipo makamaka tikadakonda kutuluka m'thupi lathu lino ndi kukakhala kwa Ambuye .
47005009	Nchifukwa chake , ngakhale tikhalebe kuno , kapena tikakhale kwa Ambuye , timayesetsa kuŵakondweretsa Ambuyewo .
47005010	Pakuti tonsefe tiyenera kukaimirira poyera pamaso pa Khristu kuti atiweruze . Kumeneko aliyense adzalandira zomuyenerera , molingana ndi zimene adachita pansi pano , zabwino kapena zoipa .
47005011	Tsono popeza tikudziŵa kuti Ambuye ngoyenera kuŵaopa , timayesetsa kukopa anthu . Mulungu amatidziŵa kwathunthu , ndipo tikhulupirira kuti inunso mumatidziŵa kwenikweni m'mitima mwanu .
47005012	Sitikuyesa kudzichitiranso umboni pamaso panu ai , koma tingofuna kukupatsani chifukwa choti muzitinyadira . Tikufuna kuti mukhale ndi kanthu koŵayankha amene angonyadira zooneka ndi maso , osati zamumtima .
47005013	Ngati tidachita ngati tapenga , tidachita zimenezi kuti tilemekeze Mulungu . Koma ngati tikuchita zanzeru , tikuchita zanzeru kuti tikuthandizeni .
47005014	Chikondi cha Khristu ndicho chimatiwongolera mokakamiza , popeza kuti tikudziŵa mosakayika konse kuti Munthu mmodzi adafera anthu onse , ndiye kuti pamenepo onse adafa .
47005015	Iye adafera anthu onse , kuti amene ali ndi moyo , asakhalenso ndi moyo wofuna kungodzikondweretsa okha , koma azikondweretsa Iye amene adaŵafera , nauka kwa akufa chifukwa cha iwowo .
47005016	Nchifukwa chake kuyambira tsopano ife sitiganiziranso za munthu aliyense potsata nzeru za anthu chabe . Ngakhale kale tinkaganiza za Khristu potsata nzeru za anthu chabe , koma tsopano sitiganizanso za Iye motero .
47005017	Choncho ngati munthu ali mwa Khrisru , ngwolengedwa kwatsopano . Zakale zapita , zimene zilipo nzatsopano .
47005018	Wochita zonsezi ndi Mulungu , amene mwa Khristu adatiyanjanitsa ndi Iye mwini , ndipo adatipatsa ntchito yolalikira anthu chiyanjanitsocho .
47005019	Ndiye kuti mwa Khristu Mulungu ankayanjanitsa anthu a pa dziko lonse lapansi ndi Iye mwini , osaŵaŵerengera machimo ao . Ndipo adatipatsa ifeyo mau onena za chiyanjanitsocho kuti tiŵalalike .
47005020	Tsono ndife akazembe oimirira Khristu , ndipo kudzera mwa ifeyo Mulungu mwini ndiye akulankhula nanu mokudandaulirani . Tikukupemphani m'dzina la Khristu kuti muvomere kuyanjananso ndi Mulungu .
47005021	Khristu sadachimwe konse , koma Mulungu adamsandutsa uchimo chifukwa cha ife , kuti mwa Iyeyo ife tisanduke olungama pamaso pa Mulungu .
