47006001	Tsono popeza kuti ndife ogwirizana ndi Mulungu pa ntchito yake , takupembani musaŵasandutse achabe madalitso amene Mulungu adakupatsani .
47006002	Paja Mulungu akuti , " Pa nthaŵi yanga yabwino ya kukomera anthu mtima , ndidakumvera , pa nyengo ya kupulumutsa anthu , ndidakuthandiza . " Mvetsani , ndi inotu nthaŵi yabwinoyo , imene Mulungu akukomera anthu mtima . Ndi Lerotu tsiku la chipulumutsolo .
47006003	Sitifuna kupatsa anthu chifukwa chonyozera ntchito yathu , nchifukwa chake sitikhumudwitsa munthu aliyense ndi kanthu kalikonse .
47006004	Koma pa zonse timasonyeza kuti ndife atumiki a Mulungu pakupirira kwambiri m'masautso , m'zoŵaŵa ndiponso m'nkhaŵa .
47006005	Tidakwapulidwa , tidaponyedwa m'ndende , ndipo anthu adatiwukira mwachipolowe . Tidagwira ntchito kwambiri , mwina osagona tulo , osaona chakudya .
47006006	Timatsimikiza kuti ndife atumiki a Mulungu pakuyera mtima , pakudziŵa zinthu mozama , pakuleza mtima , pakukoma mtima , mwa Mzimu Woyera , mwa chikondi chosanyenga ,
47006007	mwa mau oona , ndiponso mwa mphamvu ya Mulungu . Zida zimene zili m'dzanja lathu lamanja ndi lamanzere ndizo chilungamo .
47006008	Anthu amatilemekeza , komanso amatinyoza . Amatinenera zoipa , komanso zabwino . Anthu amatiyesa onyenga , komabe ndife oona .
47006009	Amatiyesa osadziŵika , komabe ndife odziŵika kwambiri . Amatiyesa anthu amene alikufa , komabe onani , tili moyo . Amatiyesa olangidwa , komabe sitidaphedwe .
47006010	Amatiyesa achisoni , komabe ndife okondwa masiku onse . Amatiyesa amphaŵi , komabe timalemeretsa anthu ambiri . Amatiyesa opanda kanthu , komabe tili ndi zonse .
47006011	Inu anthu a ku Korinto , talankhula nanu momasuka , ndipo tatsekula mtima wathu ndithu .
47006012	Malo sakusoŵani mumtima mwathu , koma mumtima mwanu ndimo mukusoŵa malo .
47006013	Ndikulankhula nanu ngati ana anga . Mutibwezere zomwezo zimene ifenso tidakuchitirani inu , pakutitsekulira mtima wanu .
47006014	Musamagwirizana ndi anthu akunja , monga ngati kuti iwo ndi inu mumafanana . Nanga kulungama kungagwirizane bwanji ndi kusalungama ? Kapena kuŵala kungayanjane bwanji ndi mdima ?
47006015	Kodi Khristu nkuvomerezana ndi Satana ? Kodi mkhristu ndi mkunja angagaŵanenso chiyani pamodzi ?
47006016	Kodi Nyumba ya Mulungu nkufanana bwanji ndi mafano ? Pajatu ife ndife Nyumba ya Mulungu wamoyo , monga Mulungu mwini adanena kuti , " Ndidzakhazikika mwa iwo , ndi kukhala nawo . Ndidzakhala Mulungu wao , iwo adzakhala anthu angaanga . "
47006017	Nchifukwa chake Ambuye akuti , " Tulukani pakati pao , ndi kudzipatula . Musakhudze kanthu kosayera , ndipo ndidzakulandirani .
47006018	Ndidzakhala Atate anu , inu mudzakhala ana anga aamuna ndi aakazi , akutero Ambuye Mphambe . "
47007001	Tsono , inu okondedwa , popeza kuti tili ndi malonjezo ameneŵa , tiyeni tidzichotsere zinthu zonse zodetsa thupi lathu kapena mtima wathu . Ndipo pakuwopa Mulungu tiziyesetsa ndithu kukhala oyera mtima .
47007002	Mutipatse malo m'mitima mwanu . Sitidalakwire munthu aliyense , kapena kumuipitsa , kapena kumchenjerera .
47007003	Sindikunena zimenezi kuti mupezeke olakwa . Paja monga ndanena kale , inu muli m'mitima mwathu ndithu , kotero kuti tili pamodzi , ngakhale tikhale moyo kapena timwalire .
47007004	Ndimakukhulupirirani kwambiri , ndipo ndimakunyadirani kwenikweni . Zondilimbitsa mtima zandichulukira , ndipo m'zovuta zathu zonse ndakondwa kopambana .
47007005	Ngakhale pamene tidafika ku Masedoniya sitidapeze mpumulo konse . Tidapeza zovuta ponseponse , popeza kuti panali kukangana ndi adani otizungulira , ndiponso mantha m'mitima mwathu .
47007006	Koma Mulungu amene amalimbitsa otaya mtima , adatilimbitsa ndi kufika kwa Tito .
47007007	Ndipo chimene chidatilimbitsa , si kufika kwake kokha , koma makamakanso mau ake onena za m'mene iyeyo mudamlimbitsira mtima . Adatiwuza kuti mukulakalaka kundiwona , kuti muli ndi chisoni , ndiponso kuti mukuchita changu kundithandiza . Nchifukwa chake ndakondwa koposa .
47007008	Kalata yanga ija idakupwetekani mtima , komabe sindikuchita chisoni kuti ndidailemba . Ndidaachita chisoni poyamba , ndipo ndikuwona kuti kalatayo idakupwetekanidi mtirna , ngakhale kanthaŵi pang'ono chabe .
47007009	Koma tsopano ndakondwa , osati chifukwa ndidaakupwetekani mtima , koma chifukwa kuvutika kwanu kudakuthandizani kutembenuka mtima . Kuvutika kwanuko kunali kovomerezeka ndi Mulungu , motero sitidakutayitseni kanthu kabwino kalikonse .
47007010	Paja chisoni chokomera Mulungu chimamtembenuza munthu ndi kumpulumutsa , kotero kuti chisoni chake chimathera pomwepo . Koma kumva chisoni monga m'mene amachitira anthu odalira zapansipano , kumadzetsa imfa .
47007011	Onani zimene chisoni chanu chokomera Mulungu chija chakuchitirani : chakupatsani changu chachikulu , chakukakamizani kwambiri kutsimikiza kuti simudalakwe , chakukwiyitsani kwambiri , ndipo chakuchititsani mantha aakulu . Chakulakalakitsani kuti mundiwone , ndipo chakupatsani changu chonditchinjiriza , ndiponso cholanga olakwa . Pa nkhani yonseyi umboni ulipo wakuti inu simudalakwepo .
47007012	Motero , ngakhale ndidakulemberani kalata imene ija , sindidailembe chifukwa cha amene adalakwa uja , kapena chifukwa cha amene iyeyo adamlakwira . Koma ndidailemba kuti ndikuwonetseni pamaso pa Mulungu kuti changu chanu chotitchinjiriza nchachikulu ndithu .
47007013	Zimenezi zatilimbitsa mtima kwambiri . Kuwonjezera pa zotilimbitsa mtimazo , chimwemwe cha Tito chidatikondweretsa kopambana , popeza kuti nonsenu mudamsangulutsa .
47007014	Ndidamuuzadi kuti ndimakunyadirani , ndipo inu simudandichititse manyazi . Koma monga momwe zonse zimene tidaakuuzani zinali zoona , momwemonso kudaoneka kuti zimene ndidauza Tito mokunyadirani , zinali zoona .
47007015	Makamaka chikondi chake pa inu nchachikulu kopambana pamene akumbukira kuti nonsenu mudamvera mau anga , ndipo mudamlandira ndi mantha ndi monjenjemerera .
47007016	Ndikukondwa kuti ndingathe kukukhulupirirani pa zonse .
47008001	Abale , tifuna kuti mudziŵe za m'mene Mulungu adadalitsira mipingo ya ku Masedoniya .
47008002	Anthu a m'mipingoyo adayesedwa kwambiri ndi masautso , komabe adakondwa kwakukulu , kotero kuti adapereka moolowa manja kwenikweni , ngakhale anali amphaŵi .
47008003	Ine ndikuŵachitira umboni kuti adapereka monga adathera , ngakhalenso mopitirira pamenepo poyerekeza ndi chuma chao .
47008004	Popanda wina aliyense woŵakakamiza adatipempha , natiwumiriza kuti tiŵapatse mwai woti nawonso athandize anthu a Mulungu a ku Yudeya .
47008005	Ndipo adathandizadi mopitirira pa zimene tidaayembekeza , pakuti poyamba adadzipereka kwa Ambuye , kenaka mwa kufuna kwa Ambuye adadziperekanso kwa ife .
47008006	Nchifukwa chake tidaapempha Tito kuti akatsirizenso pakati panu ntchitoyi yakusonkhanitsa zopereka zachifundo imene iye anali atayamba kale .
47008007	Zonse mudalandira pakulu , monga kukhulupirira , kulankhula , kudziŵa zinthu , kuchita changu pa zonse , ndiponso kutikonda . Motero tifuna kuti muperekenso pakulu zachifundozi .
47008008	Pamene ndikunena zimenezi , sindikuchita kulamula ai . Pakukufotokozerani za changu cha ena , ndingofuna kuwona ngati chikondi chanu ndi chikondi chenicheni .
47008009	Mukudziŵa kukoma mtima kwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu . Ngakhale anali wolemera , adakhala mmphaŵi chifukwa cha inu , kuti ndi umphaŵi wakewo inu mukhale olemera .
47008010	Pa nkhani imeneyi maganizo anga ndi akuti nkwabwino kuti mutsirize zimene mudayamba kale chaka chathachi , osati kungofuna kuzichita , komanso kuzichita kumene .
47008011	Tiyeni tsono muzitsirize . Paja munali ndi changu pofuna kuzichita , muchitenso changu tsopano kuzitsiriza molingana ndi zimene muli nazo .
47008012	Malinga munthu akakhala ndi chaHgu cha kupereka , Mulungu amalandira mokondwa zimene munthuyo ali nazo , ndipo samkakamiza kuti apereke zimene alibe .
47008013	Sindikufuna kunena kuti inuyo muvutike , ena apepukidwe , ai , koma kuti pakhale kulingana .
47008014	Poti inu muli ndi zambiri tsopano , muyenera kumathandiza osoŵa , kuti m'tsogolomo nawonso akadzakhala ndi zochuluka , azidzakuthandizani pa zosoŵa zanu . Motero padzakhala kulingana .
47008015	Paja Malembo akuti , " Amene adapata zambiri , sizidamchulukire , amene adapata pang'ono , sizidamchepere . "
47008016	Tiyamike Mulungu kuti adaika mumtima mwa Tito changu chomwecho chimene ife tili nacho pokuthandizani .
47008017	Pakuti sadangochita zimene tidampempha , koma changu chake chinali chachikulu , kotero kuti adatsimikiza yekha zobwera kwanuko .
47008018	Pamodzi ndi iyeyo tikutuma mbale wathu uja , amene mipingo yonse ikumuyamika chifukwa cha ntchito yake yolalika Uthenga Wabwino .
47008019	Ndipo si pokhapo ai , komanso mipingo idamsankha kuti adzatiperekeze pokapereka zopereka zachifiindozi . Tikukonza zimenezi kuti tichitire Ambuye ulemu , ndiponso kuti tiwonetse mtima wathu wofuna kuthandiza .
47008020	Sitikufuna kupatsa anthu chifukwa choti azitinenera zoipa pa mayendetsedwe athu a zopereka zachifundo zochulukazi .
47008021	Ifetu tikufuna kuchita zabwino , osati pamaso pa Ambuye pokha , komanso pamaso pa anthu .
47008022	Pamodzi ndi iwowo tikutuma mbale wathu wina . Takhala tikumuyesa kaŵirikaŵiri , ndipo tampeza kuti ndi wachangu ndithu pa zinthu zambiri . Tsopano akufunitsitsa koposa kuti athandize , popeza kuti amakukhulupirirani kwambiri .
47008023	Kunena za Tito , iyeyu ndi wantchito mnzanga amene amagwirizana nane pokuthandizani . Kunenanso za abale athu enawo , ngotumidwa ndi mipingo , ndipo Khristu amalemekezedwa chifukwa cha iwo .
47008024	Tsono muŵatsimikizire chikondi chanu , kuti mipingo yonse ichiwone , ndi kudziŵa kuti sitikulakwa tikamakunyadirani .
47009001	Nkosafunikira kuti ndikulembereni za zopereka zothandizira anthu a Mulungu a ku Yudeya .
47009002	Ndikudziŵa kuti mumafunadi kuthandiza , ndipo ndimakunyadirani kwa anthu a ku Masedoniya chifukwa cha chimenechi . Ndimaŵauza kuti , " Abale a ku Akaiya adakonzeka kale chaka chatha kuti athandize . " Ndipo changu chanu chautsa ena ambiri .
47009003	Koma ndikutuma abale athuŵa , kuti kukunyadirani kwathu pa zimenezi kusakhale kwachabe , koma kuti mukhaledi okonzeka monga momwe ndidaanenera .
47009004	Ngati anthu ena a ku Masedoniya adzandiperekeze ndi kukupezani muli osakonzeka , tidzachita manyazi kwambiri kuti tinkakunyadirani pachabe , koma makamaka inuyo ndiye mudzachite manyazi kwambiri .
47009005	Nchifukwa chake ndidaganiza kuti ndiyenera kupempha abale ameneŵa kuti abwere kwa inu ndisanafike ineyo , ndipo kuti akonzeretu mphatso imene mudalonjeza kale . Pamenepo mphatsoyo idzakhala yokonzekeratu , ndipo idzakhaladi mphatso yeniyeni , osati kanthu kamene mwapereka mokakamizidwa .
47009006	Nkhanitu ndi iyi : wobzala pang'ono , adzakololanso pang'ono , wobzala zochuluka , adzakololanso zochuluka .
47009007	Aliyense apereke monga momwe adatsimikiziratu mumtima mwake , osati ndi chisoni kapena mokakamizidwa , pakuti Mulungu amakonda wopereka mokondwa .
47009008	Mulungu angathe kukupatsani madalitso onse pakulu , kuti nthaŵi zonse mukhale ndi zokukwanirani inuyo , ndipo zinanso zochuluka kuti mukathandize pa ntchito zonse zabwino .
47009009	Za munthu wotere paja Malembo akuti , " Wapereka mphatso zake moolowa manja kwa anthu osauka . Chilungamo chake nchamuyaya . "
47009010	Mulungu amene amapatsa mbeu kwa wobzala , ndiponso chakudya choti adye , adzakupatsani mbeu zoti mubzale , ndipo adzazichulukitsa . Adzachulukitsanso zipatso zake za chifundo chanu .
47009011	Adzakulemeretsani pa zonse , kuti mukhale oolowa manja ndithu , kotero kuti ambiri adzathokoza Mulungu chifukwa cha mphatso yanu imene tiŵatengereko .
47009012	Zoonadi ntchito imeneyi yomwe mukuchitira anthu a Mulungu , siingoŵathandiza pa zosoŵa zao , komanso chotsatira chake china nchakuti anthu ochuluka adzathokoza Mulungu kwambiri .
47009013	Pakuti ntchito imeneyi ikuŵatsimikizira kuti chifundo chanu nchoona , iwo adzatamanda Mulungu chifukwa cha kumvera kwanu povomereza Uthenga Wabwino wonena za Khristu . Adzatero chifukwanso cha ufulu wanu poŵagaŵirako iwowo ndi anthu ena onse zinthu zimene muli nazo .
47009014	Tsono adzakuwonetsani chikondi chao ndi kukupemphererani , chifukwa Mulungu wakukomerani mtima kopitirira .
47009015	Tiyamike Mulungu chifukwa cha mphatso yake yosaneneka .
47010001	M'dzina la Yesu Khristu wa mtima woleza ndi wofatsa , ine Paulo mwiniwake , amene anthu ena amati ndine wamantha pamene ndili pamaso panu , koma wosaopa konse pamene ndili nanu kutali , ndikuti mundimve .
47010002	Ndikukupemphani kuti ndikadzafika kwanuko ndisadzakakamizidwe kudzudzula mosaopa konse anthu amene akuti machitidwe athu ndi otsata za anthu chabe .
47010003	Ndi zoona kuti ndife anthu , koma sitimenya nkhondo motsata za anthu chabe .
47010004	Pakuti zida zathu zakhondo si za anthu chabe , koma ndi mphamvu zochokera kwa Mulungu zotha kuwononga malinga . Timagonjetsa maganizo onyenga ,
47010005	ndiponso kudzikuza kulikonse koletsa anthu kudziŵa Mulungu . Timagonjetsa ganizo lililonse kuti limvere Khristu .
47010006	Ndipo inu mutakhala omvera kwenikweni , tili okonzeka kulanga aliyense amene samvera .
47010007	Ganizani bwino pa zimene mukuwona ndi maso anu . Kodi pali wina amene amakhulupirira kuti ndi wake wa Khristu ? Chabwino , koma akumbukire kuti monga iye ali wake wa Khristu , ifenso ndife ake a Khristu .
47010008	Ndipotu ngakhale mwina ndikunyadira mokakata ulamuliro umene Ambuye adatipatsa woti tikulimbitse nawoni , osati kukuwonongani ai , ndithu sindidzachita manyazi .
47010009	Tsono musayese kuti ndikungokuwopsezani ndi makalata anga .
47010010	Paja ena amati , " Makalata a Paulo ngaukali ndi amphamvu , koma mwiniwake akakhala pakati pathu , iyeyo ngwofooka ndipo mau ake ndi achabe . "
47010011	Anthu oganiza zotere , adziŵe kuti palibe kusiyana pakati pa zimene timanena m'makalata pamene tili nanu kutali ndi zimene timachita tikakhala nanu pamodzi .
47010012	Sikuti timayesa kudzilinga kapena kudziyerekeza ndi ena amene amadzichitira okha umboni . Amapusa chabe pakungodziyesa ndi muyeso waowao , ndi kudzilinganiza ndi anzao a m'gulu lao lomwe .
47010013	Kunena za ife , sitinganyade mopitirira malire . Tidzasamala malire omwe Mulungu adatiikira potifikitsa mpaka kwa inu .
47010014	Sitidabzole malire athu , monga ngati sitidakafike kwanu . Tinali oyamba ndife kukafika kwanu ndi kulalika Uthenga Wabwino wonena za Khristu .
47010015	Motero sitinyadira ntchito zimene anthu ena adazigwira m'dera limene Mulungu adatiikira ife . Kwenikweni tikuyembekeza kuti chikhulupiriro chanu chidzakula , ndipo kuti ntchito yathunso pakati panu idzakula , koma osabzola malire a dera lathu .
47010016	Pambuyo pake tingathe kukubzolani nkukalalika Uthenga Wabwino ku maiko enanso , osanyadira ntchito imene munthu wina wachita kale m'dera lake .
47010017	Paja Malembo akuti , " Wofuna kunyada , anyadire Ambuye . "
47010018	Pakuti munthu wovomerezeka , si amene amadzichitira yekha umboni , koma amene Ambuye amamchitira umboni .
47011001	Ndikadakondakutimundilekerere pang'ono pa kupusa kwangaku . Tandilekereranipo ndithu .
47011002	Nsanje imene ndikukuchitirani ndi yonga ya Mulungu . Pakuti ndidakupalitsani ubwenzi ndi mwamuna mmodzi yekha , ngati namwali wangwiro ndi woyera mtima , kuti mukhale akeake a Khristu .
47011003	Njoka ndi kuchenjera kwake idanyenga Heva . Ndikuwopa kuti maganizo anu angaipitsidwe chimodzimodzi , ndipo mungaleke kudzipereka kwa Khristu ndi mtima wonse .
47011004	Wina amati akabwera kudzalalika Yesu wina wosiyana ndi amene tidamlalika ife , inu mumangomulekerera . Kapena mukalandira mzimu wina wosiyana ndi Mzimu Woyera amene mudamlandira kale , inu nkumaloladi . Mwinanso mukalandira Uthenga Wabwino wosiyana ndi umene mudalandira kale , inu nkumauvomeradi msangamsanga .
47011005	Ndikuganiza kuti atumwi anu apamwambawo sandiposa ine pa kanthu kalikonse .
47011006	Ngakhale ndine mbuli pa luso lolankhula , koma pa nzeru ndiye ai . Zimenezi ndidakuwonetsani kaŵirikaŵiri pa zonse .
47011007	Ndidadzitsitsa ndekha ineyo , kuti inu mukule . Ndidakulalikirani mwaulere Uthenga Wabwino wa Mulungu . Kodi ndiye kuti pakutero ndidalakwa ?
47011008	Pakulandira zondithandiza kuchokera ku mipingo ina , ndidachita ngati kuŵalanda zao kuti ndikutumikireni inu .
47011009	Ndipo pamene ndinali kwanuko , nditasoŵa kanthu , sindidavute aliyense , pakuti abale ena ochokera ku Masedoniya adaandipatsa zonse zimene ndinkasoŵa . Pa zonse ndinkasamala kwambiri kuti ndisakhale ngati katundu wokulemerani , ndipo ndidzapitirirabe kutero .
47011010	Malinga ndi choona cha Khristu chimene chili mwa ine , ndikunenetsa kuti palibe munthu amene adzandiletsa kunyadira zimenezi m'madera onse a ku Akaiya .
47011011	Ndikutero chifukwa chiyani ? Kodi monga sindikukondani ? Akudziŵa ndi Mulungu kuti ndimakukondani .
47011012	Zimene ndikuchita tsopano , ndidzazichitabe , kuti ndisaŵapatse mpata onyenga aja amene akufuna danga loti anyadire , ndi kumanena kuti iwonso akugwira ntchito molingana ndi ife .
47011013	Anthu otereŵa si atumwi oona , koma antchito onyenga , amene amadzizimbaitsa , naoneka ngati atumwi a Khristu .
47011014	Zimenezitu si zododometsa ai , pakuti Satana yemwe amadzizimbaitsa , naoneka ngati mngelo wounikira anthu .
47011015	Motero si chodabwitsa ngati atumiki ake omwe amadzizimbaitsa , naoneka ngati otumikira chilungamo . Potsiriza adzalandira molingana ndi zimene ankachita .
47011016	Ndikufuna kubwerezanso kuti munthu wina aliyense asandiyese wopusa . Koma ngati inuyo mukundiyesadi wopusa , chabwino mundilandire ngati chitsiru , kuti inenso ndinyadirepo .
47011017	Zimene ndimati ndinena panozi si zimene Ambuye afuna kuti ndinene , koma ndikungonyada , monga momwe amachitira wopusa .
47011018	Tsono popeza kuti ambiri akunyadira zapansipano , inenso ndidzatero .
47011019	Inu mumati ndinu anzeru kwambiri , nchifukwa chake anthu opusa mumangoŵalekerera mokondwa .
47011020	Mumangolekerera munthu akakuyesani akapolo , kapena akadya chuma chanu , kapena akakunyengani , kapena akakunyozani , kapena akakumenyani kumaso .
47011021	Ndikuvomera mwamanyazi kuti ife sitinali olimba mtima kuti nkuchita zotere . Tsopano ndilankhula ngati wopusa : zimene wina aliyense anganyadire , zomwezo inenso ndingathe kuzinyadira .
47011022	Kodi iwo ndi Ahebri ? Inenso . Kodi iwo ndi Aisraele ? Inenso . Kodi iwo ndi ana a Abrahamu ? Inenso .
47011023	Kodi iwo ndi atumiki a Khristu ? Ndikulankhula ngati wamisala , ndine mtumiki woposa iwowo . Ndidagwira ntchito kwambiri kopambana iwo , kaŵirikaŵiri ndinali pafupi kufa .
47011024	Kasanu Ayuda adandikwapula mikwapulo 39 .
47011025	Katatu Aroma adandimenya ndi ndodo . Kamodzi anthu adandiponya miyala . Katatu pa maulendo athu apanyanja , chombo chathu chidasweka . Nthaŵi ina ndidayandama pakati pa nyanja tsiku lathunthu , usana ndi usiku .
47011026	Pa maulendo anga ochuluka ndidakumana ndi zoopsa za mitsinje , zoopsa za achifwamba , zoopsa zochokera kwa Ayuda anzanga , ndi zina zochokera kwa akunja . Ndidapeza zoopsa m'mizinda , m'thengo , ndi pakati pa abale onyenga .
47011027	Ndidagwira ntchito zolemetsa , ndipo kaŵirikaŵiri sindidalaŵe tulo . Ndidamva njala ndi ludzu , kaŵirikaŵiri osaona chakudya , ndipo kusoŵa zovala ndi kuzizidwa .
47011028	Kuwonjezera pa zonsezi , tsiku ndi tsiku ndimapsinjidwa ndi udindo wa kusamalira mipingo yonse .
47011029	Ndani ali wofooka , ine osakhala naye pamodzi m'kufooka kwakeko ? Ndani amene mnzake amchimwitsa , ine osavutika mu mtima ?
47011030	Ngati ndiyenera kunyada , ndidzanyadira kufooka kwanga .
47011031	Mulungu , Atate a Ambuye athu Yesu , amene tiyenera kumtamanda nthaŵi zonse , akudziŵa kuti sindikunama .
47011032	Pamene ndinali ku Damasiko , bwanamkubwa woimirira mfumu Areta , adaaika alonda kuzinga mzinda wonsewo kuti andigwire .
47011033	Koma anthu adandiika m'dengu nanditsitsira pa windo la m'lingalo , motero ndidamthaŵira .
47012001	Ndiyenera kunyada , tsono kunyada kwake nkopanda phindu . Komabe ndimati ndikambe za zimene Ambuye adandiwonetsa m'masomphenya , ndiponso za zimene adandiwululira .
47012002	Ndikudziŵa mkhristu wina amene adaatengedwa mwadzidzidzi kupita Kumwambamwamba . Papita zaka khumi ndi zinai chichitikire cha zimenezi . Sindidziŵa ngati zidaachitika ali m'thupi kapena ali kunja kwa thupi . Akudziŵa ndi Mulungu zimenezi .
47012003	Ndikudziŵa kuti munthuyo adaatengedwa mwadzidzidzi kupita ku Paradizo . Sindikudziŵa ngati zimenezi zidaachitika ali m'thupi , kapena ali kunja kwa thupi . Akudziŵa ndi Mulungu zimenezi .
47012004	Kumeneko munthuyo adamva zinthu zosasimbika , zinthu zimene munthu sangazilankhule .
47012005	Munthu wotere ndidzamnyadira , koma kunena za ine ndekha , sindidzanyadira kanthu kena koma kufooka kwanga kokha .
47012006	Ndikadafuna kunyada , sindikadakhala ngati wopusa , chifukwa ndikadalankhula zoona zokha . Koma sindidzanyada , kuwopa kuti wina aliyense angandiyese wopambana , kusiyana ndi m'mene amandiwonera , ndiponso ndi m'mene amandimvera ndikamalankhula .
47012007	Koma kuwopa kuti ndingamadzitukumule chifukwa cha zazikulu kwambiri zimene Ambuye adandiwululira , Mulungu adandipatsa cholasa ngati minga m'thupi . Adalola wamthenga wa Satana kuti azindimenya , kuti ndingamanyade kwambiri .
47012008	Pamenepo ndidapempha Ambuye katatu kuti andichotsere chimenechi ,
47012009	koma Iwo adandiwuza kuti , " Chithandizo changa nchokukwanira . Mphamvu zanga zimaoneka kwenikweni mwa munthu wofooka . " Nchifukwa chake makamaka ndidzanyadira kufooka kwanga , kuti mphamvu za Khristu zikhale mwa ine .
47012010	Tsono ndimakondwera pamene ndili wofooka , pamene anthu andinyoza , namandizunza , ndiponso pamene ndimva zoŵaŵa ndi kusautsidwa chifukwa cha Khristu . Pakuti pamene ndili wofooka , mpamene ndili ndi mphamvu .
47012011	Ndasanduka wopusa , koma ndinu mwandichititsa zimenezi . Ndinu mukadayenera kundichitira umboni . Pakuti ngakhale sindili kanthu , atumwi anu apamwamba aja sandipambana pa kanthu kalikonse .
47012012	Ndidakutsimikizirani mopirira kwambiri kuti ndine mtumwi , pakuchita pakati panu zizindikiro , zozizwitsa ndi ntchito zina zamphamvu .
47012013	Kodi nchiyani chimene ndidachitira mipingo ina , inu osakuchitirani , kupatula chokhachi chakuti sindidakhale ngati katundu wokulemetsani ? Ndikhululukireni kulakwa kwangaku .
47012014	Aka nkachitatu tsopano kukonzeka kuti ndibwere kwanuko , ndipo sindidzakhala ngati katundu wokulemetsani . Sindikufuna zinthu zanu , koma ndikufuna inuyo . Pakuti si udindo wa ana kusungira makolo ao chuma , koma ndi udindo wa makolo kusungira ana ao chuma .
47012015	Kunena za ine , ndidzakondwa kupereka zanga zonse , ndi kutaya ngakhale moyo wanga womwe chifukwa cha inu . Ine ndikamakukondani kwambiri chotere , kodi ndiye kuti inuyo muzingondikonda pang'ono ?
47012016	Momwemo tsono , mudzandivomereza kuti ine sindidakhale ngati katundu wokulemetsani . Koma kapena wina adzati popeza kuti ndine wochenjera , ndidakuchenjeretsani .
47012017	Kodi kapena ndidakuchenjererani mwa aliyense amene ndidamtuma kwa inu ?
47012018	Ndidapempha Tito kuti apite , kenaka ndidatuma mbale wathu wina pamodzi naye . Kodi Titoyo adakuchenjererani ? Kodi suja iye ndi ine tinkachita zonse ndi mtima umodzi ? Suja tinkatsata njira imodzimodzi ?
47012019	Kapena mwakhala mukuganiza kuti tikuyesa kudziteteza pamaso panu . Iyai , koma pokhala pamaso pa Mulungu , timalankhula mwa Khristu , ndipo pa zonsezi , okondedwa anga , timangofuna kukulimbitsani mtima .
47012020	Ndikuwopa kuti ndikadzabwera kwanuko , mwina nkudzakupezani muli osiyana ndi m'mene ndikadafunira . Ndikuwopa kuti mwina inunso nkudzandipeza ine wosiyana ndi m'mene mukadafunira . Ndikuwopanso kuti mwina ine nkudzapeza kukangana , kaduka , kupsa mtima , kudzikonda , kusinjirirana , ugogodi , kudzitukumula , ndiponso chisokonezo .
47012021	Ndikuwopa kuti ndikadzabweranso kwanuko , mwina Mulungu wanga nkudzandinyazitsa pamaso panu , ineyo nkudzalira misozi chifukwa cha ambiri amene adachimwa kale , ndipo sadalape zonyansa zao , dama lao , ndi mayendedwe ao oipa .
47013001	Aka nkachitatu tsopano kuti ndibwere kwanuko . Mau a Mulungu akuti , " Mlandu uliwonse uzitsimikizika ndi umboni wa anthu aŵiri kapena atatu . "
47013002	Inu amene mudaachimwa kale , ndiponso ena onse , paja ndidaakuuzani pamene ndinali kwanuko kachiŵiri kaja ndipo ndikubwereza kukuuziranitu tsopano ndisanafike , kuti ndikadzabweranso , sindidzamchitira chifundo wina aliyense .
47013003	Pamenepo mudzaona chitsimikizo chimene mukufuna chakuti Khristu amalankhula kudzera mwa ine . Iyeyu sali wofooka pa zimene amachita nanu , koma amaonetsa mphamvu zake pakati panu .
47013004	Anali wofooka pamene adapachikidwa pa mtanda , komabe tsopano ali moyo mwa mphamvu ya Mulungu . Ifenso ndife ofooka mwa Iye , koma tidzakhala amoyo pamodzi naye ndi mphamvu ya Mulungu , pogwira ntchito yathu pakati panu .
47013005	Muzidziyesa nokha inuyo kuti mutsimikize ngati mukusungadi chikhulupiriro chanu . Muzidzifunsitsa nokha . Simudziŵa nanga kuti Yesu Khristu ali mwa inu ? Ngati si choncho , mwalephereratu .
47013006	Koma ndikhulupirira kuti mudzazindikira kuti ife sitidalephere .
47013007	Tikupempha Mulungu kuti musachite choipa chilichonse . Osati kuti ife tiwoneke ngati opambana , koma kuti inu muchite zimene zili zoyenera , ngakhale ife tiwoneke ngati talephera .
47013008	Pakuti sitingathe kuchita chilichonse chotsutsana ndi choona , koma zokhazokha zothandizira choonacho .
47013009	Timakondwa pamene ife tili ofooka koma inu muli amphamvu . Chimene tikupempha Mulungu nchakuti mudzasanduke angwiro .
47013010	Ndikulemba zimenezi ndisanafike kwanu , kuti ndikadzafika , pasadzakhale chifukwa choti ndidzagwiritse ntchito ulamuliro wanga mwaukali . Ambuye adandipatsa ulamulirowo kuti ndilimbitse mpingo , osati kuti ndiupasule .
47013011	Tsono abale , kondwani . Mverani zimene ndikukulangizani , ndipo mukonze zimene zidalakwika . Muzimvana ndi kukhala mu mtendere . Pamenepo Mulungu wachikondi ndi wamtendere adzakhala nanu .
47013012	Mupatsane moni mwa chikondi choona .
47013013	Anthu onse a Mulungu akukupatsani moni .
47013014	Madalitso a Ambuye Yesu Khristu ndi chikondi cha Mulungu ndiponso chiyanjano cha Mzimu Woyera zikhale ndi inu nonse .
48001001	Ndine , Paulo , mtumwi . Adandisankha si anthu ai , koma Yesu Khristu , ndiponso Mulungu Atate amene adamuukitsa kwa akufa .
48001002	Ineyo pamodzi ndi abale onse amene ali nane , tikulembera mipingo ya ku Galatiya .
48001003	Mulungu Atate athu ndi Ambuye Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere .
48001004	Khristuyo adadzipereka chifukwa cha machimo athu , kuti atipulumutse ku njira za moyo woipa uno . Pakutero adachita zimene Mulungu Atate athu ankafuna .
48001005	Ulemu ukhale kwa Mulunguyo mpaka muyaya . Amen .
48001006	Ndikudabwa kuti mukupatuka msangamsanga motere , kusiya Mulungu amene adakuitanani mwa kukoma mtima kwa Khristu , ndipo kuti mukutsata uthenga wabwino wina .
48001007	Koma palibe konse uthenga wabwino wina . Pali anthu ena amene akukusokonezani , ndipo akufuna kupotoza Uthenga Wabwino wonena za Khristu .
48001008	Koma aliyense , kaya ndife kaya ndi mngelo wochokera Kumwamba , akakulalikirani uthenga wabwino wosiyana ndi uja tidakulalikiraniwu , ameneyo akhale wotembereredwa .
48001009	Ndikubwereza kunena zimene tidaanenanso kale , kuti munthu aliyense akakulalikirani uthenga wabwino wosiyana ndi Uthenga Wabwino umene mudalandira uja , iyeyo akhale wotembereredwa .
48001010	Kodi ponena zimenezi ndiye kuti ndikufuna kuti anthu andivomereze ? Iyai , koma kuti andivomereze ndi Mulungu . Kodi ndikuyesa kukondweretsa anthu ? Ndikadayesabe kukondweretsa anthu , si bwenzi ndilinso mtumiki wa Khristu .
48001011	Abale , ntakuuzani : Uthenga Wabwino umene ine ndimalalika , ndi wosachokera kwa anthu .
48001012	Sindidaulandire kwa munthu , ndipo palibenso munthu amene adandiphunzitsa Uthengawo , koma ndi Yesu Khristu yemwe amene adawuulula kwa ine .
48001013	Mudamva za mayendedwe anga kale pamene ndinali m'Chiyuda . Ndinkazunza Mpingo wa Mulungu koopsa , ndipo ndinkayesetsa kuuwonongeratu .
48001014	Ndinkapambana anzanga ambiri a msinkhu wanga pochita zachiyuda , ndipo ndinali wachangu koposa potsata miyambo ya makolo athu .
48001015	Koma Mulungu adandipatula ndisanabadwe , ndipo mwa kukoma mtima kwake adandiitana .
48001016	Tsono pamene adatsimikiza zondiwululira Mwana wake , kuti choncho ndikalalike Uthenga Wabwino wonena za Iye kwa anthu amene sali Ayuda , sindidapite kwa munthu aliyense kuti ndikapemphe nzeru .
48001017	Sindidapite ngakhalenso ku Yerusalemu kwa anthu amene anali atumwi kale ine ndisanakhale mtumwi . Koma ndidapita ku Arabiya kenaka nkubwereranso ku Damasiko .
48001018	Pambuyo pake , patapita zaka zitatu , ndidapita ku Yerusalemu kukacheza ndi Petro , ndipo ndidangokhala naye masiku khumi ndi asanu .
48001019	Sindidaonenso mtumwi wina aliyense kupatula Yakobo yekha , mbale wa Ambuye .
48001020	Ndikulumbira pamaso pa Mulungu kuti zimene ndikukulemberanizi ndi zoona , sindikunama ai .
48001021	Pambuyo pake ndidakafika ku madera a ku Siriya ndi a ku Silisiya .
48001022	Koma chonsecho nkuti mipingo yaehikhristu ya ku Yudeya isanandiwone ndi kundidziŵa bwino .
48001023	Inali itangomva mbiri chabe yakuti , " Munthu uja ankatizunza kaleyu , tsopano akulalika chikhulupiriro chimene kale lija ankayesetsa kuchiwononga . "
48001024	Motero mipingoyi inkalemekeza Mulungu chifukwa cha ine .
48002001	Pambuyo pake , patapita zaka khumi ndi zinai , ndidapitanso ku Yerusalemu pamodzi ndi Barnabasi . Ndidatenganso Tito kuti apite nafe .
48002002	Ndidapita kumeneko chifukwa Mulungu adaachita kundiwululira kuti ndipite . Mu msonkhano wa atsogoleri okhaokha ndidaŵafotokozera Uthenga Wabwino umene ndimalalika pakati pa anthu osakhala Ayuda . Ndidachita zimenezi kuwopa kuti ntchito imene ndikuchitayi , ndiponso imene ndidachita kale , ingakhale yachabe .
48002003	Koma mnzanga uja , Tito , ngakhale ndi Mgriki , sadamkakamize kuti aumbalidwe ,
48002004	ngakhale kuti anthu ena adaafuna kuti iyeyu aumbalidwe ndithu . Anthu ameneŵa adaabwera modzizimbayitsa ngati abale athu . Iwowo adangodzaloŵa ngati azondi kuti adzaone ufulu wathu umene tili nawo mwa Khristu Yesu . Ankafuna kutisandutsa akapolo .
48002005	Sitidaŵagonjere mpang'ono pomwe , popeza kuti tinkafuna kukusungirani kwathunthu zoona za Uthenga Wabwino .
48002006	Koma kunena za aja ankaŵayesa atsogoleriŵa , ( kaya analidi atsogoleri kaya , ndilibe nazo kanthu . Mulungu sakondera paja ) , iwowo sadaonjeze kanthu kena koti ndilalike .
48002007	Makamaka adaaona kuti Mulungu adandipatsa ine ntchito ya kulalika Uthenga Wabwino kwa anthu osakhala Ayuda , monga momwe adapatsira Petro ntchito ya kuulalika kwa Ayuda .
48002008	Pakuti Mulungu yemweyo amene adagwira ntchito mwa Petro pomutuma ngati mtumwi kwa Ayuda , adagwiranso ntchito mwa ine , pondituma ngati mtu'mwi kwa anthu a mitundu ina .
48002009	Yakobo , Petro ndi Yohane , amene anthu ankaŵaona kuti ndi mizati mu Mpingo , adazindikira kuti ineyo Mulungu adandipatsadi ntchito imeneyi . Motero adagwirana chanza ndi ine ndiponso ndi Barnabasi , kutsimikiza chiyanjano chathu . Ndipo tidavomerezana kuti ine ndi Bamabasi tipite kwa anthu a mitundu ina , iwowo apite kwa Ayuda .
48002010	Adangopempha chokhachi kuti tisaleke kukumbukira anthu ao aumphaŵi . Ndipotu chimenechi ndicho ndakhala ndikuchita moikapo mtima .
48002011	Koma pamene Petro adafika ku Antiokeya , ndidamtsutsa poyera , chifukwa adaapezeka wolakwadi .
48002012	Pakuti asanafike anthu ena amene Yakobo adaaŵatuma , iye ankadya pamodzi ndi abale osakhala Ayuda . Koma atafika iwowo , iye adayamba kudzipatula , osafuna kudya nawonso , chifukwa choopa anthu amene ankafuna kuti omwe sali Ayuda aumbalidwe .
48002013	Abale ena onse ochokera ku Chiyuda nawonso adayamba kuchita chiphamaso , kotero kuti ngakhale Barnabasi yemwe adaatengeka nacho chiphamaso chaocho .
48002014	Ine ndidaaona kuti iwo sakuyenda molunjika , sakutsata choona cha Uthenga Wabwino . Tsono ndidauza Petro pamaso pa onse kuti , " Iwe ndiwe Myuda , komabe ukukhala ngati munthu wa mtundu wina , osati Myuda . Nanga ungakakamize bwanji anthu a mitundu ina kukhala ngati Ayuda ? "
48002015	Ife ndife a mtundu wa Ayuda , osati anthu aja amati akunja ochimwa .
48002016	Komabe tikudziŵa kuti munthu sangapezeke kuti ngwolungama pamaso pa Mulungu pakuchita ntchito zolamulidwa ndi Malamulo , koma pakukhulupirira Yesu Khristu . Ifenso tidakhulupirira Khristu Yesu kuti tisanduke olungama pamaso pa Mulungu pakukhulupirira Khristu , osati chifukwa cha ntchito zolamulidwa ndi Malamulo . Pakuti palibe munthu amene angapezeke kuti ngwolungama pamaso pa Mulungu chifukwa cha ntchito zolamulidwa ndi Malamulo .
48002017	Tsono ngati ifeyo , poyesetsa kusanduka olungama mwa Khristu , tikupezeka kuti ndifenso ochimwa , kodi pamenepo ndiye kuti Khristu ndi wotumikira uchimo ? Mpang'ono pomwe .
48002018	Ngati ndimanganso zomwezo zimene ndidaagamula , pamenepo kukuwonekeratu kuti ndine wopalamula .
48002019	Malamulo ndiwo adandizindikiritsa kuti ndiyenera kulekeratu kuŵadalira Malamulowo , ndipo kuti moyo wanga wonse uyenera kukhala wodalira Mulungu mwini .
48002020	Ndidapachikidwa pa mtanda pamodzi ndi Khristu , kotero kuti sindinenso amene ndili ndi moyo , koma ndi Khristu amene ali ndi moyo mwa ine . Moyo umene ndili nawo tsopano m'thupi lino , ndi moyo wokhulupirira Mwana wa Mulungu , amene adandikonda napereka moyo wake chifukwa cha ine .
48002021	Sindiisandutsa yopandapake mphatso yaulere ya Mulungu . Pakuti ngati munthu atha kusanduka wolungama pamaso pa Mulungu pakutsata Malamulo , ndiye kuti Khristu adafa pachabe .
48003001	Agalatiya opusa inu , adakulodzani ndani ? Pamene tidakulalikirani Yesu Khristu , tidamuwonetsa poyera pamaso panu ngati wopachikidwa pa mtanda .
48003002	Ndikufunseni chinthu chimodzi chokha : Kodi mudalandira Mzimu Woyera pakutsata Malamulo , kapena pakumva ndi kukhulupirira Uthenga Wabwino ?
48003003	Kani ndinu opusa chotere ? Kodi zimene Mzimu Woyera adayamba kuchita mwa inu , mukufuna kuzifikitsa pake penipeni tsopano ndi mphamvu zanuzanu ?
48003004	Kodi mudalandira zonse zija pachabe ? Sindikukhulupirira kuti mpachabe .
48003005	Kodi Mulungu amene amakupatsani Mzimu Woyera , nachita zozizwitsa pakati panu , amachita zimenezi chifukwa mumatsata Malamulo , kapena chifukwa mudamva ndi kukhulupirira Uthenga Wabwino ?
48003006	Paja ponena za Abrahamu Malembo akuti , " Iye adaakhulupirira Mulungu , motero Mulungu adamuwona kuti ngwolungama . "
48003007	Muzindikire tsono kuti ndi anthu amene amakhulupirira omwe ali ana enieni a Abrahamu .
48003008	Koma Malembo adaoneratu kuti anthu a mitundu ina pakukhulupirira , Mulungu adzaŵaona kuti ngolungama pamaso pake . Nchifukwa chake Malembowo adaauziratu Abrahamu Uthenga Wabwinowu wakuti , " Mwa iwe Mulungu adzadalitsa anthu a mitundu yonse . "
48003009	Abrahamu adakhulupirira , ndipo Mulungu adamdalitsa . Motero pamodzi ndi Abrahamuyo Mulungu amadalitsanso onse okhulupirira .
48003010	Onse amene amadalira ntchito za Malamulo ndi otembereredwa . Paja Malembo akuti , " Ndi wotembereredwa aliyense amene satsata zonse zolembedwa m'buku la Malamulo . "
48003011	Komatu nchodziŵikiratu kuti palibe munthu amene angapezeke kuti ngwolungama pamaso pa Mulungu pakuchita ntchito zolamulidwa ndi Malamulo . Paja Malembo akuti , " Munthu amene ali wolungama pamaso pa Mulungu pakukhulupirira , adzakhaladi ndi moyo . "
48003012	Koma Malamulo akusiyana ndi chikhulupiriro , chifukwa Malembo akuti , " Munthu amene amachita zonse zolamulidwa ndi Malamulo , adzakhala ndi moyo pakutero . "
48003013	Khristu adatiwombola ku temberero la Malamulo pakusanduka wotembereredwa m'malo mwathu . Paja Malembo akuti , " Ndi wotembereredwa aliyense wopachikidwa pa mtengo . "
48003014	Khristu adachita zimenezi , kuti dalitso limene Mulungu adaalonjeza Abrahamu , lipatsidwe kwa anthu a mitundu yonse kudzera mwa Khristu Yesu , ndipo kuti pakukhulupirira tilandire Mzimu Woyera amene Mulungu adaatilonjeza .
48003015	Abale , ndikufotokozereni zimenezi pokupatsani chitsanzo cha zimene zimachitika tsiku ndi tsiku . Anthu aŵiri akapangana natsimikiza chimodzi , palibe munthu angaphwanye panganolo kapena kuwonjezapo mau .
48003016	Tsono Mulungu adapatsa malonjezo ake kwa Abrahamu ndi kwa mbeu yake . Sakunena kuti , " Ndi kwa mbeu zake " ai , ngati kuti akunena za anthu ambiri . Koma akunena kuti , " Ndi kwa mbeu yake " , popeza kuti akukamba za munthu mmodzi yekha . Ameneyu ndi Khristu .
48003017	Chimene ndikunena ndi ichi : Mulungu adachita chipangano , nalonjeza kuchisunga . Malamulo a Mose , amene adadza patapita zaka 430 , sangathe kuchiphwanya chipanganocho ndi kuwononga lonjezo la Mulungu lija .
48003018	Mulungu akapatsa munthu madalitso chifukwa munthuyo ndi wotsata Malamulo , ndiye kuti madalitsowo sapatsidwanso chifukwa cha lonjezo ai . Koma Mulungu adadalitsa Abrahamu chifukwa adaalonjeza kutero .
48003019	Nanga tsono cholinga cha Malamulo chinali chiyani ? Mulungu adaonjezapo Malamulo kuti azindikiritse anthu machimo , mpaka mbeu ija ya Abrahamu , imene Mulungu adaaipatsa lonjezo lija , itabwera . Mulungu adapereka Malamulowo kudzera mwa angelo , ndiponso kudzera mwa munthu wochita ntchito ya mkhalapakati .
48003020	Tsono tikati mkhalapakati , ndiye kuti pali anthu aŵiri . Koma Mulungu ali yekha .
48003021	Kodi ndiye kuti Malamulo a Mose amatsutsana ndi malonjezo a Mulungu ? Mpang'ono pomwe . Anthu akadalandira malamulo otha kuŵapatsa moyo , pamenepo bwenzi atasanduka olungama kudzera mwa malamulowo .
48003022	Koma Malembo akunenetsa kuti zinthu zonse zili mu ulamuliro wa uchimo , kuti pakukhulupirira Yesu Khristu , anthu okhulupirira alandiredi zimene Mulungu adalonjeza .
48003023	Chisanafike chikhulupirirochi , tinali ngati akaidi m'manja mwa Malamulo , kudikira kuti chikhulupiriro chimene chidaati chifikecho , chiwululidwe .
48003024	Motero Malamulowo anali ngati namkungwi wathu , mpaka atabwera Khristu , kuti tisanduke olungama pamaso pa Mulungu pakukhulupirira .
48003025	Popeza kuti tsopano chikhulupiriro chafika , namkungwiyo satilamuliranso .
48003026	Nonsenu ndinu ana a Mulungu chifukwa mumakhulupirira Khristu Yesu .
48003027	Pajatu nonsenu arhene mudasanduka amodzi ndi Khristu pakubatizidwa , mudachita ngati kuvala moyo wa Khristu .
48003028	Motero palibe kusiyana pakati pa Ayuda ndi anthu a mitundu ina , pakati pa akapolo ndi mfulu , kapenanso pakati pa amuna ndi akazi , pakuti nonsenu ndinu amodzi mwa Khristu Yesu .
48003029	Ngati ndinu ake a Khristu , ndiye kuti ndinu ana a Abrahamu , oyenera kulandira zimene Mulungu adalonjeza .
48004001	Chimene ndikufuna kunena ndi ichi : Mloŵachuma akali wamng'ono sasiyana ndi kapolo , ngakhale iyeyo ndi mwini chuma chonsecho .
48004002	Mwanayo ayenera kumvera omulera ndiponso akapitao oyang'anira chuma chake , mpaka nthaŵi imene bambo wake adakhazikitsa .
48004003	Chimodzimodzinso ifeyo , pamene tinali ana , tinali akapolo a miyambo yapansipano .
48004004	Koma nthaŵi itakwana , Mulungu adatuma Mwana wake . Mwanayo adabadwa mwa mkazi , adabadwa woyenera kumvera Malamuio a Mose .
48004005	Adachita zimenezi kuti akaombole amene anali akapolo a Malamulowo , ndipo kuti potero tisanduke ana a Mulungu .
48004006	Pofuna kutsimikiza kuti ndinu ana ake , Mulungu adatitumizira Mzimu wa Mwana wake m'mitima mwathu , ndipo Mzimuyo amatinenetsa kuti , " Abba ! Atate ! "
48004007	Motero sindiwenso kapolo ai , koma mwana . Ndipo popeza kuti ndiwe mwana wake , Mulungu adakusandutsanso mloŵachuma wake .
48004008	Kale simunkadziŵa Mulungu , nchifukwa chake munkatumikira zomwe sizili milungu konse .
48004009	Koma tsopano mukumdziŵa Mulungu , makamaka ndinene kuti Mulungu ndiye akudziŵa inu . Nanga bwanji mukubwereranso ku miyambo yachabe ndi yopanda phindu ija ? Bwanji mukufuna kukhalanso akapolo ake ?
48004010	Mumasunga masiku , miyezi , nyengo ndi zaka .
48004011	Ndikuwopa kuti mwinatu ntchito zanga zonse pakati panu ndidazigwira pachabe .
48004012	Ndikukupemphani abale , musanduke ngati ine , pakuti inenso ndidasanduka ngati inu nomwe . Simudandilakwire konse .
48004013	Monga mukudziŵa , pamene ndidayamba kukulalikirani Uthenga Wabwino , ndinkadwala .
48004014	Ngakhale matendawo anali ngati mayeso kwa inu , komabe simudandinyoze kapena kunyansidwa nane . Kwenikweni mudandilandira ngati mngelo wa Mulungu , kapenanso ngati Khristu Yesu mwini .
48004015	Nanga chimwemwe chanu chija chili kuti tsopano ? Ndikukuchitirani umboni kuti nthaŵi imene ija , kukadatheka , mukadakolowola maso anu nkundipatsa ineyo .
48004016	Monga ndasanduka mdani wanu popeza kuti ndakuuzani zoona ?
48004017	Anthu amene aja akuchita changu kwambiri pothandiza inu kuti akukopeni , koma changu chaocho sichili chabwino ai . Amangofuna kukupatutsani kuti muzichita changu pakuŵathandiza iwowo .
48004018	Kwabwino nkumachita changu pa chinthu chabwino masiku onse , osati pokhapokha pamene ndili pamodzi nanu .
48004019	Inu ana anga , monga mkazi amamva zoŵaŵa pochira , inenso ndikumva zoŵaŵa chifukwa cha inu mpaka moyo wa Khristu ukhazikike mwa inu .
48004020	Ndikadakonda nditakhala nanu tsopano . Apo kapena ndikadasintha mau anga , chifukwa mwandithetsa nzeru .
48004021	Inu ofuna kukhala akapolo a Malamulo , tandiwuzani . Kodi simukumvetsa zimene Malamulowo akunena ?
48004022	Paja Malembo akuti , Abrahamu anali ndi ana aamuna aŵiri : wina mai wake anali kapolo , winayo mai wake anali mfulu .
48004023	Mwana amene mai wake anali kapolo uja , adabadwa monga momwe amabadwira ana onse . Koma mwana wina uja , amene mai wake anali mfulu , adabadwa chifukwa cha lonjezo la Mulungu .
48004024	Zimenezi zili ngati fanizo . Akazi aŵiri aja akufanizira zipangano ziŵiri . Mmodzi ( Hagara uja ) , ndi wochokera ku phiri la Sinai , ndipo ana ake amakhala akapolo .
48004025	Hagarayo akufanizira phiri la Sinai la m'dziko la Arabiya , lofanizira Yerusalemu walero , amene ali m'ukapolo pamodzi ndi anthu ake onse .
48004026	Koma Yerusalemu wakumwamba ndiye mfulu , ndipo ndiye mai wathu .
48004027	Paja Malembo akuti , " Sangalala iwe chumba chosabala ana , imba nthungululu , fuula mokondwera , iwe amene sunamvepo zoŵaŵa za kubala . Ana a mkazi wosiyidwa ndi ochuluka koposa ana a mkazi amene ali naye mwamuna . "
48004028	Tsono inu abale , ndinu ana a Mulungu chifukwa cha lonjezo lake , monga Isaki .
48004029	Nthaŵi imeneyo mwana uja amene adaabadwa monga momwe amabadwira ana onse , ankasautsa mwana winayo wobadwa mwa mphamvu za Mzimu Woyera , ndipo mpaka tsopano zili chimodzimodzi .
48004030	Nanga Malembo akuti bwanji ? Akuti , " Mpirikitseni kapoloyu pamodzi ndi mwana wake . Mwana wa kapolo asadzakhale konse mloŵachuma pamodzi ndi mwana wa mfulu . "
48004031	Nchifukwa chake , abale , ife sindife ana a kapolo , ndife ana a mfulu .
48005001	Khristu adatimasula kuti tikhale mfulu ndithu . Muzichilimikira tsono , osalola kumangidwanso m'goli la ukapolo .
48005002	Ndiye mvetsani , ine Paulo ndikukuuzani kuti mukalola kukuumbalani , Khristu simupindula nayenso konse ai .
48005003	Ndikufuna kubwerezanso kuuza aliyense woumbalidwa , kuti ayenera kutsata Malamulo onse a Mose .
48005004	Inu amene mukuyesa kusanduka olungama pakutsata Malamulowo , mudadzipatula nokha kusiya Khristu . Pamenepo mudalekana ndi madalitso aulere a Mulungu .
48005005	Koma kunena za ife , chifukwa cha kulandira Mzimu Woyera ndiponso pakukhulupirira , tikuyembekeza kuti Mulungu adzatiwona kuti ndife olungama pamaso pake .
48005006	Pakuti pamene tili mwa Khristu Yesu , kuumbalidwa kapena . kusaumbalidwa kulibe kanthu , chachikulu nchakuti munthu akhale ndi chikhulupiriro chogwira ntchito mwachikondi .
48005007	Munkathamanga bwino lomwe . Tsono adakuletsani ndani kuti musamverenso choona ?
48005008	Kukopeka kwanu kumeneku sikuchokera kwa Mulungu amene amakuitanani .
48005009	Chofufumitsira chapang'ono chabe chimafufumitsa buledi yense .
48005010	Ndili ndi chikhulupiriro mwa Ambuye , kuti simudzakhala ndi maganizo osiyana ndi anga . Koma amene akukusokonezaniyo , ngakhale akhale yani , Mulungu adzamlanga ndithu .
48005011	Koma kunena za ine , abale , ngati ndikulalikabe kuti anthu aziwumbalidwa , nanga bwanji ndikuzunzidwabe ? Ndikadalalikabe kuti anthu aziwumbalidwa , sibwenzi ndikuŵakhumudwitsa pakulalika mtanda wa Khristu .
48005012	Ndikadakonda kuti amene akukuvutaniwo angodzithena basi .
48005013	Inu abale , Mulungu adakuitanani kuti mukhale mfulu . Koma chenjerani kuti ufulu wanu umenewu usapatse mpata khalidwe lanu lokonda zoipa . Kwenikweni muzitumikirana mwachikondi .
48005014	Paja Malamulo onse a Mulungu amaundidwa mkota pa lamulo limodzi lija lakuti , " Uzikonda mnzako monga momwe umadzikondera iwe wemwe . "
48005015	Koma ngati muyamba kulumana ndi kukadzulana , muchenjere kuti mungaonongane kotheratu . Za ntchito za khalidwe lokonda zoipa , ndi za zipatso za Mzimu Woyera
48005016	Chimene ndikufuna kunena ndi ichi : Mulole Mzimu Woyera kuti azikutsogolerani . Mukatero , pamenepo simudzachita zimene khalidwe lanu lokonda zoipa limalakalaka .
48005017	Pakuti khalidwelo limalakalaka zotsutsana ndi zimene Mzimu Woyera afuna , ndipo zimene Mzimu Woyera afuna zimatsutsana ndi zimene khalidwe lokonda zoipalo limafuna . Ziŵirizi zimadana , kotero kuti simungachite zimene mufuna kuchita .
48005018	Koma ngati Mzimu Woyera akutsogolerani , ndiye kuti sindinunso akapolo a Malamulo a Mose .
48005019	Zochita za khalidwe lokonda zoipa zimaonekera poyera . Ndi izi : Dama , kuchita zonyansa , kusadziletsa ,
48005020	kupembedza mafano , ufiti , chidani , kukangana , kaduka , kupsa mtima , kudzikonda , kusa gwirizana , kuchita mipatuko ,
48005021	dumbo , kuledzera , kudakwa pa maphwando achi ' pembedzo , ndi zina zotere . Ndikukuchenjezani tsopano , monga ndidaachitanso kale , kuti anthu amene amachita zotere , sadzalandirako Ufumu wa Mulungu .
48005022	Koma zipatso zimene Mzimu Woyera amabweretsa m'moyo wa munthu ndi izi : Chikondi , chimwemwe , mtendere , kuleza mtima , chifundo , kukoma mtima , kukhulupirika ,
48005023	kufatsa ndiponso kudziletsa . Zimenezi palibe lamulo loziletsa .
48005024	Amene ali ake a Khristu Yesu , adalipachika pa mtanda khalidwe lao lokonda zoipa , pamodzi ndi zokhumba zake ndi zilakolako zake .
48005025	gati Mzimu Woyera adatipatsa moyo , tilolenso kuti Mzimu yemweyo azititsogolera .
48005026	Tisakhale odzitukumula , oputana , kapena ochitirana dumbo .
48006001	Abale , wina akagwa m'tchimo lililonse , inu amene Mzimu Woyera amakutsogolerani , mumthandize munthuyo ndi mtima wofatsa kuti akonzekenso . Koma mukhale maso kuti inu nomwe mungayesedwe ndi zoipa .
48006002	Muzithandizana kusenza zokulemetsani , ndipo pakutero mumvere ndithu lamulo la Khristu .
48006003	Ngati munthu adziyesa kanthu , pamene chikhalirecho sali kanthu konse , amangodzinyenga .
48006004	Aliyense aziyesa yekha ntchito zake m'mene ziliri . Ngati zili bwino , adzatha kunyadira chifukwa cha ntchito zake zokhazo , osati chifukwa zapambana ntchito za mnzake .
48006005	Pakuti aliyense adzayenera kudzisenzera katundu wakewake .
48006006	Munthu amene akuphunzira mau a Mulungu , agaŵireko mphunzitsi wake zabwino zonse zimene iye ali nazo .
48006007	Musadzinyenge , nkosatheka kupusitsa Mulungu . Zimene munthu amabzala , adzakolola zomwezo .
48006008	Munthu wongodalira zilakolako zake zokha , chimene adzakolole ndi imfa . Koma munthu wodalira Mzimu Woyera , chimene adzakolole ndi moyo wosatha .
48006009	Tisatope nkuchita zabwino , chifukwa pa nthaŵi yake tidzakolola , ngati sitilefuka .
48006010	Nchifukwa chake tsono , nthaŵi zonse tikapeza mpata , tizichitira anthu onse zabwino , makamaka abale athu achikhristu .
48006011	Onani malemba akuluakulu amene ndikulemba ndi dzanja langalanga tsopano .
48006012	Onse amene afuna kuti akome pamaso pa anthu , akukukakamizani kuti muumbalidwe . Ali ndi cholinga chimodzi chokha , chakuti asazunzidwe chifukwa cha mtanda wa Khristu .
48006013	Pakuti ngakhale iwo omwe amene amaumbalidwa satsata Malamulo , komabe amafuna kuti inu muumbalidwe , kuti athe kunyadira kuumbalidwa kwanuko .
48006014	Koma ine sindinganyadire kanthu kena kalikonse , koma mtanda wa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu basi . Popeza kuti Iye adafa pa mtanda , tsopano zapansipano kwa ine zili ngati zakufa , ndipo inenso kwa zapansipano , ndili ngati wopachikidwa .
48006015	Kuumbalidwa si kanthu , kusaumbalidwa si kanthunso , chachikulu nchakuti Mulungu apatse munthu moyo watsopano .
48006016	Mulungu aŵapatse mtendere , ndipo aŵachitire chifiindo anthu a Mulungu onse amene amatsata njira imeneyi .
48006017	Kuyambira tsopano asandivutenso munthu wina aliyense , pakuti zipsera zimene ine ndili nazo pa thupi langa , zikutsimikiza kuti ndine wakewake wa Yesu .
48006018	Abale , Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu akudalitseni inu nonse . Amen .
49001001	Ndine , Paulo , mtumwi wa Khristu Yesu mwa kufuna kwa Mulungu . Ndikulembera anthu a Mulungu amene ali ku Efeso , amenenso ali okhulupirika mwa Khristu Yesu .
49001002	Mulungu Atate athu ndi Ambuye Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere .
49001003	Tiyamike Mulungu , Atate a Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu . Mwa Khristu Iye adatipatsa madalitso onse auzimu Kumwamba .
49001004	Mulungu asanalenge dziko lapansi , adatisankhiratu mwa Khristu kuti tikhale oyera mtima ndi opanda cholakwa pamaso pake .
49001005	Chifukwa chotikonda , adakonzeratu kuti mwa Yesu Khristu atilandire ngati ana ake . Adachita zimenezi chifukwa adaafuna kutero mwa kukoma mtima kwake .
49001006	Adaafuna kuti tizitamanda ulemu wake chifukwa adatikomera mtima kopambana , pakutipatsa Mwana wake wokondedwa ngati mphatso yaulere .
49001007	Ndi imfa ya Mwana wakeyo Mulungu adatipulumutsa , adatikhululukira machimo afhu . Nzazikuludi mphatso zaulere
49001008	zimene Mulungu adatipatsa mochuluka .
49001009	Mwa lunfha ndi nzeru adatiwululira chifuniro chake chimene kale chinali chobisika . Zimene adaati achite mwa kukoma mtima kwake ndi zomwe Iye mwini adaakonzeratu kale .
49001010	Chimene Mulungu adalongosola kuti achite itakwana nthaŵi , nchakuti asonkhanitse pamodzi mwa Khristu zinthu zonse za Kumwamba ndi zapansipano .
49001011	Paja Mulungu amaongolera zinthu zonse monga momwe Iye wafunira ndi m'mene watsimikizira . Iye adatisankhiratu mwa Khristu kuti tikhale akeake . Adazikonzeratu kuti ziyenera kukhala choncho .
49001012	Adafuna kuti ife , amene tinali oyamba kuyembekeza Khristu , tilemekeze ulemerero wake .
49001013	Mwa Khristu , inunso mutamva mau oona , amene ali Uthenga Wabwino wokupulumutsani , mudaukhulupirira . Nchifukwa chake Mulungu adakusindikizani chizindikiro chotsimikizira kuti ndinu akedi , pakukupatsani Mzimu Woyera amene Iye adaalonjeza .
49001014	Mzimu Woyerayo ndiye chikole chotsimikizira kuti tidzalandiradi madalitso onse amene Mulungu adalonjeza kupatsa anthu ake , ndipo kuti Mulungu adzapulumutsa kwafhunthu anthu amene adaŵaombola kuti akhale ake enieni . Cholinga cha zonsezi ndi chakuti tilemekeze ulemerero wake .
49001015	Ndamva kuti mukukhulupirira Ambuye Yesu , ndiponso kuti mumakonda anthu a Mulungu .
49001016	Nchifukwa chake sindilekeza kuthokoza Mulungu chifukwa cha inu . Ndimakukumbukirani m'mapemphero anga ,
49001017	ndipo ndimapemphera kuti Mulungu wa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu , Atate aulemerero , akuninkheni Mzimu Woyera , amene adzakupatsani nzeru , nadzaulula Mulungu kwa inu , kuti mumdziŵe kwenikweni .
49001018	Ndimapemphera kuti Mzimu Woyerayo akuunikireni m'mitima mwanu , kuti mudziŵe zimene mungathe kuyembekezera kwa Mulungu amene adakuitanani . Ndimafunanso kuti mudziŵe kukula kwake kwa ulemerero ndi madalitso amene Mulungu amalonjeza kupatsa anfhu ake .
49001019	Ndiponso ndikufuna kuti mudziŵe mphamvu yake yopitirira muyeso imene ikugwira ntchito mwa ife ornkhulupirira . Mphamvuyi ndi yomwe ija yolimba koposa ,
49001020	imene Mulungu adaigwiritsa ntchito pamene adaukitsa Khristu kwa akufa , namkhazika ku dzanja lake lamanja m'dziko la Kumwamba .
49001021	Adamkhazika pamwamba pa mafumu onse , aulamuliro onse ndi akuluakulu onse a Kumwamba , ndiponso pamwamba pa maina ena onse amene anthu angaŵatchule nthaŵi ino kapenanso nthaŵi ilikudza .
49001022	Mulungu adagonjetsa zonse kuti zikhale pansi pa mapazi a Khristu , ndipo adamkhazika pamwamba pa zonse kuti akhale mutu wa Mpingo .
49001023	Mpingowu ndi thupi la Khristu , ndipo ndi wodzazidwa ndi Khristuyo amene amadzaza zinfhu zonse kotheratu .
49002001	Kale inu munali akufa chifukwa cha zolakwa zanu ndi machimo anu .
49002002	Pa nthaŵi imeneyo , munkayenda m'zoipa potsata nzeru zapansipano , ndipo munkamvera mkulu wa aulamuliro amumlengalenga . Mkuluyo ndi mzimu woipa umene ukugwira ntchito tsopano pakati pa anthu oukira Mulungu .
49002003	Nthaŵi imene ija ifenso tonse tinali ndi moyo wonga wao , ndipo tinkatsata zilakolako za khalidwe lafhu lokonda zoipa . Tinkachitanso zilizonse zimene matupi afhu ndi maganizo athu ankasirira . Nchifukwa chake , mwachibadwa chathu , tinali oyenera mkwiyo wa Mulungu , monga anthu ena onse .
49002004	Koma Mulungu ndi wachifundo chachikulukulu , adatikonda ndi chikondi chachikulu kopambana .
49002005	Motero , pamene tinali akufa chifukwa cha machimo athu , Iye adatipatsa moyo pamodzi ndi Khristu . Kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu ndi kumene kudakupulumutsani .
49002006	Popeza kuti tili mwa Khristu Yesu , Mulungu adachita ngati kutiwukitsa kwa akufa pamodzi naye , kuti choncho atipatse malo aulemu pamodzi naye m'dziko la Kumwamba .
49002007	Adachita zimenezi kuti mwa chifundo chake chimene adatichitira mwa Khristu Yesu , aonetse kwa nthaŵi zonse zam'tsogolo kuti ngwokomadi mtima kopambana .
49002008	Ndi kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kumene kudakupulumutsani pakukhulupirira . Simudapulumuke chifukwa cha zimene inuyo mudaachita ai , kupulumuka kwanu ndi mphatso ya Mulungu .
49002009	Munfhu sapulumuka chifukwa cha ntchito zake , kuwopa kuti angamanyade .
49002010	Mulungu ndiye adatipanga . Adatilenga mwa Khristu Yesu kuti moyo wathu ukhale wogwira ntchito zabwino zimene Iye adakonzeratu kuti tizichite .
49002011	Inu amene mtundu wanu sindinu Ayuda , kumbukirani m'mene munaliri kale . Ayuda amadzitchula oumbala , chifukwa cha mwambo umene amachita pa thupi lao , ndipo inu amakutchulani osaumbala .
49002012	Tsono kumbukirani kuti nthaŵi imene ija munali opanda Khristu . Munali alendo , ndipo simunali a mtundu wa anthu osankhidwa ndi Mulungu . Munali opanda gawo pa zimene Mulungu , mwa zipangano zake , adaalonjeza anthu ake . Munkakhala pansi pano opanda chiyembekezo , opandanso Mulungu .
49002013	Koma tsopano , mwa Khristu Yesu , inu amene kale lija munali kutali ndi Mulungu , mwakhala pafupi , chifukwa cha imfa ya Khristu .
49002014	Khristu mwini wake ndiye mtendere wathu . Iye adasandutsa Ayuda ndi anthu a mitundu ina kuti akhale amodzi . Pakupereka thupi lake , adagamula khoma la chidani limene linkatilekanitsa .
49002015	Iye adathetsa Malamulo a Mose pamodzi ndi malangizo ake ndi miyambo yake . Adachita zimenezi . kuti kuchokera ku mitundu iŵiri ija , alenge mtundu umodzi watsopano , wokhala mwa Iye , kuti choncho adzetse mtendere .
49002016	Khristu adafa pa mtanda kuti athetse chidani , ndipo kuti mwa mtandawo aphatikize pamodzi m'thupi limodzi mitundu iŵiriyo , ndi kuiyanjanitsa ndi Mulungu .
49002017	Khristu adadzalalika Uthenga Wabwino wa mtendere kwa inu a mirundu inanu , amene munali kutali ndi Mulungu , ndiponso kwa Ayuda , amene anali pafupi naye .
49002018	Tsopano kudzera mwa Khristu ife tonse , Ayuda ndi a mitundu ina , tingathe kufika kwa Atate mwa Mzimu Woyera mmodzi yemweyo .
49002019	Nchifukwa chake tsono , inu amene simuli Ayuda , sindinunso alendo kapena akudza ai , koma ndinu nzika pamodzi ndi anthu ake a Mulungu , ndiponso ndinu a m'banja lake la Mulungu .
49002020	Ndinu omangidwa pamodzi m'nyumba yomangidwa pa maziko amene ndi atumwi ndi aneneri , ndipo Khristu Yesu mwini ndiye mwala wapangodya .
49002021	Mwa Iyeyu nyumba yonse ikumangidwa molimba , ndipo ikukula kuti ikhale nyumba yopatulika ya Ambuye .
49002022	Mwa Iyeyu inunso mukumangidwa pamodzi ndi ena onse , kuti mukhale nyumba yokhalamo Mulungu mwa Mzimu Woyera .
49003001	Nchifukwa chake ine Paulo ndimakupemphererani . Ndine womangidwa m'ndende chifukwa chotumikira Khristu ndi kugwirira ntchito inu amene simuli Ayuda .
49003002	Kumva mudamva za ntchito imene mwa ufulu wake Mulungu adandipatsa , yolalika pakati panu za kukoma mtima kwake .
49003003	Adandiwululira chinsinsi chake , monga ndidakulemberani mwachidule posachedwapa .
49003004	Pamene muŵerenga zimenezi , mungathe kuwona kuti ndikumvetsetsadi chinsinsi chonena za Khristu .
49003005	Chinsinsi chimenechi anthu a mibadwo yakale sadachidziŵe , koma Mulungu wachiwulula tsopano mwa Mzimu Woyera kwa atumwi ake oyera mtima , ndiponso kwa aneneri ake .
49003006	Chinsinsicho nchakuti mwa Uthenga Wabwino anthu a mitundu ina nawonso ngoyenera kulandira rnadalitso a Mulungu pamodzi ndi Ayuda . Pamodzinso ndi Ayuda ali ziwalo za thupi limodzi , ndipo mwa Khristu Yesu amalandira nao lonjezo la Mulungu .
49003007	Mwa kukoma mtima kwake Mulungu adandisandutsa wolalika Uthenga Wabwino umenewu , ndipo pakutero adaonetsapo mphamvu yake .
49003008	Pakati pa anthu onse a Mulungu ine ndine wamng'ono koposa , komabe Mulungu adandipatsa ineyo ntchito iyi , yakuti ndilalikire anthu a mitundu ina za chuma chopanda malire , chimene Mulungu amatipatsa mwa Khristu .
49003009	Adandipatsanso ntchito yofotokozera anthu onse za m'mene Mulungu adzachitira zonse zimene Iye adakonzeratu mwa chinsinsi chake . Mulungu amene adalenga zonse , adasunga chinsinsichi chikhalire , nthaŵi isanayambe .
49003010	Tsopano afuna kuti kudzera mwa Mpingo , mafumu ndi aulamuliro onse a Kumwamba adziŵe nzeru za Mulungu zamitundumitundu .
49003011	Mulungu adachita zimenezi kuti zichitikedi zimene Iye adakonzeratu mwa Khristu Yesu Ambuye athu chikhalire , nthaŵi isanayambe .
49003012	Popeza kuti timakhulupirira Iyeyu , tingathe kulimba mtima kuyandikira kwa Mulungu mosakayika konse .
49003013	Ndikukupemphani tsono kuti musataye mtima chifukwa chakuti ndikukusaukirani . Kwenikweni muyenera kunyadira chifukwa cha kusauka kwangaku .
49003014	Nchifukwa chake tsono ndikugwadira Atate ,
49003015	amene banja lililonse Kumwamba ndi pansi pano limatchulidwa ndi dzina lao .
49003016	Ndikupempha Mulungu kuti kuchokera m'chuma cha ulemerero wake akupatseni mphamvu , ndipo mwa Mzimu wake Woyera alimbitse moyo wanu wauzimu .
49003017	Ndikupemphera kuti mwa chikhulupiriro chanu Khristu akhazikike m'mitima mwanu , kuti muzike mizu yanu m'chikondi , ndiponso kuti mumange moyo wanu wonse pa chikondi .
49003018	Ndikupempha Mulungu kuti , pamodzi ndi anthu ake onse , muthe kuzindikira kupingasa kwake ndi kutalika kwake , kukwera kwake ndi kuzama kwake kwa chikondi cha Khristu .
49003019	Ndithu ndikupemphera kuti mudziŵe chikondi chija cha Khristu chopitirira nzeru za anthu , kuti mudzazidwe kotheratu ndi moyo wa Mulungu mwini .
49003020	Ulemerero ukhale kwa Mulungu amene , mwa mphamvu yake yogwira ntchito mwa ife , angathe kuchita zochuluka kupitirira kutalitali zimene tingazipemphe kapena kuziganiza .
49003021	Mulungu alandire ulemuwo mu Mpingo ndi mwa Khristu Yesu pa mibadwo yonse mpaka muyaya . Amen .
49004001	Nchifukwa chake ine , womangidwa m'ndende chifukwa chotumikira Ambuye , ndikukupemphani kuti , chifukwa Mulungu adakuitanani , muziyenda moyenerana ndi kuitanidwako .
49004002	Muzikhala odzichepetsa , ofatsa ndi opirira nthaŵi zonse . Muzilezerana mtima mwachikondi ,
49004003	ndipo muziyesetsa kusunga umodzi mwa Mzimu Woyera pa kulunzana mu mtendere ,
49004004	Pali thupi limodzi ndiponso Mzimu Woyera mmodzi , monganso pali chiyembekezo chimodzi chimene Mulungu adakuitanirani .
49004005	Pali Mbuye mmodzi , chikhulupiriro chimodzi , ubatizo umodzi .
49004006	Pali Mulungu mmodzi amene ali Atate a anthu onse . Iye ali pamwamba pa onse , amagwira ntchito kudzera mwa onse , ndipo ali mwa onse .
49004007	Komabe aliyense wa ife adalandira mphatso yakeyake yaulere , molingana ndi m'mene Khristu amaperekera mphatso zake .
49004008	Paja mau a Mulungu akuti , " Pamene adakwera Kumwamba , adatenga chigulu cha am'ndende , ndipo adagaŵira anthu mphatso . "
49004009	Tsono mau akuti " adakwera " tanthauzo lake nchiyani ? Ndiye kuti poyamba adaatsikira pansi penipeni pa dziko .
49004010	Iye amene adaatsika , ndi yemweyo amene adakwera , nabzola Kumwamba konse , kuti zinthu zonse zikhale zodzaza ndi Iye .
49004011	Iyeyu ndiye amene " adapereka mphatso kwa anthu . " Mphatso zake zinali zakuti ena akhale atumwi , ena aneneri , ena alaliki , ena abusa ndi aphunzitsi .
49004012	Ntchito yao inali yakuti akonzeretu anthu a Mulungu kuti akagwire ntchito yotumikira , ndi kulimbitsa Mpingo umene uli thupi la Khristu .
49004013	Motero potsiriza , tonse tidzafika ku umodzi umene umapezeka pakukhulupirira , ndiponso pakudziŵa Mwana wa Mulungu . Pamenepo tidzakhwima ndithu , ndi kufika pa msinkhu wathunthu wa Khristu .
49004014	Sitidzakhalanso ngati ana akhanda ogwedezekagwedezeka ndi mafunde , ndiponso otengekatengeka ndi mphepo iliyonse ya zophunzitsa za anthu onyenga amene amasokeretsa anthu ndi kuchenjera kwao .
49004015	Kwenikwenitu pakulankhula zoona ndi mtima wachikondi , tizikula pa zonse mwa Khristu . Iye ndiye mutu ,
49004016	umene umalamula thupi lonse , ndi kulilumikiza pamodzi ndi mfundo zake zonse . Motero chiwalo chilichonse chimagwira ntchito yake moyenera , ndipo thupi lonse limakula ndi kudzilimbitsa ndi chikondi .
49004017	Tsono m'dzina la Ambuye ndikukuuzani , ndipo ndikunenetsa , kuti musayendenso monga amachitira akunja potsata maganizo ao achabe .
49004018	Nzeru zao zidachita chidima , sangalandire nao konse moyo wa Mulungu chifukwa cha umbuli umene udadza mwa iwo kaamba ka kuuma mtima kwao .
49004019	Mitima yao ilibenso manyazi ndipo adangodzipereka ku zonyansa , kuti azichita zoipa zilizonse mosadziletsa .
49004020	Koma umu si m'mene inu mudaphunzirira za Khristu ai ,
49004021	ngatitu mudamva za Iyeyo , ngatinso mudaphunzitsidwa za Iye , motsata choona chimene chili mwa Yesu .
49004022	Mudaphunzira kuti muleke mayendedwe anu akale , muvule moyo wanu wakale uja umene unkadziwononga ndi zilakolako zake zonyenga .
49004023	Mtima wanu , umene uli gwero la maganizo anu , usanduke watsopano .
49004024	Ndipo muvale moyo watsopano , umene Mulungu adaulenga , wofanafana naye . Apo mudzakhala olungama ndi oyera mtima kwenikweni .
49004025	Tsono lekani kunama . Aliyense azilankhula zoona zokhazokha ndi mkhristu mnzake , pakuti tonse pamodzi mogwirizana ndife ziwalo za thupi la Khristu .
49004026	Inde mwina nkupsa mtima , koma musachimwe , ndipo musalole kuti dzuŵa likuloŵereni muli chikwiyire .
49004027	Musampatse mpata Satana woti akugwetseni .
49004028	Amene ankaba , asabenso , koma makamaka azigwira ntchito kolimba ndi kumachita zolungama ndi manja ake , kuti akhale nkanthu kopatsa osoŵa .
49004029	M'kamwa mwanu musatuluke mau aliwonse oipa , koma muzinena mau okhaokha abwino ndi olimbitsa mtima monga kungafunikire , kuti mupindulitse anzanu omva mau anuwo .
49004030	Ndipo musamvetse chisoni Mzimu Woyera amene Mulungu adakusindikizani chizindikiro chake chotsimikizira kuti ndinu ake pa tsiku limene Mulunguyo adzatipulumutse kwathunthu .
49004031	Muchotseretu pakati panu kuzondana , kukalipa , ndiponso kupsa mtima . Musachitenso chiwawa , kapena kulankhula mau achipongwe , tayani kuipa konse .
49004032	Muzikomerana mtima ndi kuchitirana chifundo , ndipo muzikhululukirana monga momwe Mulungu mwa Khristu adakukhululukirani inunso .
49005001	Tsono popeza kuti ndinu ana okondedwa a Mulungu , muziyesa kumtsanzira .
49005002	Muzikondana , monga Khristu adatikonda ife , nadzipereka kwa Mulungu chifukwa cha ife . Adadzipereka ngati chopereka ndi nsembe ya fungo lokondweretsa Mulungu .
49005003	Popeza kuti ndinu anthu a Mulungu , ndiye kuti dama kapena zonyansa , kapena masiriro oipa zisatchulidwe nkomwe pakati panu .
49005004	Ndiponso musamalankhule zolaula , zopusa , kapena zopandapake , koma muzilankhula zoyamika Mulungu .
49005005	Mudziŵe ichi , kuti munthu aliyense wadama , kapena wochita zonyansa , kapena wa masiriro oipa ( pakuti wa masiriro oipa ali ngati wopembedza fano ) sadzaloŵa nao mu Ufumu wa Khristu ndi wa Mulungu .
49005006	Munthu wina aliyense asakupusitseni ndi mau onyenga , pakuti zinthu zotere ndizo zimadzetsa ukali wa Mulungu pa anthu omupandukira .
49005007	Nchifukwa chake musamagwirizane nawo anthu otere .
49005008	Inunso kale mudaali mu mdima , koma tsopano muli m'kuŵala , popeza kuti ndinu ao a Ambuye . Tsono muziyenda ngati anthu okhala m'kuŵala .
49005009	Pajatu pamene pali kuŵala , pamapezekanso ubwino wonse , chilungamo chonse ndi choona chonse .
49005010	Muziyesa kudziŵa kwenikweni zimene zingakondweretse Ambuye .
49005011	Musayanjane nawo anthu ochita zopanda pake za mdima , koma muŵatsutse .
49005012	Paja zimene iwo amachita mobisa , ngakhale kuzitchula komwe kumachititsa manyazi .
49005013	Koma kuŵala kumaunika zinthu , ndipo zonse zimaonekera poyera .
49005014	Motero chilichonse choonekera poyera , chimasanduka kuŵala . Nchifukwa chake amati , " Dzuka wam'tulo iwe , uka kwa akufa , ndipo Khristu adzakuŵalira . "
49005015	Samalirani bwino mayendedwe anu . Musayende monga anthu opanda nzeru , koma monga anthu anzeru .
49005016	Mukhale achangu , osataya nthaŵi yanu pachabe , pakuti masiku ano ngoipa .
49005017	Nchifukwa chake musakhale opusa , koma dziŵani zimene Ambuye afuna kuti muchite .
49005018	Musaledzere vinyo , kumeneko nkudzitaya , koma mudzazidwe ndi Mzimu Woyera .
49005019	Muzichezerana ndi mau a masalimo ndi a nyimbo za Mulungu ndi zauzimu . Ndipo muziimbira Ambuye mopolokezana ndi mtima wanu wonse .
49005020	Muziyamika Mulungu Atate nthaŵi zonse chifukwa cha zonse , m'dzina la Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
49005021	Inu amene mumaopa Khristu , muzimverana .
49005022	Inu akazi , muzimvera amuna anu , monga mumamvera Ambuye .
49005023	Paja mwamuna ndi mutu wa mkazi wake , monga momwe Khristu ali mutu wa Mpingo , umene uli thupi lake , ndipo Iye mwini ndi Mpulumutsi wa Mpingowo .
49005024	Tsono monga Mpingo umamvera Khristu , momwemonso akazi azimvera amuna ao pa zonse .
49005025	Inu amuna , muzikonda akazi anu , monga momwe Khristu adakondera Mpingo , nadzipereka chifukwa cha Mpingowo .
49005026	Adachita zimenezi kuti aupatule ukhale wakewake , atauyeretsa pakuutsuka ndi madzi ndiponso ndi mau ake .
49005027	Adafuna kuti akauimike pamaso pake uli waulemerero , wopanda banga kapena makwinya , kapena kanthu kena kalikonse kouipitsa , koma uli woyera ndi wangwiro kotheratu .
49005028	Momwemonso amuna azikonda akazi ao , monga momwe eniakewo amakondera matupi ao . Amene amakonda mkazi wake , ndiye kuti amadzikonda iye yemwe .
49005029	Palibiretu munthu amene amadana ndi thupi lake , koma amalidyetsa ndi kulisamala bwino , monga momwe Khristu amachitira Mpingo wake .
49005030	Amatero chifukwa Mpingowo ndi thupi lake , ndipo ife ndife ziwalo zake .
49005031	Paja mau a Mulungu akuti , " Nchifukwa chake mwamuna adzasiye atate ndi amai ake , nkukaphatikizana ndi mkazi wake , kuti aŵiriwo asanduke thupi limodzi . "
49005032	Mau ameneŵa akutiwululira chinsinsi chozama , ndipo ndikuti chinsinsicho nchokhudza Khristu ndi Mpingo .
49005033	Komabe akunenanso za inu , kuti mwamuna aliyense azikonda mkazi wake monga momwe amadzikondera iye mwini , ndiponso kuti mkazi aliyense azilemekeza mwamuna wake .
49006001	Inu ana , popeza kuti ndinu ake a Khristu , muzimvera anakubala anu , pakuti zimenezi ndiye zoyenera .
49006002	Mau a Mulungu akuti , " Lemekeza atate ako ndi amai ako . " Limeneli ndiye lamulo loyamba kukhala ndi lonjezo .
49006003	Lonjezolo likuti , " Ukatero , udzakhala wodala , ndipo moyo wako udzakhala wautali pansi pano . "
49006004	Inu atate , musamaŵapsetsa mtima ana anu , koma muziŵalera bwino pakuŵasungitsa mwambo ndi malangizo a Ambuye .
49006005	Inu akapolo , ambuye anu a pansi pano muziŵamvera mwamantha ndi monjenjemerera . Muzichita zimenezi ndi mtima woona , ngati kuti mukuchitira Khristu yemwe .
49006006	Musazichite mwachiphamaso chabe , ngati kuti mukungofuna kukondweretsa anthu . Koma ngati akapolo a Khristu , muzichita ndi mtima wonse zimene Mulungu afuna .
49006007	Muzitumikira mosangalala , ngati kuti mukutumikira Ambuye , osati anthu chabe .
49006008	Mukudziŵa kuti Ambuye adzampatsa munthu aliyense mphotho chifukwa cha ntchito yake yabwino imene adaigwira , ngakhale munthuyo ndi kapolo kapena mfulu .
49006009	Inu ambuye , muziŵachitiranso chimodzimodzi akapolo anu , ndipo muleke zoŵaopseza . Paja mukudziŵa kuti iwoŵa ndi inuyo , nonse muli ndi Mbuye wanu Kumwamba , ndipo Iyeyo alibe tsankho .
49006010	Potsiriza ndikuti , dzilimbitseni mwa Ambuye , mwa mphamvu yao yaikulu .
49006011	Valani zida zonse zimene Mulungu akupatsani , kuti muthe kulimbika polimbana ndi ndale za Satana .
49006012	Paja sitikulimbana ndi anthu chabetu ai . Tikulimbana ndi maufumu , aulamuliro ndi mphamvu za dziko lino lapansi lamdima , ndiponso ndi mizimu yoipa yamumlengalenga .
49006013	Nchifukwa chake valani zida zonse za Mulungu . Pamenepo mudzatha kulimbika , osagonja pa tsiku loipa , ndipo mutatsiriza kulimbanaku , mudzaimabe kuti nji .
49006014	Imirirani tsono mutavala choona ngati lamba m'chiwuno mwanu . Valani chilungamo ngati chovala chachitsulo chotchinjirizira pachifuwa panu .
49006015	Ndipo changu chanu polalika Uthenga Wabwino wa mtendere chikhale ngati nsapato zanu .
49006016	Nthaŵi zonse mukhale ndi chikhulupiriro ngati chishango chanu chokutetezani , chimene mudzatha kuzimitsira mivi yonse yoyakamoto ya Satana .
49006017	Landirani chipulumutso ngati chisoti chanu , ndi mau a Mulungu ngati lupanga limene Mzimu Woyera akupatsani .
49006018	Chitani zonse mopemphera , ndi kupempha chithandizo cha Mulungu nthaŵi zonse . Nthaŵi iliyonse muzipemphera motsogoleredwa ndi Mzimu Woyera . Nchifukwa chake muchezere kupemphera mosalekeza , kupempherera anthu onse a Mulungu .
49006019	Inenso muzindipempherera , kuti Mulungu aike mau m'kamwa mwanga pamene ndizilankhula , kuti ndidziŵitse anthu chinsinsi cha Uthenga Wabwino molimba mtima .
49006020	Ngakhale ndili womangidwa m'ndende , ndine nthumwi ndithu chifukwa cha Uthenga Wabwinowu . Mundipempherere tsono kuti ndizilankhula molimba mtima za Uthenga Wabwinowu , monga ndiyenera kulankhulira .
49006021	Tikiko adzakudziŵitsani zonse za ine ndi zimene ndikuchita . Iyeyu ndi mbale wathu wokondedwa , ndiponso mtumiki wokhulupirika pa ntchito ya Ambuye .
49006022	Ndikumtuma kwa inu kuti mudziŵe za m'mene tiliri , ndipo kuti akulimbitseni mtima .
49006023	Mulungu Atate ndi Ambuye Yesu Khristu apatse abale onse mtendere , chikondi ndi chikhulupiriro .
49006024	Onse okonda Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu ndi chikondi chosafa , Mulungu aŵadalitse .
50001001	Ndife , Paulo ndi Timoteo , atumiki a Khristu Yesu . Tikulembera onse a mu mzinda wa Filipi , amene ali anthu ake a Mulungu mwa Khristu Yesu . Tikulemberanso oyang'anira Mpingo ndi atumiki ao .
50001002	Mulungu Atate athu ndi Ambuye Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere .
50001003	Ndimayamika Mulungu wanga nthaŵi zonse ndikamakukumbukirani .
50001004	Nthaŵi zonse pamene ndikukupemphererani nonsenu , ndimapemphera mokondwa .
50001005	Ndiyeneradi kuthokoza chifukwa mwakhala mukugwirizana nane ndi kundithandiza kufalitsa Uthenga Wabwino , kuchokera tsiku limene mudayamba kukhulupirira mpaka tsopano .
50001006	Sindikayika konse kuti Mulungu , amene adayamba kuchita ntchito yabwinoyi mwa inu , adzaipitiriza mpaka itatsirizika pa Tsiku la Kubweranso kwa Khristu Yesu .
50001007	Ndikuyeneradi kuganiza zotere za nonsenu , popeza kuti ndimakukondani kwambiri . Pakuti nonsenu ndinu ogwirizana nane ndithu , pamene ndili m'ndende ndiponso pamene ndikugwira ntchito iyi imene Mulungu adandipatsa mwa kukoma mtima kwake , ntchito ya kuteteza ndi kukhazikitsa Uthenga Wabwino .
50001008	Mulungu akundichitira umboni kuti ndimakulakalakani kwambiri , pakuti ndimakukondani ndi mtima wonse , motsanzira chikondi cha Khristu Yesu mwini .
50001009	Pemphero langa ndi lakuti chikondi chanu chinke chikukulirakulira pamodzi ndi nzeru ndi kumvetsetsa zinthu mozama .
50001010	Pamenepo mudzadziŵa kusankha zimene zili zabwino kotheratu . Apo pa Tsiku la Kubweranso kwa Khristu mudzapezeka oyera mtima , ndi opanda cholakwa chilichonse .
50001011	Ndipo moyo wanu udzakhala wodzaza ndi zipatso za chilungamo zimene mudzaonetsa mothandizidwa ndi Yesu Khristu , kuti anthu onse alemekeze ndi kutamanda Mulungu .
50001012	Abale , ndikufuna kuti mudziŵe kuti zimene zandigwera , zathandiza ndithu kufalitsa Uthenga Wabwino .
50001013	Mwakuti asilikali onse olonda nyumba ya mfumu , ndi ena onse kuno , adziŵa kuti ndili m'ndende chifukwa cha Khristu .
50001014	Tsono chifukwa choti ndili m'ndende , abale ochuluka akulimba mtima mwa Ambuye , ndipo akulalika mau a Mulungu mopanda mantha .
50001015	Alipodi ena amene amalalika Khristu chifukwa cha kaduka ndi kukonda mikangano . Koma aliponso ena amene amamlalika ndi mtima woona .
50001016	Otsirizaŵa amamlalika chifukwa cha chikondi , popeza kuti amadziŵa kuti Mulungu adandikhazika muno kuti ndigwire ntchito yoteteza Uthenga Wabwino .
50001017	Koma oyamba aja salalika Khristu moona . Amangodzikonda okha , ndipo amafuna kundiwonjezera zoŵaŵa pamene ndili m'ndende muno .
50001018	Zili nkanthu ngati ! Kaya amalalika mwachiphamaso , kaya moona , malinga nkuti Khristu akulalikidwa , pamenepo ine ndikukondwa .
50001019	Ndipo sindidzaleka kukondwa podziŵa kuti chifukwa cha mapemphero anu ndiponso chithandizo cha Mzimu wopatsidwa ndi Yesu Khristu ndidzamasulidwa .
50001020	Motero ndikuyembekeza ndi kukhulupirira ndi mtima wonse kuti sipadzakhala konse manyazi . Koma ndikuyembekeza kuti ndidzalimba mtima kulankhula poyera , kuti tsopanonso , monga nthaŵi zonse , Khristu alemekezedwe mwa ine , ngakhale ndikhale moyo , kapena ndimwalire .
50001021	Kwa inetu moyo ndi Khristu amene , ndipo nayonso imfa ili ndi phindu .
50001022	Koma ngati kukhalabe moyo kungandipatse mwai woti ndigwire ntchito yoonetsa zipatso , sindidziŵa kaya ndingasankhe chiti .
50001023	Ndagwira njakata . Kwinaku ndikulakalaka kuti ndisiye moyo uno ndikakhale pamodzi ndi Khristu , pakuti chimenechi ndiye chondikomera koposa .
50001024	Koma kwinakunso nkofunika kwambiri kuti ndikhale moyo chifukwa cha inuyo .
50001025	Mosakayika konse ndikudziŵa kuti ndidzakhalapobe . Ndidzapitiriza kukhala nanu nonsenu , kuthandiza kuti chikhulupiriro chanu chizikula , ndipo chikupatseni chimwemwe koposa kale .
50001026	Motero pamene ndidzafikanso kwanuko , mudzakhala ndi zifukwa zochuluka zonyadira Khristu Yesu chifukwa cha ine .
50001027	Chachikulu nchakuti mayendedwe anu akhale oyenerana ndi Uthenga Wabwino wonena za Khristu . Ngakhale ndibwere kudzakuwonani , kapena ndikhale kutali , ndikufuna kumva kuti mukulimbika ndi mtima umodzi . Ndikufunanso kumva kuti momvana ndi mothandizana mukumenya nkhondo chifukwa chokhulupirira Uthenga Wabwino ,
50001028	osalola kuti adani anu azikuwopsezani pa kanthu kalikonse . Zimenezi zidzaŵatsimikizira kuti iwowo adzaonongeka , koma inu mudzapulumuka . Mulungu ndiye amene adzakuchitirani zimenezi .
50001029	Paja Iye adakupatsani mwai , osati wakungokhulupirira Khristu ai , komanso wakumva zoŵaŵa chifukwa cha Iye .
50001030	Inunso mukumenya nkhondo yomwe ija imene mudandiwona ine ndikuimenya , yomwenso ndikumenyabe tsopano , monga mukumveramu .
50002001	Mosapeneka , moyo wanu mwa Khristu umakulimbitsani mtima . Chikondi chake chimakuchotsani nkhaŵa . Mumakhala a mtima umodzi mwa Mzimu Woyera , ndipo mumamvera anzanu chifundo ndi chisoni .
50002002	Nchifukwa chake ndikukupemphani kuti mundikondweretse kwenikweni pakuvomerezana maganizo ndi kukondana chimodzimodzi , kukhala a mtima umodzi ndi a cholinga chimodzi .
50002003	Musamachita kanthu ndi mtima wodzikonda , kapena wodzitukumula chabe . Koma khalani odzichepetsa , ndipo aliyense aziwona anzake kuti ngomuposa iyeyo .
50002004	Musamangofuna zokomera inu nokha , koma zokomeranso anzanu .
50002005	Motero nonse mukhale ndi mtima womwe uja umene adaali nawonso Khristu Yesu :
50002006	Iyeyu anah ndi umulungu chikhalire , komabe sadayese kuti kulingana ndi Mulungu ndi chinthu choti achigwiritsitse .
50002007	Koma adadzitsitsa kotheratu pakudzitengera umphaŵi wa kapolo , ndi kukhala munthu wonga anthu onse .
50002008	Ali munthu choncho adadzichepetsa , adakhala womvera mpaka imfa , imfa yake yapamtanda .
50002009	Chifukwa cha chimenechi Mulungu adamkweza kopambana , nampatsa dzina lopambana dzina lina lililonse .
50002010	Adachita zimenezi kuti pakumva dzina la Yesu , zolengedwa zonse kumwamba , pansi pano ndi pansi pa dziko , zidzagwade pansi mopembedza ,
50002011	Zonse zidzavomereze poyera kuti , " Yesu Khristu ndi Ambuye , " ndipo pakutero zilemekeze Mulungu Atate .
50002012	Nchifukwa chake , inu okondedwa anga , mwakhala omvera nthaŵi zonse pamene ndinali nanu . Nanji tsopano pamene sindili nanu , ndiye muzikhala omvera koposa . Mupitirize ndi kufikitsa chipulumutso chanu pa chimake mwamantha ndi monjenjemerera .
50002013	Paja Mulungu ndiye amene amagwira ntchito mwa inu , muzifuna ndi kutha kuchita zimene zimkomera Iye .
50002014	Muzichita zonse mosanyinyirika ndi mosatsutsapo ,
50002015	kuti mukhale angwiro ndi osalakwa , ana a Mulungu opanda chilema chilichonse pakati pa anthu onyenga ndi osokeretsa anzao . Pakati pa anthu otere mumaŵala monga momwe zimaonekera nyenyezi pa dziko lapansi ,
50002016	pakuŵauza mau opatsa moyo . Motero ine ndidzakhala ndi chifukwa chonyadira pa Tsiku la Kubweranso kwa Khristu . Pakuti pamenepo padzadziŵika kuti sindidathamange pachabe pa mpikisano wa liŵiro , ndipo khama langa pa ntchito silidapite pachabe .
50002017	Ndipotu mwina mwake ndidzaphedwa , magazi anga nkukhala ngati otsiridwa pa nsembe imene chikhulupiriro chanu chikupereka kwa Mulungu . Ngati ndi choncho ndili wokondwa , ndipo ndikusangalala nanu pamodzi nonsenu .
50002018	Chimodzimodzi inunso muzikondwa , ndi kusangalala nane pamodzi .
50002019	Ngati Ambuye Yesu alola , ndikhulupirira kuti ndidzatha kutuma Timoteo kwanuko msanga , kuti mtima wanga ukhale pansi nditamva za kumeneko .
50002020	Ndilibenso wina wonga amene ali ndi mtima wosamala za inu kwenikweni .
50002021	Paja ena onse amangofuna zokomera iwo okha , osati zokomera Yesu Khristu .
50002022	Koma mukudziŵa kuti mkhalidwe wa Timoteo ndi wotsimikizika kale kuti ngwabwino . Mukudziŵanso kuti adagwira mogwirizana nane ntchito yofalitsa Uthenga Wabwino , monga mwana ndi bambo wake .
50002023	Ndikuyembekeza tsono kumtumiza kwa inu msanga , nditadziŵa za m'mene ziyendere zanga .
50002024	Koma ndikhulupirira kuti , Ambuye akalola , inenso ndidzafika kwanuko msanga .
50002025	Ndaganiza kuti nkofunikadi kuti ndikutumizireni mbale wathu uja , Epafrodito . Mudaamtuma kuti adzandithandize pa zosoŵa zanga , ndipo wagwiradi ntchito ndi kumenya nkhondo yachikhristu pamodzi ndi ine .
50002026	Tsonotu akukulakalakani nonsenu , ndipo ndi wokhumudwa podziŵa kuti inu mudamva zoti iye ankadwala .
50002027	Nzoonadi adaadwala zedi mpaka pafupi kufa . Mwai kuti Mulungu adamchitira chifundo . Ndipotu sadangochitira chifundo iye yekhayu , komanso ineyo , kuti chisoni changa chisakhale chosanjikizana .
50002028	Nchifukwa chake ndikufunitsitsa ndithu kumtumiza kwa inu , kuti podzamuwonanso mudzasangalale , kutinso nkhaŵa yanga ichepeko .
50002029	Mlandireni mwachikhristu ndi chimwemwe chachikulu . Anthu otere muziŵachitira ulemu .
50002030	Chifukwa cha kugwira ntchito ya Khristu , iyeyu adaali pafupifupi kufa . Adaadzipereka osaopa ngakhale kutaya moyo wake kuti azindithandiza pa zimene inu simudathe kukwaniritsa pondithandiza .
50003001	Abale anga , potsiriza ndikuti , " Muzikondwa mwa Ambuye . " Kukulemberaninso mau omwewo sikondilemetsa , ndipo mauwo ngokuthandizani kukhala osakayika .
50003002	Chenjera nawoni ochita zaugalu aja , ndiye kuti ochita zoipa , anthu omangodula thupi chabe .
50003003	Paja ifeyo ndiye oumbala enieni , ife amene timapembedza Mulungu motsogoleredwa ndi Mzimu Woyera . Timanyadira Khristu Yesu , osadalira miyambo ya thupi chabe .
50003004	Komabetu ineyo ndikadatha kudalira miyambo yathupiyi . Ngati alipo wina woganiza kuti ali ndi chifukwa chodalira miyambo yathupi yotere , ineyo ndili ndi chifukwa choposa apo .
50003005	Pajatu ine ndidaumbalidwa pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chitatu nditabadwa . Ndine wa mtundu wa Israele , wa fuko la Benjamini , Mhebri weniweni wobadwa mwa makolo achihebri . Kunena za Malamulo achiyuda , ndinali wa gulu la Afarisi .
