50003006	Ndipo changu changa chinali chachikulu , kotero kuti ndinkazunza Mpingo . Kunena za chilungamo chopezeka pakutsata Malamulo , ineyo ndinali wopanda cholakwa .
50003007	Koma chifukwa cha Khristu , zomwe kale ndinkaziyesa zaphindu , tsopano ndikuziwona kuti nzosapindula .
50003008	Zoonadi , zonse ndikuziwona kuti nzosapindulitsa poziyerekeza ndi phindu lopambana la kudziŵa Khristu Yesu , amene ndi Ambuye anga . Chifukwa cha Khristuyo ndidalolera kutaya zonse , nkumaziyesa zinyalala , kuti potero phindu langa likhale Khristu ,
50003009	Iye ndi ine tikhale amodzi . Sindiyesanso pandekha kukhala wolungama pakutsata Malamulo , koma ndizikhala ndi chilungamo chopezeka pakukhulupirira Khristu , chilungamo chochokera kwa Mulungu , chochilandira pakukhulupirira .
50003010	Chimene ndikufuna nchakuti ndidziŵe Khristu , ndiponso mphamvu zimene zidamuukitsa kwa akufa . Ndikufunanso kumva zoŵaŵa pamodzi naye ndi kufanafana naye pa imfa yake .
50003011	Ndikuyesetsa kuchita zimenezi pokhulupirira kuti inenso ndidzakhala ndi moyo wosatha podzauka kwa akufa .
50003012	Sindikunena kuti ndafikapo kale pa zimenezi , kapena kuti ndine wangwiro kale . Koma ndikuthamangabe ndi kuyesetsa kuzipata pakuti ndicho chinali cholinga cha Yesu Khristu pakundikopa kuti ndikhale wake .
50003013	Abale , sindikuganiza konse kuti ndazipata kale . Koma pali chimodzi chokha chimene ndimachita : ndimaiŵala zakumbuyo , ndi kuyesetsa kufikira ku zakutsogolo .
50003014	Ndikuthamangira ku mapeto a mpikisano wa liŵirowu , kuti ndikalandire mphotho Kumwamba , imene Mulungu akutiitanira kudzera mwa Khristu Yesu .
50003015	Tsono ife tonse amene tili okhwima pa moyo wathu wauzimu , tikhale ndi mtima womwewo . Ngati pa zinthu zina muli ndi maganizo osiyana ndi ameneŵa , pameneponso Mulungu adzakuunikirani .
50003016	Koma ngakhale zitani , tisatayepo kanthu pa zoona zimene takhala tikuzikhulupirira mpaka tsopano .
50003017	Abale anga , nonse pamodzi muzinditsanzira ine , ndipo muziŵapenyetsetsa amene amayenda motsata chitsanzo chimene ife timakupatsani .
50003018	Ndakhala ndikukuuzani kaŵirikaŵiri , ndipo tsopano ndikubwerezanso molira misozi , kuti pali ambiri amene mayendedwe ao akutsimikiza kuti amadana ndi mtanda wa Khristu .
50003019	Mathero ao nkuwonongeka . Zosangalatsa thupi chabe ndizo zili ngati mulungu wao . Amanyadira zimene akadayenera kuchita nazo manyazi , ndipo amangoika mtima pa zapansipano zokha .
50003020	Koma ife kwathu kwenikweni ndi Kumwamba , ndipo kumeneko kudzachokera Mpulumutsi amene tikumuyembekeza . Mpulumutsiyo ndi Ambuye Yesu Khristu .
50003021	Iyeyo adzasandutsa matupi athu achabeŵa kuti akhale ofanafana ndi thupi lake laulemerero . Adzachita zimenezi ndi mphamvu zake zomwe zija zimene angathenso kugonjetsa nazo zinthu zonse .
50004001	Tsono abale anga , ndimakukondani ndipo ndikukulakalakani . Mumandisangalatsa ndipo ndinu mphotho yanga imene ndimainyadira . Okondedwa anga , limbikani choncho mogwirizana ndi Ambuye .
50004002	Yuwodiyayo ndi Sintikeyo ndaŵapemba , chonde akhale omvana , popeza kuti ndi abale mwa Ambuye .
50004003	Ndiponso iwe , mnzanga weniweni pa ntchito yathuyi , bwanji uŵathandize azimaiŵa . Paja ameneŵa pofalitsa Uthenga Wabwino akhala akugwira ntchito kolimba pamodzi ndi ine ndi Klemensi ndi antchito anzanga ena onse , amene maina ao ngolembedwa m'buku la amoyo .
50004004	Muzikondwa mwa Ambuye nthaŵi zonse . Ndikubwerezanso kuti , " Muzikondwa . "
50004005	Kufatsa kwanu kuziwoneka pamaso pa anthu onse . Ambuyetu ali paiupi .
50004006	Musade nkhaŵa ndi kanthu kalikonse , koma m'mapemphero anu onse muzipempha Mulungu zimene zikusoŵani , ndipo nthaŵi zonse muzipemphe ndi mtima woyamika .
50004007	Pamenepo mtendere wochokera kwa Mulungu , umene uli wopitirira nzeru zonse za anthu , udzasunga bwino mitima yanu ndi maganizo anu mwa Khristu Yesu .
50004008	Potsiriza , abale , muziika mtima pa zilizonse zabwino kwambiri ndi zotamandika , monga izi : zinthu zoona ndi zolemekezeka , zinthu zolungama , zoyera , zokongola , ndi zaulemu .
50004009	Muzichita zimene mudaphunzira ndi kulandira kwa ine , ndiponso zimene mudamva kwa ine ndi kuwonera kwa ine . Pamenepo Mulungu amene amapatsa mtendere adzakhala nanu .
50004010	Ndakondwa kwambiri mwa Ambuye kuti tsopano , patapita nthaŵi yaiali , mwayambanso kuwonetsa kuti muandikumbukira . Kukumbukira munkandikumbukiradi , koma munkangosoŵa mpata woti muwonetsere .
50004011	Sindikunena zimenezi modandaula kuti ndikusoŵa kanthu , pakuti ine ndaphunzira kukhutira ndi zimene ndili nazo .
50004012	Kukhala wosauka ndimakudziŵa , kukhala wolemera ndimakudziŵanso . Pa zonse ndidaphunzira chinsinsi chake cha kukhala wokhutitsidwa , pamene ndapeza chakudya kapena ndili ndi njala , pamene ndili ndi zambiri kapena ndili wosoŵeratu .
50004013	Ndingathe kuchita zonse chifukwa Khristu amandipatsa mphamvu .
50004014	Komabe mudaachita bwino kundithandiza pa zovuta zanga .
50004015	Inu Afilipi , mukudziŵa inu nomwe kuti pamene ndidachoka ku Masedoniya , masiku oyamba aja akulalika Uthenga Wabwino , panalibe mpingo wina wogwirizana nane pa zoyenera kulipira kapena kulandira , koma inu nokha .
50004016	Pamene ndinali ku Tesalonika , mudatumiza kangapo zondithandiza pa zosoŵa zanga .
50004017	Sikuti ndikuika mtima pa mphatso zanu ai , koma chimene ndikukhumba nchakuti pa zimene muli nazo , pawonjezedwe phindu .
50004018	Ndalandiradi zonse , ndipo ndili nazo zochuluka . Ndili ndi zonse zofunika tsopano , popeza kuti ndalandira kwa Epafrodito zimene mudanditumizira . Zili ngati chopereka cha fungo lokoma , ngati nsembe imene Mulungu ailandira ndi kukondwera nayo .
50004019	Mulungu wanga ali ndi chuma chochuluka , ndipo mwa Khristu Yesu adzakupatsani zonse zimene mukusoŵa .
50004020	Mulungu Atate athu alemekezedwe mpaka muyaya . Amen .

51001001	Ndine , Paulo , mtumwi wa Khristu Yesu mwa kufuna kwa Mulungu . Ndili limodzi ndi Timoteo , mbale wathu .
51001002	Tikulembera inu osankhidwa ndi Mulungu okhala ku Kolose , abale athu okhulupirika mwa Khristu . Mulungu Atate athu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere .
51001003	Tikamakupemphererani , nthaŵi zonse timathokoza Mulungu , Atate a Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
51001004	Timathokoza chifukwa tamva kuti mumakhulupirira Khristu Yesu , ndiponso kuti mumakonda anthu onse a Mulungu .
51001005	Gwero la zonsezi ndi chiyembekezo chimene muli nacho chodzalandira zimene Mulungu akukusungirani Kumwamba . Mudamva za zimenezi pamene mau oona , adakufikani poyamba paja . Mau oonawo ndi Uthenga Wabwino .
51001006	Uthenga Wabwinowu ukubala zipatso ndi kufalikira pa dziko lonse lapansi , monga momwe wachitiranso pakati panu , kuyambira tsiku limene mudamva ndi kumvetsa za kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu .
51001007	Mudaphunzira zimenezi kwa Epafra , mtumiki mnzathu wokondedwa . Iye uja akugwirira ntchito Khristu mokhulupirika m'malo mwathu .
51001008	Ndiye amene adatidziŵitsa za chikondi chomwe Mzimu Woyera adaika mwa inu .
51001009	Nchifukwa chake , kuyambira tsiku limene tidamva zimenezi , sitileka kukupemphererani . Timapempha Mulungu kuti akudzazeni ndi nzeru ndi luntha , zimene Mzimu Woyera amapatsa , kuti mumvetse zonse zimene Iye afuna .
51001010	Pamenepo mudzatha kuyenda m'njira zimene Ambuye amafuna , ndi kuŵakondweretsa pa zonse . Pakugwira ntchito zabwino zamitundumitundu , moyo wanu udzaonetsa zipatso , ndipo mudzanka muwonjezerawonjezera nzeru zanu za kudziŵa Mulungu .
51001011	Timapempheranso kuti Mulungu akulimbikitseni ndi mphamvu yake yaulemerero , kuti muzipirira zonse ndi mitima yoleza ndi yosangalala .
51001012	Ndipo timapemphera kuti muziyamika Atate , amene adakuyenerezani kuti mudzalandire nao madalitso onse amene amasungira anthu ao mu ufumu wa kuŵala .
51001013	Adatilanditsa ku mphamvu za mdima wa zoipa , nkutiloŵetsa mu Ufumu wa Mwana wake wokondedwa .
51001014	Mwa Iyeyu Mulungu adatiwombola , ndiye kuti adatikhululukira machimo athu .
51001015	Khristuyo ndiye chithunzi chenicheni cha Mulungu wosaoneka . Iye ndiye Mwana wake woyamba , wolamulira zolengedwa zonse .
51001016	Kudzera mwa Iye Mulungu adalenga zonse zakumwamba ndi zapansipano , zooneka ndi zosaoneka , mafumu , akuluakulu , aulamuliro ndi amphamvu ena onse . Mulungu adalenga zonse kudzera mwa Iye , zonsezo adalengera Iyeyo .
51001017	Iyeyo analipo zinthu zonse pakadahbe , mwa Iye zinthu zonse zimalunzana pamodzi .
51001018	Iye ndiyenso mutu wa mpingo thupi lake . Ndiye chiyambi chake , Woyambirira mwa ouka kwa akufa , kuti pa zonse Iye akhale wopambana ndithu .
51001019	Kudakomera Mulungu kuti umulungu wake wonse ukhalemo mwa Khristuyo .
51001020	Mwa Iyeyo Mulungu adafuna kuyanjanitsanso zinthu zonse ndi Iye mwini , zapansipano ndi za Kumwamba . Adachita zimenezi pakudzetsa mtendere kudzera mwa imfa ya Mwana wake pa mtanda .
51001021	Kale inu munali kutali ndi Mulungu , ndipo munkadana naye m'maganizo anu ndi m'ntchito zanu zoipa .
51001022	Koma tsopano , kudzera mwa imfa ya Mwana wake m'thupi lake , Mulungu wakuyanjanitsaninso ndi Iye mwini . Adachita zimenezi kuti pamaso pake muthe kuwoneka muli oyera mtima , opanda banga kapena cholakwa chilichonse .
51001023	Koma tsono muzikhala okhazikika kolimba pa maziko a chikhulupiriro chanu , osasunthika pa chiyembekezo chofumira ku Uthenga Wabwino umene mudamva . Uthenga Wabwinowu walalikidwa kwa anthu a pa dziko lonse lapansi , ndipo Mulungu ndiye adandipatsa ine , Paulo , ntchito yoti ndiwulalike .
51001024	Tsopano ndakondwa kuti ndikukuvutikirani . Pakuti pakumva zoŵaŵazo , ndikutsiriza m'thupi mwanga zotsala za masautso a Khristu kuthandiza thupi lake , ndiye kuti Mpingo .
51001025	Ndipo ine ndine mtumiki wa Mpingowu , pakuti Mulungu ndiye adandipatsa ntchitoyi yoti ndikulalikireni kwathunthu mau ake .
51001026	Mauwo ndi chinsinsi chozama chimene chinali chobisika chikhalire kwa mibadwo yonse , koma tsopano Mulungu wachiwululira anthu ake .
51001027	Cholinga cha Mulungu ndi cha kudziŵitsa anthuwo kukoma kwake kwa chinsinsicho ndi ulemerero wake pakati pa anthu akunja . Chinsinsicho nchakuti Khristu ali mwa inu , ndipo Iye amakupatsani chiyembekezo cha kudzalandira ulemerero .
51001028	Khristuyo ndiye amene timamlalika . Timachenjeza ndi kuphunzitsa munthu aliyense ndi nzeru zonse zimene tili nazo . Pakuti tikufuna kusandutsa munthu aliyense kuti akhale wangwiro mwa Khristu .
51001029	Ndi cholinga chimenechi ndikugwiradi ntchito kwambiri ndi mphamvu ya Khristu imene ikugwira ntchito kolimba mwa ine .
51002001	Ndikufuna kuti mudziŵe kuti ndikukuvutikirani kwambiri , inuyo ndi anzanu a ku Laodikea , ndi ena onse amene sitidaonane nawo maso ndi maso chikhalire .
51002002	Ndikufuna kuti zimenezi ziŵalimbitse mtima , ndipo azilunzana pamodzi m'chikondi , azikhala odzaza ndi nzeru zomvetsa zinthu . Motero adzatha kudziŵa mozama chinsinsi cha Mulungu chonena za Khristu .
51002003	Mwa Iyeyu mudzapeza chuma chonse chobisika , ndiye kuti nzeru ndi luntha .
51002004	Ndikunenatu zimenezi , kuwopa kuti wina aliyense angakukopeni ndi mau onyenga .
51002005	Pakuti ngakhale sindili nanu m'thupi , komabe mumtimamu ndili nanu pamodzi . Ndipo ndakondwa kuwona kuti mukulongosola bwino zonse , ndi kuti chikhulupiriro chanu mwa Khristu nchosagwedezeka konse .
51002006	Tsono popeza kuti mudavomereza kuti Khristu Yesu ndi Mbuye wanu , moyo wanu wonse ukhale wolunzana naye .
51002007	Mukhale ozika mizu mwa Iye . Mupitirire kumanga moyo wanu pa Iye . Mulimbike kukhulupirira monga momwe mudaphunzirira , ndipo muzikhala oyamika kwambiri .

51002012	Pamene mudabatizidwa , mudachita ngati kuikidwa m'manda pamodzi ndi Khristu . Ndipo ndi ubatizowo mudaukitsidwanso pamodzi naye , pakukhulupirira mphamvu za Mulungu amene adamuukitsa kwa akufa .
51002013	Inu kale munali akufa chifukwa cha machimo anu , ndiponso chifukwa munali osaumbalidwa mu mtima . Koma tsopano Mulungu wakupatsani moyo pamodzi ndi Khristu . Adatikhululukira machimo athu onse .
51002014	Adafafaniza kalata ya ngongole yathu , yonena za Malamulo a Mose . Kalatayo inali yotizenga mlandu , koma Iye adaichotsa pakuikhomera pa mtanda .
51002015	Motero mwa Khristu Mulungu adaŵalanda zida maufumu ndi maulamuliro onse , ndipo pamaso pa onse , adaŵayendetsa ngati akaidi pa mdipiti wokondwerera kupambana kwake .
51002016	Wina aliyense asakuzengeni mlandu pa nkhani yokhudza zakudya kapena zakumwa , kapena pa zokhudza masiku a chikondwerero , kapena a mwezi wokhala chatsopano , kapena pa zokhudza tsiku la Sabata .

51003015	Mtendere wa Khristu uzikutsogolerani m'mitima mwanu . Mulungu adakuitanani kuti mukhale nawo mtendere umenewu , popeza kuti ndinu ziwalo za thupi limodzi . Muzikhala oyamika .

51003017	Chilichonse chimene mungachite , kaya nkulankhula , kaya nkugwira ntchito , muchichite m'dzina la Ambuye Yesu ndi kuthokoza Mulungu Atate kudzera mwa Iye .

52001010	Tsopano mukudikira Mwana wake kuti abwerenso kuchokera Kumwamba . Mwana wakeyo ndi Yesu , amene Mulungu adamuukitsa kwa akufa . Iyeyo amatipulumutsa ku mkwiyo umene ulikudza .
52002001	Abale , inu nomwe mukudziŵa kuti kucheza kuja tidadzacheza kwanuku , kunali kwaphindu .
52002002	Monga mukudziŵa , paja nthaŵi imene ija nkuti anthu a ku Filipi atatizunza kale ndi kutichita chipongwe . Komabe Mulungu wathu adatilimbitsa mtima mpaka tidakulaHkirani ndithu Uthenga wake Wabwino , ngakhale ambiri ankatsutsana nafe .
52002003	Pakuti zimene timalalika sitizilalika chifukwa chofuna kuphunzitsa zonama , kapena kuganiza zoipa , kapena kuflina kunyenga anthu ai .
52002004	Koma timalalika chifukwa Mulungu adativomereza natisungiza Uthenga Wabwino kuti tiulalike . Choncho tikamaphunzitsa sitifuna kukondweretsa anthu , koma timafuna kukondweretsa Mulungu , amene amapenyetsetsa mitima yathu .
52002005	Monga mukudziŵa , sitidabwere kwanuko ndi mau oshashalika kapena ndi mtima womangofuna phindu . Apo Mulungu angathe kutichitira umboni .
52002006	Sitinkafimanso ulemu wochokera kwa anthu , kapena kwa inu , kapena kwa ena , ngakhale kunali kotheka kukulamulani kuti mutithandize , popeza kuti ndife atumwi a Khristu .
52002007	Koma tidakhala ofatsa pakati panu ngati mai wosamalira ana ake .
52002008	Tinkakukondani , ndipo chifukwa cha kukulakalakani kwambiri , tidatsimikiza zogaŵana nanu osati Uthenga Wabwino wa Mulungu wokha , komanso ngakhale moyo wathu womwe .
52002009	Abale , simukumbukira nanga kuti tinkagwira ntchito kwambiri mpaka kutopa ? Monse muja tinkakulalikirani Uthenga Wabwino wa Mulungu , tinkagwira ntchito zamanja usana ndi usiku , kuwopa kuti tingavutitse wina aliyense mwa inu .
52002010	Inu ndinu mboni , Mulungu yemwe ndi mboninso , kuti mkhalidwe wathu pakati pa inu okhulupirira unali wangwiro , wolungama , ndi wopanda cholakwa .
52002011	Paja mukudziŵa kuti , tinkasamala aliyense mwa inu monga momwe amachitira bambo ndi ana ake .
52002012	Tinkakulimbitsani mtima , kukuthuzitsani mtima ndi kukupemphani kuti mayendedwe anu akhale okomera Mulungu , amene amakuitanani kuti mukaloŵe mu Ufumu wake waulemerero .
52002013	Pa mbali yathu , timathokoza Mulungu kosalekeza . Timatero chifukwa chakuti pamene mudamva mau a Mulungu amene tidakulalikirani , mudaŵalandira osati ngati mau a anthu chabe , koma monga momwe aliri ndithu , mau a Mulungu . Mauwo ndi omwe akugwira ntchito mwa inu okhulupirira .
52002014	Abale , zimene zidakugwerani inu ndi zomwe zidagweranso mipingo ya Mulungu ya mwa Khristu Yesu imene ili ku Yudeya . Paja inunso anthu akwanu adakuzunzani monga momwe Ayuda adazunzira akhristu a ku Yudeya .
52002015	Ayudawo ndi amene adapha Ambuye Yesu ndi aneneri akale , ndipo adatizunza ifenso kwambiri . Ameneŵa sakondweretsa Mulungu konse , ndipo amadana ndi anthu onse .
52002016	Iwowotu amatiletsa kulalika Uthenga Wabwino kwa anthu a mitundu ina woŵathandiza kuti apulumuke . Motero nthaŵi zonse amanka nawonjezerawonjezera machimo ao , mwakuti tsopano mkwiyo wa Mulungu waŵagwera .
52002017	Abale , pamene tidasiyana nanu ngakhale kanthaŵi pang'ono , tinkalakalaka kwambiri kuwonana nanunso maso ndi maso . Ngakhale tinkachoka , mtima wathu unali nanube .
52002018	Nchifukwa chake tidaayesetsa kubweranso kwanuko . Ineyo Paulo , ndidaayesa kangapo , koma Satana adaatilepheretsa .
52002019	Kodi pamaso pa Ambuye athu Yesu , nchiyani chidzakhale chiyembekezo chathu , chimwemwe chathu , ndi mphotho yoti ife tidzanyadire , Iye akadzabweranso ? Si ndinu nomwe nanga ?
52002020	Pajatu ulemu wathu ndi chimwemwe chathu ndinu amene .
52003001	Nchifukwa chake pamene sitidathenso kupirira , tidalolera kutsalira tokha ku Atene .
52003002	Choncho tidatuma Timoteo , mbale wathu ndi mnzathu wogwira naye ntchito ya Mulungu yolalika Uthenga Wabwino wa Khristu . Tidamtuma kuti adzakulimbitseni mtima ndi kukukhazikitsani m'chikhulupiriro chanu ,
52003003	kuwopa kuti wina aliyense mwa inu angagwedezeke chifukwa cha mazunzoŵa . Mukudziŵa nokha kuti Mulungu ndiye adalola kuti zimenezi zitigwere .
52003004	Pajatu pamene tinali pamodzi nanu , tidaakuuziranitu kuti tidzayenera kuzunzidwa . Ndipo monga mukudziŵa , zimenezi zidachitikadi .
52003005	Nchifukwa chake , pamene sindidathenso kupirira , ndidatuma Timoteo kuti adzaone m'mene chiliri chikhulupiriro chanu . Pakuti ndinkaopa kuti kapena Satana , Wonyenga uja , adakunyengani , ndipo kuti ntchito zathu zonse pakati panupo zidangopita pachabe .
52003006	Koma tsopano Timoteo wabwerako kuchokera kwanuko , ndipo watisimbira mbiri yokoma ya chikhulupiriro chanu ndi chikondi chanu . Watiwuzanso kuti masiku onse mumatikumbukira mokondwa , ndipo kuti mumalakalaka kutiwona ife , monga momwe ifeyo timafunitsitsira kukuwonaninso inuyo .
52003007	Motero abale , pakati pa masautso ndi mazunzo athu onse , chikhulupiriro chanu chatithuzitsa mtima .
52003008	Takhalanso ndi moyo tsopano pakuti mukulimbika pa chikhristu chanu .
52003009	Nanga tingathe bwanji kuyamika Mulungu mokwanira chifukwa cha inu , poona chimwemwe chonse chimene tili nacho pamaso pa Mulungu wathu ?
52003010	Ndi mtima wonse timapemphera usana ndi usiku kuti tiwonane nanunso maso ndi maso , kuti tikakwaniritse zimene zikusoŵa pakuwonetsa chikhulupiriro chanu .
52003011	Tikupempha kuti Mulungu Atate athu mwini , ndi Ambuye athu Yesu atikonzere njira yabwino kuti tidzafike kwanuko .
52003012	Ambuye akulitsirekulitsire kukondana kwanu , ndiponso chikondi chanu cha pa anthu onse , monga momwe chikondi chathu cha pa inu chikukulirakulira .
52003013	Motero Iye adzalimbitsa mitima yanu kuti idzakhale yangwiro ndi yoyera pamaso pa Mulungu Atate athu , pamene Ambuye Yesu adzabwerenso pamodzi ndi oyera ake onse .
52004001	Potsiriza tsono , abale , tifuna tikupempheni kanthu . Mudalandira kwa ife mau onena za m'mene muziyendera kuti mukondweretse Mulungu . Mukutsata mayendedwe otere kumene , koma tikukupemphani kolimba m'dzina la Ambuye Yesu kuti muchite zimenezi koposa kale .
52004002	Pakuti mukudziŵa malangizo amene tidakupatsani ochokera kwa Ambuye Yesu .
52004003	Chimene Mulungu akufuna ndi ichi : mukhale oyera mtima , ndiye kuti muzipewa dama .
52004004	Aliyense mwa inu adziŵe kulamula thupi lake , pakulilemekeza ndi kulisunga bwino , osalidetsa .
52004005	Musamangotsata zilakolako zonyansa , monga amachitira akunja , amene sadziŵa Mulungu .
52004006	Pa zimenezi munthu asachimwire mbale wake kapena kumpezera . Monga tidakuuzani kale monenetsa , Ambuye adzalanga anthu onse ochita zotere .
52004007	Paja Mulungu sadatiitane kuti tizichita zonyansa , koma kuti tikhale oyera mtima .
52004008	Motero munthu wokana mau ameneŵa , sakukana munthu chabe ai , koma akukana Mulungu amene amakupatsani Mzimu wake Woyera .
52004009	Kunena za kukondana pakati pa akhristu , nkosafunikira kuti ndichite kukulemberani , popeza kuti ndi Mulungu mwini amene adakuphunzitsani za m'mene muyenera kukonderana .
52004010	Ndipo mumakondana nawodi abale onse a m'dziko lonse la Masedoniya . Koma tikukupemphani abale , kuti muchite zimenezi koposa kale .
52004011	Yesetsani kukhala ndi moyo wabata . Aliyense asamale ntchito yakeyake ndi kumagwira ntchito ndi manja ake . Chitani zimenezi , monga tidakulangizirani muja ,
52004012	kuti akunja azikulemekezani , ndi kuti inuyo mukhale osadalira wina aliyense .
52004013	Abale , tifuna kuti mudziŵeko za anthu amene adamwalira , kuti chisoni chanu chisakhale ngati cha anthu ena amene alibe chiyembekezo .
52004014	Paja ife timakhulupirira kuti Yesu adaamwalira naukanso . Motero timakhulupiriranso kuti anthu amene adamwalira akukhulupirira Yesu , iwonso Mulungu adzaŵaukitsa nkubwera nawo pamodzi ndi Yesuyo .
52004015	Tsopano tikuuzeni mau a Ambuye mwini . Ife amoyofe , otsala mpaka kubwera kwa Ambuye , sikuti tidzaŵasiya kumbuyo amene adamwalira aja ai .
52004016	Padzakhala mfuu wa mau a mngelo wamkulu ndi wa lipenga la Mulungu . Ndipo pamenepo Ambuye mwini adzatsika kuchokera Kumwamba . Anthu amene adafa akukhulupirira Khristu , adzayamba ndiwo kuuka .
52004017	Pambuyo pake ife amoyofe , otsalafe , tidzatengedwa pamodzi nawo m'mitambo kuti tikakumane ndi Ambuye mu mlengalenga . Motero tidzakhala ndi Ambuye nthaŵi zonse .
52004018	Nchifukwa chake tsono muzithuzitsana mtima pokambirana zimenezi .
52005001	Komatu abale , za nthaŵi ndi nyengo yake yodzachitika zimenezi , nkosafunikira kuti ndichite kukulemberani .
52005002	Inu nomwe mukudziŵa bwino kuti tsiku la Ambuye likadzafika ngati mbala yausiku .
52005003	Pamene anthu azikati , " Pali mtendere , tili pabwino " , pamenepo chiwonongeko chidzaŵagwera modzidzimutsa . Chidzaŵadzidzimutsa monga momwe zoŵaŵa zimamchitira mkazi pa nthaŵi yoti achire ; ndipo sadzatha konse kuchizemba .
52005004	Koma inu abale , simuli m'chimbulimbuli kuti tsikulo nkukudzidzimutsani ngati mbala .
52005005	Paja nonsenu zanu zonse ndi zam'kuŵala , ndiye kuti zausana . Ife zathu si zausiku kapena zamumdima ai .
52005006	Nchifukwa chake tsono tisagone tulo monga momwe amachitira anthu ena , ife tikhale maso , tikhale osaledzera .
52005007	Anthu ogona tulo , amagona usiku , anthu oledzera amaledzera usiku .
52005008	Koma ife , popeza kuti zathu nzausana , tisamaledzera . Tikhale titavala chikhulupiriro ndi chikondi ngati chovala chachitsulo chapachifuwa . Ndipo ngati chisoti choteteza kumutu tivale chiyembekezo chakuti tidzapulumuka .
52005009	Paja Mulungu sadatisankhe kuti tidzaone mkwiyo wake , koma kuti tidzalandire chipulumutso kwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
52005010	Iwo adatifera kuti tikakhale ndi moyo pamodzi naye , ngakhale pamene tili amoyo kapena titafa kale .
52005011	Nchifukwa chake muzilimbitsana mtima ndi kumathandizana , monga momwe mukuchitiramu .
52005012	Abale , tikukupemphani kuti muziŵalemekeza amene akugwira ntchito pakati panu , amene Ambuye adaŵaika kuti azikutsogolerani ndi kumakulangizani .
52005013	Mwa chikondi muziŵachitira ulemu kwambiri chifukwa cha ntchito yao . Muzikhalitsana ndi mtendere pakati panu .
52005014	Abale , tikukupemphani kuti anthu amene amangokhala osafuna kugwira ntchito muziŵadzudzula , anthu otaya mtima muziŵalimbikitsa . Anthu ofooka muziŵathandiza , anthu onsewo muziŵalezera mtima .
52005015	Onetsetsani kuti wina aliyense mnzake akamchita choipa , asabwezere choipacho . Koma nthaŵi zonse muziyesetsa kuchitira zabwino anzanu ndi anthu ena onse .
52005016	Khalani okondwa nthaŵi zonse .
52005017	Muzipemphera kosalekeza .
52005018	Muzithokoza Mulungu pa zonse . Paja zimene Mulungu amafuna kuti muzichita mwa Khristu Yesu nzimenezi .
52005019	Musayese kuletsa ntchito ya Mzimu Woyera .
52005020	Musanyoze mau olalikidwa m'dzina la Mulungu ,
52005021	koma zonse muziziyesa bwino , kuti muwonetsetse ngati nzoona . Musunge zimene zili zabwino ,
52005022	ndipo mupewe choipa cha mtundu uliwonse .
52005023	Mulungu mwini , amene amatipatsa mtendere , akusandutseni angwiro pa zonse . Akusungeni athunthu m'nzeru , mumtima ndi m'thupi , kuti mudzakhale opanda chilema pobwera Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
52005024	Iye amene akukuitanani ngwokhulupirika , ndipo adzakuchitirani zimenezi .
52005025	Abale , muzitipempherera .
52005026	Abale onse muŵapatseko moni mwachikondi .
52005027	M'dzina la Ambuye ndikukulamulani kuti kalatayi muŵaŵerengere abale onse .
52005028	Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima .
53001001	Ndife , Paulo , Silivano ndi Timoteo . Tikulembera mpingo wa ku Tesalonika , umene uli wake wa Mulungu Atate , ndiponso wa Ambuye Yesu Khristu .
53001002	Mulungu Atate ndi Ambuye Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere .
53001003	Tiyenera kuthokoza Mulungu nthaŵi zonse chifukwa cha inu , abale . Nkoyeneradi kutero , chifukwa chikhulupiriro chanu chikunka chikukulirakulira kwambiri pamodzi ndi kukondana kwanu pakati pa inu nonse .
53001004	Nchifukwa chake ife timakunyadirani , m'mipingo yonse ya Mulungu , chifukwa cha kulimbika kwanu ndi chikhulupiriro chanu pakati pa masautso ndi mazunzo onse amene adakugwerani .
53001005	Zonsezi zikutsimikiza kuti Mulungu amaweruza molungama . Cholinga chake nchakuti inu mupezeke oyenera kuloŵa mu Ufumu wa Mulungu umene mukuusaukira tsopano .
53001006	Paja Mulungu mwa chilungamo chake , adzaŵalanga ndi masautso anthu amene amakusautsani inu .
53001007	Koma inu amene mukusauka tsopano , adzakupatsani mpumulo pamodzi ndi ife totnwe , Adzachita zimenezi , Ambuye Yesu akadzabwera kuchokera Kumwamba pamodzi ndi angelo ake amphamvu .
53001008	Adzabwera ndi moto woyaka , nadzalanga anthu amene sadziŵa Mulungu , ndi amene sadamvere Uthenga Wabwino wa Ambuye athu Yesu .
53001009	Chilango chao nchakuti adzaonongedwa kwamuyaya , sadzaona konse nkhope ya Ambuye kapena ulemerero wa mphamvu zake ,
53001010	pa tsiku limene Iye adzabwera kuti alemekezedwe mwa oyera , ndipo alandire ulemu mwa onse omkhulupirira . Ndipotu inunso mudzakhala nawo , chifukwa mudakhulupirira umboni wathu .
53001011	Nchifukwa chake timakupemphererani nthaŵi zonse , kuti Mulungu wathu akusandutseni oyenera moyo umene Iye adakuitanirani . Timapemphanso kuti ndi mphamvu zake akulimbikitseni kuchita zabwino zonse zimene mumalakalaka kuzichita , ndiponso ntchito zotsimikizira chikhulupiriro chanu .
53001012	Motero dzina la Ambuye athu Yesu lidzalemekezedwa mwa inu , ndipo inu mudzalemekezedwa mwa Iye . Zonsezi zidzachitika chifukwa cha kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu wathu ndi kwa Ambuye Yesu Khristu .
53002001	Pa za kubweranso kwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu , ndiponso za kusonkhana kwathu kuti tikakumane naye , tifuna kukupemphani kanthu , abale .
53002002	Maganizo anu asasokonezeke msanga , ndipo musaopsedwe ndi mau akuti , " Tsiku la Ambuye lafika , " ngakhale anene kuti mauwo ngochokera kwa Mzimu Woyera , kapena kuti taŵanena ndife , kapena tachita kuŵalemba m'kalata .
53002003	Musalole kuti wina akupusitseni mwa njira iliyonse . Pajatu lisanafike tsikulo , kudzayamba kwachitika zoti anthu ochuluka akupandukira Mulungu , ndipo kudzaoneka Munthu Woipitsitsa uja , woyenera kutayikayu .
53002004	Ameneyu ndi mdani , ndipo adzadziika pamwamba pa chilichonse chimene anthu amachitcha mulungu kapena amachipembedza , kotero kuti mwiniwakeyo adzadzikhazika m'Nyumba ya Mulungu ndi kudzitcha Mulungu .
53002005	Kodi simukukumbukira kuti ndinkakuuzani zimenezi muja ndinali kwanuko ?
53002006	Mukudziŵanso chimene chikumletsa kuwoneka tsopano , koma adzaululuka ndithu pa nthaŵi yake .
53002007	Ngakhale tsopano lomwe lino uchimo wayamba kugwira ntchito mobisika . Koma zoyenera kuchitikazo sizidzachitika mpaka amene akuletsa uchimowo tsopano atayamba wachotsedwa .
53002008	Tsono pamenepo Munthu Woipitsitsa uja adzaululuka . Ndipo Ambuye Yesu adzamthetsa ndi mpweya wa m'kamwa mwake , nkumuwonongeratu ndi maonekedwe ake aulemerero a kubwera kwake .
53002009	Munthu Woipitsitsa uja adzabwera ndi mphamvu za Satana . Adzachita zamphamvu zosiyanasiyana , ndiponso zizindikiro ndi zozizwitsa zonyenga .
53002010	Mwa njira iliyonse adzanyenga anthu amene adzaonongedwa chifukwa chokana kukonda choona chimene chikadaŵapulumutsa .
53002011	Nchifukwa chake Mulungu adzatumiza mphamvu zoŵasokoneza , kuti akhulupirire zonama .
53002012	Motero adzalangidwa onse amene sadakhulupirire choona , koma adakondwerera kusalungama .
53002013	Koma ife tikuyenera kumathokoza Mulungu nthaŵi zonse chifukwa cha inu , abale , amene Ambuye amakukondani . Paja Mulungu adakusankhani pachiyambi pomwe kuti mupulumuke . Mudapulumuka chifukwa Mzimu Woyera adakusandutsani anthu akeake a Mulungu , ndipo mudakhulupirira choona .
53002014	Mulungu adakuitanirani zimenezi kudzera mwa Uthenga Wabwino umene tidakulalikirani . Adakuitanani kuti mulandire nao ulemerero wa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
53002015	Tsono abale , khalani olimbika , ndipo mugwiritse miyambo imene tidakuphunzitsani ndi mau apakamwa kapena am'makalata .
53002016	Mulungu Atate athu adatikonda , ndipo mwa kukoma mtima kwake adatipatsa kulimba mtima kosatha ndi chiyembekezo chokoma .
53002017	Iye pamodzi ndi Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu athuzitse mitima yanu ndi kukupatsani mphamvu za kuchita ndi kulankhula zabwino zilizonse .
53003001	Potsiriza , abale , mutipempherere kuti mau a Ambuye afalikire msanga , ndipo anthu aŵalandire mauwo mwaulemu , monga momwe mudachitira inu .
53003002	Mupempherenso kuti Mulungu atipulumutse kwa anthu ovuta ndi oipa , pakuti si onse ali ndi chikhulupiriro .
53003003	Koma Ambuye ngokhulupirika , ndipo adzakulimbitsani mtima ndi kukutchinjirizani kwa Woipa uja .
53003004	Ambuye amatipatsa chikhulupiriro chakuti mukuchita zonse zimene timakuuzani , ndipo kuti mudzazichitabe .
53003005	Ambuye aongolere maganizo anu kuti muziyenda m'chikondi cha Mulungu , ndikutsata khama la Khristu .
53003006	Abale , tsopano tikukulamulani m'dzina la Ambuye Yesu Khristu kuti muziŵapewa abale onse a makhalidwe aulesi , osafuna kutsata mwambo umene tidaŵapatsa .
53003007	Paja inu nomwe mukudziŵa zimene muyenera kuchita pofuna kutitsanzira . Ife sitinali aulesi pamene tinali pakati panu .
53003008	Sitidalandire chakudya kwa munthu aliyense osalipira , koma tidagwira ntchito kwambiri usana ndi usiku mpaka kutopa , kuwopa kuti tingalemetse wina aliyense mwa inu .
53003009	Sitidachitetu zimenezi chifukwa choti tilibe mphamvu zopemphera chithandizo kwa inu , koma tinkafuna kukhala chitsanzo choti muzichitsanzira .
53003010	Paja nthaŵi imene tinali nanu pamodzi , tidaakulamulani kuti munthu wosafuna kugwira ntchito , kudyanso asadye .
53003011	Tikunena zimenezi popeza kuti tikumva kuti pali ena pakati panu amene ali ndi khalidwe laulesi . Anthu ameneŵa sagwira ntchito konse , koma amangoloŵera pa za anzao .
53003012	M'dzina la Ambuye Yesu Khristu tikuŵalamula ndi kuŵachenjeza anthu otere kuti azigwira ntchito mwabata , ndi kumadya chakudya chodzigwirira ntchito .
53003013	Koma inu abale , musatope nkuchita zabwino .
53003014	Ngati wina aliyense akana kumvera mau amene talemba m'kalatayi , mumuwonetsetse ameneyo , ndipo musayanjane naye , kuti choncho achite manyazi .
53003015	Koma musamuwone ngati mdani . Makamaka mumchenjeze ngati mbale .
53003016	Ambuye , eniake mtendere amene , akupatseni mtenderewo nthaŵi zonse mwa njira iliyonse . Ambuye akhale ndi inu nonse .
53003017	Ndi dzanja langa ndikulemba mau aŵa : " Moni . Ndine , Paulo . " Mauŵa ndi chizindikiro changa m'kalata iliyonse . Ndimalemba motero .
53003018	Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima nonse .
54001001	Ndine , Paulo , mtumwi wa Khristu Yesu , monga adalamulira Mulungu , Mpulumutsi wathu , ndiponso Khristu Yesu , chiyembekezo chathu .
54001002	Ndikulembera iwe Timoteo , mwana wanga weniweni m'chikhulupiriro . Mulungu Atate ndi Khristu Yesu Ambuye athu akukomere mtima , akuchitire chifundo ndi kukupatsa mtendere .
54001003	Pamene ndinkanyamuka kupita ku Masedoniya , paja ndidaakupempha kuti ukhalire ku Efeso . Kuli anthu ena kumeneko amene akuphunzitsa zina zachilendo , ndiye ndikufuna kuti iweyo uŵaletse .
54001004	Uŵauze kuti aleke kumangoika mtima pa nthano zopeka , ndi pa kufufuza kosalekeza dongosolo la maina a makolo . Zimenezi zimangoutsa mikangano chabe , siziphunzitsa konse zimene Mulungu adakonzeratu , zomwe zimadziŵika pakukhulupirira .
54001005	Cholinga changa pokupatsa malangizo ameneŵa , nchakuti pakhale chikondi chochokera mu mtima woyera , mu mtima wopanda kanthu koutsutsa , ndiponso m'chikhulupiriro chopanda chiphamaso .
54001006	Anthu ena adapatuka pa zimenezi , ndipo adasokera nkumatsata nkhani zopanda pake .
54001007	Iwo amafuna kukhala aphunzitsi a Malamulo a Mulungu , chonsecho samvetsa zimene iwo omwe akunena kapena zimene akufuna kutsimikiza .
54001008	Tikudziŵa kuti Malamulo ngabwino , malinga nkuŵagwiritsa ntchito moyenera .
54001009	Koma mumvetsetse kuti saika malamulo chifukwa cha anthu olungama , koma chifukwa cha anthu osamvera , ndi osaweruzika , anthu ochimwa ndi osapembedza , monga anthu opha atate ao , amai ao , kapena anthu ena .
54001010	Malamulo amaŵaika chifukwa cha anthu adama , ochimwa ndi amuna anzao , oba anthu , amabodza , olumbira monama , ndi ochita chilichonse chotsutsana ndi chiphunzitso choona .
54001011	Chiphunzitso choonacho chimapezeka mu Uthenga Wabwino wonena za ulemerero wa Mulungu wolemekezeka , umene Iye mwini adandisungiza .
54001012	Ndikuthokoza Khristu Yesu Ambuye athu , amene adandipatsa mphamvu pa ntchitoyi . Ndikumthokoza pondiwona wokhulupirika nandipatsa ntchito yomtumikira ,
54001013	ngakhale kuti kale ndinkamuchita chipongwe , kumzunza ndi kumnyoza . Koma Mulungu adandichitira chifundo chifukwa ndinkazichita mosadziŵa , poti ndinali wopanda chikhulupiriro .
54001014	Ambuye athu adandikomera mtima koposa , nkundipatsa chikhulupiriro ndi chikondi zimene tili nazo chifukwa chogwirizana ndi Khristu Yesu .
54001015	Aŵa ndi mau otsimikizika , oyenera kuŵavomereza ndi mtima wonse , akuti Khristu Yesu adabwera pansi pano kuti adzapulumutse anthu ochimwa . Ndipo mwa iwowo ine ndiye wochimwa koposa .
54001016	Koma Mulungu adandichitira chifundo , kuti mwa ine , wochimwa koposane , Khristu Yesu aonetse kuleza mtima kwake konse . Adafuna kuti ndikhale chitsanzo cha kuŵalezera mtima onse amene adzamkhulupirire kuti alandire moyo wosatha .
54001017	Kwa Mfumu yamuyaya , yosafa , yosaoneka , amene Iye yekha ndiye Mulungu , kukhale ulemu ndi ulemerero mpaka muyaya . Amen .
54001018	Iwe Timoteo , mwana wanga , ndikukupatsa malangizo ameneŵa molingana ndi zimene aneneri adaanenapo kale za iwe . Mau amenewo akuthandize kumenya nkhondo yabwino ,
54001019	uli ndi chikhulupiriro ndiponso ndi mtima wopanda kanthu koutsutsa . Ena sadamvere pamene mtima wao unkaŵatsutsa , motero chikhulupiriro chao chidaonongeka .
54001020	Mwa iwowo wina ndi Himeneo , wina Aleksandro , anthu amene ndaŵapereka kwa Satana kuti aphunzire kusanyoza Mulungu mwachipongwe .
54002001	Tsono choyamba ndikukupemphani kuti pakhale mapemphero opempherera anthu onse . Mapemphero ake akhale opemba , opempha ndi othokoza Mulungu .
54002002	Muziŵapempherera mafumu ndi onse amene ali ndi ulamuliro , kuti tikhale ndi moyo wabata ndi wamtendere , tizitamanda Mulungu pa zonse ndi kumadzilemekeza .
54002003	Zimenezi nzabwino ndi zokondweretsa pamaso pa Mulungu , Mpulumutsi wathu .
54002004	Iye amafuna kuti anthu onse apulumuke ndipo kuti adziŵe choona .
54002005	Pajatu Mulungu ndi mmodzi yekha , Mkhalapakati mmodzi yekhanso pakati pa Mulungu ndi anthu , munthu uja timati Khristu Yesu .
54002006	Iyeyo adadzipereka kuti akhale momboli wa anthu onse . Umenewu unali umboni umene udaperekedwa pa nthaŵi yake .
54002007	Nchifukwa chake ine adandiika kuti ndikhale mlaliki wake ndiponso mtumwi , wophunzitsa anthu a mitundu ina mau a chikhulupiriro choona . Sindikunamatu ai , ndikunena zoona .
54002008	Ndikufuna kuti paliponse amuna popemphera azikweza manja ao kwa Mulungu momchitira ulemu , mopanda mkwiyo kapena kukangana .
54002009	Ndikufunanso kuti akazi azivala mwaulemu , mwanzeru ndi moyenera . Inde adzikongoletse , komatu osati ndi tsitsi lochita kukonza monyanyira , kapena ndi zokongoletsa zagolide , kapena mikanda yamtengowapatali , kapena zovala zamtengowapatali .
54002010	Kwenikweni adzikongoletse ndi ntchito zabwino , monga ayenera kuchitira akazi amene amati ndi opembedza Mulungu .
54002011	Akazi pophunzitsidwa , azikhala chete ndi a mtima wodzichepetsa .
54002012	Sindilola kuti mkazi aziphunzitsa kapena kukhala ndi ulamuliro pa amuna . Mkazi kwake nkukhala chete .
54002013	Paja Adamu ndiye adaayambira kulengedwa , pambuyo pake Heva .
54002014	Ndiponso si Adamu amene adaanyengedwa , koma mkaziyo ndiye adaanyengedwa , naphwanya lamulo la Mulungu .
54002015	Koma mkazi adzapulumukabe kudzera m'kubala ana , malinga akalimbikira modzichepetsa m'chikhulupiriro , m'chikondi ndi m'kuyera mtima .
54003001	Aŵa ndi mau otsimikizika ndithu akuti , " Ngati munthu afuna ntchito ya kuyang'anira Mpingo , akukhumba ntchito yaulemu . "
54003002	Woyang'anira Mpingo azikhala munthu wopanda chokayikitsa , akhale wa mkazi mmodzi yekha , akhale wodzigwira , wa maganizo anzeru , waulemu , wosamala bwino alendo , ndi wotha kuphunzitsa .
54003003	Asakhale chidakwa , asakhale wandeu , koma wofatsa , wosakangana ndi anthu , ndi wosakonda ndalama .
54003004	Akhale wodziŵa kuyendetsa bwino banja lake , ndi kulera bwino ana ake , kuti akhale omvera ndi aulemu kwenikweni .
54003005	Ngati munthu sadziŵa kuyendetsa bwino banja lake , nanga angasunge bwanji Mpingo wa Mulungu ?
54003006	Asakhale munthu wolandiridwa mu mpingo chatsopano , kuwopa kuti angadzitukumule nkulangidwa monga momwe Satana adalangidwira .
54003007	Kuwonjezera pamenepo , akhale munthu woti ndi akunja omwe amamlemekeza , mwinamwina nkudzayamba kunyozedwa nagwa mu msampha wa Satana .
54003008	Chimodzimodzinso ndi atumiki a mpingo : akhale ochita zachikulu , osanena paŵiripaŵiri , osakhala ozoloŵera zoledzeretsa , osakonda udyo phindu la ndalama .
54003009	Akhale anthu a mtima wopanda kanthu koutsutsa posunga zoona za chikhulupiriro zimene Mulungu adaulula .
54003010	Iwonso ayambe ayesedwa , ndipo pambuyo pake , ngati alibe chokayikitsa , ndiye asenze udindo wa atumiki .
54003011	Momwemonso akazi akhale ochita zachikulu , osasinjirira , odzigwira , ndi okhulupirika pa zonse .
54003012	Atumiki a mpingo akhale a mkazi mmodzi yekha . Akhale olera ana ao bwino , oyendetsanso bwino mabanja ao .
54003013	Paja anthu ogwira bwino ntchito ya utumiki , amadzitengera mbiri yabwino , ndipo amalimba mtima kwenikweni pakuika chikhulupiriro chao mwa Khristu Yesu .
54003014	Pamene ndikukulembera zimenezi , ndikuyembekeza kudzafika kwanuko posachedwa .
54003015	Koma zina zikandichedwetsa , zimene ndanenazi zidzakudziŵitsa za m'mene anthu ayenera kukhalira m'banja la Mulungu , limene lili Mpingo wa Mulungu wamoyo , ndi mzati wochirikiza choona .
54003016	Ndithudi , chinsinsi cha chipembedzo chathu nchachikulu : " Iye uja adaonekera ali ndi thupi la munthu , Mzimu Woyera adamchitira umboni kuti ndi wolungama , angelo adamuwona , adalalikidwa pakati pa anthu a mitundu yonse , anthu a pa dziko lonse lapansi adamkhulupirira , Iyeyo adatengedwa kunka kumwamba mu ulemerero . "
54004001	Mzimu Woyera akunena momveka kuti pa masiku otsiriza anthu ena adzataya chikhulupiriro chao . Adzamvera mizimu yonyenga ndi zophunzitsa zochokera kwa mizimu yoipa .
54004002	Zophunzitsa zimenezi nzochokera ku chinyengo cha anthu onama , amene mumtima mwao adalembedwa chizindikiro ndi chitsulo chamoto .
54004003	Iwo amaletsa anthu ukwati , nkumaŵalamula kusala zakudya zina . Koma tsono zakudyazo Mulungu adazilenga kuti amene ali okhulupirira ndi odziŵa choona , azidye moyamika Mulungu .
54004004	Pajatu chilichonse chimene Mulungu adalenga nchabwino , palibe chilichonse choti munthu asale , akamachilandira moyamika Mulungu ,
54004005	pakuti chimayeretsedwa ndi mau a Mulungu ndi mapemphero aja .
54004006	Ngati abale uŵalangiza zimenezi , udzakhala mtumiki wabwino wa Khristu Yesu , woleredwa ndi mau a chikhulupiriro ndi a chiphunzitso choona chimene wakhala ukutsata .
54004007	Koma upewe nthano zachabe , monga zimene akazi okalamba amakonda kukamba . Udzizoloŵeze kukhala ndi moyo wolemekeza Mulungu .
54004008	Kuzoloŵeza thupi kumapindulitsapo pang'ono , koma moyo wolemekeza Mulungu umapindulitsa pa zonse . Umatilonjeza moyo pa moyo uno ndiponso pa moyo wakutsogolo .
54004009	Ameneŵa ndi mau otsimikizika oyenera kuŵavomereza ndi mtima wonse .
54004010	Nchifukwa chake timagwira ntchito kolimba , ndipo timayesetsa kupambana , pakuti chiyembekezo chathu chili pa Mulungu wamoyo , amene ali Mpulumutsi wa anthu onse , makamaka okhulupirira Khristu .
54004011	Uzilamula ndi kuphunzitsa zimenezi .
54004012	Munthu asakupeputse poona kuti ndiwe wachinyamata , koma ukhale chitsanzo kwa akhristu onse pa mau , pa mayendedwe , pa chikondi , pa chikhulupiriro ndi pa kuyera mtima .
54004013	Mpaka pamene ndidzabwere , uchite khama kuŵerengera anthu mau a Mulungu , kuŵalalikira ndi kuŵaphunzitsa .
54004014	Usanyozere mphatso yaulere ija ili mwa iweyi , imene udailandira kudzera m'mau otchulidwa m'dzina la Mulungu , pamene gulu la akulu a Mpingo lidaakusanjika manja .
54004015	Ntchito zimenezi uzizichita mosamala ndi modzipereka , kuti anthu onse aone kuti moyo wako wautumiki ukukulirakulira .
54004016	Udziyang'anire bwino wekha , ndi kusamala zimene umaphunzitsa . Ulimbikire kutero , chifukwa pakuchita zimenezi udzadzipulumutsa iwe wemwe , ndiponso anthu amene amamva mau ako .
54005001	Munthu wachikulire usamdzudzule mokalipa , koma umchenjeze monga ngati bambo wako . Amuna achinyamata uzikhalitsana nawo ngati abale ako .
54005002	Azimai achikulire uzikhalitsana nawo ngati amai ako , ndipo azimai a zaka zochepa uzikhalitsana nawo ngati alongo ako , m'kuyera mtima kwenikweni .
54005003	Uziŵachitira ulemu azimai amasiye , amenetu ali amasiye enieni .
54005004	Koma ngati mai wamasiye ali ndi ana kapena adzukulu , anawo ayambe aphunzira kukwaniritsa udindo wao pa banja lao moopa Mulungu , kuti pakutero abwezere makolo ao zimene adalandira kwa iwo . Pakuti zimenezi Mulungu amakondwera nazo akamaziwona .
54005005	Mai amene ali wamasiye kwenikweni , wopanda wina aliyense womsamala , ameneyo waika chiyembekezo chake pa Mulungu , ndipo amapemphera kosalekeza usana ndi usiku kuti Mulungu azimthandiza .
54005006	Koma mai wamasiye amene amangodzisangalatsa ndi zapansipano , ameneyo wafa kale ngakhale akali moyo .
54005007	Uziŵalamula zimenezi , kuti akhale opanda mlandu .
54005008	Ngati wina aliyense saŵapatsa zofunika achibale ake , makamaka a m'banja mwake momwe , ameneyo wataya chikhulupiriro chake , ndipo kuipa kwake nkoposa kwa munthu wosakhulupirira .
54005009	Wina aliyense asaloledwe kuloŵa m'gulu la azimai amasiye , asanakwanitse zaka 60 . Akhale woti adakwatiwapo ndi mwamuna mmodzi yekha .
54005010	Akhale mai woti anthu amamchitira umboni wakuti amachitadi ntchito zabwino . Akhale woti ankalera ana ake bwino , ankalandira bwino alendo , ankasambitsa mapazi a anthu a Mulungu , ndipo ankathandiza anthu amene anali m'mavuto . Akhalenso mai woti ankadzipereka pa ntchito zonse zabwino .
54005011	Koma azimai amasiye a zaka zochepera uzikana kuŵalemba m'gulu limeneli . Pajatu zilakolako zao zikayamba kuŵavutitsa nkuŵalekanitsa ndi Khristu , amangofuna kukwatiwanso .
54005012	Pamenepo amapezeka olakwa , chifukwa chosasunga lonjezo lao loyamba .
54005013	Kuwonjezera pamenepo , amagwa m'chizoloŵezi cha kungokhala khale , motero amangoyendayenda ku nyumba za anthu . Tsonotu samangokhala khale chabe ai , amachitanso miseche nkumaloŵera za eni , ndi kukhala omalankhula zimene samayenera kulankhula .
54005014	Nchifukwa chake nkadakonda kuti azimai amasiye a zaka zochepera azikwatiwanso , abale ana , ndipo azisamala bwino panyumba pao , kuti adani athu asapeze mpata wotisinjirira .
54005015	Paja alipo kale azimai amasiye ena amene adapatukapo nkumatsata Satana .
54005016	Koma ngati mai wina aliyense wachikhristu ali ndi achibale amene ali azimai arnasiye , aziŵasamala iyeyo , osasenzetsa mpingo katundu wakeyo . Motero mpingo udzatha kusamala azimai amasiye opanda oŵathandiza .
54005017	Akulu a mpingo otsogolera mpingo bwino , akhale oyenera kuŵalemekeza moŵirikiza , makamaka amene amagwira ntchito yolalika mau a Mulungu ndiponso yophunzitsa .
54005018	Paja Malembo akuti , " Usaimange pakamwa ng'ombe imene ikupuntha tirigu . " Penanso akuti , " Wantchito ngwoyenera kulandira malipiro ake . "
54005019	Usamamvere mau oneneza mkulu wa mpingo , pokhapokha ngati pali mboni ziŵiri kapena zitatu .
54005020	Opitirirabe kuchimwa uziŵadzudzula pamaso pa onse , kuti ena onsewo achite mantha .
54005021	Pamaso pa Mulungu , pamaso pa Khristu Yesu , ndi pamaso pa angelo onse osankhidwa , ndikukulamula ndithu kuti uzitsata malamulo ameneŵa mopanda tsankho , ndipo kuti usachite chilichonse mokondera .
54005022	Usafulumire kumsanjika manja munthu , ndipo usavomerezane ndi anthu ena pa uchimo wao . Iwe usunge bwino kuyera mtima kwako .
54005023	Uleke kumangomwa madzi okha . Koma uzimwako vinyo pang'ono , paja umavutika ndi m'mimba , ndiponso chifukwa cha kudwaladwala kwako kuja .
54005024	Pali anthu ena amene machimo ao amaonekeratu poyera asanakambe nkomwe mlandu wao , m'menemo ena machimo ao amayamba kudziŵika pokamba mlandu .
54005025	Momwemonso ntchito zokoma zimaonekera poyera , ndipo ngakhale zipande kutero , sizingathe kubisika nthaŵi zonse .
54006001	Onse amene ali mu ukapolo aziwona ambuye ao ngati oyenera kuŵachitira ulemu ndithu , kuti anthu anganyoze dzina la Mulungu ndiponso zimene timaphunzitsa .
54006002	Amene ambuye ao ndi akhristu , asaŵapeputse poona kuti ndi abale . Kwenikweni aziŵatumikira koposa , popeza kuti amene amapindula ndi ntchito yao , nawonso ndi akhristu , ndiponso okondedwa . Uziŵaphunzitsa anthu ndi kuŵalamula ntchito zimenezi .
54006003	Angathe kupezeka munthu wophunzitsa zosiyana ndi zimenezi , wosavomereza mau oona a Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu ndi chiphunzitso chogwirizana ndi moyo wolemekeza Mulungu .
54006004	Munthu wotere ndi wodzitukumula ndi kunyada , sadziŵa kanthu . Mtima wake ngwodwala , wongofuna zotsutsanatsutsana ndi kukangana pa mau chabe . Zimenezi zimabweretsa kaduka , kusamvana , kusinjirirana , kuganizirana zoipa ,
54006005	kupsetsana mtima kosalekeza pakati pa anthu amene nzeru zao zidaonongekeratu ndipo sazindikiranso choona . Iwo amayesa kuti kupembedza Mulungu ndi njira yopatira chuma .
54006006	Nzoonadi , kupembedza Mulungu kumapindulitsa kwambiri , malinga munthu akakhutira ndi zimene ali nazo .
54006007	Sitidatenge kanthu poloŵa m'dziko lino lapansi , ndipo sitingathenso kutenga kanthu potulukamo .
54006008	Tsono ngati tili ndi chakudya ndi zovala , zimenezi zitikwanire .
54006009	Koma anthu ofuna kulemera , amagwa m'mayeso , amagwidwa mu msampha wa zilakolako zambiri zopusa ndi zoononga . Zilakolakozo zimamiza anthu m'chitayiko choopsa .
54006010	Pajatu kukonda ndalama ndi gwero la zoipa zonse . Chifukwa cha kuika mtima pa ndalama anthu ena adasokera , adasiya njira ya chikhulupiriro , ndipo adadzitengera zoŵaŵitsa mitima .
54006011	Koma iwe , munthu wa Mulungu , uzipewe zonsezi . Uzikhala ndi mtima wofunafuna chilungamo , wolemekeza Mulungu , wokhulupirika , wachikondi , wolimbika ndi wofatsa .
54006012	Uzimenya nkhondo yabwino ya kusunga chikhulupiriro , mpaka ukalandire moyo wosatha . Paja Mulungu adakuitanira zimenezi , ndipo udavomera bwino chikhulupiriro chako pamaso pa mboni zambiri .
54006013	Uŵagwiritse mau oona amene udamva kwa ine , kuti akhale chitsanzo amapatsa moyo zinthu zonse , ndiponso pamaso pa Khristu Yesu amene popereka umboni pamaso pa Ponsio Pilato , adaanena zoona zenizeni .
54006014	Ndikukulamula kuti , mopanda cholakwa kapena chokayikitsa , utsate bwino zonse zimene udalamulidwa , mpaka Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu adzabwerenso .
54006015	Pa nthaŵi yake Mulungu adzamuwpnetsa kwa ife . Mulunguyo ngwodala ndipo Iye yekha ndiye Wolamula , ndiye Mfumu ya mafumu onse , ndiponso Mbuye wa ambuye onse .
54006016	Ndiye yekha wosafa , ndipo amakhala m'kuŵala kosayandikizika . Chikhalire palibe munthu amene adamuwona , palibenso amene angathe kumuwona . Kwa Iye kukhale ulemu ndi mphamvu mpaka muyaya . Amen .
54006017	Anthu amene ali olemera pa zinthu zapansipano , uŵalamule kuti asanyade kapena kudalira chuma chimene sichidziŵika ngati chidzakhalitsa . Koma azidalira Mulungu amene amatipatsa zonse moolowa manja kuti tisangalale nazo .
54006018	Uŵalamule kuti azichita zabwino , kuti azikhala olemera pa ntchito zabwino , oolowa manja , ndi okonda kugaŵana zinthu zao ndi anzao .
54006019	Pakutero adzadziwunjikira chuma chokoma ndi chokhalitsa chimene chidzaŵathandize kutsogoloko , kuti akalandire moyo umene uli moyo weniweni .
54006020	Iwe Timoteo , usunge bwino zimene adakusungitsa . Upewe nkhani zopanda pake , zosalemekeza Mulungu , ndiponso maganizo otsutsana , amene anthu amanama kuti ndi nzeru zodziŵa zinthu .
54006021	Anthu ena , chifukwa chovomereza nzeru zotere , adasokera nkutaya chikhulupiriro chao . Mulungu akukomere mtima . choti uzitsata . Uzichita zimenezi mwa chikhulupiriro ndi mwa chikondi , zimene zili mwa Khristu Yesu .
55001001	Ndine , Paulo , mtumwi wa Khristu Yesu , mwa kufuna kwa Mulungu . Adandituma kuti ndilalike chilonjezo cha moyo umene uli mwa Khristu Yesu .
55001002	Ndikulembera iwe Timoteo , mwana wanga wokondedwa . Mulungu Atate ndi Khristu Yesu Ambuye athu akukomere mtima , akuchitire chifundo ndi kukupatsa mtendere .
55001003	Ndikuthokoza Mulungu amene ndimamtumikira ndi mtima wopanda kanthu koutsutsa , monga momwe ankachitira makolo anga . Ndimamthokoza ndikamakukumbukira kosalekeza m'mapemphero anga usana ndi usiku .
55001004	Ndikamakumbukira misozi yako , ndimafunitsitsa kukuwona , ' kuti ndikhale ndi chimwemwe chodzaza .
55001005	Ndimakumbukira chikhulupiriro chako chosanyenga . Chikhulupiriro chimenechi adaayamba ndi agogo ako aLoisi kukhala nacho . Amai ako aYunisi anali nachonso , ndipo tsopano sindikukayika konse kuti iwenso uli nacho .
55001006	Nchifukwa chake ndikukukumbutsa kuti mphatso imene Mulungu adakupatsa pamene ndidakusanjika manja , uiyatsenso ngati moto .
55001007	Paja Mzimu amene Mulungu adatipatsa , si Mzimu wotipatsa mtima wa mantha ai , koma Mzimu wotipatsa mphamvu , chikondi ndi kudzigwira .
55001008	Usachite manyazi tsono kuchitira umboni Ambuye athu . Usachitenso manyazi chifukwa cha ine amene ndili m'ndende chifukwa cha iye , koma umve nao zoŵaŵa chifukwa cha Uthenga Wabwino , ndi chithandizo cha mphamvu za Mulungu .
55001009	Iye adatipulumutsa , ndipo adatiitana kuti tikhale anthu ake . Sadachite zimenezi chifukwa choti ife tidaachita zabwino ai , koma chifukwa mwiniwakeyo adaazikonzeratu motero , ndiponso chifukwa mwa Khristu Yesu adatikomera mtima nthaŵi isanayambe .
55001010	Koma tsopano Mulungu watiwululira zimenezi kudzera m'kuwoneka kwa Mpulumutsi wathu , Khristu Yesu . Khristuyo adathetsa mphamvu za imfa , ndipo mwa Uthenga Wabwino adaonetsera poyera moyo umene sungafe konse .
55001011	Mulungu adandiika kuti ndikhale mlaliki , mtumwi ndi mphunzitsi wa Uthenga Wabwino umenewu ,
55001012	nchifukwa chake ndilikumva masautsoŵa . Koma sindichita manyazi , pakuti ndimamdziŵa Iye amene ndakhala ndikumkhulupirira , ndipo sindikayika kuti Iyeyo angathe kusunga bwino , mpaka tsiku la chiweruzo , zimene adandisungiza ine .
55001013	Ndikukulamula pamaso pa Mulungu amene
55001014	Usunge bwino zokoma zimene adakusungitsa pakutsata Mzimu Woyera amene amakhala mwa ife .
55001015	Ukudziŵa kuti onse a ku dziko la Asiya adandisiya . Mwa iwowo wina ndi Figelo , wina ndi Heremogene .
55001016	Ambuye achitire chifundo banja la Onesifore , chifukwa iye ankandisangulutsa kaŵirikaŵiri . Sankachita nane manyazi , ngakhale ndinali womangidwa ndi unyolo :
55001017	adangoti atafika ku Roma , nkuyamba kundifunafuna mwachangu , mpaka adandipeza .
55001018	Ambuye amulole kuti adzalandire chifundo kwa Mulungu pa tsiku la chiweruzo . Ukudziŵa bwino ndi iwe wemwe kuti adandithandiza kwambiri ku Efeso .
55002001	Tsono iwe , mwana wanga , limbika pakugwiritsa ntchito mphatso zaulere zimene uli nazo mwa Khristu Yesu .
55002002	Mau amene udamva kwa ine pamaso pa mboni zambiri , uŵasungitse anthu okhulupirika amene adzathe kuŵaphunzitsanso kwa ena .
55002003	Umve nao zoŵaŵa monga msilikali wabwino wa Khristu Yesu .
55002004	Msilikali amene akumenya nkhondo sasamalako ntchito zakumudzi , chifukwa iye amangofuna kukondweretsa mkulu wa ankhondo .
55002005	Munthu wothamanga pa mpikisano wa liŵiro , sangalandire mphotho ngati sathamanga motsata malamulo a mpikisanowo .
55002006	Mlimi wogwira ntchitoyo molimbika , ndiye ayenera kukhala woyamba kulandira nao zipatso .
55002007	Uganizire bwino zimene ndikunenazi , Ambuye adzakuthandiza kumvetsa zonse .
55002008	Kumbukira Yesu Khristu amene adauka kwa akufa , ndiponso anali mmodzi mwa zidzukulu za Davide , monga umaphunzitsira Uthenga Wabwino umene ine ndimalalika .
55002009	Chifukwa cha Uthenga Wabwinowu ndimamva zoŵaŵa , mpakanso kumangidwa m'ndende , ngati chigaŵenga . Koma mau a Mulungu sangathe kumangidwa .
55002010	Motero tsono ndimapirira zonsezi chifukwa cha anthu amene Mulungu adaŵasankha , kuti iwonso apulumutsidwe ndi Khristu Yesu , ndi kulandira ulemerero wamuyaya .
55002011	Aŵa ndi mau otsimikizika ndithu : " Ngati tidafa pamodzi naye , tidzakhala moyonso pamodzi naye .
55002012	Ngati tilimbika , tidzakhala mafumu pamodzi naye . Ngati ife timkana , Iyenso adzatikana .
55002013	Ngati ndife osakhulupirika , Iye amakhalabe wokhulupirika , pakuti sangathe kudzitsutsa . "
55002014	Uziŵakumbutsa zimenezi anthu , ndipo uŵachenjeze kolimba pamaso pa Mulungu kuti asamakangana pa za mau . Kutero kulibe phindu , koma kumangotayikitsa anthu amene akumva kukanganako .
55002015	Uyesetse kukhala wovomerezeka pamaso pa Mulungu , ngati wantchito wopanda chifukwa chochitira manyazi , wolalika mau a choona mwachilungamo .
55002016	Koma nkhani zopanda pake , zosalemekeza Mulungu , uzipewe , pakuti anthu olankhula zotere adzanka nanyozeranyozera Mulungu .
55002017	Ndipo zophunzitsa zao zidzaloŵerera mu anthu ngati kunyeka kwa chilonda . Mwa anthu ameneŵa wina ndi Himeneo , wina ndi Fileto .
55002018	Iwowo adasokera nkusiya choona . Amaphunzitsa kuti kuuka kwa akufa kudachitika kale . Motero amasokoneza chikhulupiriro cha anthu ena .
55002019	Komabe maziko olimba , amene Mulungu adaŵaika , ngokhazikika , ndipo mau olembedwapo ndi aŵa : " Ambuye amadziŵa amene ali ao " , ndiponso , " Aliyense wotamanda dzina la Ambuye , asiye zosalungama . "
55002020	M'nyumba yaikulu simukhala ziŵiya zagolide kapena zasiliva zokhazokha ; mumakhalanso zamtengo kapena zadothi . Zina zimakhala za ntchito zolemerera , zina za ntchito wamba .
55002021	Tsono munthu akadziyeretsa nkusiya zotsikazi , adzakhala ngati chiŵiya cha ntchito zolemerera . Adzakhala wopatulika ndi wofunika zedi kwa Ambuye ake , wokonzeka kugwira ntchito iliyonse yabwino .
55002022	Uthaŵe zilakolako zoipa zachinyamata . Pamodzi ndi anthu onse otama Ambuye mopemba ndi mtima woyera , uzifunafuna chilungamo , chikhulupiriro , chikondi ndi mtendere .
55002023	Uzikana matsutsano opusa ndi opanda nzeru , paja ukudziŵa kuti zotere zimautsa mikangano .
55002024	Ndipo mtumiki wa Ambuye asamakhala wokanganakangana ndi anthu , koma azikhala wachifundo kwa onse , mphunzitsi wokhoza , munthu wodziŵa kupirira mavuto .
55002025	Akhale wofatsa polangiza otsutsana naye . Mwina Mulungu angaŵapatse mwai woti atembenuke ndi kuzindikira choona .
55002026	Pamenepo nzeru zao zidzabweramo , ndipo adzapulumuka mu msampha wa Satana , amene adaaŵagwira kuti azichita zofuna zake .
55003001	Udziŵe kuti pa masiku otsiriza kudzafika nthaŵi ya zovuta .
55003002	Anthu adzakhala odzikonda , okonda ndalama , onyada , odzikuza , onyoza Mulungu , osamvera anakubala ao , osayamika , ndi oipitsa zinthu za Mulungu .
55003003	Adzakhala opanda chifundo , osapepeseka , ndi osinjirira anzao . Adzakhala osadzigwira , aukali , odana ndi zabwino ,
55003004	opereka anzao kwa adani ao . Adzakhala osaopa chilichonse , odzitukumula , okonda zosangalatsa m'malo mokonda Mulungu .
55003005	Adzasamala maonekedwe ake okha a chipembedzo , nkumakana mphamvu zake . Anthu otere uziŵalewa .
55003006	Ena mwa iwo amaloŵa m'nyumba za anthu nkumakanyenga akazi ofooka , olemedwa ndi katundu wa machimo . Akazi ameneŵa amatengeka ndi zilakolako zamitundumitundu ,
55003007	amangomvera za aliyense , ndipo sangathe konse kudziŵa choona .
55003008	Monga momwe Yane ndi Yambere adaaukira Mose , anthu amenewonso amaukira choona . Nzeru zao nzobuntha , ndipo pa za chikhulupiriro ndi anthu olephera .
55003009	Koma sadzapitirira nazo , pakuti anthu onse adzaona kupusa kwao , monga momwe zidaachitikiranso ndi Yane uja ndi Yambere .
55003010	Tsono iwe wakhala ukunditsatira m'zophunzitsa zanga , mayendedwe anga , cholinga changa , chikhulupiriro changa , kuleza mtima kwanga , chikondi changa , kupirira kwanga ,
55003011	mazunzo anga , ndi masautso anga , monga amene adaandigwera ku Antiokeya , ku Ikonio ndi ku Listara . Ndidaazunzikadi koopsa ! Koma Ambuye adandipulumutsa pa zonsezi .
55003012	Onse ofuna kukhala ndi moyo wolemekeza Mulungu mwa Khristu Yesu , adzazunzikadi ,
55003013	m'menemo anthu ochimwa ndi onyenga , adzanka naipiraipira , ndipo azidzanyenga ena nkumanyengedwanso iwo omwe .
55003014	Koma iwe , limbika pa zimene waphunzira ndipo wadziŵa kuti nzoona , paja ukuŵadziŵa amene adakuphunzitsa .
55003015	Ukudziŵanso kuti kuyambira ukali mwana waŵazoloŵera Malembo Oyera , amene angathe kukupatsa nzeru zopulumukira pakukhulupirira Khristu Yesu .
55003016	Malembo Oyera onse ndi Mulungu amene adaŵalembetsa mochita ngati kuŵauzira , ndipo amathandiza pakuphunzitsa choona , pakutsutsa zolakwa , pakuwongola zokhota , ndi pakuphunzitsa anthu za kukhala olungama .
55003017	Motero Malembo amathandiza munthu wa Mulungu kukhala wokhoza kwenikweni , ndi wokonzekeraru kuchita ntchito yabwino iliyonse .
55004001	Pamaso pa Mulungu ndi pamaso pa Khristu Yesu , amene adzaweruza anthu onse , amoyo ndi akufa omwe , ndipo potamanda kubwera kwake ndi ufumu wake wa Khristuyo ndikukulamula ndithu kuti
55004002	uzilalika mau a Mulungu . Uziŵalalika molimbikira , pa nthaŵi imene anthu akuŵafuna , ngakhalenso pamene sakuŵafuna . Uziŵalozera zolakwa zao , uziŵadzudzula , uziŵalimbitsa mtima , osalephera kuŵaphunzitsa moleza mtima kwenikweni .
55004003	Paja nthaŵi idzafika pamene anthu azidzakana chiphunzitso choona . M'malo mwake , chifukwa cholakalaka kumva zoŵakomera zokha , adzadzisankhira aphunzitsi ochuluka omaŵauza zimene iwo akufuna .
55004004	Adzafulatira choona , osafunanso kuchimva , ndipo adzangotsata nthano chabe .
55004005	Koma iwe , uzikhala maso pa zonse , pirira pa zoŵaŵa , gwira ntchito yolalika Uthenga Wabwino . Kwaniritsa udindo wako mosamala .
55004006	Paja ine ndiye moyo wanga wayamba kale kuthiridwa ngati nsembe , ndipo nthaŵi yafika kuti ndinyamuke ulendo wanga wochoka m'moyo uno .
55004007	Ndamenya nkhondo yabwino , ndatsiriza bwino mpikisano wa liŵiro , ndasunga chikhulupiriro .
55004008	Tsopano chimene chikundidikira ndi mphotho ya chilungamo imene Mulungu wandisungira . Ambuye amene ali Woweruza wolungama , ndiwo amene adzandipatsa mphothoyo pa tsiku la chiweruzo . Tsonotu sadzangopatsa ine ndekha ai , komanso ena onse amene mwachikondi akudikira kuti Ambuyewo adzabwerenso .
55004009	Uyesetse kubwera kuno msanga .
55004010	Paja Dema adandisiya chifukwa chokonda zapansipano , adapita ku Tesalonika . Kresike adapita ku Galatiya , ndipo Tito adapita ku Dalamatiya .
55004011	Luka yekha ndiye ali ndi ine . Ukatenge Marko udzabwere naye kuno , chifukwa amene uja angathe kundithandiza pa ntchito .
55004012	Ndidatuma Tikiko ku Efeso .
55004013	Pobwera unditengereko mwinjiro wanga umene ndidasiya kwa Karpo ku Troasi . Unditengerenso mabuku anga , makamaka aja azikopaŵa .
55004014	Aleksandro , mmisiri wa zosulasula uja adandichita zoipa kwambiri . Ambuye adzamlanga molingana ndi zimene adachita .
55004015	Iwenso uchenjere naye , chifukwa iye uja adatsutsa kwamphamvu zolalika ife .
55004016	Pamene ndinkadziteteza pa mlandu wanga poyamba paja , panalibe ndi mmodzi yemwe amene adabwera kudzandithandiza , onse adangondisiya ndekha . Mulungu aŵakhululukire .
55004017	Koma Ambuye adakhala nane limodzi , adandilimbitsa mtima kuti ndilalike mau onse a Uthenga Wabwino , kuti anthu a mitundu yonse aŵamve . Motero ndidapulumuka m'kamwa mwa mkango .
55004018	Ambuye adzandipulumutsanso ku chilichonse chofuna kundichita choipa , ndipo adzandisunga bwino mpaka kundiloŵetsa mu Ufumu wake wa Kumwamba . Kwa Iye kukhale ulemerero kwamuyaya . Amen .
55004019	Uperekeko moni kwa Prisika ndi Akwila ndiponso kwa a m'banja la Onesifore .
55004020	Erasito adatsalira ku Korinto , ndipo Trofimo ndidamsiya akudwala ku Mileto .
55004021	Uyesetse ndithu kubwera isanafike nyengo yachisanu . Yubulo , Pude , Lino , Klaudia , ndi abale ena onse akuti moni .
55004022	Ambuye akhale nawe . Mulungu akukomereni mtima nonse .
56001001	Ndine , Paulo , mtumiki wa Mulungu , ndi mtumwi wa Yesu Khristu . Adandituma kuti amene Mulungu adaŵasankha , ndiŵatsogolere ku chikhulupiriro , azizindikira choona chimene chimaŵafikitsa ku moyo wolemekeza Mulungu ,
56001002	ndi kuŵapatsa chiyembekezo cha moyo wosatha . Mulungu amene sanama , adalonjeza moyo wosathawu nthaŵi isanayambe .
56001003	Pa nthaŵi yake Mulungu , Mpulumutsi wathu , adaululadi mau ake , ndipo adalamula kuti ine ndipatsidwe udindo wolalika uthengawu .
56001004	Ndikulembera iwe Tito , mwana wanga weniweni chifukwa choti ineyo ndi iwe tili m'chikhulupiriro chimodzimodzi . Mulungu Atate ndi Khristu Yesu , Mpulumutsi wathu , akukomere mtima ndi kukupatsa mtendere .
56001005	Ndidakusiya ku Krete kuti ulongosole zonse zimene zinali zisanalongosokebe , ndi kuti uike akulu a mpingo mu mzinda uliwonse , monga momwe ndidakulamulira .
56001006	Mkulu wa mpingo akhale munthu wosapalamula konse , ndipo akhale wa mkazi mmodzi yekha . Ana ake akhalenso okhulupirira Khristu , opanda mbiri yoti ngosakaza kapena yoti ngosaweruzika .
56001007	Woyang'anira mpingo azikhala wosapalamula konse , chifukwa ali ngati kapitao m'banja la Mulungu . Asakhale womva zayekha , kapena wopsa mtima msanga , kapena chidakwa , kapena wandeu , kapenanso wokonda kudya phindu la ndalama .
56001008	Akhale wosamala bwino alendo , wokonda zabwino , wodziŵa kudzilamula , wolungama , woyera mtima , ndiponso wodzigwira .
56001009	Asunge mogwiritsa mau okhulupirika , amene ali ogwirizana ndi zimene tidaphunzitsidwa . Pakutero adzatha kulimbikitsa ena ndi chiphunzitso choona , ndiponso kugonjetsa otsutsana nacho .
56001010	Paja pali anthu ambiri osaweruzika , makamaka pakati pa gulu la anthu ochokera ku Chiyuda . Anthu ameneŵa amalankhula nkhani zopanda pake nkumasokeretsa anzao .
56001011	Nkofunika kuŵakhalitsa chete , chifukwa akusokoneza mabanja ena athunthu pakuŵaphunzitsa zimene sayenera kuŵaphunzitsa . Amangochita zimenezi ndi cholinga choipa , chofuna kupata ndalama .
56001012	Mneneri wina wa ku Krete , mmodzi mwa iwo omwewo , adati , " Akrete nthaŵi zonse ndi amabodza , zilombo zoipa , alesi adyera . "
56001013	Mau ameneŵa ngotsimikizika . Nchifukwa chake uŵadzudzule kwamphamvu anthuwo , kuti akhale ndi chikhulupiriro cholimba ,
56001014	m'malo momasamala nthano zachiyuda , ndi malamulo a anthu okana choona .
56001015	Kwa anthu oyera mtima , zinthu zonse nzoyera . Koma kwa amene ali odetsedwa ndi osakhulupirira , palibe kanthu koyera ; mitima yao ndi nzeru zao zomwe , zonse nzodetsedwa .
56001016	Amatsimikiza kuti amadziŵa Mulungu , pamene ndi zochita zao amamkana , pakuti ndi anthu onyansa osamvera , ndi osayenera kuchita kanthu kalikonse kabwino .
56002001	Koma iwe uziphunzitsa zogwirizana ndi chiphunzitso choona .
56002002	Uuze amuna achikulire kuti azikhala osaledzera , ochita zachikulu , a maganizo anzeru , olimba pa chikhulupiriro , pa chikondi ndi pa kusatepatepa .
56002003	Chimodzimodzinso azimai achikulire , uŵauze kuti azikhala ndi makhalidwe oyenera azimai oyera mtima . Asakhale osinjirira anzao kapena akapolo a zoledzeretsa . Akhale alangizi abwino ,
56002004	kuti choncho athe kuphunzitsa azimai achitsikana kukonda amuna ao ndi ana ao .
56002005	Aŵaphunzitse kukhala a maganizo anzeru , opanda dama , osamala bwino zapabanja , ndi omvera amuna ao . Pamenepo anthu sanganyoze mau a Mulungu .
56002006	Momwemonso amuna achinyamata uŵauzitse kuti akhale odzigwira .
56002007	Pa zonse iwe wemwe ukhale chitsanzo cha ntchito zabwino . Zophunzitsa zako zikhale zoona , ndipo uziphunzitse mwaulemu .
56002008	Mau ako akhale oona , kuti anthu asadzathe kuŵatsutsa . Motero wotsutsana nawe adzachita manyazi , atasoŵa kalikonse koipa kuti atinenere .
56002009	Antchito azimvera ambuye ao , aziŵakondweretsa pa zonse . Asamatsutsana nawo
56002010	kapena kumaŵabera , koma makamaka adziwonetse kuti ngokhulupirika pa zonse zabwino . Motero pa zochita zao zonse adzaonetsa kukoma kwake kwa zophunzitsa zonena za Mulungu , Mpulumutsi wathu .
56002011	Mulungutu waonetsa kukoma mtima kwake kofuna kupulumutsa anthu onse .
56002012	Kukoma mtima kwakeko kumatiphunzitsa kusiya moyo wosalemekeza Mulungu , ndiponso zilakolako za dziko lapansi . Kumatiphunzitsa kuti moyo wathu pansi pano ukhale wodziletsa , wolungama ndi wolemekeza Mulungu .
56002013	Pajatu tikudikira tsiku lodala , pamene zidzachitike zimene tikuyembekeza , pamene Mulungu wamkulu ndi Mpulumutsi wathu Yesu Khristu adzaonetsa ulemerero wake .
56002014	Paja Iye adadzipereka chifukwa cha ife , kuti atipulumutse ku zoipa zathu zonse , ndi kutiyeretsa kuti tikhale anthu ake achangu pa ntchito zonse zabwino .
56002015	Zimenezi ndizo zimene uyenera kumaphunzitsa . Uziŵalimbikitsa anthu , ndi kuŵadzudzula komwe . Uzichita zimenezi ndi ulamuliro wonse . Wina aliyense asakupeputse ai .
56003001	Uziŵakumbutsa anthu onse kuti azigonjera akulu oweruza ndi olamulira . Aziŵamvera ndipo azikhala okonzeka kuchita ntchito iliyonse yabwino .
56003002	Uŵauze kuti asamakamba zoipa za wina aliyense , apewe kukangana , akhale ofatsa , ndipo nthaŵi zonse akhale aulemu kwa anthu onse .
56003003	Pajatu kale ifenso tinali opusa , osamvera , ndi osokezedwa . Tinali akapolo a zilakolako zoipa ndi zisangalatso zamitundumitundu . Masiku onse tinkakhalira kuchita zoipa ndi kaduka , anthu kudana nafe , ndipo ife tomwe kumadana .
56003004	Koma pamenepo Mulungu Mpulumutsi wathu adaonetsa kukoma kwake ndiponso chifundo chokonda anthu .
56003005	Choncho adatipulumutsa osati chifukwa cha ntchito zolungama zimene ife tidaachita , koma mwa chifundo chake pakutisambitsa . Adatisambitsa mwa Mzimu Woyera pakutibadwitsa kwatsopano ndi kutipatsa moyo watsopano .
56003006	Mwa Yesu Khristu , Mpulumutsi wathu , Mulungu adatipatsa Mzimu Woyerayo moolowa manja .
56003007	Adachita zimenezi , kuti mwa kukoma mtima kwake tisanduke olungama pamaso pake , ndipo tikalandire moyo wosatha umene tikuuyembekeza .
56003008	Ameneŵa ndi mau otsimikizika ndithu , ndipo ndikufuna kuti zimenezi unenetse , kuti okhulupirira Mulungu azidzipereka pa ntchito zabwino . Zimenezi nzabwino ndi zopindulitsa anthu .
56003009	Koma upewe kufufuzafufuza zopusa , kumaŵerengaŵerenga ndondomeko za maina a makolo , mikangano , ndi mitsutso pa za Malamulo a Mose . Zimenezi nzosathandiza , zilibe phindu konse .
56003010	Munthu woyambitsa mipatuko , utamdzudzula kaŵiri konse , usakhale nayenso nkanthu .
56003011	Paja ukudziŵa kuti munthu wotere ngwosokonezeka ndipo ngwochimwa . Mwini wake yemwe amadziimba mlandu yekha .
56003012	Ndikadzamtuma Aritema kapena Tikiko kwanuko , uchite chotheka kudzandipeza ku Nikopoli , chifukwa ndatsimikiza kuti ndikakhala kumeneko nyengo yachisanu ikubwerayi .
56003013	Uyesetse kuthandiza Zena , katswiri wa malamulo uja ndiponso Apolo , kuti apitirize ulendo wao . Uwonenso kuti asasoŵe kanthu .
56003014	Anthu athunso aziphunzira kudzipereka pa ntchito zabwino , kuti azithandiza pamene pali kusoŵa kwenikweni . Azitero kuti moyo wao usakhale wopanda phindu .
56003015	Onse amene ali nane kuno akuti moni . Uperekeko moni kwa onse amene amatikonda chifukwa cha chikhulupiriro . Mulungu akukomereni mtima nonse .
57001001	Ndine , Paulo , amene ndili m'ndende chifukwa cha Khristu Yesu . Ndili limodzi ndi Timoteo , mbale wathu . Tikulembera iwe Filemoni , bwenzi lathu ndi mnzathu wantchito .
57001002	Kalata yomweyinso tikulembera Afiya , mlongo wathu , ndi Arkipo , msilikali mnzathu pa nkhondo ya Mulungu , ndiponso mpingo wonse umene umasonkhana kunyumba kwanu .
57001003	Mulungu Atate athu ndi Ambuye Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere .
57001004	Ndimayamika Mulungu wanga nthaŵi zonse ndikamakukumbukira m'mapemphero anga .
57001005	Pakuti ndikumva kuti umakonda ndi kukhulupirira Ambuye Yesu , ndi oyera onse a Mulungu .
57001006	Ndimapemphera kuti chikhulupiriro chimene ukugaŵana nawo chigwire ntchito mwamphamvu , kuti udziŵitsitse zabwino zonse zimene timalandira chifukwa cha Khristu .
57001007	Mbale wanga , chikondi chako chandikondweretsa kwambiri ndi kundithuzitsa mtima , pakuti watsitsimutsa mitima ya oyera onse a Mulungu .
57001008	Tsono , inde nkotheka kuti ndichite kukulamula m'dzina la Khristu zimene uyenera kuchita .
57001009	Komabe chifukwa cha chikondi makamaka ndingochita kukupempha , ine Paulo amene ndili nkhalamba , amenenso ndili m'ndende tsopano chifukwa cha Khristu Yesu .
57001010	Ndikukupempha chifukwa cha mwana wanga mwa Khristu , amene ndidachita ngati kumubala m'ndende muno . Iyeyu ndi Onesimo .
57001011	Kale unalibe naye ntchito , koma tsopano angathe kutithandiza kwambiri tonsefe , iweyo ndi ine ndemwe .
57001012	Ndikumtumizanso kwa iwe tsopano , ndipo pakutero ndikuchita ngati kukutumizira mtima wanga womwe .
57001013	Ndikadakonda kuti akhalebe ndi ine kuno , kuti azinditumikira m'malo mwako , pokhala ndili m'ndende chifukwa cha Uthenga Wabwino .
57001014	Koma sindikufuna kuchita kanthu osakufunsa , kuwopa kuti ungandichitire chinthu chabwinochi mokakamizidwa , osati mwaufulu .
57001015	Kapena Onesimo adangokusiya kanthaŵi pang'ono , kuti udzakhale naye nthaŵi zonse ,
57001016	osatinso ngati kapolo , koma kwenikweni ngati mbale wokondedwa . Ine ndimamkonda kwambiri , ndipo iweyo uyenera kumkonda koposa , popeza kuti ndi munthu mnzako ndiponso mkhristu mnzako .
57001017	Tsono ngati umati ndine bwenzi lako , umlandire iyeyu monga momwe ukadandilandirira ineyo .
57001018	Ngati adakulakwirapo , kapena ali ndi ngongole kwa iwe , ngongoleyo ikhale yanga .
57001019	Pano mau aŵa ndikulemba ndi dzanja langalanga kuti , " Ine Paulo ndidzalipira . " Nkosasoŵekera kukukumbutsa kuti paja iweyo ngongole yako kwa ine ndi moyo wako womwe wachikhristuwu !
57001020	Tsono , mbale wanga , inenso undithandizeko chifukwa cha Ambuye . Undisangulutseko ngati mbale mwa Khristu .
57001021	Ndikukulembera zimenezi , popeza kuti ndikukhulupirira kuti udzachitadi zimene ndakupempha . Ndikudziŵa kuti udzachita kopitiriranso zimene ndapemphazi .
57001022	Kanthu kenanso ndi aka : undikonzere malo , chifukwa ndikhulupirira kuti Mulungu adzamvera mapemphero a inu nonse , ndi kundibwezera kwa inu .
57001023	Akukupatsa moni Epafra , amene ali m'ndende pamodzi nane chifukwa cha Khristu Yesu .
57001024	Akutinso moni anzanga antchito , Marko , Aristariko , Dema , ndi Luka .
57001025	Ambuye Yesu Khristu akukomereni mtima nonse .
58001001	Kale lija pa nthaŵi zosiyanasiyana , mwa njira zosiyanasiyana , Mulungu adaalankhula ndi makolo athu kudzera mwa aneneri .
58001002	Koma masiku otsiriza ano walankhula nafe kudzera mwa Mwana wake . Ndi mwa Iyeyu Mulungu adalenga zolengedwa zonse , namuika kuti alandire zinthu zonse ngati choloŵa chake .
58001003	Iye ndiye kuŵala koonetsa ulemerero wa Mulungu , ndipo ndiye chithunzi chenicheni chosonyeza khalidwe la Mulungu . yeyu amachirikiza zonse ndi mau ake amphamvu . Atayeretsa mtundu wa anthu pakuŵachotsa machimo , adakakhala Kumwamba , ku dzanja lamanja la Mulungu waulemerero .
58001004	Mwana wa Mulunguyo ngwoposa angelo , monga momwe dzina limene Mulungu adampatsa limaposera dzina la angelo .
58001005	Nchifukwa chake nkale lonse Mulungu sadauzepo mngelo aliyense kuti , " Iwe ndiwe mwana wanga , Ine lero ndakubala . " Mulungu sadakambepo za rnngelo aliyense kuti , " Ine ndidzakhala bambo wake , iye adzakhala mwana wanga . "
58001006	Koma pamene ankatuma Mwana wake wachisamba pansi pano , Mulungu adati , " Angelo onse a Mulungu azimpembedza . "
58001007	Ndipo za angelo Mulungu adati , " Mulungu amasandutsa angelo ake mphepo , atumiki ake amaŵasandutsa malaŵi a moto . "
58001008	Koma za Mwana wake adati , " Inu Mulungu , mpando wanu wachifumu udzakhala mpaka muyaya , chilungamo ndicho chili ngati ndodo yachifumu mu ulamuliro wanu .
58001009	Mudakonda chilungamo nkudana ndi zosalungama . Nchifukwa chake Ine , Mulungu wanu , ndakukwezani nkukudzozani ndi mafuta osonyeza chimwemwe , kupambana anzanu ena onse . "
58001010	Adatinso , " Inu Ambuye , ndinu amene mudalenga dziko lapansi pachiyambi pomwe , zakumwambaku ndi ntchito ya manja anu .
58001011	Zimenezi zidzatha , koma Inu ndinu achikhalire . Zonsezi zidzafwifwa ngati chovala .
58001012	Mudzazipindapinda ngati mwinjiro , ndipo zidzasinthika ngati chovala , koma Inu ndinu osasinthika , zaka zanu sizidzatha konse . "
58001013	Nkale lonse Mulungu sadauzepo mngelo aliyense kuti , " Khala ku dzanja langa lamanja mpaka ndisandutse adani ako kuti akhale ngati chopondapo mapazi ako . "
58001014	Nanga angelo , kodi suja iwo ndi mizimu yotumikira chabe , imene Mulungu amaituma chifukwa cha anthu odzalandira chipulumutso ?
58002001	Nchifukwa chake tsono , zimene tidamva , tizizisamala kwambiri , kuwopa kuti pang'ono ndi pang'ono tingazitaye .
58002002	Mau amene Mulungu adalankhula kudzera mwa angelo anali okhazikika ndithu , kotero kuti aliyense amene sadaŵamvere kapena amene adaŵanyoza , adalangidwa monga momwe kudamuyenerera .
58002003	Nanga ife tingapulumuke bwanji tikapanda kusamala chipulumutso chachikulu chotere ? Ambuye ndiwo amene adalankhula poyamba za chipulumutsochi , kenaka amene adamva mau aowo , adatitsimikizira kuti ndi oona .
58002004	Mulungu yemwe ankachitira umboni pakuchita zizindikiro , zinthu zozizwitsa ndi ntchito zamphamvu zamitundumitundu , ndi pakuŵagaŵira mphatso za Mzimu Woyera monga momwe Iye ankafunira .
58002005	Tikamanena za dziko limene lilikudza , si angelo amene Mulungu adaŵapatsa ulamuliro pa dzikolo .
58002006	Koma pena pake wina adanenetsa m'Malembo kuti , " Kodi munthu nchiyani , kuti muzimkumbukira , mwana wa munthu nchiyani , kuti muzimsamala ?
58002007	Kanthaŵi pang'ono mudamsandutsa wochepera kwa angelo . Mudampatsa ulemerero ndi ulemu wachifumu ,
58002008	ndipo mudampatsa ulamuliro pa zinthu zonse . " Tsono ngati Mulungu adapatsa munthu ulamuliro pa zinthu zonse , palibe kanthu kamene sikali mu ulamuliro wake . Komabe m'mene zinthu ziliri tsopano sitikuwona kuti zonse zakhaladi mu ulamuliro wakewo .
58002009	Komatu tikuwona kuti Yesu , amene pa kanthaŵi pang'ono adaasanduka wochepera kwa angelo , adalandira mphotho ya ulemerero ndi ulemu chifukwa adamva zoŵaŵa za imfa . Zidatero chifukwa mwa kukoma mtima kwake Mulungu adaafuna kuti afere anthu onse .
58002010	Paja Mulungu amene ndi Mlengi wa zonse ndipo zonse zimalinga kwa Iye , adafuna kufikitsa ana ake ambiri ku ulemerero . Tsono kudaamuyenera kuti mwa njira ya zoŵaŵa , amsandutse Yesu mtsogoleri wangwiro woŵatsogolera ku chipulumutso .
58002011	Amene amayeretsa anthuyo , ndiponso anthu amene amayeretsedwawo , onse Tate wao ndi mmodzi . Nchifukwa chake Yesu sachita manyazi kuŵatchula abale ake ,
58002012	ponena mau akuti , " Ndidzasimbira abale anga za dzina lanu . Ndidzakutamandani pa msonkhano wa anthu anu . "
58002013	Amanenanso kuti , " Ndidzakhulupirira Mulungu . " Penanso amanena kuti , " Ine ndili pano , pamodzi ndi ana amene Mulungu adandipatsa . "
58002014	Tsono popeza kuti anawo ndi anthu , okhala ndi magazi ndi mnofu , Yesu yemwe adasanduka munthu wonga iwowo . Adachita zimenezi kuti ndi imfa yake aononge Satana amene anali ndi mphamvu yodzetsa imfa .
58002015	Pakutero adafunanso kuti aŵamasule amene pa moyo wao wonse anali ngati akapolo chifukwa choopa imfa .
58002016	Paja nchodziŵikiratu kuti sadatekeseke ndi angelo ai koma ndi zidzukulu za Abrahamu .
58002017	Nchifukwa chake adaayenera kusanduka wofanafana ndi abale ake pa zonse , kuti akhale mkulu wa ansembe onse wachifundo ndi wokhulupirika potumikira Mulungu , ndipo kuti pakutero achotse machimo a anthu .
58002018	Tsono popeza kuti iye yemwe adazunzikapo ndi kuyesedwapo , ndiye kuti angathe kuŵathandiza anthu amene amayesedwa .
58003001	Abale , ndinu oyera ake a Mulungu , inuyo adakuitanani kuti nanunso mukhale ndi moyo wakumwamba . Nchifukwa chake muzisinkhasinkha za Yesu , mtumwi wa Mulungu , ndiponso Mkulu wa ansembe onse wa chikhulupiriro chimene timavomereza .
58003002	Paja Iye anali wokhulupirika kwa Mulungu amene adampatsa udindowo , monga momwe Mosenso anali wokhulupirika m'nyumba yonse ya Mulungu .
58003003	Munthu womanga nyumba amalandira ulemu woposa ulemerero wa nyumbayo . Momwemonso Yesu ngwoyenera kulandira ulemerero woposa ulemerero wa Mose .
58003004	Nyumba iliyonse imamangidwa ndi munthu wakutiwakuti , koma amene adapanga zonse , ndi Mulungu .
58003005	Mose anali wokhulupirika m'nyumba yonse ya Mulungu ngati wantchito chabe , kuti achitire umboni zimene Mulungu analikudzanena m'tsogolo mwake .
58003006	Koma Khristu anali wokhulupirika m'nyumba ya Mulungu ngati mwana wolamulira pa zonse za m'nyumba mwakemo . Ndipo nyumba yakeyo ndife , ngati tiika mphamvu pa kulimba mtima ndi kunyadira zimene tikuziyembekeza .
58003007	Nchifukwa chake tsono , monga Mzimu Woyera akunenera , " Lero lino mukamva mau a Mulungu ,
58003008	musaumitse mitima yanu monga muja zidaachitikira pomuukira Mulungu , tsiku la kumuyesa m'chipululu muja .
58003009	Mulungu akuti , Pamene paja , makolo anu adaandiputa pakundiyesa , ndipo adaona zimene ndidaŵachita pa zaka makumi anai .
58003010	Tsono ndidaukwiyira mbadwowo , ndipo ndidati , ' Nthaŵi zonse amasokera mumtima mwao , sanaphunzirebe njira zanga . '
58003011	Motero ndili wokwiya ndidalumbira kuti , ' Sadzaloŵa konse mu mpumulo umene ndidaŵakonzera . ' "
58003012	Abale , mchenjere , kuti pasapezeke wina aliyense mwa inu wokhala ndi mtima woipa ndi wosakhulupirira , womlekanitsa ndi Mulungu wamoyo .
58003013	Kwenikweni muzilimbikitsana tsiku ndi tsiku ikadalipo nthaŵi , imene m'mau a Mulungu imatchedwa kuti , " Lero " . Muzichita zimenezi , kuwopa kuti wina aliyense mwa inu angaumitsidwe mtima ndi chinyengo cha uchimo .
58003014	Paja timasanduka anzake a Khristu , malinga tikasunga kwenikweni mpaka potsiriza kulimba mtima kumene tinali nako poyamba .
58003015	Paja Malembo akuti , " Lero lino mukamva mau a Mulungu , musaumitse mitima yanu monga muja zidaachitikira poukira Mulungu . "
58003016	Nanga amene adaamva mau ake a Mulungu namuukira , ndani ? Ndi onse aja amene Mose adaaŵatsogolera nkuŵatulutsa m'dziko la Ejipito .
58003017	Nanga amene Mulungu adaaŵakwiyira zaka makumi anai , ndani ? Ndi anthu amene adaachimwa aja , mitembo yao nkutsalira m'chipululu .
58003018	Nanga Mulungu ankanena za yani pamene adaati , " Ndikulumbira kuti ameneŵa sadzaloŵa konse mu mpumulo umene ndidaŵakonzera ? " Pajatu ankanena za anthu amene adaamuukira .
58003019	Motero tikuwona kuti anthuwo sadathe kuloŵa , chifukwa cha kusakhulupirira .
58004001	Lonjezo la Mulungu lakuti tidzaloŵa mu mpumulo umene Iye adatikonzera , lilipobe . Tsono tichenjere kuti pasakhale wina aliyense mwa inu wopezeka kuti walephera kuloŵamo .
58004002	Paja ifenso tidaumva Uthenga Wabwino , monga iwo aja . Koma iwowo sadapindule nawo mau olalikidwawo , popeza kuti adangoŵamva , koma osaŵakhulupirira .
58004003	Ife okhulupirirafe tikuloŵamo mu mpumulowo . Paja Mulungu adaanena kuti , " Ndili wokwiya ndidalumbira kuti , ' Sadzaloŵa konse mu mpumulo umene ndidaŵakonzera . ' " Adaanena zimenezi , ngakhale anali atatsiriza ntchito zake zonse za kulenga dziko lapansi .
58004004	Pena pake ponena za tsiku lachisanu ndi chiŵiri pali mau akuti , " Mulungu adapumula pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiŵiri , kuleka ntchito zake zonse . "
58004005	Panonso akunena za zomwezo pamene akuti , " Sadzaloŵa konse mu mpumulo umene ndidaŵakonzera . "
58004006	Mulungu adakonza kuti ena aloŵe ndithu mu mpumulowo , koma aja adaamva Uthenga Wabwino poyambaŵa sadaloŵemo chifukwa cha kusamvera .
58004007	Nchifukwa chake Mulungu adaikanso tsiku lina , lotchedwa kuti " Lero " . Patapita nthaŵi yaitali Mulungu adalankhula za tsiku lomweli kudzera mwa Davide ponena mau aja tatchula kaleŵa , akuti , " Lero , mukamva mau a Mulungu , musaumitse mitima yanu . "
