58004008	Chifukwatu Yoswa akadaŵaloŵetsa anthuwo mu mpumulo uja , sibwenzi pambuyo pake atanena za tsiku linanso .
58004009	Nchifukwa chake tsono mpumulo wonga wa pa Sabata waŵatsalirabe anthu a Mulungu .
58004010	Paja munthu woloŵa mu mpumulo umene Mulungu adalonjeza , nayenso amaputnula , kuleka ntchito zake , monga momwe Mulungu adaapumulira , kuleka ntchito zake .
58004011	Tiyesetse tsono kuloŵa mu mpumulowo , kuwopa kuti wina aliyense angakhale wosamvera monga iwo aja , nalephera kuloŵamo .
58004012	Paja mau a Mulungu ndi amoyo ndi ogwira ntchito mwamphamvu . Ndi akuthwa koposa lupanga lakuthwa konsekonse . Amabaya mpaka molumikizirana mwa moyo ndi mzimu , ndiponso molumikizirana mfundo ndi mafuta a m'mafupa . Amaweruza ngakhale zimene anthu amalingalira ndi kulakalaka m'mitima mwao .
58004013	Pamaso pa Mulungu palibe kanthu kobisika , zonse zili poyera ndipo nzovundukuka pamaso pa Iye amene tiyenera kumufotokozera zonse zimene tachita .
58004014	Tiyeni tsono , tigwiritse chikhulupiriro chimene timavomereza . Pakuti tili naye Mkulu wa ansembe wopambana , amene adapita mpaka kukafika kumwamba kwenikweni kwa Mulungu . Iyeyu ndi Yesu , Mwana wa Mulungu .
58004015	Sitili ndi Mkulu wa ansembe woti sangathe kutimvera chifundo chifukwa cha zofooka zathu . Wathu Mkulu wa ansembe onse adayesedwa pa zonse , monga momwe ife timayesedwera , koma Iye sadachimwe konse .
58004016	Tiyeni tsono , tiyandikire mopanda mantha ku mpando wachifumu wa Mulungu wokoma mtima . Kumeneko tidzalandira chifundo , ndipo mwa kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu tidzapeza thandizo pa nthaŵi yake yeniyeni .
58005001	Mkulu wa ansembe aliyense amasankhidwa pakati pa anthu , namuika kuti aziŵaimirira pamaso pa Mulungu . Ntchito yake nkupereka mphatso ndi nsembe chifukwa cha machimo .
58005002	Popeza kuti iye yemweyo ali ndi zofooka zambiri , ndiye kuti angathe kuŵalezera mtima amene ali opanda nzeru ndi osokera .
58005003	Nchifukwa chake aumirizidwa kumapereka nsembe chifukwa cha machimo a iye yemwe , ndiponso machimo a anthu ena .
58005004	Palibe munthu amadzitengera yekha ulemu wokhala mkulu wa ansembe onse , koma amachita kuitanidwa ndi Mulungu , monga momwe adaaitanidwira Aroni .
58005005	Momwemonso Khristu sadadzikweze yekha ku ulemu wokhala mkulu wa ansembe onse , koma Mulungu ndiye adachita kumuuza kuti , " Iwe ndiwe Mwana wanga , Ine lero ndakubala . "
58005006	Penanso Mulungu adati , " Ndiwe wansembe mpaka muyaya , unsembe wake wonga uja wa Melkizedeki . "
58005007	Yesu , pa nthaŵi imene anali munthu pansi pano , mofuula ndi molira misozi , adapereka mapemphero ndi madandaulo kwa Mulungu , amene anali nazo mphamvu zompulumutsa ku imfa . Ndiye popeza kuti Yesu adaadzipereka modzichepetsa , Mulungu adamvera mapemphero ake .
58005008	Motero Yesu , ngakhale anali Mwana wa Mulungu , adaphunzira kumvera pakumva zoŵaŵa .
58005009	Atasanduka wangwiro kotheratu , adakhala gwero la chipulumutso chosatha kwa onse omvera Iye ,
58005010	ndipo Mulungu adamtchula mkulu wa ansembe onse , unsembe wake wonga uja wa Melkizedeki .
58005011	Tili ndi zambiri zoti nkunena pa zimenezi , koma nzovuta kufotokoza kwake , popeza kuti mwasanduka ouma mitu .
58005012	Lija nkale mukadayenera kukhala ophunzitsa anzanu , komabe nkofunika kuti wina akuphunzitseninso maphunziro oyamba enieni a mau a Mulungu . Nkofunikanso kukumwetsani mkaka , m'malo mwa kukupatsani chakudya cholimba .
58005013	Ngati wina aliyense angomwa mkaka , ndiye kuti akali mwana wakhanda , sangathe kutsata chiphunzitso chofotokoza za chilungamo .
58005014	Koma chakudya cholimba ndi cha anthu okhwima . Pakugwiritsa ntchito nzeru zao , iwoŵa adadzizoloŵeza kusiyanitsa pakati pa zabwino ndi zoipa .
58006001	Tsono tisangoima pa maphunziro oyamba enieni a Khristu . Tisachite kubwerezanso kuphunzitsa zomwe zili ngati maziko , monga za kutembenuka mtima kusiya ntchito zosapindulitsa moyo wosatha , za kukhulupirira Mulungu ,
58006002	za maubatizo , za kusanjika manja , za kuuka kwa akufa , ndi za chiweruzo chotsiriza . Koma tiyeni tipitirire mpaka tikafike pa kukhwima kwenikweni .
58006003	Mulungu akalola , tidzaterodi .
58006004	Anthu amene adataya chikhulupiriro chao , nkosatheka kuŵatsitsimutsa kuti atembenuke mtima . Iwowo kale Mulungu adaaŵaunikira , adaalaŵako mphatso yochokera Kumwamba , nkulandira nao Mzimu Woyera .
58006005	Ndipo adazindikira kukoma kwa mau a Mulungu , ndi mphamvu za nthaŵi imene inalikudzafika .
58006006	Tsono akamkana Mulungu tsopano , akuchita ngati kumpachika iwo omwe Mwana wa Mulungu , ndi kumnyozetsa poyera .
58006007	Paja nthaka yolandira mvula kaŵirikaŵiri , nkubereka mbeu zopindulitsa oilima , Mulungu amaidalitsa .
58006008	Koma ngati ibereka minga ndi nthula , ndi yachabe ndipo ili pafupi kutembereredwa . Mathero ake nkutenthedwa m'moto .
58006009	Koma inu okondedwa anga , ngakhale tikunena zimenezi , sitikukukayikirani . Tikudziŵa kuti muli nazo zabwino , zolinga ku chipulumutso chanu .
58006010	Paja Mulungu ngwolungama , sangaleke kusamalako za ntchito zanu , ndi chikondi chimene mudaamuwonetsa pakutumikira oyera ake , monga m'mene mukuchitirabe tsopano .
58006011	Tikufunitsitsa kuti aliyense mwa inu apitirire kuwonetsa changu chomwechi mpaka potsiriza , kuti chiyembekezo chanu chifike pake penipeni .
58006012	Sitifuna kuti mukhale aulesi , koma kuti mutsanzire anthu amene , pakukhulupirira ndi pakupirira , akulandira zimene Mulungu adalonjeza .
58006013	Pamene Mulungu ankamulonjeza kanthu Abrahamu , adaalumbira kuti , " Pali Ine ndemwe , Mulungune . " Adaatero , popeza kuti panalibe wamkulu koposa Mwiniwakeyo amene akadamtchula polumbirapo .
58006014	Ndiye Mulungu adati , " Ndithudi ndidzakudalitsa kwakukulu , ndipo ndidzachulukitsa kwambiri zidzukulu zako . "
58006015	Nchifukwa chake Abrahamu adaayembekeza molimbikira , nalandira zimene Mulungu adaamlonjeza .
58006016	Anthu amalumbira m'dzina la wina amene akuŵaposa , ndipo lumbiro lotere lotsimikizira mau , limathetsa kutsutsana konse pakati pao .
58006017	Mulungu pofuna kuŵatsimikizira anthu odzalandira zimene adaalonjeza , kuti Iye sangasinthe maganizo , adatsimikiza lonjezo lakelo pakulumbira .
58006018	Motero pali zinthu ziŵirizi , lonjezo ndi lumbiro , zimene sizingathe kusinthika , ndipo Mulungu sanganamirepo . Mwa zimenezi Mulungu adafuna kutilimbitsa mtima ife amene tidathaŵira kwa Iye , kuti tichigwiritse chiyembekezo chimene adatiikira pamaso pathu .
58006019	Chiyembekezo chimenechi tili nacho ngati nangula wa moyo wathu . Nchokhazikika , nchosagwedezeka konse , ndipo chimabzola chochinga cha Nyumba ya Mulungu ya Kumwamba , nkukaloŵa mpaka ku Malo Opatulika am'katikati .
58006020	Yesu adatitsogolera kale nkuloŵamo chifukwa cha ife . Iye adasanduka mkulu wa ansembe onse wamuyaya , unsembe wake wonga uja wa Melkizedeki .
58007001	Melkizedeki ameneyu anali mfumu ya ku Salemu , ndiponso wansembe wa Mulungu Wopambanazonse . Pamene Abrahamu ankabwerako kuchokera ku nkhondo , atagonjetsa mafumu aja , Melkizedeki adadzamchingamira , namdalitsa .
58007002	Abrahamu adampatsa chigawo chachikhumi cha zonse zimene adaafunkha . Potsata tanthauzo la dzina lake , choyamba Melkizedeki ndi " Mfumu ya chilungamo , " pambuyo pake ndi " Mfumunso ya Salemu , " ndiye kuti , " Mfumu ya Mtendere " .
58007003	Za bambo wake kapena mai wake , kapena makolo ake , palibe chilichonse chidalembedwa . Chimodzimodzi za kubadwa kwake ndi imfa yakenso . Ali ngati Mwana wa Mulungu , akupitiriza kukhala wansembe mpaka muyaya .
58007004	Mukuwonatu tsono kuti munthuyo anali wamkulu ndithu . Nanga Abrahamu , kholo lathu lija , kuchita kumpatsa chachikhumi cha zimene adaafunkha !
58007005	Malamulo a Mose amati ana a Levi , amene ali ansembe , azilandira chachikhumi kwa Aisraele . Ndiye kuti iwo amalandira kwa abale ao , ngakhale abalewo nawonso ndi ana a Abrahamu .
58007006	Melkizedeki sanali m'gulu la zidzukulu za Levi , komabe adalandira chachikhumi kwa Abrahamu . Ndipo adadalitsa Abrahamu , munthu amene anali atalandira malonjezo a Mulungu .
58007007	Paja nchodziŵikiratu kuti munthu wodalitsa mnzake ndiye wamkulu kuposa amene akudalitsidwayo .
58007008	Kunena za ansembe olandira chachikhumi aja , amene ndi zidzukulu za Levi , iwoŵa ndi anthu otha kufa . Koma kunena za Melkizedeki , Malembo amamchitira umboni kuti ngwamoyo .
58007009	Kwenikweni tingathe kunena kuti pamene Abrahamu ankapereka chachikhumi , Levi yemwe , amene amalandira chachikhumi , adaapereka nao chachikhumicho .
58007010	Pakuti iye anali akadali m'thupi la kholo lake Abrahamu pamene Melkizedeki adadzamchingamira .
58007011	Malamulo amene Aisraele adalandira , anali okhazikika pa unsembe wa Levi . Tsono achikhala kudaali kotheka kukhala angwiro mwa unsembe umenewu , sikukadafunikanso unsembe wina , wonga uja wa Melkizedeki , wosiyana ndi wonga uja wa Aroni .
58007012	Pakuti pakakhala kusintha pa unsembe , ndiye kuti pa Malamulonso sipangalephere kukhala kusintha .
58007013	Ambuye athu , amene mauŵa akunena za Iwo , anali a fuko lina . Ndipo palibiretu wa fuko limeneli amene adatumikirapo ku guwa lansembe .
58007014	Nchodziŵikiratu kuti Ambuye athu aja anali a fuko la Yuda , ndipo Mose pokamba za fuko limeneli , sadanenepo kanthu za ansembe .
58007015	Nkhaniyi imamveka bwino koposa pamene tiwona kuti pafika wansembe wina wonga Melkizedeki .
58007016	Iyeyo sadakhale wansembe chifukwa cha malamulo okhudza kubadwa kwa anthu , koma chifukwa cha mphamvu za moyo wake umene uli wosatha .
58007017	Paja mau a Mulungu pomuchitira umboni akuti , " Ndiwe wansembe mpaka muyaya , unsembe wake wonga uja wa Melkizedeki . "
58007018	Motero lamulo lakale lalekeka chifukwa linali lopanda mphamvu , linali lopanda phindu .
58007019	Pajatu Malamulo a Mose sankatha kusandutsa munthu kuti akhale wangwiro . Koma m'malo mwake mwaloŵa chiyembekezo choposa , ndipo mwa chiyembekezo chimenechi timayandikira kwa Mulungu .
58007020	Chinanso nchakuti Mulungu adaachita kulumbira . Amene ankaloŵa unsembe kale lija ankatenga udindo waowo popanda lumbiro .
58007021	Koma Yesu adaloŵa unsembe wake ndi lumbiro , pamene Mulungu adamuuza kuti , " Ambuye adalumbira , ndipo sadzasintha maganizo ake akuti , ndiwe wansembe mpaka muyaya . "
58007022	Kusiyana kokhudza lumbiroku kukutiwonetsa kuti Yesu ndi Nkhoswe yotsimikizira Chipangano choposa .
58007023	Kusiyana kwina nkwakuti ansembe akale aja anali ambiri , chifukwa ankafa , sankatha kupitirira ndi udindo waowo .
58007024	Koma Yesu ngwamuyaya , motero unsembe wake ngwosasinthika .
58007025	Nchifukwa chake angathe kuŵapulumutsa kwathunthu anthu amene akuyandikira kwa Mulungu kudzera mwa Iye , pakuti Iyeyo ali ndi moyo nthaŵi zonse kuti aziŵapempherera .
58007026	Tsono padaafunika kuti tikhale naye wotere mkulu wa ansembe onse : woyera mtima , wopanda choipa kapena chodetsa chilichonse , wosiyana ndi anthu ochimwa , ndiponso wokwezedwa kubzola zonse zakumwambaku .
58007027	Yesu ameneyu sali ngati akulu a ansembe ena aja . Palibe chifukwa chakuti tsiku ndi tsiku azipereka nsembe poyamba chifukwa cha machimo ake , kenaka chifukwa cha machimo a anthu . Zimenezi adachitiratu kamodzi kokha , pakudzipereka yekha ngati nsembe .
58007028	Malamulo a Mose amaika anthu amene ali ndi zofooka , kuti akhale akulu a ansembe onse . Koma mau a lumbiro la Mulungu lija limene lidabwera pambuyo pa Malamulowo , adaika Mwana wake , amene wakhala wangwiro kwamuyaya kuti akhale mkulu wa ansembe onse .
58008001	Mfundo yeniyeni pa zimene tikunenazi ndi iyi : tili naye wotere Mkulu wa ansembe onse , amene akukhala ku dzanja lamanja la mpando wachifumu wa Mulungu Waulemerero Kumwamba .
58008002	Iye akutumikira m'Malo Opatulika am'katikati , ndiye kuti m'chihema chenicheni chimene adachimanga ndi Ambuye osati munthu ai .
58008003	Paja mkulu wa ansembe aliyense amaikidwa kuti azipereka mphatso ndi nsembe kwa Mulungu . Motero nkofunika kuti wathunso mkulu wa ansembe onse akhale nkanthu koti apereke .
58008004	Iyeyu akadakhala pa dziko lapansi , sibwenzi ali wansembe konse , popeza kuti alipo kale ansembe amene amapereka mphatso potsata Malamulo a Mose .
58008005	Ntchito za chipembedzo zimene iwo amachita , zili ngati chithunzi chongofanizira zenizeni za Kumwamba . Paja zidaateronso ndi Mose : pamene iye adaati amange chihema , Mulungu adaamlangiza kuti , " Upangetu zonse molingana ndi chitsanzo chimene ndidaakuwonetsa paphiri paja . "
58008006	Koma monga zilirimu , Yesu adalandira unsembe wopambana kutalitali unsembe wakale uja , monga momwe ndiyenso Nkhoswe ya chipangano chopambana , chifukwa malonjezo ake ngopambana malonjezo a chipangano chakale chija .
58008007	Chipangano choyamba chija chikadakhala changwiro , sipakadafunikanso china m'malo mwake .
58008008	Koma Mulungu adadzudzula anthu ake ndi mau aŵa akuti , " Masiku akubwera , pamene ndidzachita chipangano chatsopano ndi fuko la Israele , ndiponso ndi fuko la Yuda .
58008009	Sichidzakhala chonga chipangano chimene ndidaachita ndi makolo ao tsiku limene ndidaachita kuŵagwira pa dzanja kuti ndiŵatulutse m'dziko la Ejipito . Chifukwa iwo sadasunge chipangano changa chija , nanenso sindidaŵasamale " , akutero Ambuye .
58008010	" Nachi tsono chipangano chimene ndidzachita ndi fuko la Israele atapita masiku ameneŵa , " akutero Ambuye : " Ndidzaika Malamulo anga m'maganizo ao ndidzachita kuŵalemba m'mitima mwao . Choncho Ine ndidzakhala Mulungu wao , iwowo adzakhala anthu anga .
58008011	Sipadzafunikanso kuti wina aliyense aphunzitse mnzake , kapena kuti wina aliyense auze mbale wake kuti , ' Udziŵe Ambuye ' . Pakuti onse adzandidziŵa , kuyambira wamng'ono mpaka wamkulu .
58008012	Mwachifundo hdidzaŵakhululukira zochimwa zap , sindidzakumbukiranso machimo ao . "
58008013	Pakunena mau oti , " Chipangano chatsopano " , Mulungu akunena kuti chipangano choyamba nchotha ntchito . Paja chinthu chimene chayamba kutha ntchito nkumakalamba , ndiye kuti chili pafupi kuzimirira .
58009001	Chipangano choyamba chija chinali nawo malamulo okhudza chipembedzo , chinalinso ndi malo opembedzeramo omangidwa ndi anthu .
58009002	Anthu adaamanga chihema , ndipo m'chipinda chake choyamba munkakhala choikaponyale , tebulo , ndi mikate yoperekedwa kwa Mulungu . Chipinda chimenechi chinkatchedwa " Malo Opatulika . "
58009003	Paseri pa chochinga chachiŵiri panali chipinda chotchedwa " Malo Opatulika Kopambana " .
58009004	Chipindachi chinali ndi guwa lagolide lofukizirapo lubani . M'chipindamo munalinso bokosi lachipangano . Bokosi lonselo linali lokutidwa ndi golide . M'bokosimo munali kambiya kagolide m'mene munali mana uja , ndi ndodo ya Aroni , ija idaaphukayi . Munalinso miyala iŵiri ija yolembedwapo mau a chipangano .
58009005	Pamwamba pa bokosilo panali zithunzi za akerubi oonetsa ulemerero wa Mulungu . Mapiko ao adaaphimbira pa chivundikiro cha bokosilo chimene chinali malo okhululukirapo machiroo . Koma nkosatheka tsopano lino kufotokoza zonzezi tsatanetsatane .
58009006	Malinga ndi malongosoledwe ameneŵa , ansembe amaloŵa m'chipinda choyamba chija masiku onse pokagwira ntchito zao za chipembedzo .
58009007	Koma m'chipinda chachiŵiri chija ndi mkulu wa ansembe onse yekha amene amaloŵamo , nayenso ndi kamodzi kokha pa chaka , ndipo saloŵamo popanda kutenga magazi . Magaziwo ngokapereka kwa Mulungu chifukwa cha iye mwini , ndiponso chifukwa cha machimo ochita anthu mosazindikira bwino .
58009008	Mwa njira imeneyi Mzimu Woyera akuphunzitsa kuti njira yoloŵera m'Malo Opatulika Kopambana ndi yosatsekukabe pamene chipinda choyamba chija chilipobe .
58009009	Zimenezi nzofanizira chabe , ndipo zimaloza ku nthaŵi ino . Potsata malongosoledwe ameneŵa mphatso ndi nsembe zimene munthu amapereka sizingathe konse kuusandutsa wangwiro mtima wa wopembedzayo .
58009010	Zimangonena za zakudya , za zakumwa , ndi za miyambo yosiyanasiyana ya kasambidwe . Zonsezo ndi malamulo olinga pa zooneka ndi maso chabe , oikidwa kuti azingokhalapo mpaka nthaŵi imene Mulungu adzakonzenso zonse .
58009011	Koma Khristu wafika , ndipo ndiye Mkulu wa ansembe onse wa zokoma zimene zilikudza tsopano . Chihema chimene Iye amatumikiramo nchachikulu ndiponso changwiro kopambana . Nchosapangidwa ndi anthu , ndiye kuti si chapansipano .
58009012	Pamene Khristu adabzola chihemachi , nkukaloŵa kamodzi kokhako m'malo Opatulika Kopambana , sadaloŵemo ndi magazi a atonde ndi a anaang'ombe amphongo ai . Adaloŵamo ndi magazi akeake . Potero adatikonzera chipulumutso chosatha .
58009013	Magazi a atonde ndi a ng'ombe zamphongo , ndiponso phulusa la mwanawang'ombe wamkazi zimawazidwa pa anthu amene ali odetsedwa chifukwa chosasamala mwambo wachiyuda . Zimenezi zimaŵayeretsa pakuŵachotsa litsiro lam'thupi .
58009014	Nanji tsono magazi a Khristu , angathe kuchita zoposa . Mwa Mzimu wamuyaya Iye adadzipereka ngati nsembe yopanda chilema kwa Mulungu . Ndiye kuti magazi ake adzayeretsa mitima yathu pakuichotsera ntchito zosapindulitsa moyo , kuti tizitumikira Mulungu wamoyo .
58009015	Nchifukwa chake Khristu ndi Nkhoswe ya chipangano chatsopano , kuti amene Mulungu adaŵaitana , alandire madalitso osatha amene Mulunguyo adalonjeza . Izi zidatheka chifukwa cha imfa ya Khristu , imene imapulumutsa anthu ku zochimwa zozichita akali m'Chipangano choyamba chija .
58009016	Ngati munthu alemba Chipangano chosiyira ena chuma , pafunika kutsimikiza kuti wolemba chipanganocho ŵamwaliradi .
58009017	Paja chipangano chotere chilibe mphamvu , asanamwalire wochilemba . Chimakhala ndi mphamvu pokhapokha wochilembayo atamwalira .
58009018	Nchifukwa chake ngakhale Chipangano choyamba chija sichidachitike popanda kukhetsa magazi .
58009019	Poyamba Mose adaalengeza kwa Aisraele malamulo onse , motsata Malamulo amene Mulungu adaampatsa . Pambuyo pake adatenga magazi a anaang'ombe amphongo ndi madzi , nawaza pa buku la Malamulo ndi pa anthu onse . Adaachita zimenezi ndi kanthambi ka chitsamba cha hisope , ndiponso ndi ubweya wankhosa wofiira .
58009020	Pochita zimenezi adanenerera mau akuti , " Aŵa ndi magazi otsimikizira Chipangano chimene Mulungu walamula kuti mchisunge . "
58009021	Momwemonso Mose adawaza magazi pa chihema ndi pa ziŵiya zonse zogwirira ntchito pa chipembedzo .
58009022	Malinga ndi Malamulo a Mosewo pafupifupi zonse zimayeretsedwa ndi magazi , ndipo machimo sakhululukidwa popanda kukhetsa magazi .
58009023	Tsono padaafunika kuti zinthu zongofanizira zenizeni za Kumwamba , ziyeretsedwe ndi miyambo imeneyi . Koma kuti za Kumwamba zenizenizo ziyeretsedwe , padaafunika nsembe zina zoposa zimenezo .
58009024	Paja Khristu sadaloŵe m'malo opatulika omangidwa ndi anthu , malo ongofanizira malo enieni opatulika a Kumwamba . Iye adapita Kumwamba kwenikweniko , kuti tsopano aziwonekera pamaso pa Mulungu chifukwa cha ife .
58009025	Mkulu wa ansembe onse amaloŵa m'Malo Opatulika Kopambana chaka ndi chaka atatenga magazi amene sali ake . Koma Khristu sadaloŵe Kumwamba kuti azidzipereka nsembe kaŵirikaŵiri .
58009026	Zikadatero , akadayenera kumamva zoŵaŵa kaŵirikaŵiri chilengedwere cha dziko lapansi . Koma monga zilirimu , waoneka kamodzi kokha pakutha pake pa nthaŵi yotsiriza , kuti achotse uchimo pakudzipereka yekha nsembe .
58009027	Munthu aliyense amafa kamodzi kokha , pambuyo pake nkumaweruzidwa .
58009028	Momwemonso Khristu adaperekedwa nsembe kamodzi kokha , kuti asenze ndi kuchotsa machimo a anthu ambiri . Adzaonekanso kachiŵiri , osati kuti adzachotsenso uchimo ai , koma kuti adzapulumutse anthu amene akumuyembekeza .
58010001	Malamulo a Mose ndi chithunzi chabe cha madalitso amene alikudza , osati madalitso enieniwo . Ngakhale nsembe zimodzimodzi zimaperekedwa kosalekeza chaka ndi chaka , Malamulowo sangathe konse mwa nsembezo kuŵasandutsa angwiro anthu oyandikira pamenepo .
58010002	Anthu opembedza Mulungu aja akadayeretsedwa kwathunthu , sibwenzi mtima wao ukuŵatsutsabe , ndipo akadaleka kumapereka nsembe .
58010003	Koma monga zilirimu , nsembezo zimakumbutsa anthu za machimo ao chaka ndi chaka .
58010004	Magazi a ng'ombe zamphongo ndi a atonde sangathe konse kuchotsa machimo .
58010005	Nchifukwa chake pamene Khristu adadza pansi pano , adati , " Inu Mulungu simudafune nsembe kapena zopereka , koma thupi mudandikonzera .
58010006	Nsembe zoocha kwathunthu ndi nsembe zoperekera machimo , simudakondwere nazo .
58010007	Tsono ine ndidati , ' Inu Mulungu , ndabweratu kuti ndichite zimene mukufuna , paja zidalembedwa choncho ponena za Ine m'buku la Malamulo . ' "
58010008	Motero poyamba adati , " Nsembe kapena zopereka , nsembe zopsereza kwathunthu kapenanso nsembe zoperekera machimo , simudazifune ndipo simudakondwere nazo . " Zimenezi nzimene Malamulo adaanena kuti ziperekedwe .
58010009	Koma pambuyo pake adati , " Ndabweratu , kuti ndichite zimene mukufuna . " Motero Khristu adathetsa mphamvu za nsembe za mtundu woyamba zija , kuti m'malo mwake akhazikitse nsembe ya mtundu wachiŵiriyo .
58010010	Chifukwa chakuti Yesu Khristu adachita zimene Mulungu adaafuna kuti achite , ife tidayeretsedwa ndi nsembe ya thupi lake , limene Iye adapereka kamodzi kokhako .
58010011	Wansembe aliyense amaimirira tsiku ndi tsiku nkumatumikira , ndipo amapereka nsembe imodzimodzi mobwerezabwereza . Komabe nsembe zimenezi sizingathe konse kuchotsa machimo .
58010012	Koma Khristu adapereka nsembe imodzi yokha yochotsera machimo onse . Ndipo ataipereka , adakakhala ku dzanja lamanja la Mulungu .
58010013	Kumeneko akudikira tsono kuti Mulungu asandutse adani ake kukhala ngati chopondapo mapazi ake .
58010014	Mwa nsembe imodzi yomweyo wasandutsa angwiro kwamuyaya onse amene Iye akuŵayeretsa .
58010015	Mzimu Woyera nayenso amatitsimikizira zimenezi . Poyamba Iye akuti ,
58010016	" Nachi chipangano chimene ndidzachita nawo atapita masiku amenewo , akutero Ambuye : ndidzaika Malamulo anga m'mitima mwao , ndidzachita kuŵalemba m'maganizo ao . "
58010017	Pambuyo pake akutinso , " Sindidzaŵakumbukiranso konse machimo ao ndi zolakwa zao . "
58010018	Pamene Mulungu wakhululukira zonsezi , sipafunikanso nsembe yoperekera machimo .
58010019	Motero tsono , abale , timayembekeza mosakayika konse kuloŵa m'Malo Opatulika Kopambana chifukwa cha imfa ya Yesu .
58010020	Iye adatitsekulira njira yatsopano ndi yamoyo yobzola chochinga , chimene chili thupi lake .
58010021	Ndiponso tili ndi Wansembe wamkulu woyang'anira nyumba ya Mulungu .
58010022	Nchifukwa chake tsono , tiyeni tiyandikire kwa Mulungu ndi mtima woona , tili ndi chitsimikizo cha chikhulupiriro . Timuyandikire ndi mitima yoyeretsedwa , yopanda kalikonse koitsutsa , ndiponso ndi matupi osambitsidwa ndi madzi oyera .
58010023	Tilimbikire kuvomereza mosafookera zimene timaziyembekeza , pakuti Iye amene adatilonjeza zimenezi ngwokhulupirika .
58010024	Tizikumbukirana kuti tilimbikitsane kukondana ndi kuchita ntchito zabwino .
58010025	Tisamakhalakhala ku misonkhano yathu , monga adazoloŵera ena , koma ife tizilimbitsana mtima , makamaka poona kuti tsiku la Ambuye likuyandikira .
58010026	Pakuti tikamachimwirachimwira mwadala , kwina tikudziŵa choona , palibenso nsembe ina iliyonse ingaperekedwe chifukwa cha machimo athuwo .
58010027	Pamenepo chotitsalira si china ai , koma kumangodikira ndi mantha chiweruzo , ndiponso moto woopsa umene udzaononga otsutsana ndi Mulungu .
58010028	Munthu wophwanya Malamulo a Mose amaphedwa popanda nchifundo chomwe , malinga pakakhala mboni ziŵiri kapena zitatu .
58010029	Nanji tsono munthu wonyoza Mwana wa Mulungu , munthu woyesa chinthu chachabe magazi achipangano amene adamuyeretsa , munthu wonyoza Mzimu wotipatsa madalitso a Mulungu ! Chilango cha munthu wotere chidzakhala choopsa kopambana .
58010030	Paja tikumdziŵa kale amene adati , " Kulipsira nkwanga , ndidzakhaulitsa ndine . " Adatinso , " Arnbuye adzaweruza anthu ake . "
58010031	Kugwa m'manja mwa Mulungu wamoyo ndi chinthu choopsa .
58010032	Kumbukirani masiku akale aja mutangolandira kuŵala chatsopano . Pa nthaŵi imene ija mudaalimbana ndi mazunzo ambiri .
58010033	Mwina ankakunyozani ndi kukuchitani chipongwe , anthu akuwonerera . Mwinanso munkamva nawo zoŵaŵa amene ankasautsidwa motero .
58010034	Munkasaukira limodzi ndi amene adaaponyedwa m'ndende , ndipo mudalola mokondwa kuti alande chuma chanu , mutadziŵa kuti muli ndi chuma choposa ndi chosatha .
58010035	Tsono musataye kulimba mtima kwanu , pakuti kumabweretsa mphotho yaikulu .
58010036	Pafunikadi kupirira , kuti muchite zimene Mulungu akufuna , kuti motero mukalandire zimene adalonjeza .
58010037	Paja Malembo akuti , " Pangotsala kanthaŵi pang'ono chabe kuti Iye amene alikudza , afike . Sachedwa ai .
58010038	Wolungama wanga adzakhala ndi moyo pakukhulupirira . Koma akamachita mantha nkubwerera m'mbuyo , Ine sindikondwera naye . "
58010039	Ifetu sindife anthu oti nkumabwerera m'mbuyo ndi kutayika ai , ndife anthu okhulupirira , kuti tipulumuke .
58011001	Tikati kukhulupirira , ndiye kuti kusakayika konse pa zinthu zimene tikuziyembekeza , ndiponso kutsimikiza kuti zinthu zimene sitikuziwona zilipo ndithu .
58011002	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , makolo anthu akale aja Mulungu adaonetsa kuti ankakondwera nawo .
58011003	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro timamvetsa kuti zonse zimene zilipo zidalengedwa ndi mau a Mulungu , mwakuti zinthu zoonekazi zidachokera ku zinthu zosaoneka .
58011004	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Abele adapereka kwa Mulungu nsembe yopambana ya Kaini , navomerezedwa kuti ngwolungama , chifukwa Mulungu mwiniwake adaamchitira umboni pakulandira zopereka zake . Mwakuti ngakhale iye adafa , koma chifukwa cha chikhulupiriro chakecho , akulankhulabe mpaka pano .
58011005	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Enoki adatengedwa kupita Kumwamba , osafa konse . Sadapezekenso , popeza kuti Mulungu adamtenga . Malembo amamchitira umbom ' kuti asanatengedwe , anali wokondweretsa Mulungu .
58011006	Ndipotu popanda chikhulupiriro nkosatheka kukondweretsa Mulungu . Paja aliyense wofuna kuyandikira kwa Mulungu , ayenera kukhulupirira kuti Mulunguyo alipodi , ndipo kuti amaŵapatsa mphotho anthu omufunafuna .
58011007	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Nowa adalandira machenjezo a Mulungu onena za zinthu zomwe mpaka nthaŵi imeneyo zinali zisanaoneke . Adamvera , napanga chombo kuti apulumutse onse a m'banja mwake . Potero adaŵatsutsa kuti ngolakwa anthu a dziko lapansi , nalandira chilungamo chimene Mulungu amapatsa anthu omkhulupirira .
58011008	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Abrahamu adamvera pamene Mulungu adamuitana kuti apite ku dziko lina limene adaamlonjeza kuti lidzakhala lake . Ngakhale sankadziŵa kumene ankapita , adapitabe .
58011009	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro chomwecho , ankakhala ngati mlendo m'dzikolo limene Mulungu adaamlonjeza . Ankakhala m'mahema pamodzi ndi Isaki ndi Yakobo , amene nawonso anali atalandira lonjezo lomwelo la Mulungu .
58011010	Monsemo Abrahamu ankadikira mzinda wa maziko okhazikika . Mzindawo , Mmisiri woganiziratu mamangidwe ake ndiponso woumanga , ndi Mulungu .
58011011	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Sara yemwe adalandira mphamvu zakutenga pathupi , ngakhale zaka zake zakubala mwana zinali zitapita kale . Zimenezi zidatheka chifukwa adaavomera kuti amene adazilonjezayo ngwokhulupirika .
58011012	Nchifukwa chake mwa munthu mmodzi , wotinso anali ngati wakufa , mudatuluka mibadwo yochuluka ngati nyenyezi , ndi yosaŵerengeka ngati mchenga wa pa gombe la nyanja .
58011013	Onseŵa adasunga chikhulupiriro chao mpaka kufa . Sadalandire zimene Mulungu adaaŵalonjeza , koma adangoziwonera chapatali ndi kuzikondwerera . Adaavomera kuti pansi pano analidi alendo osakhazikika .
58011014	Paja anthu olankhula motere , amaonekeratu kuti akufunafuna malo ao enieni okhazikikamo .
58011015	Akadakhala kuti ankaganizirako za kudziko kumene adaachokera , bwenzi atapeza danga lakuti abwerere kwakaleko .
58011016	Koma monga zilirimu tikuwona kuti ankafuna dziko lina , lokoma kopambana , ndiye kuti dziko la Kumwamba . Nchifukwa chake Mulungu sachita manyazi kutchedwa Mulungu wao , popeza kuti Iye adaŵakonzera mzinda .
58011017	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Abrahamu , pamene Mulungu adamuyesa , adapereka Isaki ngati nsembe . Ngakhale anali munthu woti Mulungu adaampatsa lonjezo , adakhala wokonzeka kupereka ngati nsembe mwana wake mmodzi yekhayo .
58011018	Za mwana ameneyu Mulungu anali atanena kuti , " Mwa Isaki udzakhala ndi zidzukulu . "
58011019	Abrahamu ankakhulupirira kuti Mulungu nkuukitsa munthu kwa akufa . Tsono tingathe kunena mofanizira kuti adamlandiranso Isakiyo ngati wouka kwa akufa .
58011020	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Isaki adapemphera ana ake , Yakobo ndi Esau , madalitso am'tsogolo .
58011021	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Yakobo pakufa , adadalitsa ana a Yosefe mmodzimmodzi . Pochita zimenezi anali atayedzamira pa ndodo yake , akupembedza Mulungu .
58011022	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Yosefe ali pafupi kutsirizika , adanenapo za kutuluka kwa Aisraele mu Ejipito , naŵauziratu za m'mene adaayenera kudzachitira ndi mafupa ake .
58011023	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , atabadwa Mose , makolo ake adamubisa miyezi itatu , poona kuti mwana waoyo anali wokongola . Sadaope konse lamulo lamphamvu la mfumu .
58011024	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Mose atakula adakana kutchedwa mdzukulu wa Farao , mfumu ya ku Ejipito .
58011025	Iye adasankha kuzunzikira nawo limodzi ana a Mulungu , koposa kukondwerera zosangalatsa za uchimo kanthaŵi pang'ono .
58011026	Adaaona kuti kuzunzika chifukwa cha Wodzozedwa wa Mulungu kunali chuma chachikulu koposa chuma chonse cha ku Ejipito , pakuti maso ake anali ndithu pa mphotho yakutsogolo .
58011027	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Mose adachoka ku Ejipito , osaopa ukali wa mfumu , popeza kuti ankapirira ngati munthu woona Mulungu wosaonekayu .
58011028	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , adachita nawo chikondwerero cha Paska , nalamula kuti anthu awaze magazi pa zitseko kuti mngelo woononga ana achisamba uja asakhudze ana achisamba a Aisraele .
58011029	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Aisraele adaoloka Nyanja Yofiira ngati pamtunda pouma . Koma Aejipito , kuti nawonso ayesere kuwoloka , adamizidwa .
58011030	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , malinga a mzinda wa Yeriko adagwa , Aisraele ataŵazungulira masiku asanu ndi aŵiri .
58011031	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro , Rahabu , mkazi wadama uja , sadafe nawo limodzi anthu osamvera aja , pakuti adaaŵalandira bwino azondi aja kunyumba kwake .
58011032	Kodi ndinenenso chiyani tsopano ? Nthaŵi yachepa yoti ndinene za anthu enanso ambiri monga Gideoni , Balaki , Samisoni , Yefita , Davide , Samuele ndiponso aneneri .
58011033	Pokhala ndi chikhulupiriro anthu ameneŵa adagonjetsa maufumu , adakhazikitsa chilungamo , ndipo adalandira zimene Mulungu adaaŵalonjeza . Ena adapuya mikango pakamwa ,
58011034	ena adazimitsa moto waukali , ndipo ena adapulumuka , osaphedwa ndi lupanga . Anali ofooka , koma adalandira mphamvu . Adasanduka ngwazi pa nkhondo , nathamangitsa magulu a ankhondo a adani ao .
58011035	Akazi ena adalandiranso anthu ao amene adafa , ataŵaukitsa . Ena adazunzidwa koopsa mpaka kufa , osalola kuti aŵamasule , chifukwa chofuna kudzaukanso ndi moyo wabwino kopambana .
58011036	Ena , anthu adaŵaseka ndi kuŵakwapula . Adamangidwa ndi maunyolo naponyedwa m'ndende .
58011037	Ena adaŵapha pakuŵaponya miyala ; ena adaŵacheka pakati ; ndipo ena adaŵapha ndi lupanga . Ankayenda uku ndi uku atavala zikopa zankhosa kapena zambuzi , umphaŵi wokhawokha , anthu nkumaŵazunza ndi kuŵavutitsa .
58011038	Anthu ameneŵa , pansi pano sipadaŵayenere ! Ankangoyenda m'zipululu ndi m'mapiri namabisala m'mapanga ndi m'maenje apansi .
58011039	Anthu onseŵa , ngakhale adaaŵachitira umboni wokoma chifukwa cha chikhulupiriro chao , sadalandire zimene Mulungu adaalonjeza .
58011040	Ndiye kuti Mulungu anali ataganiziratu zotikonzera zabwino zopambana , kotero kuti sadafune kuti anthu onse aja asafikire ku ungwiro popanda ife .
58012001	Popeza kuti ponse pozungulira pali mboni zambirimbiri chotere , tiyeni tichotse kalikonse kotichedwetsa , makamaka tchimo limene limatikangamira , ndipo tithamange ndi khama mpikisano umene tayambawu .
58012002	Maso athu azipenyetsetsa Yesu amene ali woyambitsa chikhulupiriro chathu , ndiponso wochifikitsa pake penipeni . Chifukwa cha chimwemwe chimene chinkamudikira , Iyeyo adapirira zoŵaŵa zapamtanda . Adaŵanyoza manyazi a imfa yotere ndipo tsopano akukhala ku dzanja lamanja la mpando wachifumu wa Mu
58012003	Muziganiza za Iye amene adapirira udani waukulu chotere wochokera kwa anthu ochirnwa , kuti musafookere ndi kutaya mtima .
58012004	Polimbana ndi uchimo , simudafike mpaka pokhetsa magazi .
58012005	Mwaiŵala kodi mau olimbitsa mtima aja , amene Mulungu amakulankhulani ngati ana ake ? Mauwo ndi aŵa : " Mwana wanga , usanyozere malango a Ambuye , kapena kutaya mtima pamene Iwo akudzudzula .
58012006	Paja Ambuye amamlanga aliyense amene amamkonda , amakwapula mwana aliyense amene Iwo amamlandira . "
58012007	Muzipirira masautso kuti muphunzirepo makhalidwe oyenera . Mulungu amakutengani ngati ana ake m'zochita zake zonse . Kodi nkale lonse analipo mwana amene bambo wake sadamlange ?
58012008	Ngati Mulungu sakulangani inuyo , monga amachitira ndi ana ake onse , ndiye kuti sindinu ana enieni , koma am'chigololo .
58012009	Tinali nawo azibambo athu apansipano amene ankatilanga , ndipo tinkaŵalemekeza . Kwenikweni tsono tikadayenera kugonjera Mulungu , Atate a mizimu , kuti tikhale ndi moyo .
58012010	Azibambo athu apansipanowo ankatilanga pa kanthaŵi kochepa kokha , akazindikira kuti nkofunika . Koma Mulungu amatilanga kuti tipindulepo , ndipo tilandireko kuyera mtima kwake .
58012011	Pamene munthu akulandira chilango , kwa iye chilangocho chimaoneka ngati chinthu chomvetsa chisoni , ndi chosakondweretsa . Koma anthu amene adaleredwa mwa njira imeneyi , pambuyo pake amapata mtendere umene uli chipatso cha moyo wolungama .
58012012	Limbitsani tsono manja anu ofooka ndiponso maondo anu ogooka .
58012013	Muziyenda m'njira zoongoka , kuti miyendo yopunduka isagweduke , koma ichiritsidwe .
58012014	Yesetsani kukhala ndi mtendere ndi anthu onse , ndi kukhala oyera mtima , pakuti palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe amene adzaona Ambuye popanda kuyera mtimako .
58012015	Chenjerani kuti wina aliyense asabwerere m'mbuyo nkutaya madalitso a Mulungu . Chenjerani kuti wina aliyense asakhale ngati muzu woŵaŵa , umene umaphuka nkuvuta ena ambiri ndi ululu wake .
58012016	Chenjerani kuti wina aliyense asakhale wadama , kapena wonyoza zauzimu , monga Esau , amene adaagulitsa ukulu wake ndi chakudya cha kamodzi kokha .
58012017	Paja mukudziŵa kuti , pambuyo pake adaafuna kulandira madalitso a atate ake , koma zidakanika , chifukwa sadathenso kusintha maganizo , ngakhale adaalakalaka kutero molira misozi .
58012018	Inu simudachite monga Aisraele aja , amene adaafika ku chinthu chimene adaatha kuchikhudza , ndiye kuti ku Phiri la Sinai , lija linali loyaka moto , lamdima wa bii , la mphepo yamkuntho ;
58012019	limene panali kulira kwa lipenga , ndiponso kumveka kwa mau . Anthu atamva mauwo , adaapempha kuti asaŵamvenso konse ,
58012020	pakuti lidaaŵaopsa lamulo lija lakuti , " Ndi nyama yomwe ikangokhudza phirilo , iphedwe ndi miyala . "
58012021	Maonekedwe a zonsezo anali oopsa kwambiri , kotero kuti Mose yemwe adaati , " Ndikunjenjemera ndi mantha . "
58012022	Koma inu mwafika ku Phiri la Ziyoni , ndiponso ku mzinda wa Mulungu wamoyo , ndiye kuti Yerusalemu wa Kumwamba , m'mene muli angelo osaŵerengeka .
58012023	Mwafika kuchikondwerero kumene kwasonkhana ana oyamba a Mulungu , amene maina ao adalembedwa Kumwamba . Mwafika kwa Mulungu , mweruzi wa anthu onse , ndiponso kwa mizimu ya anthu olungama , amene Mulungu waŵasandutsa angwiro kwenikweni .
58012024	Mwafika kwa Yesu , Nkhoswe yokonza za chipangano chatsopano , ndiponso mwafika ku magazi okhetsedwa , amene akutilonjeza zinthu zabwino koposa m'mene magazi a Abele ankachitira .
58012025	Chenjerani tsono kuti musakane kumvera amene akulankhula nanu . Anthu amene adakana kumvera iye uja amene adaaŵachenjeza pansi pano , sadapulumuke ku chilango ai . Nanji tsono ifeyo , tidzapulumuka bwanji ngati timufulatira wotilankhula kuchokera Kumwambaku ?
58012026	Nthaŵi imeneyo mau a Mulungu adaagwedeza dziko , koma tsopano lino walonjeza ndi mau akuti , " Kamodzi kenanso ndidzagwedeza , osati dziko lokha ai , koma ndi thambo lomwe . "
58012027	Mau akuti " Kamodzi kenanso " akuwonetsa poyera kuti zolengedwa zonse zogwedezeka zidzachotsedwa , kuti zinthu zosagwedezeka zidzakhalitse .
58012028	Popeza kuti talandira ufumu wosagwedezeka , tizithokoza Mulungu , ndipo pakutero timpembedze moyenera , mwaulemu ndi mwamantha .
58012029	Paja Mulungu wathu ndi moto wopsereza .
58013001	Pitirizani kukondana monga abale .
58013002	Musanyozere kumalandira bwino alendo m'nyumba mwanu . Pali ena amene kale adaalandira bwino alendo , ndipo mosazindikira adaalandira angelo .
58013003	Muzikumbukira am'ndende , ngati kuti mukuzunzikira nawo limodzi m'ndendemo . Muzikumbukira ovutitsidwa , pakuti inunso muli ndi thupi .
58013004	Ukwati muziwulemekeza nonse , ndipo amuna ndi akazi ao azikhala okhulupirika , pakuti anthu adama ndi achigololo Mulungu adzaŵalanga .
58013005	Mtima wanu usakangamire pa ndalama , ndipo zimene muli nazo , mukhutire nazo . Paja Mulungu adati , " Sindidzakusiyani kapena kukutayani konse . "
58013006	Tiyeni tsono tilimbe mtima ndi kunena kuti , " Ambuye ndiwo Mthandizi wanga , sindidzachita mantha . Munfhu angandichite chiyani ? "
58013007	Muzikumbukira atsogoleri anu amene ankakulalikirani mau a Mulungu . Muzilingalira za moyo wao ndi m'mene adafera , ndipo muzitsanzira chikhulupiriro chao .
58013008	Yesu Khristu ndi yemweyo dzulo , lero ndi mpaka muyaya .
58013009	Musalole zophunzitsa zosiyanasiyana ndiponso zachilendo kuti zikusokeretseni . Choyenera kutilimbitsa mtima ndi kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu , osati malamulo onena za chakudya ai . Malamulo ameneŵa sadaŵapindulitsepo anthu amene ankaŵatsata .
58013010	Ife tili ndi guwa , ndipo ansembe otumikira m'chihema chachipembedzo cha Ayuda saloledwa kudyako zoperekedwa pamenepo .
58013011	Mkulu wa ansembe wachiyuda amaloŵa ndi magazi a nyama ku Malo Opatulika kuti magaziwo akhale nsembe yopepesera machimo . Koma nyama yeniyeniyo amaiwotchera kunja kwa misasa .
58013012	Chifukwa cha chimenechi , Yesu nayenso adafera kunja kwa mzinda , kuti pakutero ayeretse anthu ndi magazi ake .
58013013	Tiyeni tsono tipite kwa Iye kunja kwa misasa kuti tikanyozekere naye limodzi .
58013014	Paja ife tilibe mzinda wokhazikika pansi pano , tikufunafuna wina umene ulikudza .
58013015	Nchifukwa chake , kudzera mwa Yesu tiyeni tipereke kosalekeza mayamiko athu kwa Mulungu ngati nsembe . Ndiye kunena kuti tipereke ngati nsembe mau athu ovomereza dzina lake poyera .
58013016	Musanyozere kumachita zachifundo ndi kumathandizana , chifukwa nsembe zotere zimakondweretsa Mulungu .
58013017	Muzimvera atsogoleri anu ndi kuŵagonjera . Iwo sapumulira konse poyang'anira moyo wanu , pakuti adzayenera kufotokoza za ntchito yao pamaso pa Mulungu . Mukaŵamvera , adzagwira ntchito yaoyo mokondwa osati monyinyirika , kupanda kutero ndiye kuti kwa inuyo phindu palibe .
58013018	Muzitipempherera ifeyo , pakuti sitipeneka konse kuti tili ndi mtima wopanda kanthu koutsutsa , ndipo tatsimikiza kuchita zonse mwachilungamo .
58013019	Ndikukupemphani makamaka kuti mupemphere kuti Mulungu andibwezere kwa inu msanga .
58013020	Mulungu wopatsa mtendere , adaukitsa kwa akufa Ambuye athu Yesu , amene ndiye Mbusa wamkulu wa nkhosa , chifukwa cha imfa yake yotsimikizira Chipangano chamuyaya .
58013021	Mulunguyo akupatseni zabwino zonse zimene mukusoŵa kuti muzichita zimene Iye afuna . Ndipo mwa Yesu Khristu achite mwa ife zomkondweretsa , Khristuyo akhale ndi ulemerero mpaka muyaya . Amen .
58013022	Ndikukupemphani , inu abale anga , kuti muŵalandire bwino mau okulimbitsani mtimaŵa , pakuti ndangokulemberani mwachidule .
58013023	Ndikufuna kuti mudziŵe kuti Timoteo , mbale wathu , amtulutsa m'ndende . Akafika msanga , ndidzabwera naye kwanuko podzakuwonani .
58013024	Mutiperekereko moni kwa atsogoleri anu onse , ndi kwa anthu onse a Mulungu . Abale a ku Italiya akuti moni .
58013025	Mulungu akukomereni mtima nonse .
59001001	Ndine , Yakobo , mtumiki wa Mulungu ndi wa Ambuye Yesu Khristu . Ndikupereka moni kwa inu anthu a Mulungu , a mafuko khumi ndi aŵiri , obalalikana ku maiko osiyanasiyana .
59001002	Abale anga , muzikondwa ndithu mukamayesedwa ndi mavuto amitundumitundu .
59001003	Paja mukudziŵa kuti mukamayesedwa m'chikhulupiriro chanu , mumasanduka olimbika .
59001004	Koma kulimbika kumeneku kuzigwira ntchito yake kotheratu , kuti mukhale angwiro , opanda chilema ndi osapereŵera pa kanthu kalikonse .
59001005	Wina mwa inu akasoŵa nzeru , apemphe kwa Mulungu , ndipo adzalandira , pakuti Mulungu amapereka kwa onse mwaufulu ndi mosatonzera .
59001006	Koma wopemphayo apemphe mokhulupirira , ndi mosakayika konse . Paja munthu wokayikakayika ali ngati mafunde apanyanja , amene amavunduka ndi kuŵinduka ndi mphepo .
59001007	Munthu wotere asamaganiza kuti nkudzalandira kanthu kwa Ambuye ai ;
59001008	pakuti iyeyo ndi wa mitima iŵiri , ndi wosakhazikika pa zochita zake zonse .
59001009	Mbale woluluka anyadire pamene Mulungu amkweza .
59001010	Ndipo mbale wolemera nayenso anyadire pamene Mulungu amtsitsa , pakuti adzatha ngati duŵa la udzu .
59001011	Dzuŵa limatuluka nkutentha kwake , ndipo limaumitsa udzu . Duŵa la udzuwo limathothoka , kukongola kwake nkutha . Chomwechonso moyo wa wolemerayo udzazimirira ali pakati pa zochita zake .
59001012	Ngwodala munthu amene amalimbika pamene ayesedwa , pakuti atapambana , adzalandira moyo . Moyowo ndi mphotho imene Ambuye adalonjeza anthu oŵakonda .
59001013	Pamene munthu akuyesedwa ndi zinyengo , asanene kuti , " Mulungu akundiika m'chinyengo . " Paja Mulungu sangathe kuyesedwa ndi zinyengo , ndipo Iyeiyeyo saika munthu aliyense m'chinyengo .
59001014	Koma munthu aliyense amayesedwa ndi zinyengo pamene chilakolako cha mwiniwakeyo chimkopa ndi kumkola .
59001015	Pamenepo chilakolakocho chimachita ngati chatenga pathupi nkubala uchimo . Tsono uchimowo utakula msinkhu , umabala imfa .
59001016	Musamanyengedwa , abale anga okondedwa .
59001017	Mphatso iliyonse yabwino ndi yangwiro imachokera Kumwamba , kwa Atate a zounikira zonse zakuthambo . Iwo sasinthika konse , ndipo kuŵala kwao sikutsitirika mpang'ono pomwe .
59001018	Mwa kufuna kwake mwiniwakeyo , adatipatsa moyo kudzera mwa mau ake oona , kuti pakati pa zolengedwa zake zonse , ife tikhale ngati zipatso zoyamba zimene Iye wadzipatulira .
59001019	Abale anga okondedwa , gwiritsani mau aŵa : munthu aliyense azifulumira kumva , koma kulankhula asamafulumira , ndipo kukwiya asamafulumiranso .
59001020	Paja munthu wokwiya safikapo pa chilungamo chimene amafuna Mulungu .
59001021	Nchifukwa chake siyani chizoloŵezi chilichonse chonyansa , ndiponso kuipamtima kulikonse . Muŵalandire mofatsa mau amene Mulungu adabzala m'mitima mwanu , pakuti ndiwo angathe kukupulumutsani .
59001022	Musamadzinyenga pakungomva chabe mau a Mulungu , koma muzichita zimene mauwo anena .
59001023	Paja munthu amene amangomva chabe mau , osachita zimene wamvazo , ali ngati munthu woyang'anira nkhope yake yachibadwa m'galasi .
59001024	Tsono amati akadzipenya , amachokapo , posachedwa nkuiŵalako m'mene akuwonekera .
59001025	Malamulo a Mulungu ndi angwiro ndiponso opatsa anthu ufulu . Munthu amene amalandira Malamulowo nkumaŵatsata mosamala , amene samangomva mau nkuŵaiŵala , koma amaŵagwiritsa ntchito , ameneyo Mulungu adzamdalitsa pa zochita zake zonse .
59001026	Ngati wina akudziyesa woika mtima pa zopembedza Mulungu , koma nkukhala wosasunga pakamwa , chipembedzo chakecho nchopanda pake , ndipo amangodzinyenga .
59001027	Chipembedzo choona ndi changwiro pamaso pa Mulungu amene ali Atate , ndi ichi : kusamalira ana amasiye ndi akazi amasiye pa mavuto ao , ndiponso kudzisunga bwino , kuwopa kudetsedwa ndi zoipa za m'dziko lapansi .
59002001	Abale anga , popeza kuti mumakhulupirira Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu , Ambuye aulemerero , musamakondera .
59002002	Mwachitsanzo : munthu wina aloŵa mumsonkhano mwanu atavala mphete zagolide m'manja , alinso ndi zovala zokongola . Winanso nkuloŵa , koma ali mmphaŵi , nsanza zili wirawira .
59002003	Tsono inu pofuna kusamala kwambiri wovala zokongolayo , mumuuza kuti , " Khalani apa pabwinopa " , mmphaŵi uja nkumuuza kuti , " Iwe , kaimirire apo , kapena dzakhale pansi kumapazi kwangaku . "
59002004	Limenelotu ndi tsankho pakati pa inu nokhanokha , ndipo inuyo mwasanduka oweruza a maganizo oipa .
59002005	Mverani , abale anga okondedwa , kodi suja Mulungu adasankha ooneka amphaŵi m'maso mwa anthu , kuti akhale olemera pa chikhulupiriro , ndi kuti alandire madalitso amene Iye adalonjeza anthu omukonda ?
59002006	Koma inuyo mwakhala mukumnyoza mmphaŵiyo . Kodi si anthu olemera amene amakupsinjani ? Si anthu olemera kodi amene amakukokerani ku mabwalo amilandu ?
59002007	Kodi si omwewo amene amalichita chipongwe dzina lolemekezekali la Khristu , limene inu mumatchulidwa ?
59002008	Tsono mumachita bwino ngati mumatsatadi lamulo lachifumu lija limene limapezeka m'Malembo , lonena kuti , " Uzikonda mnzako monga momwe umadzikondera iwe wemwe . "
59002009	Koma mukamaonetsa kukondera , mukuchimwa , ndipo Malamulo a Mulungu akukutsutsani kuti ndinu opalamula .
59002010	Pajatu munthu wotsata Malamulo onse , akangophonyapo ngakhale pa mfundo imodzi yokha , ndiye kuti wachimwira Malamulo onsewo .
59002011	Pakuti Mulungu amene adanena kuti , " Usachite chigololo " , adanenanso kuti , " Usaphe " . Ngati inu chigololo simuchita , koma kupha mumapha , ndiye kutitu mwachimwira Malamulo onse .
59002012	Tsono muzilankhula ndi kuchita zinthu monga anthu oti Mulungu adzaŵaweruza potsata lamulo loŵapatsa ufulu .
59002013	Paja munthu woweruza mopanda chifundo , nayenso Mulungu adzamuweruza mopanda chifundo . Koma wochita chifundo alibe chifukwa choopera chiweruzo cha Mulungu .
59002014	Abale anga , pali phindu lanji , ngati munthu anena kuti , " Ndili ndi chikhulupiriro , " koma popanda chimene akuchitapo ? Kodi chikhulupiriro chotere chingampulumutse ?
59002015	Mwachitsanzo : mbale wina kapena mlongo ali ndi usiŵa , ndipo masiku onse alibe chakudya chokwanira .
59002016	Tsono wina mwa inu angoŵauza kuti . " Pitani ndi mtendere , mukafundidwe ndipo mukakhute " , koma osaŵapatsa zimene akusoŵazo , pamenepo phindu lake nchiyani ?
59002017	Choncho , chikhulupiriro pachokha , chopanda ntchito zake , nchakufa basi .
59002018	Koma kapena wina anganene kuti , " Inuyo muli ndi chikhulupiriro , ineyo ndili ndi ntchito zabwino . " Pamenepo ine nkumuyankha kuti , " Uyesetse kundiwonetsa chikhulupiriro chako chopanda ntchito zakecho , ine ndi ntchito zanga ndikuwonetsa chikhulupiriro changa . "
59002019	Inu mumakhulupirira kuti Mulungu ndi mmodzi yekha . Ai chabwino , mumakhoza , komatu ndi mizimu yoipa yomwe imakhulupirira zimenezi , imachitanso kunjenjemera .
59002020	Wopusawe , kodi ukufuna umboni wotsimikiza kuti chikhulupiriro chopanda ntchito zake nchachabe ?
59002021	Nanga Abrahamu , kholo lathu , suja adakhala wolungama pamaso pa Mulungu chifukwa cha ntchito yomwe adachita , muja adaapereka mwana wake Isaki pa guwa lansembe ?
59002022	Waona tsono kuti chikhulupiriro chake ndi zochita zake zidachitikira pamodzi . Zochita zake zidasandutsa chikhulupiriro chake kuti chifike pake penipeni .
59002023	Motero zidachitikadi zimene Malembo adaanena , kuti , " Abrahamu adakhulupirira Mulungu , nchifukwa chake Mulungu adamuwona kuti ngwolungama ; " mwakuti ankatchedwa bwenzi la Mulungu .
59002024	Mukuwonatu kuti zochita zake za munthu ndizo zimamsandutsa wolungama pamaso pa Mulungu , osati chikhulupiriro chokha .
59002025	Kodi suja zidaateronso ndi Rahabu , mkazi wadama uja ? Iye adaalandira azondi aja , nkuŵabweza kwao poŵadzeretsa njira ina , ndipo adapezeka kuti ngwolungama pamaso pa Mulungu chifukwa cha zimene adaachitazo .
59002026	Paja monga momwe thupi lopanda mzimu limakhala lakufa , moteronso chikhulupiriro chopanda ntchito zake nchakufa .
59003001	Abale anga , musachuluke ofuna kukhala aphunzitsi , chifukwa monga mudziŵa , aphunzitsife tidzaweruzidwa mouma koposa anthu ena onse .
59003002	Paja tonsefe timalakwa pa zinthu zambiri . Ngati alipo amene salakwa pakulankhula , ndiye kuti ndi wangwirodi ameneyo , mwakuti angathe kulamuliranso thupi lake lonse .
59003003	Timaika kachitsulo m'kamwa mwa kavalo kuti atimvere , ndipo tingathe kumaongolera thupi lake lonse .
59003004	Onaninso zombo . Ngakhale nzazikulu kwambiri , ndipo zimakankhidwa ndi mphepo yamphamvu , komabe tsigiro laling'onong'ono ndi limene limaziwongolera kulikonse kumene woyendetsa akufuna .
59003005	Chimodzimodzinso lilime : ndi kachiwalo kakang'ono , komabe limadzitama kuti nkuchita zazikulu . Tangoganizani kukula kwake kwa nkhalango imene ingayatsidwe ndi kalilaŵi kakang'ono ka moto .
59003006	Tsonotu lilime limatentha ngati moto . Chifukwa chokhala pakati pa ziwalo zathu limawanditsa zoipa m'thupi monse . Limaipitsa khalidwe lonse la munthu . Limayatsa moto moyo wathu wonse kuyambira pobadwa mpaka imfa ; ndipo moto wake ngwochokera ku Gehena .
59003007	Munthu angathe kuŵeta mtundu uliwonse wa nyama , wa mbalame , wa zokwaŵa , ndi wazam'nyanja , ndipo adaziŵetapodi .
59003008	Koma lilime palibe munthu amene angathe kuliŵeta . Ndi loipa , silidziŵa kupumula , ndipo ndi lodzaza ndi ululu wakupha .
59003009	Ndi lilime lomwelo timayamika Ambuye , amenenso ndi Atate , komanso ndi lilime lomwelo timatemberera anthu anzathu amene Mulungu adaŵalenga ofanafana naye .
59003010	Pakamwa pomwe pamatuluka mayamiko pomweponso pamatuluka matemberero . Abale anga , zoterezi siziyenera kumachitika .
59003011	Kodi kasupe amatulutsa madzi omweka ndi oŵaŵa pa dzenje limodzimodzi ?
59003012	Abale anga , kodi mkuyu ungathe kubala zipatso za olivi , kapena mpesa kubala nkhuyu ? Momwemonso kasupe wa madzi amchere sangathe kupereka madzi omweka .
59003013	Ndani mwa inu ali wanzeru ndi womvetsa zinthu ? Aonetse ndi makhalidwe ake abwino kuti nzeru zimaongoleradi zochita zake zofatsa .
59003014	Koma ngati muli ndi mtima wakaduka ndi wodzikonda , musamanyada ndi kutsutsana ndi choona pakunena mabodza .
59003015	Nzeru zotere si zochokera Kumwamba , koma ndi nzapansipano , ndi za anthu chabe , ndiponso nzochokera ku mizimu yoipa .
59003016	Pajatu pamene pali kaduka ndi kudzikonda , pomweponso pali chisokonezo ndi ntchito yoipa ya mtundu uliwonse .
59003017	Koma nzeru zochokera Kumwamba , poyamba nzangwiro , kuwonjeza apo nzamtendere , zofatsa ndi zomvera bwino . Ndi za chifundo chambiri , ndipo zipatso zake zabwino nzochuluka . Nzeruzo sizikondera kapena kuchita chiphamaso .
59003018	Ndipo chilungamo ndiye chipatso cha mbeu zimene anthu odzetsa mtendere amafesa mu mtendere .
59004001	Kodi nkhondo zimachokera kuti ? Kukangana pakati panu kumachokera kuti ? Kodi suja zimachokera ku zilakolako zanu zathupi , zimene zimachita nkhondo mwa inu ?
59004002	Mumalakalaka zinthu , koma zimakusoŵani , nchifukwa chake mumapha munthu . Mumasirira zinthu , koma simungathe kuzipeza , nchifukwa chake mumamenyana , nkumachita nkhondo . Mulibe zinthuzo chifukwa simupempha kwa Mulungu .
59004003	Ndipo ngakhale mupemphe , simulandira , chifukwa mumapempha molakwa . Zimene mumapempha , mumafuna kungozimwazira pa zokukondweretsani basi .
59004004	Inu anthu osakhulupirikanu , kodi simudziŵa kuti kuchita chibwenzi ndi zapansipano nkudana ndi Mulungu ? Choncho munthu wofuna kukhala bwenzi la zapansipano , ameneyo amadzisandutsa mdani wa Mulungu .
59004005	Kodi kapena mukuyesa kuti Malembo amanena pachabe kuti , " Mulungu amafunitsitsa mwansanje mzimu umene Iye adaika kuti uzikhala mwa ife ? "
59004006	Koma amatikomera mtima koposa . Nchifukwa chake Malembo akuti , " Mulungu amatsutsa odzikuza , koma odzichepetsa amaŵakomera mtima . "
59004007	Tsono muzigonjera Mulungu . Satana muzilimbana naye , ndipo adzakuthaŵani .
59004008	Yandikirani kwa Mulungu , ndipo Iye adzayandikira kwa inu . Muzisamba m'manja , inu anthu ochimwa . Chotsani maganizo onyenga m'mitima mwanu , inu anthu okayikakayika .
59004009	Zindikirani umphaŵi wanu , imvani chisoni , lirani misozi . Kuseka kwanu kusanduke kulira , ndipo chimwemwe chanu chisanduke chisoni .
59004010	Mudzichepetse pamaso pa Ambuye , ndipo adzakukwezani .
59004011	Abale , musamasinjirirana . Wosinjirira mbale wake kapena kumuweruza , akusinjirira ndi kuweruza Malamulo a Mulungu . Koma ukaweruza Malamulo a Mulungu , ndiye kuti sukuchita zimene Malamulowo akunena , ukudziyesa woweruza .
59004012	Mulungu yekha ndiye wopanga Malamulo ndiponso woweruza . Ndiyenso wotha kupulumutsa ndi kuwononga . Nanga iwe ndiwe yani kuti uziweruza mnzako ?
59004013	Onani tsono , inu amene mukuti , " Lero kapena maŵa tipita ku mzinda wakutiwakuti , ndipo tikachitako malonda chaka chimodzi kuti tikaphe ndalama , "
59004014	m'menemo inuyo zamaŵa simukuzidziŵa . Kodi moyo wanu ngwotani ? Pajatu inu muli ngati utsi chabe , umene umangooneka pa kanthaŵi , posachedwa nkuzimirira .
59004015	Kwenikweni muyenera kumanena kuti , " Ambuye akalola , tikala ndi moyo , tidzachita chakutichakuti . "
59004016	Koma monga zilirimu , mumanyada ndi kudzitama . Kunyada konse kotere nkoipa .
59004017	Munthu akadziŵa zabwino zimene ayenera kuchita , napanda kuzichita , ndiye kuti wachimwa .
59005001	Mverani tsono , inu anthu achumanu . Lirani ndi kufuula chifukwa cha zovuta zimene zikudzakugwerani .
59005002	Chuma chanu chaola , ndipo njenjete zadya zovala zanu .
59005003	Golide wanu ndi siliva zachita dzimbiri , ndipo dzimbirilo lidzakhala mboni yokutsutsani . Lidzaononga thupi lanu ngati moto . Mwadziwunjikira chuma pa masiku ano amene ali otsiriza .
59005004	Antchito okolola m'minda mwanu simudaŵalipire . Ndalama zamalipirozo zikulira mokutsutsani . Ndipo kufuula kwa okololawo kwamveka m'makutu a Chauta Mphambe .
59005005	Mwakhala mukuchita maphwando , ndipo mwalidyera dziko lino lapansi . Mwadzinenepetsa pa tsiku lopha anthu .
59005006	Mwamuweruza kuti ngwolakwa ndipo mwamupha munthu wolungama , iye osalimbalimba .
59005007	Tsono abale , khazikani mtima pansi mpaka Ambuye adzabwere . Onani m'mene amachitira mlimi . Amadikira kuti zipatso zokoma ziwoneke m'munda mwake . Amangoyembekeza mokhazika mtima kuti zilandire mvula yachizimalupsa ndi yachikokololansanu .
59005008	Inunso khazikani mtima . Limbani mtima , pakuti Ambuye ali pafupi kubwera .
59005009	Abale musamanenerana zoipa pakati panu , kuwopa kuti Mulungu angakuweruzeni . Onani , woweruza waima pa khomo .
59005010	Abale , kumbukirani chitsanzo cha aneneri amene adalankhula m'dzina la Ambuye . Iwo adamva zoŵaŵa , komabe adapirira .
59005011	Anthu amene timaŵatchula odala , ndi amene anali olimbika . Mudamva za kulimbika kwa Yobu , ndipo mudaona m'mene Ambuye adamchitira potsiriza , pakuti Ambuye ngachifundo ndi okoma mtima .
59005012	Koma koposa zonse abale anga , musamalumbira . Musalumbire potchula Kumwamba , kapena dziko lapansi , kapena china chilichonse . Pofuna kutsimikiza kanthu , muzingoti , " Inde " . Pofuna kukana kanthu , muzingoti , " Ai " . Muzitero , kuwopa kuti Mulungu angakuweruzeni kuti ndinu opalamula .
59005013	Kodi wina mwa inu ali m'mavuto ? Apemphere . Kodi wina wakondwa ? Aimbe nyimbo zotamanda Mulungu .
59005014	Kodi wina mwa inu akudwala ? Aitanitse akulu a mpingo . Iwowo adzampempherere ndi kumdzoza ndi mafuta m'dzina la Ambuye .
59005015	Akampempherera ndi chikhulupiriro , wodwalayo adzapulumuka , Ambuye adzamuutsa , ndipo ngati anali atachimwa , Ambuye adzamkhululukira machimowo .
59005016	Muziwululirana machimo anu , ndipo muzipemphererana kuti muchire . Pemphero la munthu wolungama limakhala lamphamvu , ndipo silipita pachabe .
59005017	Eliya anali munthu monga ife tomwe . Iye uja adaapemphera kolimba kuti mvula isagwe , ndipo mvula siidagwedi pa zaka zitatu ndi miyezi isanu ndi umodzi .
59005018	Atapempheranso , mvula idagwa , nthaka nkuyambanso kumeretsa mbeu zake .
59005019	Abale anga , wina mwa inu akasokera pa kusiya choona , mnzake nkumubweza ,
59005020	dziŵani kuti amene adzabweza munthu wochimwa ku njira yake yosokera , adzapulumutsa moyo wa munthuyo ku imfa , ndipo chifukwa cha iye machimo ochuluka adzakhululukidwa .
60001001	Ndine , Petro , mtumwi wa Yesu Khristu . Ndikulemba kalatayi kwa inu osankhidwa a Mulungu , amene muli obalalikira ku chilendo , ku maiko a ku Ponto , Galatiya , Kapadokiya , Asiya ndi Bitiniya .
60001002	Mulungu Atate adakusankhani , monga Iye adaziganiziratu kuyambira pa chiyambi , kuti Mzimu Woyera akuyeretseni ndipo kuti mumvere Yesu Khristu , ndi kutsukidwa ndi magazi ake . Mulungu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere wonka nuchulukirachulukira .
60001003	Tiyamike Mulungu , Atate a Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu . Iye mwa chifundo chake chachikulu adatibadwitsanso pakuukitsa Yesu Khristu kwa akufa . Motero timakhulupirira molimba mtima
60001004	kuti tidzalandira ngati choloŵa zokoma zosaonongeka , zosaipitsidwa , ndi zosafota , zimene Mulungu akukusungirani Kumwamba .
60001005	Ndi mphamvu zake Mulungu akukusungani inunso omkhulupirira , kuti mudzalandire chipulumutso chimene Iye ali wokonzeka kuchiwonetsa pa nthaŵi yotsiriza .
60001006	Zimenezi zikukondweretseni , ngakhale tsopano mumve zoŵaŵa poyesedwa mosiyanasiyana pa kanthaŵi .
60001007	Monga golide , ngakhale ndi wotha kuwonongeka , amayesedwa ndi moto , momwemonso chikhulupiriro chanu , chimene nchoposa golide kutali , chimayesedwa , kuti chitsimikizike kuti nchenicheni . Apo ndiye mudzalandire chiyamiko , ulemerero ndi ulemu pamene Yesu Khristu adzaoneka .
60001008	Iyeyu simudamuwone , komabe mumamkonda . Ngakhale simukumuwona tsopano , mumamkhulupirira ndipo mumakondwera ndi chimwemwe chachikulu ndi chosaneneka .
60001009	Pakutero mukupata mphotho ya chikhulupiriro , ndiye kuti chipulumutso chanu .
60001010	Aneneri amene adaneneratu za mphotho yaulere imene mudzalandireyo , ankafunafuna mofufuzafufuza za chipulumutsochi .
60001011	Mzimu wa Khristu wokhala mwa iwo ankaneneratu za zoŵaŵa zimene Khristu adzamve , ndiponso za ulemerero umene adzakhale nawo pambuyo pake . Aneneriwo ankafunafuna kudziŵa kuti kodi zimenezi zidzachitika liti , ndiponso mwa njira yanji .
60001012	Mulungu adaŵaululira kuti ntchito yaoyi sankaigwira chifukwa cha eniakewo , koma chifukwa cha inu , pamene iwo ankanena zoonazi zimene mwamva tsopano . Olalika Uthenga Wabwino adakuuzani zoonazi mwa mphamvu ya Mzimu Woyera wotumidwa kuchokera Kumwamba . Angelo omwe amalakalaka kuwona nao zinthuzo .
60001013	Nchifukwa chake mtima wanu ukhale wokonzeka . Khalani tchelu . Khazikitsani chiyembekezo chanu kotheratu pa kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu pamene Yesu Khristu adzaoneke .
60001014	Muzikhala ngati ana omvera , osatsatanso zimene munkalakalaka pamene munali osadziŵa .
60001015	Koma monga Iye amene adakuitanani ali woyera mtima , inunso khalani oyera mtima m'makhalidwe anu onse .
60001016	Paja mau a Mulungu akuti , " Muzikhala oyera mtima popeza kuti Ineyo ndine woyera mtima . "
60001017	Mulungu alibe tsankho . Amaweruza aliyense molingana ndi zochita zake . Ngati mumutcha Atate pamene mukupemphera , mchitireni ulemu nthaŵi yonse muli alendo pansi pano .
60001018	Mukudziŵa bwino chimene adakuwombola nachoni ku khalidwe lanu lachabe limene mudalandira kwa makolo anu . Sadakuwomboleni ndi ndalama zotha kuwonongeka zija , siliva kapena golide ai ,
60001019	adakuwombolam ' ndi magazi amtengowapatali a Khristu amene adakhala ngati mwanawankhosa wopanda banga kapena chilema .
60001020	Iyeyo Mulungu adaamsankhiratu dziko lapansi lisanalengedwe , koma wamuwonetsa nthaŵi yotsiriza ino chifukwa cha inu .
60001021	Kudzera mwa Iye mumakhulupirira Mulungu amene adamuukitsa kwa akufa , namupatsa ulemerero . Ndipo choncho chikhulupiriro chanu ndi chiyembekezo chanu zili mwa Mulungu .
60001022	Mwayeretsa mitima yanu pakumvera choona , kotero kuti muzikondana ndi akhristu anzanu mosanyenga . Nchifukwa chake muzikondana ndi mtima wonse , mosafookera .
60001023	Pakuti mwa mwachita kubadwanso , moyo wake si wochokera m'mbeu yotha kuwonongeka , koma m'mbeu yosatha kuwonongeka . Mbeuyi ndi mau a Mulungu , mau amoyo ndi okhala mpakampaka .
60001024	Paja mau a Mulungu amanena kuti , " Anthu onse ali ngati udzu , ulemerero wao uli ngati duŵa lakuthengo . Udzu umauma , ndipo duŵa limathothoka ,
60001025	koma mau a Ambuye ngokhala mpaka muyaya . " Mau ameneŵa ndi Uthenga Wabwino umene walalikidwa kwa inu .
60002001	Nchifukwa chake tayani choipa chonse , kunyenga konse , chiphamaso , kaduka ndi masinjiriro onse .
60002002	Monga makanda obadwa chatsopano amalirira mkaka , inunso muzilakalaka mkaka weniweni wodyetsa mtima wanu , kuti ukukuzeni ndi kukufikitsani ku chipulumutso ,
60002003	popeza kuti mwachilaŵadi chifundo cha Ambuye .
60002004	Bwerani kwa Iye amene ali mwala wamoyo womwe anthu adaukana , koma Mulungu adausankha kuti ngwamtengowapatali .
60002005	Inunso mukhale ngati miyala yamoyo yoti Mulungu amangire nyumba yake . M'menemo muzitumikira ngati ansembe opatulika , pakupereka nsembe zochokera ku mtima , zokomera Mulungu kudzera mwa Yesu Khristu .
60002006	Paja m'Malembo mudalembedwa kuti . " Ndasankha mwala wamtengowapatali . Ndikuuika tsopano m'Ziyoni , ngati mwala wapangodya . Wokhulupirira Iye sadzachita manyazi . "
60002007	Tsono kwa inu okhulupirira , Iye ndi wamtengowapatali . Koma kwa osakhulupirira , ndi monga momwe mau a Mulungu anenera kuti , " Mwala womwe amisiri omanga nyumba adaukana , womwewo wasanduka mwala wapangodya . "
60002008	Mau a Mulungu akutinso , " Umenewu ndi mwala wokhumudwitsa anthu , ndi thanthwe loŵagwetsa . " Amakhumudwa popeza kuti amakana kumvera mau a Mulungu , ndipo anali oyeneradi kuti adzaone zotere .
60002009	Koma inu ndinu fuko losankhidwa , ansembe achifumu , mtundu wopatulika , anthu akeake a Mulungu . Adakusankhani kuti mukalalike ntchito zamphamvu za Iye amene adakuitanani kuti mutuluke mu mdima , mukaloŵe m'kuŵala kwake kodabwitsa .
60002010	Kale simunali anthu a Mulungu , koma tsopano ndinu anthu ake . Kale simudaalandira chifundo , koma tsopano mwachilandira .
60002011	Okondedwa anga , popeza kuti ndinu alendo pansi pano , ndikukupemphani kuti musagonjere zilakolako zathupi zimene zimachita nkhondo ndi mzimu wanu .
60002012	Samalani mayendedwe anu pakati pa akunja , kuti ngakhale azikusinjirirani kuti ndinu anthu ochita zoipa , komabe aziwona ntchito zanu zabwino . Apo adzalemekeza Mulungu pa tsiku limene Iye adzaŵayendere .
60002013	Chifukwa cha Ambuye , muzimvera akulu onse olandira ulamuliro . Ngati ndi mfumu yaikulu koposa ija , imvereni chifukwa ili ndi ulamuliro pa mafumu ena onse .
60002014	Ngati ndi nduna , zimvereni chifukwa zidachita kutumidwa ndi mfumu kuti zizilanga ochita zoipa ndi kuyamikira ochita zabwino .
60002015	Paja Mulungu amafuna kuti ndi zochita zanu zabwino muthetse kulankhula kosadziŵa kwa anthu opusa .
60002016	Inde muzikhala ngati mfulu , koma ufulu wanuwo usakhale ngati chinthu chophimbira zoipa . Koma khalani ngati atumiki a Mulungu .
60002017	Muzilemekeza anthu onse . Muzikonda akhristu anzanu . Khalani anthu oopa Mulungu . Mfumu yaikulu koposa ija muziipatsa ulemu .
60002018	Inu antchito , muzimvera ndi ulemu wonse anthu okulembani ntchito , osati okhawo amene ali abwino ndi ofatsa ai , koma ndi ovuta omwe .
60002019	Pajatu ndi chinthu chabwino ngati munthu , chifukwa chokumbukira Mulungu , apirira zoŵaŵa zosamuyenera .
60002020	Kodi pali chiyani choti nkukuyamikirani ngati mupirira pamene akumenyani chifukwa choti mwachimwa ? Koma mukapirira zoŵaŵa mutachita zabwino , apo mwachita chinthu chovomerezedwa ndi Mulungu .
60002021	Mkhalidwe wotere ndi umene Mulungu adakuitanirani . Paja Khristu nayenso adamva zoŵaŵa chifukwa cha inu , nakusiyirani chitsanzo kuti muzilondola mapazi ake .
60002022	Iye sadachitepo tchimo lililonse , ndipo sadanene bodza lililonse .
60002023	Pamene anthu ankamuchita chipongwe , Iye sadabwezere chipongwe . Pamene ankazunzika , Iye sadaopseze , koma adapereka zonse kwa Mulungu amene amaweruza molungama .
60002024	Khristu mwiniwake adasenza machimo athu m'thupi lake pa mtanda , kuti m'machimo tikhale ngati akufa , koma pakutsata chilungamo tikhale amoyo ndithu . Mudachiritsidwa ndi mabala ake .
60002025	Munali ngati nkhosa zosokera , koma tsopano mwabwerera kwa Mbusa amene ndi wokuyang'anirani .
60003001	Chimodzimodzinso inu azimai , muzimvera amuna anu , kuti ngati ena mwa iwo samvera mau a Mulungu , azikopeka ndi makhalidwe a akazi aonu . Sipadzafunikanso kunenerera mau ,
60003002	popeza kuti adzadziwonera okha makhalidwe anu aulemu ndi angwiro .
60003003	Kudzikongoletsa kwanu kusangokhala kwa maonekedwe akunja pakuluka tsitsi , ndi kuvala zamakaka zagolide ndi zovala zamtengowapatali .
60003004	Koma kudzikongoletsa kwanu kukhale kwa moyo wam'kati , kukongola kosatha kwa mtima wofatsa ndi wachete . Moyo wotere ngwamtengowapatali pamaso pa Mulungu .
60003005	Umu ndi m'mene kale lija azimai oyera mtima okhulupirira Mulungu ankadzikongoletsera , ndipo ankamvera amuna ao .
60003006	Sara yemwe ankamvera Abrahamu , ndi kumutcha " Mbuyanga . " Motero inu azimai , ndinu ana ake a Sarayo , ngati muchita bwino , osalola kuwopsedwa ndi kanthu kalikonse .
60003007	Inunso amuna , muzikhala moŵamvetsa bwino akazi anu . Muziŵachitira ulemu popeza kuti iwowo ndi mtundu wofookerapo , ndiponso ngolandira nanu pamodzi mphatso ya Mulungu , imene ili moyo wosatha . Muzitero , kuti pasakhale kanthu koletsa mapemphero anu .
60003008	Mau otsiriza ndi aŵa : nonse mukhale a mtima umodzi , ndi omverana chisoni . Muzikondana nawo abale . Mukhale a mtima wachifundo ndi odzichepetsa .
60003009	Anthu okuchitani choipa , osaŵabwezera choipa , okuchitani chipongwe osaŵabwezera chipongwe . Koma inu muziŵadalitsa , pakuti inuyo Mulungu adakuitanirani mkhalidwe wotere , kuti mulandire madalitso ake .
60003010	Paja mau a Mulungu akuti . " Yemwe afuna kukondwera ndi moyo , ndi kuwona masiku abwino , aletse lilime lake kulankhula zoipa , ndiponso milomo yake kunena mabodza .
60003011	Alewe zoipa , azichita zabwino . Afunefune mtendere ndi kuyesetsa kuupeza .
60003012	Paja Ambuye amaŵayang'anira bwino anthu olungama amatchera khutu ku mapemphero ao . Koma ochita zoipa saŵayang'ana bwino . "
60003013	Ndani angakuchiteni choipa ngati muchita changu pa zabwino ?
60003014	Koma ngakhale mumve zoŵaŵa chifukwa cha chilungamo , mudzakhala odala ndithu . Musachite mantha ndi anthu , kapena kuvutika mu mtima ,
60003015	koma muzilemekeza Khristu m'mitima mwanu ngati Mbuye wanu . Khalani okonzeka nthaŵi iliyonse kuŵayankha mofatsa ndi mwaulemu anthu okufunsani za zimene mumayembekeza .
60003016	Khalani ndi mtima wopanda kanthu koutsutsa , kotero kuti anthu ena akamasinjirira mayendedwe anu abwino pamene mukutsata Khristu , achite manyazi ndi chipongwe chao .
60003017	Nkwabwino kumva zoŵaŵa chifukwa chochita zabwino , ngati Mulungu wafuna choncho , koposa kumva zoŵaŵa chifukwa chochita zoipa .
60003018	Paja nayenso Khristu adafera machimo a anthu kamodzi kokha ; munthu wolungama kufa m'malo mwa anthu ochimwafe , kuti atifikitse kwa Mulungu . Pa za thupi adaphedwa , koma pa za mzimu adapatsidwa moyo .
60003019	Ndipo ali ngati mzimu choncho , adapita kukalalika kwa mizimu imene inali m'ndende .
60003020	Mizimuyi ndi ya anthu amene kale lija sadamvere pamene Mulungu adaadikira moleza mtima , pa nthaŵi imene Nowa ankapanga chombo . M'chombomo anthu oŵerengeka okha , asanu ndi atatu , adapulumuka ndi madzi .
60003021	Madziwo akufanizira ubatizo umene masiku ano umakupulumutsani chifukwa cha kuuka kwa Yesu Khristu . Kubatizidwa kumeneku si kuchotsedwa litsiro la m'thupi , koma kudzipereka kwa Mulungu ndi mtima woona , kudzera mwa Yesu Khristu
60003022	amene adapita Kumwamba , ndipo ali ku dzanja lamanja la Mulungu . Kumeneko angelo ndi maulamuliro ndi zimphamvu zimamvera Iye .
60004001	Tsono popeza kuti Khristu adamva zoŵaŵa m'thupi mwake , valani dzilimbe ndi maganizo omwewo , chifukwa munthu amene wamva zoŵaŵa m'thupi mwake , ndiye kuti walekana nawo machimo .
60004002	Choncho , pa nthaŵi yatsala yoti mukhale pansi pano , simudzatsatanso zilakolako za anthu , koma mudzatsata kufuna kwa Mulungu .
60004003	Paja kale mudakhala mukutaya nthaŵi yochuluka pakuchita zinthu zimene akunja amazikonda . Munkatsata zonyansa , zilakolako zoipa , kuledzera , dyera , maphokoso apamoŵa , ndi kupembedza mafano konyansa .
60004004	Anthu akunja amadabwa tsopano poona kuti mwaleka kuthamangira nao zoipitsitsa zimene iwo amachita mosadziletsa konse . Nchifukwa chake amalalata .
60004005	Koma iwo adzayenera kufotokoza okha mlandu wao kwa Mulungu amene ali wokonzeka kuweruza amoyo ndi akufa .
60004006	Nchifukwa chake Uthenga Wabwino udalalikidwa ndi kwa amene adafa omwe , kuti ngakhale adaweruzidwa m'thupi monga anthu , komabe mu mzimu akhale ndi moyo monga Mulungu .
60004007	Chimalizo cha zonse chayandikira . Nchifukwa chake khalani ochenjera ndi odziletsa , kuti muthe kupemphera .
60004008	Chachikulu nchakuti muzikondana mosafookera , popeza kuti chikondi chimaphimba machimo ochuluka .
60004009	Poyenderana , muzisamalirana bwino mosadandaula .
60004010	Aliyense mphatso imene adalandira kwa Mulungu azitumikira nayo anzake . Mukhale ngati akapitao ogwiritsa bwino ntchito mphatso zamitundumitundu zochokera kwa Mulungu .
60004011	Aliyense amene amalankhula , mau ake akhaledi mau ochokera kwa Mulungu . Aliyense amene amatumikira , atumikire ndi mphamvu zimene Mulungu ampatsa , kuti pa zonse Mulungu alemekezedwe mwa Yesu Khristu . Ulemerero ndi mphamvu ndi zake mpaka muyaya . Amen .
60004012	Inu okondedwa , musazizwe ndi chimoto cha masautso chimene chakugwerani kuti muyesedwe nacho . Musaganize kuti zimene zakuwonekeranizo nzachilendo .
60004013	Koma kondwerani popeza kuti mulikumva zoŵaŵa pamodzi ndi Khristu , kuti podzaoneka ulemerero wake , mudzasangalale kwakukulu .
60004014	Anthu akakuchitani chipongwe chifukwa cha dzina la Khristu , ndinu odala , chifukwa ndiye kuti Mzimu wa ulemerero , Mzimu wa Mulungu , wakhazikika pa inu .
60004015	Pakati panu pasakhale ndi mmodzi yemwe wogwa m'mavuto chifukwa choti wapha munthu , kapena waba , kapena wachita choipa , kapena waloŵerera za eniake .
60004016	Koma ngati mumva zoŵaŵa chifukwa chakuti ndinu akhristu , musachite manyazi , koma mulemekeze Mulungu chifukwa cha dzinalo .
60004017	Nthaŵi ndiye yafika yoti Mulungu ayambe kuweruza anthu ake . Tsono ngati chiweruzocho chiyambira pa ife , nanga podzafika pa osamvera Uthenga Wabwino wa Mulungu , ndiye kuti chidzakhala chotani ?
60004018	Paja mau a Mulungu akuti , " Ngati wolungama yemwe adzapulumuka movutikira , nanga munthu wochimwa , wonyozera za Mulungu , adzatani ? "
60004019	Nchifukwa chake anthu amene amamva zoŵaŵa monga Mulungu afunira , adzipereke m'manja mwa Mlengi wao wokhulupirika , ndi kumachitabe ntchito zabwino .
60005001	Tsopano ndili nawo mau akulu a mpingo amene ali pakati panu , ine mkulu mnzao . Ndinenso mboni ya zoŵaŵa za Khristu , ndipo ndikuyembekeza kudzalandira nao ulemerero umene uti udzaoneke .
60005002	Mau angawo ndi aŵa : ŵetani gulu la nkhosa za Mulungu zimene zili m'manja mwanu . Musaziyang'anire ngati kuti wina akuchita kukuumirizani , koma mofuna nokha , monga momwe afunira Mulungu . Musagwire ntchito yanuyo potsatira phindu lochititsa manyazi , koma ndi mtima wofunitsitsa kutumikira .
60005003	Musakhale ngati mafumu odzikuza potsogolera anthu amene muyenera kuŵayang'anira , koma onetsani chitsanzo chabwino kwa nkhosazo .
60005004	Ndipo pamene Mbusa wamkulu adzaonekera , mudzalandira mphotho yosafota yaulemerero .
60005005	Inunso anyamata , muzimvera akulu . Ndipo nonsenu , khalani okonzeka kutumikirana modzichepetsa . Paja mau a Mulungu akuti . " Mulungu amatsutsa odzikuza , koma amaŵakomera mtima anthu odzichepetsa . "
60005006	Nchifukwa chake mudzichepetse pamaso pa Mulungu wamphamvu , kuti pa nthaŵi yake adzakukwezeni .
60005007	Tulani pa Iye nkhaŵa zanu zonse , popeza kuti Iye ndiye amakusamalirani .
60005008	Khalani odziletsa , khalani maso . Mdani wanu Satana amakhala akuyenda uku ndi uku ngati mkango wobangula , kufunafuna woti amudye . ' Mulimbane naye mutakhazikika m'chikhulupiriro , podziŵa kuti akhristu anzanu pa dziko lonse lapansi nawonso alikumva zoŵaŵa zomwezi . 10 Koma mutamva zoŵaŵa pa kanthaŵi , Mulungu mwini amene nthaŵi zonse amakukomerani mtima , adzakukonzaninso , nadzakukhazikitsani pa maziko olimba . Ndiye amene adakuitanani , kuti pokhala limodzi ndi Khristu , mukalandire ulemerero wake wosatha . 11 Iye ndiye mwini mphamvu mpaka muyaya . Amen . 12 Kalatayi ndalembetsa Silivano mwachidule . Ndimamuwona kuti ndi mbale wokhulupirika . Ndafuna kukulimbitsani mtima , ndi kuchita umboni wakuti kukoma mtima kwenikweni kwa Mulungu nkumeneku . Chifukwa cha kukoma mtimako , limbikani . 13 Anzanu a mu mpingo wa ku Babiloni akuti moni . Marko , mwana wanga , nayenso akuti moni . 14 Mupatsane moni mwachikondi . Mtendere ukhale ndi inu nonse amene muli ake a Khristu .

61001001	Ndine , Simoni Petro , mtumiki ndi mtumwi wa Yesu Khristu . Ndikulemba kalatayi kwa anthu amene adalandira chikhulupiriro chomwe ifenso tidalandirako . Iwonso adachilandira chifukwa cha chilungamo cha Mulungu ndi Mpulumutsi wathu Yesu Khristu .
61001002	Mulungu akukomereni mtima ndi kukupatsani mtendere wochuluka , pakumdziŵa Iyeyo ndiponso Yesu Ambuye athu .
61001003	Mulungu mwa mphamvu zake adatipatsa zonse zotithandiza kukhala ndi moyo ndiponso opembedza , pakutidziŵitsa za Iyeyo amene adatiitana ku ulemerero ndi ubwino wake woposa .
61001004	Mwa ulemerero ndi ubwino wakewo adatipatsa madalitso aakulu ndi amtengowapatali amene Iye adatilonjeza . Adatero kuti mulandireko moyo wake wa Mulungu , mutapulumuka ku chivunde chimene chili pa dziko lapansi chifukwa cha zilakolako zoipa .
61001005	Tsono muyesetse kuchita khama kuwonjezera makhalidwe abwino pa chikhulupiriro chanu , ndi nzeru zoona pa makhalidwe anu abwinowo .
61001006	Muwonjezerepo kudziletsa pa nzeru zoonazo , kulimbika pa kudziletsa kwanu , ndiponso kupembedza Mulungu pa kulimbika kwanuko .
61001007	Pa kupembedzapo muwonjezerepo chifundo chachibale , ndipo pa chifundo chachibalecho muwonjezepo chikondi .
61001008	Ngati zonsezi zikhala mwa inu , nkumachuluka , simudzakhala olephera ndi opanda phindu pa nzeru zodziŵira Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
61001009	Paja munthu wopanda zimenezi ndiye kuti ngwakhungu , sangathe kuwona patali , ndipo waiŵala kuti adamtsuka machimo ake akale .
61001010	Nchifukwa chake abale , chitani changu koposa kale kutsimikiza kuti Mulungu adakuitanani ndipo adakusankhani . Mukatero simudzagwa konse .
61001011	Choncho adzakutsekulirani kwathunthu khomo loloŵera mu Ufumu wosatha wa Ambuye athu ndi Mpulumutsi wathu , Yesu Khristu .
61001012	Nchifukwa chake cholinga changa nchakuti ndizikukumbutsani zimenezi nthaŵi zonse , ngakhale mukuzidziŵa ndipo mumakhulupirira ndi mtima wonse choona chimene mudalandira .
61001013	Ndiyesa nkoyenera kuti , ndikadali mu msasa uno , nditsitsimutse mitima yanu pakukukumbutsani zimenezi .
61001014	Pakuti ndikudziŵa kuti nthaŵi yakutuluka mu msasa wanga uno yayandikira , monga andidziŵitsira Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu .
61001015	Ndipo ndidzayesetsa kukonza zoti nditachoka ine , muzidzatha kuzikumbukira zimenezi nthaŵi iliyonse .
61001016	Ife sitidatsate nthano zongopeka chabe , pamene tidakudziŵitsani za mphamvu zao ndi za kubweranso kwao kwa Ambuye athu Yesu Khristu . Koma tidachita kuuwona ndi maso athu ukulu wake .
61001017	Iye adalandira ulemu ndi ulemerero kwa Mulungu Atate , ndipo adamufikira mau ochokera kwa Atate aulemererowo akuti , " Uyu ndi Mwana wanga wokondedwa , amene ndimakondwera naye . "
61001018	Ndipo mau ameneŵa ifeifeyo tidaŵamva kuchokera kumwamba chifukwa tidaali naye pamodzi pa phiri loyera lija .
61001019	Motero tikudziŵa ndithu tsopano kuti mau aja a anereriŵa ngoona . Nkwabwino tsono kuti muŵayang'anitsitse ngati nyale yoŵala m'malo amdima , kufikira nthaŵi imene kudzayambe kucha , pamene nyenyezi yam'mamaŵa idzayambe kuŵala m'mitima mwanu .
61001020	Koma choyamba mumvetse kuti munthu payekha sangathe kumasulira mau a aneneri olembedwa m'Malembo .
61001021	Paja mau a aneneri sadadze konse ndi kufuna kwa munthu yekha , koma Mzimu Woyera adaŵalankhulitsa mau ochokera kwa Mulungu .
61002001	Komabe panali aneneri ena onama ngakhale pakati pa Aisraele omwe . Momwemonso pakati pa inu padzaoneka aphunzitsi onama . Iwowo adzaloŵetsa mwachinsinsi zophunzitsa zonama ndi zoononga , ngakhale kukana kumene Mbuye wao amene adaŵaombola , ndipo motero adzadziitanira chiwonongeko mwamsanga .
61002002	Ambiri adzatsata mkhalidwe wodzilekerera ndipo anthu adzanyoza njira ya choona chifukwa cha iwowo .
61002003	Chifukwa chokondetsa chuma , iwo adzayesa kupeza phindu pakukuuzani mau onyenga . Komatu chilango chao nchokonzeratu kale , ndipo chiwonongeko chao chikuŵadikira .
61002004	Pakuti Mulungu sadaŵalekerere angelo amene adachimwa aja , koma adaŵaponya m'ng'anjo yamoto , m'maenje amdima momwe ali omangidwa kudikira chiweruzo .
61002005	Mulungu sadaŵalekererenso anthu akale aja , koma adangosunga Nowa yekha , mlaliki wa chilungamo , pamodzi ndi anzake asanu ndi aŵiri , pamene adadzetsa chigumula pa dziko la anthu osasamala za Iye Mulunguyo .
61002006	Ndiponso Mulungu adaweruza mzinda wa Sodomu ndi wa Gomora naiwononga ndi moto , kuti chimenechi chikhale chitsanzo chochenjeza anthu amene adzakhale osasamala za Mulungu .
61002007	Koma adapulumutsa Loti munthu wolungama , amene ankavutika ndi makhalidwe odzilekerera a anthu ochimwa aja .
61002008	Munthu wolungama uja , pokhala pakati pao , analikumva ndi kuwona machitidwe ao oipa , ndipo tsiku ndi tsiku mtima wake wolungama unkavutikadi .
61002009	Ndiye kuti pamene anthu osamala za Mulungu akuyesedwa , Iye amadziŵa kuŵapulumutsa kwake . Koma amadziŵanso kusunga osalungama kuti alangidwe mpaka tsiku la chiweruzo .
61002010	Makamaka adzalanga anthu amene amatsata zilakolako zonyansa zathupi namanyoza ulamuliro . Aphunzitsi onyenga ndi odzikuza , osasamala munthu , saopa kuchita chipongwe aulemerero a Kumwamba .
61002011	Chonsecho ngakhale angelo , amene ali aakulu ndi amphamvu kuposa aphunzitsi onyengaŵa , sanyazitsa aulemererowo pamaso pa Ambuye .
61002012	Koma anthu aŵa ali ngati nyama chabe , zolengedwa zopanda nzeru , zobadwira kuti zizigwidwa ndi kumaphedwa . Amanyoza mwachipongwe zinthu zosazidziŵa . Ndipo monga nyama zija , iwo omwe adzaonongedwa ,
61002013	nadzalangidwa molingana ndi kuipa kwao . Chimene chimaŵakomera nkumangochita zokondweretsa thupi nthaŵi yamasana . Ali ngati mathotho ndi maŵanga onyansa , chifukwa podya nanu pamodzi amakondwera kuchita zonyenga .
61002014	Maso ao ndi adama , osafuna kuleka kuchimwa . Amanyengerera anthu a mtima wosakhazikika . Ali ndi mtima wozoloŵera kuumirira chuma . Anthu otembereredwa !
61002015	Adasiya njira yolungama , adasokera potsata njira ya Balamu , mwana wa Beori , amene ankafunitsa kupata mphotho pochita zosalungama .
61002016	Koma adadzudzulidwa chifukwa cha kulakwa kwakeko . Bulu , nyama yosalankhula , adalankhula ngati munthu , kuletsa zamisala za mneneriyo .
61002017	Aphunzitsi onyengaŵa ali ngati akasupe opanda madzi , ngati nkhungu yokankhidwa ndi mphepo yamkuntho . Mulungu adaŵasungira mdima wakuda wabii .
61002018	Iwowotu amalankhula mau odzitama auchitsiru , ndipo ndi zilakolako zonyansa zathupi amanyengerera anthu amene angopulumuka chatsopano pakati pa anzao oipa .
61002019	Amaŵalonjeza ufulu , chonsecho eniakewo ndi akapolo a chivunde . Pajatu munthu amasanduka kapolo wa chimene chamugonjetsa .
61002020	Chifukwatu ngati anthu apulumuka ku zodetsa za dziko lino lapansi , pakudziŵa Ambuye athu ndi Mpulumutsi wathu , Yesu Khristu , pambuyo pake nkugwidwanso ndi kugonjetsedwa ndi zoipa zomwezo , potsiriza adzakhala oipa koposa m'mene analiri poyamba .
61002021	Kukadakhala bwino kwa iwo akadakhala osadziŵa njira ya chilungamo , koposa kuileka atadziŵa lamulo loyera limene Mulungu adaŵapatsa .
61002022	Pakutero akutsimikiza kuti ngwoona mwambi uja wakuti , " Galu wabwerera ku masanzi ake , " ndi wina ujanso wakuti , " Nkhumba imene inasamba , yakunkhuliranso m'matope . "
61003001	Inu okondedwa , kalata ndikukulemberaniyi ndi yachiŵiri . M'makalata aŵiri onseŵa ndafuna kuutsa mitima yanu kuti mukhale ndi maganizo oona .
61003002	Kumbukirani mau amene aneneri oyera adanena kale , ndiponso lamulo la Ambuye ndi Mpulumutsi wathu limene atumwi adakupatsani .
61003003	Choyamba mumvetse izi : pa masiku otsiriza kudzafika anthu olalata , otsata zilakolako zao zoipa .
